34b5(mdo sde): dgra bzod pa gnyis pa'i khyad par ro//shar dang lho dang nub drang byang phyogs dang //steng dang 'og dang de bzhin phyogs 'tshams ni//thams cad na yang 'jig rten mgon
34b6(mdo sde): mthong //de ni bzod po gsum par bstan pa yin//gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sgra lus skye//'phrul pa bas mo gyis mi/khyab sprul nas ni//srog chags bye ba mngal
34b7(mdo sde): chos stan te//'di dag bzod pa gsum pa'i khyad par ro//sangs rgyas zhing 'di'i jo m+bu'i gling kun no//byang chub sems dpa' di ni snang bar 'gyur//'jog rten lha
35a1(mdo sde): dang lha min bcas par grags//'di dag bzod pa gsum pa'i khyad par ro//sangs rgyas spyod yul de bzhin cho ga dang //bde bar gshegs pa'i spyod
35a2(mdo sde): lam ci 'dra ba//kun la byang chub sems dpa' des bslabs te//'di dag bzod pa gsum pa'i khyad par ro//'jig rten khams 'di sems can ci yod pas//byang
35a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i bsngags pa brjod gyur la//de la yid ni rjes su dgar byed na//sangs rgyas ye shes la ni bslabs ma yin//'jig rten khams 'di'i sems can
35a4(mdo sde): su yod pas//byang chub sems dpa' la ni mi sbyin brjod//dri dag la ni yid kyis khro byed no//dpung sangs rgyas ye shes des ma bslabs//nor rnyed pas ni yid
35a5(mdo sde): bder mi 'gyur te//nor rnams ma rnyed na yang mi dga' med//ri dang 'dra ba'i sems lo rtag tu gnas//'dri dog bzod pa gsum pa'i khyad par ro//sgra yi rjes 'gro
35a6(mdo sde): bzod pa 'dri bstan te//bsam pa sgom pa rjes su mthun pa dang //thos pa las byung de ni skye ba med//'di la gang bslabs de ni byang chub lam//bzod pa bla na med pa
35a7(mdo sde): gsus po 'di//byang chub sems dpas na me zhig thob gyur na//mi mchog bde bar gshegs pa des mthong ste//rdul med byang chub tu'ang de lung ston//de nas
35b1(mdo sde): lung bstan pa ni de thob nas//sa yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos//zhing rnams 'od kyis shin tu gsal bar gyur//lha rnams bye ba me tog char pa 'bebs//de la lung
35b2(mdo sde): bstan dri yang thos nas ni//sems can bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas kyang //bdag cag mchod rten rgyal bar 'gyur snyam ste//byang chub dam pa mchog la sems skyed 'gyur//
35b3(mdo sde): nam zhig bla med bzod pa gsum po 'di//byang chub sems dpas thob par gyur pa na//de ni mi skye 'chi bar mi 'gyur te//de la 'chi 'pho med cing skye ba'ang med//nam zhig
35b4(mdo sde): bla med bzod pa gsum po 'di//rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpas thob gyur na//skye ba dang ni 'chi ba'ang mi mthong ste//chos rnams thams cad chos nyid gnas par
35b5(mdo sde): mthong //'di ltar mi bden par ni des rig ste//chos rnams sgyu ma lta bur rang bzhin stong //stong pa dag kyang mi mthong 'chi ba'ang med//chos 'di thams cad ngo bo nyid
35b6(mdo sde): kyis stong //nam zhig la las de la gus byas shing //rim gro bkur sti mchod pa byas ni yang //de la yid ni dga' bar mi byed de//chos rnams rang bzhin stong par de yis
35b7(mdo sde): shes//sems can dag gis spyos bsdigaso brdegs na yang //de dag la ni nga rgyalo khro mo srid//de dag sems can thar bor bya ba'i phyir//de dag la ni byams pa brtan
36a1(mdo sde): par skyed//rdo dang dbyug pa dag gis brdegs btsogs kyang //mkhas pa de la khro bar mi byed de//bdag med bzod la rab tu gnas pa la//du rgyal
36a2(mdo sde): dang ni khro ba'i tha ba med//'di ltar des ni mi bden nyid du shis//sgyu ma lta bur chos rnams rang bzhin stong //chos tshul de 'dra ba la de gnas na//lhar bcas 'jig rten
36a3(mdo sde): dag na shin tu bkur//nam zhig sems can dag ni mtshan thogs nas//de yi lus dang yan lag mang gtubs kyang //de dag la ni yid kyis khro ba med//snying rje byams
36a4(mdo sde): pA las kyang nyams mi 'gyur//de dag lus dang yan lag gcod pa'i tshe//de ni de la 'di ltar sems bskyed de//'di dag byang chub mchog la ma bkod par//de srid
36a5(mdo sde): zhi bar mya ngan nga mi 'da'//de 'dra'i bzod stobs bla na med pa la//bdag med bzod pa mnyam nyid gnas po yi//byang chub sems dpa' grags pa chen po yis//bskol
36a6(mdo sde): pa bye bor rtag tu shin tu bsgoms//de las lhag par gang+gA'i bye snyed du//ji tsam sangs rgyas mkhyen pas don mi byed//de srid byang chub reg pa ma yin na//de bzhin
36a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i ye shes ci zhig smos//grags pa chen po brjod pa mtha' yas pa//bdag medo bzod la rab tu gnas pa yi//bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab brkyang
36b1(mdo sde): brjod kyang //de yi bsngags pa zad par sla ba min//de phyir byang chub mchog rlab bla na med//ye shes phung po 'chang rgyar su 'dod pa//de ni rgyal bas bsngags pa'i bzod pa
36b2(mdo sde): sgoms//byang chub dam pa rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur//bzod pa la 'jug pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o///de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur
36b3(mdo sde): gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod cing /myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
36b4(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas par bya'o//gzhon nu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
36b5(mdo sde): dnga' chen po chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pa yin zhe na/gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i sems dnga'achen pos chos thams
36b6(mdo sde): cad dngos po med pa/ngo bo nyid med pa/mtshan ma med pa/mtshan nyid med pa/ma skyes pa/ma 'gegs pa/yi ge med pa/stong pa/gzod na nas ni ba/rlung
36b7(mdo sde): bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa yin par rab tu shes par bya'o//gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nam ches thams cad dngos po med pa/ngo ba nyid
37a1(mdo sde): med pa/mtshan ma med pa/mtshan nyid med pa/ma skyes pa/ma 'gags pa/yi ge med pa/stong pa/gzod ma nas zhi ba/rang bzhin gyis
37a2(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa yin par rab tu shes par gyur pa de'i tshe gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du chos thams cad kyi dngos po med
37a3(mdo sde): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes la
37a4(mdo sde): mkhas pa de ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos thams cad la 'dod chags par mi byed/zhe sdang bar mi byed/gti mug par mi byed do//de ci'i phyir
37a5(mdo sde): zhe na/'di ltar des chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /chos de mi dmigs te/gong 'dod chags pa dang gong la 'dod chags pa dang gang gis 'dod chags
37a6(mdo sde): pa dang gang zhe sdang ba dang gang la zhe sdang ba dang gang gis zhe sdang ba dang gang gti mug pa dang gang lo gti mug pa dang gang gis gti mug par 'gyur ba'i chos de des yang dag par rjes
37a7(mdo sde): su mi mthong zhing mi dmigs so//chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing ma dmigs na khams gsum thams cad la ma chags par 'gyur te myur du ting nge 'dzin
37b1(mdo sde): 'di thob bo//myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/chos rnams thams cad dngos po med
37b2(mdo sde): dra ste//thams cad mtshan ma med cing mtshan nyid med//skyes pa med cing 'gegs pa med par yang //de ltar chos rnams shin tu rig par gyis//thams cad dngos po
37b3(mdo sde): med cing yi ge med//stong pa zhi ba gzod nas dri ma med//de ltar chos rnams gang gis shes pa ni//gzhon nu de ni sangs rgyas zhes kyang brjod//de phyir rang bzhin
37b4(mdo sde): mnyam nyid rnams spros pa//ngo bo nyid kyis chos kun rang bzhin med//bde bar gshegs pa'i yum 'disu 'dod pa//rgyal ba rnams kyi yul 'di thob par 'gyur//
37b5(mdo sde): gzhon nu de lta bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/gzhon nu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa gangs med pa bas kyang rgyas gangs med pa/rgya che
37b6(mdo sde): ba/gzhal du med pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa/tshad med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang
37b7(mdo sde): zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
38a1(mdo sde): dngos po med pa las byung ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //gzhon nu 'di ji snyam du sems/ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dngos po med pa las byung
38a2(mdo sde): ba zhes bya zhe na/gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa de skyes me thag tu steng gi nam mkha' la ta la bdun tsam du 'phags nas gom pa bdun bor te tshig 'di skad gsung ngo //chos
38a3(mdo sde): thams cad dngos po med pa las byung ngo //chos thams cad dngos po med pa las byung ba'o zhes gsungs te/gzhon nu sgra de'i dbyangs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
38a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams go bar byas so//de nas sa'i lha nas bzung ste tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgra bsgrags shing dbyangs kyis rjes su go bar byas te/e ma de
38a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa 'di skyes mo thag tu steng gi nam mkha' la te la bdun srid du 'phags nas gom pa bdun bor te/dngos po med pa'i sgra 'byin pa las na dngos po med pa
38a6(mdo sde): las byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes mtshan dngos po med pa las byung ba/dngos po med pa las byung ba'o zhes btags so//bcom ldan 'das de byang chub thob pa na
38a7(mdo sde): shing thams cad kyi lo ma dang rtsa ba dang shing gal pa dang nags tshal thams cad dang ri'i rtse mo thams cad las kyang dngos po med pa las byung ba'o zhes sgra byung ngo //'jig rten gyi
38b1(mdo sde): khams de na slar btags pa ji snyed yod pa thams cad las dngos po med pa las byung ba'o zhes rnam par rig par byed pa'i sgra byung ngo //gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan
38b2(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po med pa las byung ba de'i gsung rab 'i rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje chen po sems zhes bye ba
38b3(mdo sde): gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa zhig byung ngo //gzhon nu de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje chen po sems de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
38b4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po med pa las byung ba ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan
38b5(mdo sde): gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po med pa las
38b6(mdo sde): byung bas rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje chen po sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas ting nge 'dzin 'di bshad do//de ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas rab tu dod de/sems rab tu
38b7(mdo sde): dad pas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig gyon nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //de rab tu byung nas ting nge 'dzin 'di bzung ste/bzung zhing bcangs
39a1(mdo sde): skyugs kun chub par byas nas sgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par gnas te/de dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskul pa bye ba phrag nyi shur nam yang ngan 'phro log
39a2(mdo sde): ngar ltung bar masong ngo //sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu mnyes par byas te/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan to//sangs rgyas
39a3(mdo sde): dag thams cad las mnyan nas kyang bzung ngo kun chub par byas so//bcangs so//bklags so//bton to/nyon mongs pa med par bsgoms shing mang du byas te/bsgom
39a4(mdo sde): pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par gnas so//de dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa nyi shu 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogaso pa'i sangs
39a5(mdo sde): rgyas don legs par bsams pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/des sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par byas/sems can tshad med
39a6(mdo sde): pa'i don byas nas de'i 'og tu shing zad pa'i me ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das so//gzhon nu de lta bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di byang chub
39a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gces spras byed pa ste/sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bla na med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin par rig par bya'o//de nas
39b1(mdo sde): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon+da nar gyur pa la sngon rung ba'i le'u 'di nyid rgyas par tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to//sngon
39b2(mdo sde): 'das dus kyi bskal pa bsam yas ni//mi yi gtso bo byung ba des dran te//drang srang chen po gzings kyis don mdzad pa//de ming dngos po med las byung zhes bya//skyes ma thag
39b3(mdo sde): tu mkha' la rab 'dug nas//chos rnams thams cad dngos po med par bstan//de tshe de dang mthun par mtshan btags te//sgras ni 'jig rten kun tu grags par byos//lha
39b4(mdo sde): rnams thams cad rab tu sgra 'byin pa//dngos po med ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur//skyes ma thag tu gom pa bdun bor to//rgyal bas chos rnams dngos po med par bshad//
39b5(mdo sde): thub pa chos rnams thams cad ston pa yi//sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal por na mi 'gyur tshe//rtsi shing gel ba ri dang brag rnams las//chos rnams dngos po med ces sgra
39b6(mdo sde): yang byung //'jig rten de na ji snyed sgra yod pa//thams cad dngos med ci'ang med pa zhes//de lta bur ni 'jig rten 'dren pa yi//sgra dbyangs rnam pa shin tu byung bar gyur//
39b7(mdo sde): de yi dus na rgyal po'i bu skyes pa//ming ni rtag tu snying rje sems zhes bya//shin tu gzugs bzang blta na sdug pa zhig/rgyal ba de yi drong du nyer 'ongs te//thub pa
40a1(mdo sde): mchog zhabs la phyag btsal nas//ri mor bcas pas bskor bar byas nas ni//rdul bral bla na med pa'i chos mnyan phyir//rab tu dang ba'i sems
40a2(mdo sde): kyis der 'dug go/rgyal ba dpa' bo des ni bsam mkhyen nas//ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu bshad pa mdzad//des ni rdul bral ting 'dzin 'di thos nas//rgyal mchog
40a3(mdo sde): bstan la myur bar rab tu byung //rab tu de byung ting 'dzin 'di yang ni//bzung zhing bklags te yongs su chub byas pas//bskal pa bye ba nyi shu tshang bar ni//log
40a4(mdo sde): par ltung po'i sar yang yang ma song //de ni dge bar byas pa'i las de yis//sangs rgyas bye phrag nyi shu mnyes par byas//rgyal ba de dag kun gyi drung du yang //ting
40a5(mdo sde): 'dzin zhi mchog 'di ni goms par byas//de phyis 'jig rten du yang sangs rgyas gyur//ming na don legs bsums shes rtag tu brjod//sems can bye ba mang
40a6(mdo sde): po'i don byas nas//phyi ma'i dus la me bzhin mya ngan 'das//dngos po med pa las byung ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o////'phags pa ting nge
40a7(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo//bam po gsum pa//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub
40b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji ltar na bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing /sems can thams cad
40b2(mdo sde): skyid pa'i rgya mtsho lngas bsgral bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/
40b3(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi rang bzhini mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya/gzung bar bya/bcang bar bya/kun chub par bya/klag par bya//
40b4(mdo sde): rab tu gdon par bya/lung nod cing kha ton du bya/nyon mongs pa med par sgom pas bsgom par bya/mang du bya/gzhan la'ang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o//de ci'i
40b5(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/gzhon nu chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
40b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams skyed pa ste/'di las de bzhin gshegs pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad byung ngo //gzhon nu de lta bas na khyod kyis kyang sangs rgyas thams cad
40b7(mdo sde): kyis bsdogs pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa/chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po gzung bar bya'o//de la
41a1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bya ste/de phyir byang chub tu ni 'tshang rgya zhing //srid pa'i mtsho las sems can sgrol 'dod pas//sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mdo sde 'di
41a2(mdo sde): gzung zhig/byang chub dam pa rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/gzhon nu de lta bas na byang
41a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas
41a4(mdo sde): chos zab mo bzod pa la mkhas par bya'o//gzhon nu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos zab mo bzod pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/gzhon
41a5(mdo sde): nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rab tu shes par bya'o//chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang smig rgyu lta bu dang brag ca
41a6(mdo sde): lta bu dang mig yor lta bu dang chu zla lta bu dang sprul pa lta bu dang gzugs brla ni lta bu dang nam mkha' lta bu rab tu shes par bya'o//gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems
41a7(mdo sde): dpa' chen pos nam chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes shing /chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang smig rgyu lta bu dang brag ce lta bu dang mig yor lta bu dang
41b1(mdo sde): rgyuchuzla lta bu dang sprul pa lta bu dang gzugs brnyan lta bu dang nam mkha' lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes pa de'i tshe/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
41b2(mdo sde): chen po 'di chos zab mo bzod pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//chos zab mo bzod pa dang ldan pa de 'dod chags par 'gyur ba'i chos la mi chags/zhi sdang bar 'gyur ba'i chos la mi
41b3(mdo sde): sdang /gti mug par 'gyur ba'i chos la mi rmongs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /chos de mi dmigs te/gang 'dod chags
41b4(mdo sde): pe dang grang la 'dod chags pa dang gang gis 'dod chags pa dang gang zhe sdang ba dang grang la zhe sdang ba dang gang gis zhe sdang ba dang gang gti mug pa dang gang la gti mug pa dang gang
41b5(mdo sde): gis gti mug par 'gyur ba'i chos de des yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing chos de mi dmigs so//chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing mi dmigs pas 'dod chags pa
41b6(mdo sde): med pa/zhe sdang ba med pa/gti mug pa med pa/sems phyin ci ma log pa/mnyam par bzhag pa zhes bya'o//spros pa med pa zhes bya'o//brgal ba pha rol tu phyin
41b7(mdo sde): pa zhes bya'o//skam pa phyin pa zhes bya'o//bde bar son pa zhes bya'o//mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya'o//tshul khrims can zhes bya'o//ye shes can zhes bya'o//shes
42a1(mdo sde): rab can zhes bya'o//bsod nams can zhes bya'o//rdzu 'phrul can zhes bya'o//dran pa can zhes bya'o//blo gros can zhes bya'o//rtogs pa can zhes bya'o//
42a2(mdo sde): ngo che shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o//brtan pa ldan pa zhes bya'o//spyod pabyung ldan pa zhes bya'o//sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o//nyon
42a3(mdo sde): mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o//ci'ang med pa zhes bya'o//dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o//thag pa zad pa zhes bya'o//nyon mongs pa med pa/dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/
42a4(mdo sde): sems shin tu rnam por grol ba/shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/cad shes pa/glang po chen po/bya ba byas pa byed pa byas pa 'khur bor ba/bdag gi don
42a5(mdo sde): rjes su thob pa/srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/sems
42a6(mdo sde): kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o//bram ze zhes bya'o//khrus byas pa zhes bya'o//pha rol tu song ba zhes bya'o//rig par byed
42a7(mdo sde): pa zhes bya'o//gtsang sbra can zhes bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi sras zhes bya'o//shAkya'o sras zhes bya'o//tsher ma dkrugs pa zhes bya'o//khrims ma dral ba zhes bya'o///
42b1(mdo sde): 'ongs dral ba zhes bya'o//'obs las brgal ba ces bya'o//zug rngu phyung ba ces bya'o//nad med pa ces bya'o//dge slong zhes bya'o//kun nas dkris pa med pa zhes bya'o///
42b2(mdo sde): skyes bu zhes bya'o//skyes bu dam pa zhes bya'o//skyes bu mchog ces bya'o//skyes bu tshon po zhes bya'o//skyes bu seng ge zhes bya'o//skyes bu glang po che zhes bya'o//skyes bu
42b3(mdo sde): nga shes po zhes bya'o//skyes bu ljid khyer ba zhes bya'o//skyes bu dpa' bo zhes bya'o//skyes bu rtul po che zhes bya'o//skyes bu me ta go ces bya'o//skyes bu pad+ma zhes bya'o//
42b4(mdo sde): skyes bu pad+ma dkar po zhes bya'o//skyes bu 'dul ba zhes bya'o//skyes bu zla ba zhes bya'o//skyes bu phal pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o//mi gos pa zhes bya'o//de nas
42b5(mdo sde): bcom ldani 'das kyis chos zab mo bzod pa la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bston pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//nam zhig 'jig rten khams
42b6(mdo sde): 'di 'byung ba dang //'jig rten thams cad nam mkhar gyur pa'i tshe//ji ltar sngon bzhin phyis kyang de bzhin te//chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis//
42b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di na ji snyed ci yod pa//chu yi phung po 'di ni 'og tu 'gro//'og tu ci 'drir steng du'ang de bzhin te//chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis//
43a1(mdo sde): ji lta bar srung byung bangadu skyon med las//skad cag tu ni sbyin kyad /la la khor spyad//thogs galas byung bar shes par //da na man nas rnams
43a2(mdo sde): cad shes par gyis//de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'das pa dag/ji ltar yid la byas bzhin gzugs brtan snang//sngon mtha'o ji bzhin gyis kyang de bzhin te/chos
43a3(mdo sde): rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis//ji ltar dbu ba mang po rnas pa dag/chu bos khyer ba skyes bus ngas mthong ste//de la brtags na snying po yong ni snang //chos
43a4(mdo sde): rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par zlos//d+hI ltar chur pa'i thigs chen bab pa ni//chu'i chu nga dag nI tha dang 'byung //byung nas nig stA nA ye r+g+ha bur med//chos
43a5(mdo sde): rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis//dzI ltar spring yig glong gzhan bskur ba las//dge dang mi dgra'i bya ba so sor 'byung //b+h+rUM las spring yig tu yang
43a6(mdo sde): 'phos pa med//chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis//ji ltar mi dag rlung gis myos nas ni//sa 'di kun tu 'khor snyam byed mod kyi//sa 'di
43a7(mdo sde): 'gul zhing gams pa'ang med pa ltar//chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis//ma long ngos dang 'bru mar snod rnams la//bud med kha ba nin
43b1(mdo sde): na pas smra smra//rjes rnyan du gas nas//'ad rgyu// na nga sgru ts+tsha //gas na
43b2(mdo sde): gas rgyun da mdzangs ///rlub sa nang du gas pa med// / nas
44a1(mdo sde): sprul te//rta dang glang po'i shing rta sna tshogs byas//de la ji ltar snang ba glang yang med//chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis//ji ltar
44a2(mdo sde): bu mo gzhon nu'i rmi lam na//bu pho byung zhing shi ba des mthong nas//byung nas dga' zhing shi nas mi dga' ltar//chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis//
44a3(mdo sde): ltar mtshan mo chu yi zla ba dag/dang zhing rnyog pa med pa'i chu nang snang //chu zla stong pa gsog ste gzung du med//chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis//ji
44a4(mdo sde): ltar sos kwa'i nyi ma phyed dus na//skyes bu skom pas gdungs shing 'gro ba yis//smig rgyu dag la chu'i phung por mthong //chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par
44a5(mdo sde): rjes//smig rgyu la yod chu ni yong med no//sems can rmongs pa de la 'thung 'dod do//mi bden tshun 'thung bar yong mi nus//chos rnams thams cad de bzhin
44a6(mdo sde): shes par gyis//ji ltar chu shing rlon pa'i sdong po la//snying po 'dod phyir skyes bus de bshags kyang //nang dang phyi rol kun na snying po med//chos rnams thams
44a7(mdo sde): cad de bzhin shes par gyis//mig dang rtsu ba sna yang tshad ma min//lce dang lus dang sems kyang tshad ma min//dbang po 'di dag gal te tshad yin na//'phags
44b1(mdo sde): pa'i lam gyis su la ci zhig bya//'di ltar dbang po 'di dag tshad min zhing //ngo bo nyid kyis bems po lud ma bstan//de phyir mya ngan 'da' ba'i lam 'dod pa//des ni
44b2(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i lam gyis bya ba byos//lus la sngon gyi tha ma rab brtags na//de la lus med lus su 'du shes med//gang la lus med lus su shes med pa//de ni 'dus
44b3(mdo sde): ma byas kyi rigs zhes bya//mya ngan 'das pa'i chos la chos med do//gang phyir 'di med nam yang yod mi 'gyur//rtog can dag gi yod dang med ces bya//de ltar spyod pa
44b4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal zhi mi 'gyur//yod dang med ces bya ba gnyi ga mtha'//gtsang dang mi gtsang 'di yang mtha' yin te//de phyir gnyis ka'i mtha' ni rnam spangs nas//
44b5(mdo sde): mkhas pa dbus la'ang gnas par yod mi byed//yod dang med ces bya ba rtsod pa ste//gtsang dang mi gtsang 'di yang rtsod pa yin//rtsod par gyur pa sdug bsngal ni mi
44b6(mdo sde): 'gyur//rtsod pa med par gyur pa sdug bsngal 'gag/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i gtam byas te//byis pa bdag nyid lus la mngon sum snyems//lus la mngon sum gyur
44b7(mdo sde): pa rlom sems med//de ni rlom sems mang po thams cad spangs//bsam gtan bzhi dag gi yang gtam byas nas//byis pa bdag nyid bsam gtan spyod yul smra//
45a1(mdo sde): byasam gtan nyon mongs med cing rlom sems med//shes pas rtogs nas dregs pa rab tu spyongs//bden pa bzhi yi gtam rnams byas nas
45a2(mdo sde): kyang /byis pa bdag nyid bden pa mthong zhes zer//bden pa mthong la rlom sems gang yang med//rlom sems med pa bden pa rgyal bas gsungs//tshul khrims
45a3(mdo sde): srung zhing de yis snyems mi bya//chos rnams mnyan zhing des ni mi snyems te//gang dag shes rab chung ngu de snyems pa//rtsa ba de las de yi sdug bsngal 'phel//'jig
45a4(mdo sde): rten 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa yis///dregs pa sdug bsngal rtsa ba yin par bstan//rgyags pas dregs pa sdug bsngal rab tu 'phel//rlom sems med
45a5(mdo sde): pa sdug bsngal 'gag par 'gyur//ji snyed tsho snga mang longs su chub byas nas//thos pas rgyogs shing tshul dri mas mi srung na//tshul khrims 'chal pas ngan
45a6(mdo sde): 'gror de 'gro la//thos pa mang pos de la skyob mi nus//gal te tshul khrims grags pas de rgyags shing //ming du thos li brtson par mi byed na//tshul khrims
45a7(mdo sde): 'bras bu ma lus zad nas ni///phyir yang sdug bsngal rab tu myong bar 'gyur//'jig rten dag na ting 'dzin sgom byed kyang //de ni bdag tu 'du shes gzhig ni byed///
45b1(mdo sde): deyi nyon mongs phyir yang rab tu ldang //lhag spyod kyis ni ting 'dzin 'dir bsgoms bzhin//gal te bdag med chos la rab rtog cing //de dag brtags nas gal te sgom byed
45b2(mdo sde): na//'bras bu myo ngan 'das thob rgyu de yin//rgyu gzhan de dag zhi bar 'gyur mi srid//mi zhig chom rkun mang pos rab gtses nas//'tshe bar 'dod pas bros shing 'gror
45b3(mdo sde): brtsal ni//de yi rkang pa 'gro zhing rgyug ma nus//chom rkun ngag gis de bzung bcom pa ltar//de bzhin tshul khrims nyams pa rmongs pa'i mi//'dus byas dag las
45b4(mdo sde): 'bros par 'dod mod kyi//tshul khrims nyams pas de yang 'bros mi nus//na rga 'chi ba dag gis shin tu btsem//ji ltar mi rgod stong phrag mang po dag/rnam pa du
45b5(mdo sde): ma'i sgo nas sdigs pa byed//dra bzhin nyon mongs sgo rnams du ma nas//mi rgod bzhin du dge ba'i phyogs rnams 'joms//gang gis phung po bdag med rab brtags te///
45b6(mdo sde): spyos shing brgyad kyang zhum par mi 'gyur ba//nyon mongs bdud kyi dbang du de mi 'gro/stong pa shes pa de la 'khrug pa med//'gro mang phung po stong par ston mod kyi//ji ltar
45b7(mdo sde): bdag med de dag mi shes te//mi shes de dag gzhan gyis bergal na yang //khro ba'i zil gyis non cing tshig nub sgra//mi dog na zhing lus ni sdug bsngal te//lo grangs
46a1(mdo sde): mang por res 'ga' mthar pa//de ni yun ring nad kyis nyon mongs pas//nAd rnams gso ba'i phyir yang sman pa btsal//yang dang yang ni de sa
46a2(mdo sde): btsal ba dang //sman pa mkhas shing rig pa des rnyed de//des kyang snying rje nye bar bzhag nas ni//sman 'di btong bar gyis shig smras pa dang //sman mang bzang shing
46a3(mdo sde): phangs pa des blangs nas//na ba 'tshe bar 'gyur ba'i sman mi 'thung //sman pas ma lan sman gyis mnyes te//nad pa de nyid kyis ni nyes pa yin//de ne bstan pa
46a4(mdo sde): 'di la rab byung ste//stobs dang bsam gtan dbang po kun rig nas//sgom pa la ni mngon par brtson mi byed//rigs par mi brtson ga la mya ngan 'da'//
46a5(mdo sde): tu chos kun rang bzhin stong pa ste//rgyal ba'i sras rnams dngos po rnam par 'jig/srid pa thams cad yod ye stong pa ste//nyi tshe'i stong pa mu stegs can dag gi
46a6(mdo sde): mkhas pa byas pa dag drang rtsod mi byed//byis pa dag ni ri mor byas nas spongs//zhe sdang sems kyis bdag gi drang 'ong zhes//byis pa'i chos lnga brtan par yong mi byed///
46a7(mdo sde): byis pa dag gi rang bzhin rgyud rig nas//bas pa byis po dag dang mi 'grogs te//ji srid du ni byis pa legs bsnyen kyang //de dag phyir yang dag dang 'dra bar
46b1(mdo sde): 'gyur//mkhas pabris pa dgral yod mi rton//mkhas dang byis pa'i rang bzhin chos nyid ni//byis pa'i rang bzhin dang tshul tha dad de//so so'i skye bo la ni mdze'
46b2(mdo sde): ba med//chos dang ldan pa'i tshig tu smras na ya //yid mi cheso dang zhe sdang khro ba dag/mngon par ston pa 'di ni byis pa'i tshus//don 'di rnam par rig pas yid mi
46b3(mdo sde): rton//byis pa dang ni byis par mthun 'byor pa//ci ltar mi gtsang ba dang mi rga tsang drazhin//mkhas pa dag ni mkhas pa'i skye ba dang //mthun zhing 'byor pa mar dang nying
46b4(mdo sde): khu bzhin//'khor ba'i nyes la so so rol brtags te//las kyi rnam par smin la mi 'jug cing //sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshig la ma dad pas//byos pa de dag bcad
46b5(mdo sde): cing gtub par 'gyur//mi thob rab tu rnyed dka' zhing nas ni//bcoM yi gnas dag la ni mkhas ma gyur//dbul por gyur cing nor yang yong med de//de nas 'tshor
46b6(mdo sde): med pas rab tu 'byung //sangs rgyas bstan+ya 'dir de dgar 'byung nas//lhung bzed chos gos dag la tshugs par 'gyur//de dge smig pa'i grogs pos yongs zin
46b7(mdo sde): ngas//bde bar gshegs pa'i dasla pa mi spyod do//de dag 'dag gi tshul khrims ma mthong bas//byis pa dag ni sems gnas mi rnyed cing //nyin mtshan nal 'a
47a1(mdo sde): la yang mi brtson pas//de dag sdig pa'i lam la smod mi byed//lus dang sems ni shin tu mi sdom pa//de ni trog tu mi smra ci yang med//su
47a2(mdo sde): yis nyes pa ci byas brgal lo zhes//rtag tu gzhan gyi nyes pa 'tshol zhing rtog/byis pa dag ni zas la chags gyur nas//zas la tshad rig par ni mi byed de//sangs
47a3(mdo sde): rgyas bsod nams kyis ni zas rnyed kyang //de la byis pa byas pa gzo mi 'gyur//de dag kha zas ro zhim bsod pa dag/rnyed nas rnal 'byor mi brtson za zhing 'thung //
47a4(mdo sde): de dag la ni zas de gdug par 'gyur//bal glong phra gros rtsa ba ma bkrus bzhin//mkhas shing rtogs pa blo gros ldan pa ni//kharba so bzang po gtsang ma za med kyi//
47a5(mdo sde): de dag la ni chags par mi 'gyur te//ma chags bzhin du za zhing rnal 'byor brtson//mkhas shing rtogs pa bro gros ldan pa dag/byis pa gang nas legs par
47a6(mdo sde): 'ongs zhes smra//de bzhin snyan pa'i tshig gis nyer bsdus nas//de dag la ni snying rje nye bar 'jog/byis pa la na gang phan snying brtse bo//de la gnod pa byung na byis
47a7(mdo sde): pa dga'//de lta'i nyes phyir byas pa rnam spangs te//ri dgas bzhin du gcig pu dgon par gnas//mkhas pas 'di 'dra'i nyes pa rig nas ni//shes rab
47b1(mdo sde): draman bsten bdag ni n+ya zo ba nyams//byang chub thob par ga la 'gyur snyam ste//byis pa rnams dang nam yang yong mi snyan//byams pa la ni mkhas pa gnas par 'gyur//
47b2(mdo sde): snying rje dag la gnas shing dga' smod dang //srid pa kun la rtag tu btang snyoms pa//ting nge 'dzin bsgoms byang chub reg par 'gyur//mya ngan med zhi byang chub nges rtogs
47b3(mdo sde): shing //sems can na rgas gi zor bar rig nas ni//de la snying rje rab tu nyer gzhag ste//don dam ldan pa'i gauta ma rnams ston par byed//rgyal ba'i chos nyid brjod du
47b4(mdo sde): med pa dang //bde bar gshegs pa'i bden pa sus shes pa//de dag 'di lta bu yi chos thos nas//'phags pa zang zing med pa'i bzod pa thob//chos zab mo la bzod
47b5(mdo sde): nga'i le'u ste dgu pa'o////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/gzhon nu de lta bas na nan tan snying por bya'o/
47b6(mdo sde): zhes gzhon nu khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzhan nu byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po nan tan snying por byed pa la bla na med pa yang dag par
47b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rnyed par dka' ba mo yin na ting nge'odzin ci smos/de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig
48a1(mdo sde): tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
48a2(mdo sde): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gdams pa dang /rjes su bstan pa 'di
48a3(mdo sde): legs par bstan cing legs par bkod pa dang /byang chub semaso dpa'i bslab pa thams cad bstan te/legs par bshad pa dang legs par bkod pa bcom
48a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa'ang ma lags na mu stegs
48a5(mdo sde): can gzhan gyi lta ci smos/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang nan tan snying por bgyis te lus dang srog la'ang mi lta bar bgyis la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su slob bo//
48a6(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su slob par 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
48a7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chung mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bdud sdig can shin tu ge zhig par 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das bdag
48b1(mdo sde): ni sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang sdug bsngal thams cad las bskal bar 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa bdag gi spyi bo la bzhag par
48b2(mdo sde): gsol//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/nam mkha'i 'dre zhing rdul bral gzugs bzang 'chang //shes rab sras po lus dang mtshon mi mnga'//yon tan rgya mtsho rab zab
48b3(mdo sde): thugs rje can//mtshungs med phyag ni bdag gi spyi bor no//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba du ma las byung ba/mtshan sna
48b4(mdo sde): tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan pa/lha'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor bzhag gi/bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor phyag
48b5(mdo sde): yas pa bzhag ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la dpa' bar 'gro po dang nam mkha' mdzod dang rdo rje lta bu dang yid ltar mgyogs pa dang gzugs thams
48b6(mdo sde): cad ston pa dang sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ston pa dang stong pa nyid thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa la sogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
48b7(mdo sde): pa las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bye bakhrag khrig brgya stong du ma brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag mngon du gyur to//gzungs dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo du ma mngon du
49a1(mdo sde): gyur to//dga' ba dang bde ba gang de 'phags pas brjod pa/lha yul pa rgya che zhing dpe med pa/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod
49a2(mdo sde): yul du rig pa rab tu thob bo//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dra bas mdzes 'brel bum pa lcags kyu'i mtshan mnga' zhing //dpal be'u 'khor lo rgyal mtshan ba dran nya ris
49a3(mdo sde): mngar//bskal pa bye mang rin chen gtong la zhugs pa'i phyag/bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nu'i spyi bor bzhag//de nas lha yul pa rgya che zhing dpe med pa/sangs
49a4(mdo sde): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yul du rig pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba dang ldan par gyur nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
49a5(mdo sde): nos pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su
49a6(mdo sde): bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod do//bla med mi 'jigs sbyin pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//gzhan phan sems can gnyen rtsa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//stobs
49a7(mdo sde): bcu bden pa'i rol mnga' khod la phyag 'tshal lo//bde gshegs mi mnyam mnyam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//mgon po shin tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo//
49b1(mdo sde): dpa' bo klu ba ni rnam par btul la phyag 'tshal lo//brtson pa dam pa'i don rnams mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo//chos kyi sku mchog mnga' ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo//skyong
49b2(mdo sde): rje byams 'di rgyal ba'i nyi ma mun sel po//shes rab shin tu yangs pa'i nam mkha'i dkyil du sha ro//don dam shin tu zab pa'i chos rnams ston myed da pa//lha khyod la ni rtag
49b3(mdo sde): tu bdag kyang skyabs su mchi//de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das
49b4(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang dge slong gi dge 'dun dang btsas pa sang bdag go sdum
49b5(mdo sde): par bshos gsol bar thugs la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/bdag gi sdum par gtsang ma'i bshos gsol bar //mi dbang sras dang btsas
49b6(mdo sde): la gsol ba 'debs//thub pa'i dbang po bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir//mgon po lha yi gtso bos gnang bar mdzod//de nas bcom ldanan 'das cang mi gsung bar
49b7(mdo sde): gyur te/zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/byango chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i
50a1(mdo sde): khyim du sang bshos gso bar cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo //de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur pas
50a2(mdo sde): gnang bar rig nas ston las langs te bla gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
50a3(mdo sde): babyas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo //de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa bye rgod kyi phung po'i raM las babs nos de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas ri'i rgyal
50a4(mdo sde): pa byo rgod kyi phung po'i byeng du de'i bar kI lam thams cad legs par brgyan to/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bye ba'i phyir lam yangs shong che la rje dang sdong du ma dang
50a5(mdo sde): tshetshor ma dang rdo dang gyo mo dang gseg ma med par bsal te bye ma gtsang mas bdal nas/ka tsa lin+di ka ltar 'jam zhing reg na bde ba/dbyangs dga' bar byas te/lha'i mi
50a6(mdo sde): to ut+pa la dang pad+ma dung ku mu da dang pad+ma dkar po dang dri mchog dang a ti muk+ta ka dang ma li ka dang tsam+ba ka dang skya nar dang kun+da dang ti lA kra dang kaM sa ra dang mya nga nr-i 'tshang la sogs
50a7(mdo sde): pa dus thams cad kyi me tog bzang pos ni kun tu khebs par byas/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan rang po don dang rnam pa rgyal ba'i bden pa che'i rta babs dang blar
50b1(mdo sde): ning+ges/rin po che'i 'dug spos kyi sngod sna tshogs ni ngos la sbyangs/rin po che'i bdug spos kyi snod de dag thams cad nas ni a ga ru nag pos gang ba'i du ba 'thul/phyogs
50b2(mdo sde): phyogs su ni bro mkhan dang gar mkhani lha'i glu gang dang rol mo shin tu 'byor cing legs par bslabs pa rnams bkod/skyes pa dang bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo shin+da tu brtson pa
50b3(mdo sde): dang 'khar rnga dang tu Na ba dang pi wang rgyud gcig pa dang pi wang dang gr-igling bu dang rdza rnga dang rnga mu kuN+Da dang rdza rnga chen po thogs pa rnams bkod/lam gyi ngos gnyis su shing ta la mthon
50b4(mdo sde): po lha'i rin po che sna tshogs dang dzam+b+ha chu bo'i gser las byas pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bres shing smre 'khrol bas brgyan pa rnams dang rin po che sna tshegs kyi mkha' rten bye ba khrag
50b5(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong du mi dang /rin po che sna bdun gyi shing sde tshogs khyen dang sboms su ldan pa sna tshogs dang dus thams cad kyi lo ma dang /me tog 'bras bu phun sum tshogs
50b6(mdo sde): bi dgra btsugs so//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/lam ni sna tshogs shin tu legs par brgyan//bla res dang ni gdugs dang ba dan sgreng //sili snyan dag gi sgra dag rab
50b7(mdo sde): tu 'byin//glu sgra yid du 'ong ba'ang de bzhin to//bud med mang po dro rdung gar byed dang //gos bzang khrag khrig rnam mang sna tshogs dang //me tog phreng ba bzang zhing mdzes
51a1(mdo sde): pa yis//'am mchog yangs pa de ni rab tu brgyan//grong mchog gtsang ma 'dir ni thugs rje can//sangs rgyas thub pa'i zla ba gshegs so zhes//zla
51a2(mdo sde): 'od gzhon nus dad pa rab bskyed nas//rgya che yangs pa'i lam nr-i shin tu brgyan//lha rdzas kyi ni bye ma gtsang me bdul//rab tu yi 'ang me tog mchog rnams bkram//
51a3(mdo sde): rin chen rta babs dag kyang logs par btsugs//lam ni lha yi grong khyer bzhin du mdzes//zla 'od gzhon nu shin tu yid dga' bas//de ltar lam rnams sna tshogs
51a4(mdo sde): legs brgyan te//lha dang lha min klu yis de mthong nas//ngo mtshar gyur cing a la la zhes smra//lam gyi g.yas g.yon dzam+bu'i chu gser gyi//tA li mtho zhing bzang
51a5(mdo sde): la zlum pa dag/rin chen dril bu'i dri bras g.yogs shing dkris//skye 'khrol rnam pa du ma mang po btsugs//de bzhin rin tshon sdong po khrag khrig ni//dus kun gyi
51a6(mdo sde): yang me tog rgyas pa btsugs//de yis yangs pa'i lam brgyun mdzes gyur pa//mtho ri srin ni dga' ba'i tshal bu bzhin//rin po che las byas pa'i mkha' rten ni//
51a7(mdo sde): dra ba'i chun po 'od 'bar shin tu mdzes//dpe med mthong zhing tshe la rgyas pa dag/lam gyi g.yas g.yon 'gram du btsugs shing bkod//sangs rgyas 'jig rten
51b1(mdo sde): desum dbang gang nas ni//rgyal po'i khab kyi grong du gshegs pa yi//lam chen de ni de dag rab brgyan pas//rnam pa thams cad du yang mdzes par gyur//g.yas
51b2(mdo sde): grwa yan su ni rin chen pog por sbyangs//de dag a ga ru yang nag bos bkang //phog par kun nas du ba sprin bzhin 'khrigs//lha'i dri zhim rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung /
51b3(mdo sde): srid grong khyer chu dron sgo bar dngong //ri rgyal bya rgod phung po ji srid par//zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas rgyal ba'i phyir//lha rdzus dpe med yangs pas brgyan pa byas//de nas
51b4(mdo sde): 'od gzhon nur gyur pas lam de rin po che bgrod pa rnam pa sna tshogs du mas brgyan pa byas nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa bya rgad kyi phung po'i ri las babs te/rgyal po'i khab
51b5(mdo sde): kye grong khyer chen po gang na ba dang rang gi lha'i khyim mtho zhing tshe la yangs pa gang na yod po der song ste phyin nas reng gi khyim du zhugs so//zhugs nas bza' ba dang bca' ba
51b6(mdo sde): drang myed pa mang zhing bzang ba g.yor bcug ste/zhal zas ro sna brgya pA skyur nas de'i mtshan mo 'dus pa dang rgyal po'i khrab kyi grong khyer chen po chag chag legs par btab//
51b7(mdo sde): bye daro legs par byas nas me tog sil mi ni bkram/'dug spos kyis ni bdugs/bla re ni dras/dor gyi lnga ldi dang chun po ni sbyangs/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang
52a1(mdo sde): ba dan ni bsgreng so//de ltar rgyal po khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i lam srang dang grong bar du bcas pa rdo dang gyo mo dang gsog ma med par byas/me tog sa
52a2(mdo sde): tshogs ni bkram/tsan+dan gyi phye mas ni gtor/skar khung dang rta blang sa dang sgo khang dang ba gam dang skar khung dra ba ris dang zla ba kham pa lta bus ni brgyan tsong tsan+dan gyis byug
52a3(mdo sde): pa byas te/de ltar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po dpag tu med pa'i bkod pas rab tu brgyan nas/rang gi khyim yang rgyan sna tshogs pa rnam pa du mas brgyan te/rin po
52a4(mdo sde): che'i phreng ba rnam pa du ma ni rab tu sbyangs/dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i gos kyis ni brgyan cing nye 'khor yang mdzes par byas/phreng ba dang lda ldi rnam pa tha dad pa du mas ni brgyan
52a5(mdo sde): pa byed du bcug/rin po che'i sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du maM ni 'dring du bcug ste/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das kyi lha
52a6(mdo sde): rdzas kyi seng ge'i khri lha'i dang mi'i las 'das pa bshams so//rin po che'i sna tshogs kyi pog phar ni phyogs bzhir sbyangs te/de dag nas a ga ru 'ba' zhig gi du ba
52a7(mdo sde): 'thul bar byas so//rgyu zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas khyim mchog de'ang 'di lta ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir lha'i glu gar dang sil snyan ni
52b1(mdo sde): bsgrags/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan ni sgreng /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang /
52b2(mdo sde): mi ma yin pa brgya stong gis na gang zhing rnam par bltas/rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs rnam pa du mas ni gang bar byas so//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/zla 'od kyis ni khyim
52b3(mdo sde): mchog yangs pa ying //rgya cher thams cad shin tu brgyan par byas//gang la 'jig rten sgron ma bzhugs pa yi///lha rjes seng ge'i khri ni dbus su btsugs//'jig rten
52b4(mdo sde): sgron mdzad rgyal ba gtso bo yi//dge 'dun dag ni grang lnga 'dug 'gyur ba//rin chen shin tu rnam par bkra ba'i stan//bye ba stong phrag mtha' yas legs par bting //rin chen
52b5(mdo sde): sna tshogs kun gyi bdug spos snod//oM gA ru yis shin tu gang byas te//phyogs rnams thams cad du'ang rnam par spangaso//de dag nas ni yid 'ong dri rnams 'thul//zla 'od
52b6(mdo sde): kyis ni stobs bcu gshegs pa'i phyir//rin chen me tog mdzes pa sna tshogs pal me tog dri mchog bzang po rnam mang gis//khyim gyi sa gni bzang po kun tu bkram/
52b7(mdo sde): gar byed bruM len sil snyan sgra dag gis//khyim mchog thams cad kun tu sgra yis gong rgya//gdugs dang ba dan dag kyang shin tu sgreng //khyim kun lam mer mdzes pa lha mi
53a1(mdo sde): ngan//zla 'od gzhon nu'i khyim mchog chen pa yang //skyes bran chung tshogs kyis rgyun gyur cing //klud dang /'ad sbyin l+h+wa man mang pos gang //du
53a2(mdo sde): phrag mang po'i lha yis rnam par bltas//de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'ang brgyan/bdag gi khyim yang legs par brgyan nas de
53a3(mdo sde): mtshan mo 'das pa dang /nung par snga rab kyi dus kyi cha sil snyan sna chags brgya dag ni rab tu dkyil godugs dang rgyal mtshan dang bdun bye ba du ma ni sgreng ste/byang chub sems
53a4(mdo sde): dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu thams cad kyang lha'i me tog man+do ras snyim pa bkang ste/de dag las la la ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
53a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po 'od lta ste/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mthu chen thob dang spos kyi glang po che dang rin po che'i tog dang mngon par 'byung dka' dang 'jam dpal
53a6(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa dang dpa' bo'i sde dang lag bzang dang rin chen me tog dang mthong ba don yod dang byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos yongs su
53a7(mdo sde): bskor cing mdun du bder te/rje dang ba lang du ma shin tu brgyan cing mazhon par khrid pa mang po dang 'dres pa/gzhan yang yul gyi mi dpag tu med pa'i tshogs dang
53b1(mdo sde): bdag nyid kyang lha'i me tog man+dA ras snyim pa bkang ste byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul chen po dang /byung
53b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i a la la zhes lha'i gzhi'i sgra yid du 'thad cing yid du 'ong ba yid 'phrog pa dag sgrog cing /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i chu dron gyi sgo nas phyir byung ste/ri'i
53b3(mdo sde): rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang /bcom ldan 'dis ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la len
53b4(mdo sde): gsum bskor ba byas nas lha'i me tog man+da ra bas snyim pa grang baMs bcom ldan 'das le mngon par gtor te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems
53b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskur ba byas te/so so'i snyim pa na me tog
53b6(mdo sde): man+dA ra ba yod pa des bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa stan las langs te/bla gos
53b7(mdo sde): phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bya btud nas gdugs tshed la bab pa/bcom ldan
54a1(mdo sde): 'das bshos gtsang sbyar lags te/dwa de'i dus la bab par bcom ldan 'das kyis rga dang /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun drang dge slong gi dge 'dun
54a2(mdo sde): du bcas pa dang dbang che ba/dbang che bor grags pa rgya che zhing rlabs che ba'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri zo dang lha ma yin dang drang srong dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye
54a3(mdo sde): chen po dang grul bum dang yi dgas dang srul po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa dag dang yang thabs cig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs shing bdag gi sdum par yang
54a4(mdo sde): gdugs tshod gsol ba'i dus la bab po//bde bar gshegs pa gdugs tshod la bab po//de la 'di skad ces bye ste/bdag gis grong khyer mchog kun legs par brgyan///
54a5(mdo sde): mgon po bdag gi sdum pa'ang de bzhin te//lha yi zhal zas ro brgya bshams shing sbyar//gdugs tshod bab kyis bde gshegs bzhengs su gsol//drang srong mchog gis
54a6(mdo sde): phyag bgyis skyobs bcu yon tan 'chang //sras kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing grong du gshegs//snang byed nyi ma mun pa'i tshogs sel bzhengs su gsol//bcom
54a7(mdo sde): ldan bdag gi sdum par bshos gsol gdugs tshod bab//sras dang thabs cig bdag gi sdum par gshegs su gsol//'gro ba mang po'i tshogs kyi don kyang bgyis
54b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur//ji ltar mar me mdzad kyis khyod la lung bstan pa//de bzhin bdag kyang 'jig rten mngon sum lung ston cig/bdag 'dir lung bstan 'jig rten thos nas ni/sems
54b2(mdo sde): kyang mchog tu rgya cher rab bskyed de//'gro ba 'di dag thams cad sangs rgyas 'gyur//'di na snod min sems can gang yang med//bzhengs shig bzhengs shig stobs bcu
54b3(mdo sde): mnga' ba'i lha//bdag la rjes su phan mdzod sdum par gshegs//ji ltar bdag gi sdum par khyod gshegs pa//de bzhin byang chub shing dbang drung bdag mchi//byang chub
54b4(mdo sde): shing dbang de drung bdag mchis nas//mig yo mo 'gul bar ni gnas btsas te//byams pas sngar bcas bdud rnams pham bgyis nas//khyod kyis brnyes bzhin byang chub
54b5(mdo sde): thob par bgyi//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'odra gzhon nur gyur pa'i gsol ba mkhyen nas/zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad pas slar bka' stsal po/longs
54b6(mdo sde): shig zla 'od rgyal ba'i sras//longs shig sbyin dga' sems can mchog/longs shig snying rje tshul khrims brtan//zan la dang ni khyim du 'dong //de nas bcom ldan
54b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs nos sngar gdan las bzhengs te/sham thabs gsol/chos gos dang lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong 'bum du tshang ba'i dge slong
55a1(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu mang pos bskor cing mdun du bdar te/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang
55a2(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang drang srong dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang grul bum dang yi dgas dang srul po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong du mis mchod cing mngon par
55a3(mdo sde): bstod nas/sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam gyis 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya
55a4(mdo sde): stong ni rab tu gtong //sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni rab tu dkrol//gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni mngon par sgreng //gzugs
55a5(mdo sde): dang kha dog rags pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ngad pa dang khrung khrung dang ngur pa dang bzhad dang tsa kau ra dang rma bya dang tsa sha dang ri skegs dang khu byug dang ka la ping+ga dang ku ni la la stsogs pa
55a6(mdo sde): bya'i khyu mang po du ma sgra snyan cing 'jam la yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma 'byin pas ni bar snang la lha bzhin du so so'i nga ros rol mo'i sgra dbyangs 'byin/lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi
55a7(mdo sde): 'dug spos kyi snod yangs shing che ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma thams cad kyang bai DUr+ya dwang an+da rnyil dang shil dang spug gi yu ba can dgo gnod sbyin gyi dbang po gzugs bzang dang
55b1(mdo sde): dbang po'i tog dang rad rod can dang ba ku la dang lngas rtsen dang shAkya 'phel la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag gi lag pa gnyis na gtun 'dzin pa bzhin du thogs te/spos sprul
55b2(mdo sde): gyi snying po dang go shir Sha dang mri Na la dang ha ri dang me la ya dang tsan+dan dmar po dang a gau ru la sogs pas bkang ba'i du ba ni 'thul/phyogs so so nas lhags pa'i rgyal po dbang che ba/
55b3(mdo sde): dbang che bar grags pa rnams rta dang ba glang rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan cing ma zhon par khrid pa'i tshogs du ma dang shing rta dang dpung bu chung gis yongs su bskor cing phreng ba dang lnga ldi mang po
55b4(mdo sde): dang rin po che'i phreng ba lag na thogs shing sngon logs nas rkang gis 'gro'o//rta dang glang po che legs par brgyan pa/ma zhon par khrid pa dag kyang /rang gi stabs kyis dngom
55b5(mdo sde): par 'gro zhing skad yid du 'ong la snyan pa 'byin to//tshangs pa'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs nas mchod pa dang rim gro bsnyen bkur byed cing 'gro'o//g.yon phyogs nas ni
55b6(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu dbang che bo/dbang che bar grags pa/rga che zhing rlabs che bo/bgrang ba las 'das pa rnams lha'i cod pan bzang po dang gdu bu rgyan can dang rna
55b7(mdo sde): tsha dang gdu bu dang me tog rna rgyan dang rin po che'i tsong tsong dang me tog go phreng bas lus brgyan cing /gzugs mngon par snang bas lha'i me tog man+dA ra dang mdog mdzes dang ko pi dA
56a1(mdo sde): ra dang sta la ka dang ku ra ba ka dang tsam+ba ka dang dong ka'i me tog dang mya ngan 'chang dang sgyu snang dang A ti mut+ta ka dang ut+pal dang bku la dang mal+li ka dang kun+d+ra dang kaM sa ra dang
56a2(mdo sde): pad+ma drang ku mu da dang pad+ma dkar po dang dri mchog dang rin po che'i phreng ba dang rin po che'i a ga ru dang shing rin po che'i 'bras bu tsan dag lag na thogs shing sil snyan sna tshogs brgya stong
56a3(mdo sde): no shin tu dkrol/gos bye ba ni g.yob cing a la la zhes gzhi'i sgra dag ni 'byin//me tog gi char chen po ni rab tu 'bebs shing /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir
56a4(mdo sde): nam mkha'i ngos thams cad par mtshams med par gang bar 'khod de/me tog dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang rin po che'i char rab tu 'bebs shing /bcom ldan
56a5(mdo sde): 'das chu dron yod pa'i sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gdugs chod la gshegs so//de'i chos nyid ni 'di yin te/de la 'di skad ces bya'o//sangs rgyas de bzhin
56a6(mdo sde): gshegs pas dus mkhyen nas//dpa' bo yon tan kun gyi rab brgyan pa//zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab snang mdzad cing //bcom ldan mi yo seng ge gshegs par gyur/
56a7(mdo sde): spyan ngas gzigs deng ma rgya chen ngan yod dang //spos kyi bal glang rin chen lag bzang dang /san+ta can tog de 'thung dka' dpa' bo dang //de dang gzhan dag rgyal ba
56b1(mdo sde): zhabs 'bring byed//g.yas phyogs na ni mi pham 'dug gyur te//de ming byams pa yon tan mtha' yas phyug/bar du mchod sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste//bsod nams ye shes
56b2(mdo sde): tshogs kyang rab tu rdzogs//byams dang btang snyoms dga' bas lus bsgoms shing //chos kyi bdag nyid chen po snying rjes skyed//yon tan mtha' yas thub dbang yon
56b3(mdo sde): tan sems//bde gshegs thugs rje can gyi zhabs 'bring byed//de yi rjes la bskal pa bzang po yi//blo gros chen po ldan pa ji snyed pa'i//sangs rgyas stong du bzhis
56b4(mdo sde): ma tshang ba dag/de dag gis kyang byams pa mdun du bdar//glang sngon rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'drir//bskal pa dag la rgyal ba mtha' yas mchod//zla ba mdzes pa'i
56b5(mdo sde): 'od 'dra lha yi lus//zla 'od dpa' bo yang ni mdun na 'dug/snying rje mchog gi g.yon phyogs 'dug pa ni//'jam dpal bye ba brgya phrag mang po dang //dpa' bo rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis
56b6(mdo sde): mngon 'phags pa//brgya phrag mtha' yas zhing du 'gro ba'o//de yi 'og tu nyan thos dge 'dun te//shA ri'i bu 'og maud+gal nag po dang //'od srung rab 'byor dga' bo ka pi na//
56b7(mdo sde): bzang ldan rgyal po de bzhin kauN+Din+ya//kun dga' de bzhin gnas brtan sgra gcan zin/legs 'ongs kron ci gang po 'char ba po//nam gru gsus chen nyo 'khor ma 'gags pa/
57a1(mdo sde): ral pa can ni stong du tshang ba dag/nyan thos dge 'dun 'og tu thams cad kyang //dka' thub drag mchog rig byed chog shes//du mod pa 'dor dang phan 'dogs
57a2(mdo sde): nus pa yi//drang srong dul ba thal sbyor 'dud pa byed//zhi ba'i yid dang dul ba'i yid rnams kyis//sangs rgyas 'jig rten sgron ma mdun bdar te//thugs rjer ldan pa'i mi
57a3(mdo sde): yi seng ge gshegs//sems can stong rnams rab tu thar par mdzad//ston zla tha chung zla ba nya ba ltar//skar tshogs dbang po yongs su dag pa bzhin//tshangs pa stong
57a4(mdo sde): phrag dag ni brgya mang gis//mtshungs pa med pa'i ston pa yongs su bskor//grong khyer gyi ni sgo stangs zhabs bzhag che//nags tshal stug por bcas pa'i sa yang g.yos//
57a5(mdo sde): lha dang lha min lto 'phye'i tshogs rnams kyang //me tog bzang po dri mchog 'thor bar byed//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g.yas pa 'khor lo rin po ches brgyan pa/dge
57a6(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa bsags pa/sgo'i them pa la bzhag ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/rab tu g.yos kun tu
57a7(mdo sde): rab tu g.yos/'gul rab tu 'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul/ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldog/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/chem tsham rab
57b1(mdo sde): tu tsham tsham kun tu rab tu chematshom/'ur 'ur rab tu bur 'ur/kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur taM/shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho//nub phyogs dma' na sher phyogs mtho//byang
57b2(mdo sde): phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho//lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho//mtha' dma' na dbus mtho//dbus dma'o na mtha' mtho bar gyur nas 'jig rten du snang ba chen po'ang
57b3(mdo sde): drang bar gyur to//ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul grangs med dpag tu med pa gzhan dag kyang snang ngo ////'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo//
57b4(mdo sde): bam po bzhi po//de'i chos nyid ni 'di yin te/de la 'di skad ces bya'o//grong khyer mchog der 'dren pa gshegs pa na//sgo yi them pa la ni zhabs mchog bzhag pa'i tshe/
57b5(mdo sde): de yi dpal gyis sa 'di rab tu g.yos//grong khyer mchog 'di'i sems can rab tu dga'//mi gang bkres shing skom par gyur pa dang /de tshe de dag bkres pa med par gyur//
57b6(mdo sde): rgyal ngas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag che//bkres shing skom pa drag dang bral bar gyur//rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag che//dmus long gyur pa'i mi gang ci yod dang /
57b7(mdo sde): rnabs mi zos mgon mod bsod nams chung //de dag thams cad mig dang rna ba thob//rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag che//gshin rje'i yul gyi yi dgas gang yod pa//
58a1(mdo sde): shin tu sdug bsngal bar snabs mchil ma tha//thams cad 'od kyis reg pas bde bar gyur//rgyal bas sgo yi the ma steng zhabs bzhag che//brag gi/
58a2(mdo sde): rtse dang ri yi rtse mo dang //shing mchog sA la dang ni dong ka rnams//thams cad sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i phyogs su 'dud//rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag che//rgya
58a3(mdo sde): mtsho mthar thug grong dang grong khyer rnams//sa kun rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos//'dir ni gang la'ang gnod par gyur pa med//lha dang mi dang grul bum srin po dang //skyes
58a4(mdo sde): bu gnas pa dga' mgu sems rangs te//byang chub dam pa mchog la dad bskyed nas//'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa'i gdugs kyang 'dzin//rgyal bas sgo yi them stong
58a5(mdo sde): zhabs bzhag tshe//sil snyan stong dag ma brdungs sgra 'byin te//shin tu yid 'ong rol mo'i dbyangs thos pas//de tshe sems can thams cad rab tu dga'//sdong
58a6(mdo sde): po stong phrag brgya dag 'dud par gyur//de tshe me tog kun kyang rab tu rgyas//bar snang las ni lha rnams brgya stong dag/rgal ba la yang mi min mchod pa byed//rgyal bas
58a7(mdo sde): sgo yi thim steng zhabs bzhag tshe//glang po brgya dag sems dga' sgra 'byin te//rta dang ba glang rgyal po lus kyang stod//ri dgas rgyal po seng ge sgra 'byin byed//sa dbang
58b1(mdo sde): dogrong du na //phyogs na phyogs marnams dag nas lcags pa rnams//da lag do du coM nasan// seMms dga'astsal sun nga 'dud/
58b2(mdo sde): jig rten mdun la mngon par stong//kha cig rdul la me tog d+har 'bebs shing //kha cig song bcu thal mo sbya nas su//um N+Dal 'thugs rje can nas smra/
58b3(mdo sde): ti/dpral bzang po dang //sna tshogs rgyun meng dga' skyed 'byor bar byed//byang chub sems mchog dpe meng bskyed nas sku/kha cig na bza' rin cheni 'thor bar byed//
58b4(mdo sde): gsar gyi dab bzang po 'thor//kha cig me tog rgyal bzong 'thor bar byed//rol gsar gyi rgyan ni dam pa 'thor//kha cig de bzhin gdu bu 'thor bar byed//la lo gdu drubazung
58b5(mdo sde): 'di 'byor te//kha cig rin chen snas pa'i dpung rgyan 'thor// cig da ga nag sangs rgyas rgyu phyug ces//sems bskyed gis thaM 'azang po 'thor bar byed//'jog rten
58b6(mdo sde): dgrin pa sbyin 'thugs pa'i tshe//mi ga lacig gser gyi nga //senyas dang ga tsug+sa ga nor bu zlog 'byur//la la rin chen du ba 'thor bar byed//sems
58b7(mdo sde): can shin tu me bzed sdug bsngal zhing //gcab rnam mang zug rngus drug pa yang //dren po skyes thun dmal gyis ni//thams cad bde ba dang yang ston par gyur//
59a1(mdo sde): byug dang ni skegs rma bya dang //de bzhin khyad khyung dang ni mtsho bya dang //bya mang kun ni nam mkhar 'dug nas su//shin tu yid 'ong mchog gi zla yang
59a2(mdo sde): 'byin//de tshe bya tshogs mang po rab dga'o bas//'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra phyung ste//gong gis snyan pa'i sgra skad de thos pa//de dag 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ni//
59a3(mdo sde): sems can bye bso dga' ba'i sgra thos nas//thams cad rjes su mthun pa'i bzang thob ste//ma 'ongs dus na rgyal bar khyed 'gyur zhes//de dag kun la bde gshegs lung
59a4(mdo sde): yang ston//de yi dus na nyon mongs mi 'byung ste//chos kyi rgyal la thams cad ri mor bcas//de tshe 'dren pa'i sku byad mthong nas ni//sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la myos
59a5(mdo sde): bskyed de//bdag cag na mo zhig 'di 'dra'i mkhyen thob snyam//bsam pa mkhyen nas rgyal ba lung ston te//bde bar gshegs pa'i ba spu khung re nos//'od zer dag ni stong
59a6(mdo sde): phrag brgya yang byung //de las lhag par gang+gA'i bye snyed do//de dag gi yang mtshan ma bzung mi nus//de tshe nyi ma'i 'od kyang mi snang ste//me dang nor bu lha kun 'od kyang med//
59a7(mdo sde): rgyal ba grong gshegs sangs rgyas rnam mdzes po//de tshe 'od rnams thams cad yong mi mngon//tshogs chen dang mi de gshegs lam bzhud che//gang du stongs bcu'i ni
59b1(mdo sde): zhabs 'jog par//s+ya las pad+ma dag ni stong phrag bad+ma//'dad ma bye ba stong ldan gtsang ma byung //'dren pa grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pa'i tshe//de na nyal nyil mi gtsang med par gyur//
59b2(mdo sde): grong khyer thams cad dri mchog bdug pa yi//skyes dang yid du 'ong ba kun nas ldang //grong dang srang rnams yongs su dag gyur to//rdo dang gseg ma med cing sgos nus btu ba//stong sa
59b3(mdo sde): ldan po'i bsod nams de 'dra ste//rnam pa sna tshogs me tog sil ma bkram//gnod sbyin brgya stong gtum por sems pa drag/sangs rgyas mi dbang gser 'dra mthong nas ni//'dren la dga'
59b4(mdo sde): brgya che rab bskyed nas//sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun skyabs su 'gro//lha rnams bye ba dang ni brgya phrag stong //mi dbang lta bar 'ongs pa de dag kun//bde bar gshegase la me
59b5(mdo sde): tog char phab ste//me tog gtor nus nam mkha'i dkyilo na 'dug/rgyal la mi yos me tog gang gtor ba//nam mkha'i ngos la me tog gdugs su gyur//lha rnams kyis ni me
59b6(mdo sde): tog gtor ba yang //sa skyeng lha yi me tog bkram par gyur//lha dang mi dang grul bum srin po rnams//de mthong nas ni nam yang ngoms mi myong //mgon po stobs bcu ldan pa mthong
59b7(mdo sde): nas kyang //rab tu dga' zhing sems bder ngas par gyur//namatsho skyes bu mchog gi sku mthong nas//sems can thams cad dga' mgu rangs gyur pas//lha yi me tog la yang
60a1(mdo sde): yid mi sems//de dag la ni ngo mtshar 'dzin pa med//stobs bcu'i g.yas phyogs na ni tshangs pa ste//de bzhin g.yon na brgya byin lha yi rgyal//nam mkha'i
60a2(mdo sde): dkyil na lha mangs bye 'khod de//skyes bu mchog la shin tu gus pa skyed//lha dang lha min dag gis rgyal ba bskor//lha dang mi yi dpal gzi kun phrogs nas//zhabs mthil
60a3(mdo sde): sal ri mo 'byin bzhin du//grong khyer du ni bcom ldan spyan drangs go shegs//sku lus dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa ni//nam mkha' skar ma dag gis gang ba bzhin//nam mkha'
60a4(mdo sde): la ni zla ba nya bo ltar//rgyal po'i lamo na sangs rgyas lem mi bzhugs//nor bu rin chen rnam dog bzang po ni//nyes pa'i skyon bral rab tu snang bar byed//phyogs dang phyogs
60a5(mdo sde): mtshams su'ang 'od gtsang byung //de bzhin rgyal ba 'jig rten kun snang mdzad//lha dang lha min dag gis rkyal ba bskor//mi yi gtso bo rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs//zhabs mthil
60a6(mdo sde): sa la ri mo 'byin bzhin du//zla 'od gzhon nu'i khyim du sangs rgyas gshegs//grong khyer mchog ni kun tu legs brgyan te//rgyal mtshan bye ba phrag stong rab tu sgreng //de zhes
60a7(mdo sde): kun spos bzang rnam par byugs//yid 'ong de bzhin dbyar gyi me tog gtor//gang tsho bde gshegs gtam rnams ston pa na//mgon po snang bzhud mi la thugs brtse'i phyir//
60b1(mdo sde): rgyal bas der ni 'phrul pa rnam sprul te//de dag la yang sangs rgyas chos bzang ston//srog chags brgya stong dag gis de thos nas//sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la smon lam 'debs//
60b2(mdo sde): nam dag 'di 'dra'i ye shes thob snyam ste//bsam pa mkhyen nas rgyal ba lung yang ston//gang gis rgyal ba mi dbang spyan drangs pa//sbyin pa de ni mu mtha' med gyur pa//rnyed mchog
60b3(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab des rnyed ces//la la dag ni de la mos pa skyed//'khor ba dag na shin tu mthong dka' ba//skye dgu dag la phan mdzad thugs kyang brtse//thugs rje can de bdag
60b4(mdo sde): gis sang la yang //spyan drang snyam du la la sems kyang skyed//lal ba gram cog gi steng 'dug cing //lus ni shin tu sdug cing mdzes par brgyan//byang chub sems mchog dam
60b5(mdo sde): pa bskyed nas ni//stobs bcu ldan la lha yi me tog 'thoro//lA las bla med sems mchog rab bskyed nas//me tog tsam pa mdzes pa'i phreng ba dang //oM tI muMH de bzhin 'byar gyi
60b6(mdo sde): spos//dar gyi lnga ldi dag kyang la la 'thor//kha cig gos kyis shin tu lus brgyan te//me tog bzong po dag kyang thogs shing 'greng //me tog sna tshogs dar gyi lnga ldi thogs//rgyal
60b7(mdo sde): ba mthu chen de yi phyogs su 'thor//la la pad+ma dang ni ku mu da//ut+pal gser gyi me tog bzang po 'thor//la la rin chen me tog der 'thor te//la la tsan+dan phye mra 'dzer bar
61a1(mdo sde): byed//'dren pa glong khyer mchog tu gshegs pa'i tshe//ngo mtshar dpag tu med pa rnams kyang byung //mtshungs med de dag brjod par mi nus te//sangs rgyas
61a2(mdo sde): ye shes skye bo byed mang bkod//mi cho mi gdung bden pa mthong ba dang //gzhan yang gya nom snang dang shin tu mthong //de bzhin 'ogro min 'dod chags bral ba rnams//thams
61a3(mdo sde): cad mi dbong blta phyir nye bar lhags//de bzhin dge ba'i lha rnams dpag med dang //dge chung lha gzhan dag kyang sems dga' zhing //dge rgyas khrag khrig dpag tu med
61a4(mdo sde): pa rnams//'dren pa drang srong chen po blta phyir lhags//tshad med 'od kyang de bzhin dpag med dang //'od chung gi ni lha rnams ci yod dang //'od gsal ba yang khrag khrig mang
61a5(mdo sde): po dar//'jig rten mgon po blta phyir de dag lhags//tshangs 'khor pa dag brgya stong mang po dang //tshangs pa'i 'dun 'don dad pa de bzhin te//tshangs ris kyang ni brgya
61a6(mdo sde): phrag mang po rnams//thams cad 'dren pa blta phyir nye bar lhags//de bzhin gzhan 'phrul gyi yang lha rnams dang //gzhan yang 'phrul dga'i sems can dag pa dang //
61a7(mdo sde): dga' ldan 'thab bral lha rnams rab dga' zhing //thams cad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal nye bar lhags//da t+ya byin lha rgyal sum cu rtsa gsum pa//lha yi bu mo bye ba brgya dang /
61b1(mdo sde): lhags//'dir ni me ton char kyang rab 'bebs shing //sangs rgyas thub dbang blta phyir nye bar lhags//phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po yang //rnam thos bu dang klu
61b2(mdo sde): dang mug mi bzang //yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes sems 'ga' ste//de kun mi dbang bstod cing nye bar lhags//gnod sbyin rgyal po mthu ldan ir bir yang //dga' ba
61b3(mdo sde): skyes shing gnod sbyin brgyas bskor te//nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug cing sems dga' nas//me tog sna tshogs du ma'i char kyang 'bebs//rtag tu myos dang phreng 'dzin lha
61b4(mdo sde): rnams kyang //spos dang phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs thogs//'khor dang bcas pa thams cad sems dga' zhing //de nas skyes bu mchog la mchod pa byed//gnod sbyin lag
61b5(mdo sde): na gzhong thogs mang po yang //gnod sbyin bu mo de dag rab brgyan te//gnod sbyin rol mo rab tu snyan pa dang //shin tu yid 'ong brgyas ni sangs rgyas mchod//grwa dbyangs
61b6(mdo sde): sil snyan 'jam zhing snyan pa la//mkhas pa mi 'am ci yi bu mo stong //mi 'am ci yi rgyal po ljon pa yang //rgyal mchog mchod par spos dad ldang las lpags//bde mchog
61b7(mdo sde): stobs ldan sgra gcan thigs bzang ris//lha min bu mo stong gi 'khor bcas dang //lha min rdzu 'phrul chen po gzhan mang yang //rin po che yi cher pa ba nye per lhags//srin/
62a1(mdo sde): pa khrag khrig bad+ma phrag mtha' yas kyang //srin po bye ba bad+ma yis bsnyen bku zhing //me tog sil ma sna tshogs mang po yang //skyes bu mchog la gus//
62a2(mdo sde): par rab tu 'thor//klu yi rgyal po ri bo legs pa yang //'khor mang de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du lhags//rin tsha ni me tog rnam mang mchog thogs te//bde gshegs
62a3(mdo sde): zhabs gnyis la ni rab tu 'dud//klu dbang pad+ma dang ni pad+ma che//de bzhin nor yod mtha' yas gdangs ka can//de dag khyu mchog drung du nyer lhags te//bde bar gshegs
62a4(mdo sde): la gus pas rab tu 'dud/klu yi rgyal po nor bu yid dga' zhing //khyu mchog zhabs kyi drung du nye bar 'ongs//klu yi me tog dri zhim mchog zhigs te//ha cang mi ring ba
62a5(mdo sde): gshegs spyan sngar 'dud//de bzhin ma dros klu yi rgyal po yang //klu yi bu mo shin tu bslabs pa'i mchog/rnga dang sil snyan stong phrag ba rdung zhing //'jig rten mgon
62a6(mdo sde): po mchod phyir nye bar lhags//ma dros pa yi bu po lnga brgya dag/ye shes yangs pa bla med 'tshol ba'i phyir//gnyen mdab dag gis bskor cing dgar gyur nas//rang gis
62a7(mdo sde): rang byung mchod phyir nye bar lhags//de bzhin klu yi rgyal po sog med kyang //skyes bu mchog la thal sbyar rab btud nas//klu yi me tog mdzes shing bzang ba thogs//mkha'
62b1(mdo sde): ya'adug nas thub rdul mchod pa byed//de bzhin klu yi rgyal po btang bzung yang //rab tu yid pa de dga' maT skyes nas ni//rid chen mu tig sna tshogs thogs nas su//der 'ongs
62b2(mdo sde): 'dren pa la yang mngon par 'thor//de bzhin klu yi rgyal po dus can yang //de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du nyir dngas te//dga' zhing rin chen phreng ba mdzes mchog rdzogs//skyes
62b3(mdo sde): drim pa la yang mchod rab byas//de yang bde gshegs yon tan rjes dran zhing //gus pa chen po shin tu bskyed nas ni//gnyen med pak+Sha mang dag gis bye ba/ cing //'dren
62b4(mdo sde): pa'i bsngags pa rnam pa mang po brjod//de bzhin klung bang dga' bo nye dga' dang //de bzhin 'jog po gau ta ma nog po yang //rgyalnga ba pralta zhing der ni nye bar 'ongs//bde bar
62b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i zhabs la 'dud pa byed//klu yi rgyal po e la'i 'dab ma yang //thub mchog rgyal ba 'od srung dran pa dang //bdag nyid mi khom skyes pa mthong nas ni//klu brgyas
62b6(mdo sde): yongs su bskor te ngu zhing po sra//kye ma ba sngon the tshom da gyur te//bdag gis e la'i 'od kyang sngon bcad pas//des ni mi ldom par yang bdag skyes te//rgyal ba'i chos
62b7(mdo sde): ni rig par slab min//shin tu smad pa'i skye bo'i lus 'di dang //klu yi skye gnas bdag gis rab spangase la//chos gang byang chub snying por skyes mchog gso//rtogs pa bsil
63a1(mdo sde): ba bdag gis rtogs par bya//klu yi rgyal po rgyu mtsho 'khor los bsgyur//bye ba gsum stong klu yi 'khor gyis bskor//rgyu lha gzi can rin chen dro shal thogs//
63a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mchod phyir nye bar 'ongs//rgyal ba la ni rdo 'phangs des bzung ste//de tshe nam mkha' la'ang 'dug gyur pa//rgyal po'i khab kyi gnod sbyin ci zhig 'dzin//bde
63a3(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gus par 'dug/lcang lo can gyi rgyal po'i gnas kun kyang //stong par gyur cing gnod sbyin gang yang mo //thams cad kyis kyang phan tshun dam
63a4(mdo sde): bcas te//'jig rten mgon po blta bar thams cad lhags//de bzhin bong rna dang ni khab spu dang //gnod sbyin 'brog gnas 'jigs byed de bzhin te//gangs gnas rir
63a5(mdo sde): 'dug gnod sbyin bong bu dag/rgyal ba rang byung drung du nye bar lhags//dbang po'i tog dang gzugs bzang radwa rod can//bak+ku la dang dus 'phel lnga po dang //gnod sbyin
63a6(mdo sde): dbang po gzhan yang stong rnams no//bdug spos snod rnams thogs shing nye bar lhags//lus dbyi byas ma legs mi sdug mang po rnams//gzugs kyi rnam pa mang zhing
63a7(mdo sde): rgyan bor ba//de yi dus na brgya stong mang po dge/gnod sbyin gyi ni me tog thogs te lhags//gau ta ma ri byi pur bu rgyal byed dang //kau shIsh+ma ka dang 'od srung mAn NA/
63b1(mdo sde): thams cad bshes dang par shu gan grA dag/dzams cad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal nye bar lhags//mi sbyin yang ni daM bzhin dga' mgu ste//drang song rgyas pa ku da tsa ang 'gaur//
63b2(mdo sde): shed can ngan spong bad tsa gnas 'jog rnams//de dag sangs rgyas phyog 'tshal nye bar lhags//'dza' man po man po'i sham bA ya dang //'dza'i mag nI dang grog mkhar drang srong mchog
63b3(mdo sde): dkar bar gnas dang mi'u thung spen pa rnams//'dren pa blta zhing grong khyer mchog tu lhags//drang srong mthong nas de tshe drang srong dga'//thub rgyal zhabs mchog la ni phyag 'tshal
63b4(mdo sde): zhing //'jig rten sgron la phyag byas mngon bstod do//thal mo sbyar nos dpa' bo'i spyan sngar 'gring //'jig rten ci yod drang srong mang po kun//de dag mi dbang blto bar nyer
63b5(mdo sde): lhags te//mthong nas mchod po rgya cher byas nas kyang //sangs rgyas spyan sngar thal mo rab sbyar 'dug/rgya mtsho dag na gnas pa'i nam mkha' lding //bram ze'i cha byad du'ang sprul
63b6(mdo sde): byas nas//cod pan sna tshogs blta na sdug pa thogs//bde bar gshogs la phyag 'tshalo nam mkhar 'khod//grong brgya dang ni rnga ma gling nags tshal na//gnos shwang rten
63b7(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams gang yod dang //grong gi lha mo ma lus thams cad kyang //nye bar lhags shing gtso bo mchod par byed//nags tshal gyi yang lha rnams mtha' yas dang //ri yi lha
64a1(mdo sde): rnams thams cad nye bar 'ongs//'bab chu'i lha kun mtha' dag de bzhin du//'dren pa mchod pa byed cing nye bar lhags//mya ngam dgon pa'i lha mo brgya rnams
64a2(mdo sde): dang //ri rtse'i lha mo ji snyed ma lus dang //mtsho dang chu mig rdzing gi lha rnams dang //rgya mtsho'i lha yang sangs rgyas drung du lhags//lha dang lha mine klu dang gnod sbyin tshogs//mi
64a3(mdo sde): 'am ci dang brul dum nam mkha' lding //de bzhin yi dgas srul po mang po dang //skyes bu mchog la ri mor bya ba byed//'dren pa grong khyer mchog der gshegs pa na//rgyal
64a4(mdo sde): ba mchog la de dag mchod pa byed//lha dang lha min klu dang gnod sbyin rgyal//blta ba so rtag tu chog par yong mi 'gyur//sngon gyi srid par 'jig rten mgon po yis//sngon gyi
64a5(mdo sde): rgyal ba dag la mchod mchog byas//bsod nams 'bras bu sbyin pa de 'ang ste//skyes bu mi dbang blta bas ngoms mi mong //rgyal bas sangs rgyas zhing du 'od btang che//lhun
64a6(mdo sde): po de bzhin rab lhun khor yug re//kha ba can gyi ri dang spos ngang ldang //de dag rkyal ba'i 'od la sgrib pa med//sangs rgas zhing 'di'i rgya mtsho ci yod pa//de dag de tshes
64a7(mdo sde): dang 'dra bar gyur//sangs rgyas zhing 'di thams cad kun tu yang //me tog dag gis gtor cing mnyam par gyur//'od zer brgya stong dpag tu med pa dag/chos kyi
64b1(mdo sde): rgyal po'i zhabs kyi mthil nas byung //sems can dmyal ba thams cad bsil bar gyur//sdug bsngal med par byas nas bde ba myong //der ni stobs bcu ldan pas chos bshad pas/
64b2(mdo sde): lA dang mi yi mig kyang rnam par dag/srog chags brgya stong dpag tu med pa rnams//thams cad sangs rgyas ye shos nges par gyur//'dren pa grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pa//
64b3(mdo sde): drid gshegs cho 'phrul mang po dag gis ni//bskal pa bye bar brjod du mi smra ste//rgyal ba bde gshegs 'gro ba thams cad dga'//bde gshegs yon tan de dag dpag med de//
64b4(mdo sde): ni mchog yon tan rar kyi pha rol phyin//yon tan khyad por kun gyi pha rol son//sangs rgyas bsod nams zhing la mgos phyag 'tshal//grong khyer du gshegs pa'i le'u ste
64b5(mdo sde): 'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das zla 'od gzhon nur gyud pa'i khyim gyi gang du ba sre/zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim du gshegs so//gshegs nas
64b6(mdo sde): gang ni bshams pa la bzhugs so//byang chub sems dpa'i dge/ ded dge slong go dge 'dun kyi so sor gang 'os pa'i seMnI la 'khod do//de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas
64b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs par rog nas mchod yon chen po rims kyis gsol te/zhal zas ro de rkye dang ldan
65a1(mdo sde): pa bzang zhing mang ba'i bza' ba dang //bca' ba dang bldag pa dang bzhib pa dang btung ba rnams bdag nyid kyis gsol cing bdar te/bcom ldan
65a2(mdo sde): 'das bshos gsol nas lhung bzed bzhag ste phyag bcabs par rig nas ras bcos su phugs bye ba stong phrag brgya ri ba bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol to//byang chub sems
65a3(mdo sde): dpa' de dag dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la'ang so sor chos gos sum phrugs phul nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das lo lha'i me tog man+ta
65a4(mdo sde): ras gtor te/mchod cing mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyor ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcang
65a5(mdo sde): pas mngon par bstod do//skyes pa med cing 'gags med pa//sA lus mi mnga' bsam mi khyab//gzugs dang mtshan ni phun sum tshogs//yon tan rgya mtsho phyag
65a6(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//dpa' bo shes rab mchog gis bskyed//thubs dang stobs kyi rtsal kyang mnga'//sangs rgyas nam mkha' 'drang ste//brjod mthar byin la phyag 'tshal lo//
65a7(mdo sde): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhugs pa'i spyod yul te//de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims mal rab tu dga' dang bde//btung b.ri ting nge 'dzin te bshos su bsam gtan mchog/
65b1(mdo sde): stang nyid dgon par gnas pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//rgyal ba thugs rje bsnyen pas na//gzugs kyi sku yang ston par mdzad//sems can dag la thugs bze'i phyir//dadung drang
65b2(mdo sde): bshos kyang gsol bar ganga'o//e ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab//'ji rten kun gyi 'dren pa ste//'jig rten 'di ni khyod mchod nas//mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu mchi//mi
65b3(mdo sde): mnyam mnyam pa'i mgon gcig po la de skad bstod//gzhon nu yid kyang rab tu dgar gyur tshig smras pa//sangs rgyas mtshungs med bsam yos sku mnga' bshos gsol bas//
65b4(mdo sde): lha yi lha khyod bzhin du bad kyang sangs rgyas gyur//de ltar zla 'di gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la lci'i zhal zas ro brgya pa ni bzhes par gsol//lha'i na bza' rin thang med
65b5(mdo sde): pa phrugs kyis ni sA li gsol/lho'o me tog man+ta ras ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod/tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pas ni mngon par bstod nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la
65b6(mdo sde): bde logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis tshigs su bcad pas zhu ba zhus pa/byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas ci spyad na//rtag tu chos rnams rang bzhin
65b7(mdo sde): rab tu 'tshal//mkhas pa bgyi bdag la ji ltar 'jug/bgyi bar 'jug pa 'dren pas bstan du gsol//'dren pa skye ba dran par ji ltar 'gyur//ji ltar mngal dag tu yang
66a1(mdo sde): yong mi ste//ji lta bur na khro bar rnams mi phyed 'gyur//'di la ji ltar spobs pa mtha' yas 'gyur//sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab tu mkhyen//rnams
66a2(mdo sde): kun la mngon par mkhyen pa 'jug/rkang gnyis gtso bo zil gyis minon pa//zhu ba zhu yis bdag la lung ston cig/chos kyi rang bzhin dngos med rab mkhyen la//brjod du
66a3(mdo sde): med pa tshig tu brjod par mdzad//seng ges wa rnams ji ltar pham pa byas pa//mu stegs gzhan la'ang sangs rgyas de bzhin te//sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab mkhyen
66a4(mdo sde): chos rnams kun 'i blang ye shes rjes su 'jug/ye shes chags med spyod yul yongs su dag/chos kyi mnga' bdag bdag la de lung ston//'das pa mkhyen cing ma 'ongs de bzhin
66a5(mdo sde): te//de ltar 'ode na ci mchis pa yad mkhyen//dus gsum la ni ye shes thogs med 'jug/de phyir bdag zhu shAkya seng ge la//dus gsum ldan pa'i rgyal ba'i chos nyid ni///
66a6(mdo sde): chos kyi rgyal pos chos nyid rab tu mkhyen//rang byung chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas//de phyir bdag zhu ye shes rgya mtsho la//khyod la 'khrul pa'i chos ni ci yang med//de bas
66a7(mdo sde): khyod kyi sems pa ma lus spangs//mdud spangs thab gti mug rab tu bcad//mi dbang bdag la byang chub spyod pa ston//chos kyi mtshan nyid ci 'drar rgyal bas mkhyen//
66b1(mdo sde): chos kyi mtshan nyid de 'dra ba dgra ma ston//bdag gis mtshan nyid de 'dra'i chos rtogs nas//mtshan nyid de 'da'i byang chub spyod pa spyad//sems can spyod pa mi mthun mtha'
66b2(mdo sde): yas pa//ji ltar spyod pa spyad par 'jug pa lags//gang thos sems can spyod pa 'tshal 'gyur ba//spyod la 'jug po bdag la bshad du gsol//mtshan nyid mi mthun
66b3(mdo sde): chos kyi rang bzhin mtshon//ngo bo nyid stong rang bzhin rnam dag pa//byang chub sems dpas ji ltar mngon sumi 'gyur//chos kyi tshul rnams bdag la bstan du gsol//'di
