66b4(mdo sde): ma chos rnams kun gyi pha rol phyin//bstan pa'i tshig kun la yang shin tu mkhas//the tshom mi mnga' nem nur the tshom med//bdag la sangs rgyas byang chub bstan du gsol//
66b5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis blo 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyi rtogs pa sems kyis mkhyen nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa'
66b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po chos gcig dang ldan ni yon tan 'di dag rab tu thob ste/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogaso por 'tsheng rgya'o//chos
66b7(mdo sde): gcig po gang zhe na/gzhon du 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa yin no//gzhon nu ji ltar na byang chub sems
67a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes zhe na/gnon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ming
67a2(mdo sde): med cing ming dang bral bar rab tu shes so//chos thams cad sgra med pa/tshig gi lam dang bral ba/yi gro dang bral ba/skye ba dang bral ba/'gog pa dang bral ba/d+ya dang
67a3(mdo sde): mtshan nyid mi mthun pa/rkyen dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa/dben pa'i mtshan nyid 'di lta ste/mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa/mtshan nyid dang bral ba/bsam
67a4(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa/bsam pa dang bral ba/yid dang bral dar rab tu shes so//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//chos rnams
67a5(mdo sde): bstan pa gcig po ni//chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med//yang dag ji bzhin rab mkhyen pas//shes rab mchog gis bshad pa yin//de lta bur ni chos bstan
67a6(mdo sde): rnams//byang chub sems dpa' sus shes pa//mdo sde bye ba rab ston kyang //de la byang chub rgyun chud med//'den pas byin gyis brlabs pas na//yang dag
67a7(mdo sde): nyid kyi mtha' yong shes//yang dge mtha' der bshes ni//de la ci yang bshad pa medado//gcig gis kyang ni thams cad shos//gcig gis kyang ni thams cad
67b1(mdo sde): mthong //ji snyed mang por bshad na yang //de la dregs pa skye ba med//chos rnams thams cad bdag med par//de ltar sems kyis nges brtags shing //ming du bstun
67b2(mdo sde): pa bslabs pas na//yang dag nyid du tshig kyang sgra//sgra dbyangs gang dag ci thos pa//de yi sngon gyi mtha' shes te//sgra yi sngon gyi mtha'u shes nas//sgra dag gis ni de
67b3(mdo sde): me 'phrogs//sgra yi sngon mtha' ji 'dra bar//chos rnams mtshan nyid de bzhin te//chos rnams de ltar rab shes na//mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro//chos rnams thams
67b4(mdo sde): cad mi skye zhing //'byung ba med par rab tu shes//bstan pa 'di ni rab shes na//rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur//nam zhig skye ba dran gyur na//de tshe bya ba dag la 'jug/
67b5(mdo sde): bya ba dgro la zhugs pa yi//'khor rnams shin tu mi phyed 'gyur//de ltar chos rnams stong por ni//byang chub sems dpa' spos shes pa//des ni gang yang mi shes med//
67b6(mdo sde): 'di ni ci yang med pa'i mtha'//ci yang med pa'i mtha'o lnga yang //byis pa dag gris ni dag brtags//bskal pa bya bar de dag des//yang dang yang du 'khor bar gyur//
67b7(mdo sde): ji ltar 'dren pas mkhyen pa bzhin//gal te de dag rtog rin//de las sdug bsngal mi skye ste//ngan 'gro rnams su'ang ngo mo 'gro/so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis//de ltar tshul
68a1(mdo sde): /'dri ma shes pas//gang du chos rnams 'gag pa yi//'di 'dra'i chos rnams spong bar byed//chos kun rnyed pa med par ni//chos kyi 'du shes gang
68a2(mdo sde): zung ba//de lta bu yi 'du shes te//'du shes de ltar rig par gyis//rnam par shes dang 'du shes skye//byis pa dag gis 'di brtags te//brtags pa yi ni chos rnams
68a3(mdo sde): lo//mkhas pa 'dir ni rmongs mi 'gyur//stong pa rnyog pa med pa'i chos//'di ni mkhas pa'i sa yin te//'di la byis pa'i spyod yul mod//sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod yul
68a4(mdo sde): lo//zhi ba stong pa rab bstan pa//'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa//'di ni sangs rgyas sras spyod pa//sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyan yin no//'di ltar byang chub sems dpo 'drag/
68a5(mdo sde): ngag chags rab tu spangs gyur pa//de dag gzugs kyis mi 'phrogs te//sangs rgyas rigs la de dag gnas//chos rnams thams cad gnas med do//de dag la ni
68a6(mdo sde): gnas yod min//gang gis de ltar gnas zhes pa//de la byang chub rnyed mi dka'//sbyin dang tshul khrims thos dang bzod//bshes gnyen bzang po bsten byas nas//
68a7(mdo sde): ba 'di dag rnam reg na//byang chub myur du de 'tshang rgya//de la lhaklu rtag tu bkur sti //gnad sbyin lha min lto 'phye dri za dang //nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po thams cad
68b1(mdo sde): dang //mi 'am ci dang srin po mchod pa byed//sangs rgyas bye ba de yi snyan pa brjod//bskal pa bye ba mang por mi 'chad par//chos bshad pa yi bsngags pa brjod na yang //de
68b2(mdo sde): yi mu mtha' zad par nus mi 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' gang gis stong shes pa//de ni srog chags bye ba'i don mang byed//shin tu nges pas 'khor la chos ston te//thos
68b3(mdo sde): nas dga' zhing ri mor byed pa skyed//de dag gis ni ye shes yangs pa 'byung //de phyir rgyal ba mi mchog mthong bar 'gyur//ni rnams na yang bkod pa bzang po mthong //'jig rten
68b4(mdo sde): mgon po de la chos rnams ston//chos kun sgyu ma lta bur shes par gyis//ji ltar bar snang rang bzhin stong pa ltar//de dag gi yang rang bzhin de 'drar shes//de ltar spyod pa
68b5(mdo sde): ci la'ang chags mi 'gyur//ye shes chags pa med pas don byed cing //'jig rten ni yang byang chub spyad ma tshig spyod//shes pas chos kun la'ang rab brtags te//de
68b6(mdo sde): dag zhing rnams gzhan du'ang sprul pa 'byed//skal pa de dag sangs rgyas don byas nas//ji ltar ches nyid bzhin du rong bzhin 'gyur//byang chub sems la mi gang gnas pa
68b7(mdo sde): rnams//bsam po ji bzhini don rnams rnyed par 'gyur//sangs rgyas rigs ni gnas par gang brtson pa//de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas byis pa gzo//rnam par 'bar
69a1(mdo sde): lus dang rab ldan zhing //mtshan bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis de la 'byung //phan yon gzhan yang mang po mtha' yas pa//ting 'dzin mchog la spyod pas dzo
69a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur//rtag tu mi skul stongs kyang che bar 'gyur//de yi gzi brjid rgyal pos mi bzod de//mkhas pa su dag sangs rgyas chos spyod pa//byad bzhin bzang zhing shin tu
69a3(mdo sde): mdzes par 'gyur//bsod nams gzi brjid dpal gyis mngon 'phags te//lhas kyang de yi gzi brjid bzod mi 'gyur//su dag byang chub sems la brtan gnas pa//de ni
69a4(mdo sde): rtag tu srog chags kun gyi bshes//sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni rab ston pa//de la nam yang mun pa med par 'gyur//sgra dang tshig gi lam bral brjod du med//nam mkha'
69a5(mdo sde): ji bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin te//'di lta bu yi tshul mchog rnam rig na//de yi spobs pa dag kyang mi zad 'gyur//mdo sde dag ni brgya stong rab bshad kyang //sngon gyi mtha' ma
69a6(mdo sde): phra zhing rab tu shes//chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu phra shes pas//mkhas pa'i tshig ni rtag tu thogs pa med//rtag par tshul brgya dag la mkhas gyur cing //sgra dang nges tshig
69a7(mdo sde): rnam pa mngal mkhas//las dang 'bras bu rnam smin nges pa ste//khyad par 'phags pa'i bye brag de 'drar 'gyur//mkhas pa bdag nyid chen po stobs bcu'i sras//ma tshang
69b1(mdo sde): med pa'i stobs kyi sa shugs 'chang zhing //shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas//de yi dran pa rtag par yongs su dag/shin tu phra da'i rang bzhin chos shes pas//yid
69b2(mdo sde): du mi 'o ga ni zos mi 'gyur//rtag tu snyan cing yid 'ang ska yang thos//de yi tshig ni rtag tu yid 'ong 'gyur//shin du phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas//dran dang blo gros shes
69b3(mdo sde): rab rtogs dang ldan//de bzhin sems kyang rnyog med dang bar 'gyur//mdo sde brgya phrag du ma rab tu 'chad//yon tan 'di 'dra'i rang bzhin chos shes pas//yi ge dang ni tshig
69b4(mdo sde): rnams 'byed la mkhas//tha dad pa yi sgra mang du ma shes//don dang tshig 'brul yang mkhas par 'gyur//shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas//lha dang mi dang klu 'brug
69b5(mdo sde): srin po drang //lha min lto 'phye mi 'am ci la yang //rtag tu skrag cing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur//shin tu phra ba'i rang bzhin chos shes pas//'byung po yi dgas srin po'i tshogs
69b6(mdo sde): rnams ni//shal za ba shin tu mi zad pa//de dag nam yang de la 'jigs mi byed//mkhas pa de dag yangs pa'i gtam thos nas//shin tu dga' zhing ba spu zing zhes
69b7(mdo sde): byed//sangs rgyas la yang dga' ba rgya cher bskyed//de dag bsam gyis mi khyab don chen thob//bde bar gshegs pa'i chos mdzod 'di bzung ba'i//bskal pa stong mang de yi
70a1(mdo sde): bsod nams stobs//rab tu brjod kyang rdzogs par mi nus te//dpag tu med cing mtha' yas tshad med do//ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di bzung ba yis//
70a2(mdo sde): 'das pa'i rgyal ba dpag med thams cad dang //sangs rgyas ma byon pa dang phyogs bcu na//sangs rgyas gang bzhugs de dag de las mchod//skyes dul la bsod nams 'dod pas
70a3(mdo sde): 'dir//stongs bcu ldan pa'i thugs rje can dag la//dga' ba dpag tu med pa bskyed nas ni//bskal pa mtha' yas dpag med rim gro byas//skyes bu gnyis pa bsod
70a4(mdo sde): nams 'dod pa yis//don dam tshul 'di las ni tshigs bcud gcig/phyi ma'i dus su gyur tshe 'dzin pa ni//de la snga ma'i bsod nams char mi phod//'di ni sangs rgyas
70a5(mdo sde): mchod pa rang mchog ste//phyi ma mi bzad dus su gyur pa'i tshe//'di las tshig bzhi'i tshogs bcad gcig thos nas//'dzin pa des ni sangs rgyas thams cad mchod///
70a6(mdo sde): de dag rtag tu rnyed mchog legs par rnyed//de dag grong gi zas mchog legs par zos//stobs bcu'i spos kyi bu bo dam pa ste//de yis rgyal ba mang po yun ring mchod
70a7(mdo sde): byargod phung po'i ro 'di rang rang mthong //de dag sangs rgyas mkhyed la ngas lung bstan//mya ngan nga 'das nas ni byams pa yang //de ci de la lung yang ston par 'gyur//de bzhin
70b1(mdo sde): sa ma rgyas tshe dpag med pa yang //nga yi 'de bcan du kun 'dong nas//sman yan rnam pa du ma de la 'chad//mngon dga' rnyeng song sangs rgyas mal//gas mthong //bsapa
70b2(mdo sde): ga rdzum dbang 'dra/yang 'junu 'di gyu / dag nga
70b3(mdo sde): phyir de brag 'di 'phags de 'dra ste//'di ni rab tu bshad ba phan yon mchog/so so'i chog la nga yi rjes slobs la//phyi ma'i dus la mdo sde 'di bzung shig/rgyud sde 'dzin
70b4(mdo sde): la'u ste dre gcig gzhan nu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gong chos thams cad kyi nyid shes pa de'i yin tan
70b5(mdo sde): dang dran yan dri lta byur 'gyur ngo //de bzhin gshegs pani lan tan dang bsdogs pa yang nga/par smra'o//de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa ma yin pa dang med pas mi
70b6(mdo sde): na ni/chos ga sa zhin rab tu des nyid de ya dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ra tu shes shing /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan
70b7(mdo sde): /wa' yas par rango du shes so//ci'i phyir zhe na/gzhon nu sangs rgyas kyi yon tan namaze mas te/desem gyis mi khyab cing bsam pa dang bral bas na/de dag
71a1(mdo sde): /bsam pa'am dpag par mi nus so//de ci'i phyir ne na/no sems kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzugs med pa bstan du med pa skye/gzhan du ltar sems
71a2(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid gang yin pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyingo da kyang de yin no/sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi ngo bo nyid dang yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang de yin no//de bzhin
71a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin te/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar yon tan thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid
71a4(mdo sde): don gcig tu bstan pa/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de ni gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid kyis nges par brtags pa zhes bya ste/'byung
71a5(mdo sde): bal mkhas shing khams gsum las 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu sheso so//ji lta ba bzhin du lta zhing log par mi smra/rnam pa gzhan du mi smra/ji ska smra ba
71a6(mdo sde): de bzhin byed/khams gsum la ma chags shing khams gsum las yang dag par 'das te/'dod pa'i so dang gzugs kyi sa dang gzugs med pa'i sa dang nyon mongs
71a7(mdo sde): pa'i sa dang ming gi sa dang skra'i sa las 'das shing yi ge dang chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa/ye shes mi zad par bsgoms pa/brjod du med pa'i chos rtogs pa/yi ge
71b1(mdo sde): shes pa/yo gol mkhas pa/mig dang jig pab tu dbye/shes pa la mkhas pa/yig dang tshig rab tu dad+ya ba d+hAs pa shes pa la mkhas pa/chos thams cad rab tu dbyed shes/
71b2(mdo sde): ba la mkhas pa/chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba rgyas po shes pa la mkhas pa/chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa lnga mkhas pa yin te/gtan la dbab pa'i blo dang ljon zhing /
71b3(mdo sde): bdud sdig can dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis zil gyis mi non to//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe lha dang mi'i skye dgu sngon yongs su sbyang ba byas pa khrag khrig phrag dgu
71b4(mdo sde): bcu rtsa brgyad kyis bye ba brgya stong 'khyil ba'i gzungs dang sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' dang chos rnam par mthong ba'i bzod pa so sor thob nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag thams cad le bskal
71b5(mdo sde): pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa brkyad na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste thams cad kyang ming ni tha dad/tshe'i tshad ni gcig
71b6(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas kyi zhing so sor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes lung bstan to//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/byang chub sems dpa'
71b7(mdo sde): blo dang ldan pa gang //bla na med pa'i byang chub rab 'chol zhing //chos dang de bzhin don la mkhas pa de//chos kyi ngo bo nyid la spyod pa yin//yang dag mi yin pa yi tshig mismra/
72a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas yon tan bye brag ci 'dra ba//rgyal ba rnams kyi chos ni de yin te//dpa' bo the tshom bral bas shin tu rig/chos kun don gcig par ni rab
72a2(mdo sde): shes te//mgo gcig tu ni stong pa nyid yin pas//de dag la ni tha dad gyur pa med//don gcig la ni shin tu bslabs pa yin//rtogs pa med cing na ma rtog med pa dang //
72a3(mdo sde): dmigs pa med par blo gros ldan pas shes//zad pa dang ni mi zad 'du shes kyang //ma lus par ni thams cad rab tu spangs//de ni chos sku mi yi seng ge la//stobs bcu
72a4(mdo sde): ldan pa gzugs su mi lci zhing //de ni phyin ci log kun rab spangs pas//mtshan rnams su yang lte bar yong mi 'gyur//chos rnams 'di dag bsam mi khyab//bsam
72a5(mdo sde): dang bral zhing rang bzhin zhi//de lta bur ni rab shes nas//rkang gnyis gtso bo sangs rgyas mthong //ji ltar bdag gi 'du shes rig/de bzhin kun tu bro yang gtong //chos
72a6(mdo sde): kun de yi rang bzhin te//rnam par dag pa nam mkha' bzhin//yid la nams kyang 'byung ba med//chos rnams thams cad shes pas na//khams gsum las ni
72a7(mdo sde): rnam par grol//de la smon lam 'debs pa med//yang dag ji bzhin du ni mthong gyur cing //ma log tshig sgra rnam pa gzhan me smra//de yi tshig dang brjod pa thams
72b1(mdo sde): cad kyang //rgyal ba dag gi mthu yis 'byung bar 'gyur//'dod pa'i sa dang nyon mongs sa rnams dang //gzugs dang gzugs med las kyang shin tu 'da'//chos rnams la ni
72b2(mdo sde): yid kyang ma chags shing //rab tu dga' bas 'gro la phan par spyod//ming gi sa las 'das shing sgra yang shes//ngo bo nyid kyis gsog tu gyur pa ste//ji srid tsam du yun ring
72b3(mdo sde): brjod na yang //de la gnas par byed pa yod ma yin//'du shes rab tu rgyu ba med//lte ba log pa kun nas zad//blo yang shin tu gtan la bab//brtan pa nam mkha' 'dra
72b4(mdo sde): bar spyod//gal te bdud pa khrag khrig rnams//de yi sems dkrug phyir 'ongs kyang //bdud rnams thams cad zil mnan te//de yi dbang du 'gro mi 'gyur//bdud kyi
72b5(mdo sde): rgya ma rnams spangs te//tshul khrims yongs dag gdud pa med//bsam gtan dag gi bde la mos//'jig rten stong par rab tu shes//'jig rten phung por smras pa
72b6(mdo sde): yod//de dag stong par rab tu rag/skye ba med cing 'gag med pas//chos rnams thams cad nam mkha' bzhin//de dag bdag nyid gta byed kyi//stobs bcu'i tshul
72b7(mdo sde): drims zos mi gtong //de ni tshul khrims pha rol phyin//gar smon par yang skye bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas zhing du rnam par 'gro/sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po mthong //mtho
73a1(mdo sde): sa dag ni mi 'dodade//smon lam rnams ni yangs mi gtong //chos nyid dgan du spyod na//skad cig brtson 'grus nyams mi byed//phyogs bcu yin mas
73a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyis//de ni shin tu bstod pa yin//de phyir gzhan nu ting 'dzin las//chos 'di dag ni rab thob nas//shes kyi khe ni rnam spongs la//skye bo mngal chos rab ston//
73a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas yon tan mang ldan pa//rang 'byung 'gyur bar gang 'dod pas//dge ba 'di la rab bslabs na//stobs bcu 'chang ba sangs rgyas 'gyur//ting nge 'dzin la rjes
73a4(mdo sde): su slob pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na gzhon nu byang chub
73a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa la mkhas par bya'o//
73a6(mdo sde): gzhon nu de la ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa gang zhe na/gang chos thams cad kyi ji lta ba bzhin nyid dang mnyam pa nyid mo mnyam pa med pa dang mi rtog pa/rnam par mi rtog/
73a7(mdo sde): ba/rnam par ma bsgrubs pa/kun nas slong ba med pa/skye ba med pa/'gag pa med pa/rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang kun nas rtog pa yongs su chad pa/sems
73b1(mdo sde): kyi dmigs pa med pa/yid la byed pa med pa/rnam par rig pa yongs su chad pa/'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug yongs su chad pa/mtha' med pa/mthar yid
73b2(mdo sde): la byed pa dang bral ba/yid la byed pa yongs su chad pa/phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa/dran pa dang blo gros dang rtogs pa dang khrel yod pa dang brtan
73b3(mdo sde): pa dang cho ga dang spyod yul dang nan tan gyi gnas su gyur pa/nyon mongs pa med pa'i so/zhi ba'i sa spros pa thams cad yongs su chod pa/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
73b4(mdo sde): kyi bslab pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul/yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di ni gzhon nu ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa zhes bya ste/byang chub
73b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa 'di la gnas pa ni ting nge 'dzin dang ma bral ba yin/sems 'khrul pa med pa yin/snying rje chen po dang ldan
73b6(mdo sde): zhing sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byed pa yin no//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//ting 'dzin mnyam pa med pa'i sa//shi na
73b7(mdo sde): tu mthong dka' phra zhing zhi//'du shes thams cad bcom pa ste//de phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya//rtog pa med cing rnam rtog med//gzung ba med cing bstan du med//sems
74a1(mdo sde): kyang dmigs pa med bya ste//de phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya//namo zhig mnyam par bzhag gyur te//chos kun la ni rlom sems med//rlom sems med
74a2(mdo sde): pa ji bzhin pa//de na ting nge 'dzin ces pasgrags//chos ni rdul tsam yod med de//rdul ces bya ba'ang yod ma yin//chos rnams dmigs su med pa skye//de phyir ting nge
74a3(mdo sde): 'dzin ces bya//sems kyi dmigs pa med pa yang //de ni rnam par rtog ces bya//chos de rnam par ma brtags pa//de ltar ting 'dzin shes par gyis//sgra yis
74a4(mdo sde): don rnams rab bstan te//sgra de nyid kyang dngos po med//sgra ni brag ca lta bu ste//bar snang dag gi nam mkha' bzhin//chos 'di rnams ni mi gnas te//'di dag la ni gnas
74a5(mdo sde): mi dmigs//mi gnas pa ni gnas kyi sgra//ngo bo nyid kyis mi rnyed do//'gro zhing 'chi 'phor brjod pa yi//de lta bu yi 'gro ba med//'gro ba med pa 'gro ba'i sgras//
74a6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin du de phyir gsungs//mnyam gzhag ma yin de ni rlom sems brjod//mnyam bzhag 'di'ang rlom sems gnyis pa ste//rlom sems med par byang chub rim
74a7(mdo sde): par spyod//dran pa rlom sems med pa byang chub mchog/mnyam dang mi mnyam zha ba sangs rgyas sa//zhi gnas lhag mthong mtshan med 'di yin te//zhi bo sangs
74b1(mdo sde): rgyas sa 'di bsten byas na//ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la de brtson yin//don gyi rnam par rig pa 'jug pa la//yi ge dag gis 'jug par mi nus tAM//skra dbyangs thams cad rnam
74b2(mdo sde): par spangs nas ni//mnyam par bzhag 'gyur de la rlom sems med//byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ting 'dzin 'di//ji ltar bshad bzhin gnas shing brtson byed na//bral
74b3(mdo sde): hete gling 'dri bskol pas 'tshig gyur kyang //ri mchog dbus su zhugs pas mos mi 'chig/bskal pa brgya phrag mang por rab bsregs kyang //nam mkha' sngon chad na mi yang ma
74b4(mdo sde): 'tshig bzhin//chos rnams nam mkha' mtshungs par rnam rig pas//de ni ma yi nang du yong mi 'tshig/gal te sangs rgyas zhing rnams 'bar gyur la//'bar ba 'di dag
74b5(mdo sde): ma lus zhi zhig ces//ting 'dzin gnas nas smon lam 'di btang na//sa rnams zhig kyang de la 'gyur ba med//de ni rdzu 'phrul stobs kyang mtha' yas 'gyur//nam mkha'
74b6(mdo sde): la yang thogs pa med par 'gro/rjes su bstan bzhin ting 'dzin gnas pa ni//byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di dag myong //skye zhing 'chi 'phor de 'gyur yang //skye ba
74b7(mdo sde): med cing 'chi 'pho med//gang gis de ltar rnam rig go//de la ting 'dzin rnyed mi dka'//'chi 'pho skye ba med par ni//'jig rten mgon pos rab tu bshad//de ltar 'jig
75a1(mdo sde): rten mgon reg nas//de phyir ting nge 'dzin kyang rig/'jig rten gyis ni mgos shing //'jig rten chos la mi chags te//lus ni thogs pa med par ni//
75a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar byed//zhing dag na ni 'jig rten 'dren//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu mthong //sangs rgyas dag gis zhing bshad pa//chos rnams de
75a3(mdo sde): dag der yang nyan//dri la mi shes yod med de//chos kyi dbyings kyang rab tu 'chad//chos kyi rnam pa rtag tu rig/de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul//bskal pa bye bar
75a4(mdo sde): 'chad ston kyang //de yi spobs pazad mi 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' gzhan mang po//mkhas pa dag kyang sprul par byed//byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa ni//pad+ma
75a5(mdo sde): 'dab ma stong dag la//skyil mo krung bcas 'dug pa dag/zhing nas zhing du 'gro bar byed//ting 'dzin zhi ba bsgoms nas ni//gzungs dang mdo sde bzang po dang //mdo
75a6(mdo sde): sde gzhan yang bya ba dang //sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu ston//sems can mang po bsam mi khyab//phyir mi ldog la 'god par byed//sangs rgyas byang chub rab ston
75a7(mdo sde): kyang //spobs pa dag ni zad mi 'gyur//rin chen rnam par brgyan pa yi//khang pa brtsegs zhugs de 'gro ste//dri dang ldan pa'i me tog gis//'dren pa la yang
75b1(mdo sde): mngon par 'thor//dri dang ldan pa'i phye mas kyang //'dren pa la ni rab tu 'thor//de dag thams cad byang chub phyir//rgya che ba yi mchod pa byed//byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa
75b2(mdo sde): yid/yon tan dpag med de dag ni//nam zhig nyon mongs med gyur pa//de tshe rdzu 'phrul de dag thob//nyon mongs dag ni mi skye zhing //dag pa dang ba 'od gsal ba//mi 'khrugs
75b3(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas pa ni//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul lo//rab tu zhi zhing nye bar zhi//nyon mongs med cing mya ngan bral//spros med rnam par ma spros pa//spros pa dag las
75b4(mdo sde): shin tu 'das//yi ge'i smod pa med pa ni//chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid do//dbyangs kyis rig par dka' bas na//de phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya//zad mi shes shing nye
75b5(mdo sde): bar zhe//lhun gyis 'grub cing bstan med pa//rnyog med yang dag nyid kyi mtha'//sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul lo//'ong dang 'gro ba med pa dang //spros med lhun
75b6(mdo sde): gyis grub pa yi//chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni//sangs rgyas kun gyi bslabs pa ste//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di bslabs nas//yon tan dag gi pha rol phyin//chu
75b7(mdo sde): rol dang ni pha rol med//sngon mtha' rnam par ma brtags te//de phyir sangs rgyas de dag kun//yon tan dag gi pha rol phyin//'ong dang 'gro ba med pa dang //spros med
76a1(mdo sde): lhun gyis grud pa yi//chos kyi rang bzhin mkhyen nas ni//de dag de las pha rol phyin//ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o///
76a2(mdo sde): 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo//bam po lnga pa//do nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo ga yas pa'i lha ngas la
76a3(mdo sde): btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das
76a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa'i ting nge
76a5(mdo sde): 'dzin bstan pa legs par bshad pa ni ngo mtshar to//'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis yun ring por bslab pa 'di la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
76a6(mdo sde): rlung yang dag par bslangs pa ni bcom ldan 'das bdag spobs so//bde bar gshegs pa bdag spongs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gzhon nu de'i
76a7(mdo sde): dus la dang ba par shes na khyod spobs par gyis shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la skabs phye nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du tshul
76b1(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bstod do//'dod dang khro bas rtag tu zil non cing //sdug bsngal garjes pa'i sems can gzigs nas ni//se dgu thar byed
76b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gyur cig ces//byang chub phyir ni khyod kyis sems kyang bskyed//dpa' bos bskal pa bye ba ming spyad do//sbyin dang dul dang legs sdom rtag rlo ga nas//bzod
76b3(mdo sde): dang tshul khrims de bzhin brtson 'grus deso//sbyin pa dag kyang mtha' yas rgya cher byin//rkang lag dang ni srog kyang rib gtong zhing //khyod kyi yid la nam yang skyo med de//gser
76b4(mdo sde): dngul de bzhin bu dang chung ma dang //chags med gyur nas rgyal po'i srid kyang gtong //khyod kyi tshul khrims dri med rnam dag ste//bdag nyid gtong zhing tshul khrims yong mi 'dral//
76b5(mdo sde): lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rang tu bsdams//dad gshegs sems dul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//bzod la dgyes shing bzod pa'i lam la gnas//lus ni dum bur byas
76b6(mdo sde): kyang 'khrugs med de//byams pa bsgoms pas de las 'o ma zags//bdo gshegs ngo mtshar khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//stobs bcu dag gi stobs dang ldan gyur cing //cha gos
76b7(mdo sde): med ye shes gnas pas chos kun rtogs//thugs rjes 'jig rten phan mdzad chos kyi rje//skye dgu 'di yi don bzhed thugs brtse ba//stong par mkhyen cing 'di na sems
77a1(mdo sde): can med//de bzhin 'jig rten lam stor gzigs nas ni//de dag rang bzhin bdag med chos rtogs bgyis//rnam grol skyes kyang gang na'ang rnam grol med//
77a2(mdo sde): so sor brtags te bag med thams cad spangs//bdud sde mtha' yas stobs dang ldan pa bcom//ye shes mtha' yas byang chub rgya cher mkhyen//mchog tu rnam dag zhi ba'i
77a3(mdo sde): rjes kyang sten//zla ba skar mar bcas pa gnas lhung zhing //ri dang grod du bcas pa'i sa zhig pa la//nam mkha'i khams ni rnam pa gzhan gyur kyang //khyod ni mi badren pa yi
77a4(mdo sde): tshig mi gsung //skye dgu dmigs pa dag la dga' ba dang //sems can sdug bsngal khyod kyis gzigs nas ni//stong pa nyid dang zab cing zhi ba yi//dmigs pa
77a5(mdo sde): med pa dag ni ston par mdzad//bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su//mi dmigs pa yi bslab pa la//dpa' bo chen posra bslabs pas na//khyod la 'khrul pa yong mi
77a6(mdo sde): mnga'//ji lta bu yi chos bsrabs pa//de lta bu yi chos ston te//mu stegs gzhan dag ji snyed dang //byis pa dag gis sa 'di min//bdag tu 'du shes gang gnas
77a7(mdo sde): pa//mi mkhas de dag 'khrul bar 'gyur//chos rnams bdag med rigs pas na//khyod la 'khrul pa yong mi mnga'//dpa' bo che po yang dag gsung //yang dag
77b1(mdo sde): chos la rab tu gnas//mgon po yang dag bden gnas te//yang dag tshig ni rab tu gsung //khyod kyi smon lam btab pa bzhin//khyod kyi yang dag spyod pa byung //yang dag
77b2(mdo sde): de yi rgyu 'drangs//yang dag tshig ni rab tu gsung /1 dag spyod pa phun sum tshogs//yang dag mtha' la shin tu bslangs//yang dag parnam pa yang dag spyod//yang dag
77b3(mdo sde): mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo//khyod kyi shes rab mnyam pa me de//ye shes gsung ba 'od mdzad pa//ye shes khyad par rab brnyes shing //ye shes gsung la phyag 'tshal lo//khyod
77b4(mdo sde): kyis byams pa rab bsgoms te//sems can kun gyi bshes gnyen khyod//re re ba bzhin du mi sprul te//mi g.yo rab tu gnas pa'o//ston pa'i 'khor tshogs rgya che yang
77b5(mdo sde): chogs mang dag kyang sdud par mdzad//shes rab zab mo bde bar gshegs//'khor gyi nang gshegs sgra yang sgrog/sangs rgyas seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing //seng ge'i
77b6(mdo sde): skyabs su rnam par gshegs//khyod kyis mu stegs kun btul ba//seng gA yis nI wa rnams bzhin//dpa' bo ma dul dul mdzad pa//ma dul ba dag khyod kyis btul//
77b7(mdo sde): de dag mdza' sdug brtar+ya gyur te//sbyar mi phyed cing lesmras par gnas//lta ba sna tshogs gnas pa yi//sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas ni//sdug dang mi sdug
78a1(mdo sde): med pa yi//bdag med chos ni khyod ston te//ma bslabs pa yi byis pa dag/log pa'i lam la spyod pa rnams//'dren pa gang nas gshegs pa yi//
78a2(mdo sde): lam yang rab tu khyod kyis bstan//bdag tu 'dzin la su gnas pa//de dag sdug bsngal nyid la gnas//gang lo sdug bsngal med pa yi//bdag med de dag mi shes
78a3(mdo sde): so//'khrul pa med pa'i chos tshig khyod ston to//khyod la 'khrul pa mi rnyed 'jig rten mgon//khyod ni ma log pa yi tshig gsung ste//sdug bsngal mang thar mdzad la
78a4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo//lta klu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig phrag/brgya stong mang po mkha' la 'khod pa rnams//bcom ldan 'das kyi don ldan gsung thos nas//thams cad
78a5(mdo sde): 'dren la rab tu dga' ba skyed//tshig ni rab tu snyan cing bzang la 'thad//mnyen zhing 'jam la yid 'ong dus dang 'byor//gsung gi yan lag dpag tu med dang ldan//
78a6(mdo sde): phan byed skye bo mang po thar byed pa//sil snyan brgya stong dpag tu med pa dang //lha yi dbyangs sgra dga' bar 'gyur ba'i mchog/shin tu snyan pa dus gcig 'byor gyur
78a7(mdo sde): kyang //bde gshegs gsung gcig gis ni zil gyis non//khu byug bya mang 'jam pa'i sgra 'byon dang //kun la shin tu yid 'thad dbyangs snyan dag/bya tshogs
78b1(mdo sde): mang po thams cad sgra 'byin pa//sangs rgyas gsung gi char yang des mi phod//lha yi bu mo sgra dbyangs snyan pa dang //sil snyan rol mo glu dbyangs 'jam pa dang //pi wang rdza rnga
78b2(mdo sde): rnga chen dung gi sgra//de dag sangs rgyas gsung gi char mi phod//khu byug ne tso ri skegs sgra rnams dang //khrung khrung rma bya mi 'am ci yi sgra//sgra dbyangs yid 'ong snyan pa ci yod pa//de
78b3(mdo sde): dag sangs rgyas gsung gi char mi pho//snyan cing mnyen la yid 'ong dga' ba dang //shin tu mnyen la rab bsdogs zhi ba'i tshig/dbyangs rnams thams cad dus gcig bsgrags
78b4(mdo sde): pa bas//de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung mchog dgar 'gyur yin//lha mi me dbang lha ma yin rnams dang //srid gsum sems can mtha' dag ci yod pa//'od byed
78b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi 'od snang de dag ni//bde gshegs 'od zer gcig gis zil gyis non//bde gshegs sku ni me tog rgyas pa bzhin//mtshan rnams kun gyis sna tshogs spros
78b6(mdo sde): shing brgyan//bsod nams brgyas grub dag cing rnam par dang //rgyal ba'i sku ni 'jig rten kun tu lhan//dung gi sgra dang 'khar rnga sgra snyan dang //rnga yi sgra dang de bzhin kau ma
78b7(mdo sde): pa la yau sgra//rab tu 'jam zhing 'thad pa'i sgra de kun//sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya yi char mi phod//sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig stong gi sgra//sgra skad gsal zhing mnyen pa
79a1(mdo sde): lha yi 'dra//lha dang lha mo'i sgra dbyangs dgar 'gyur ba//sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi brgya yI char mi phod//khrung khrud rma bya dUr pa khu byug dang //ngang pa kun la rnam
79a2(mdo sde): mang bya yi tshogs//de dag sgra snyan dus gcig tshogs pas kyang //sangs rgyas dbyings kyi brgya yi tshar mi phod//klu dang gnod sbyin lha min lto 'phye dang //lha dbang tshangs pa
79a3(mdo sde): lha yau bdag po'i sgra//srid gsum yid 'ong 'thad pa ci yod pa//de dag sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi char mi phod//tshangs pa'i 'od dang lha yi dbang po dang //nyi ma dang ni nor bu
79a4(mdo sde): rin chen 'od//kun gyi 'od ni rnam pa du ma dag/'od kun rgyal ba'i 'od kyis zil gyis non//lus dang ngag dang yid kyang shin tu rnam par dag/ye shes dag pa srid pa
79a5(mdo sde): gsum na gos pa med//mi dbang yon tan dbyig tshogs yon tan rin chen mnga'//rang 'byung yon tan thams cad kyis ni mnyam med mnyam//de ltar stobs bcu bden pa
79a6(mdo sde): gsung la bstod nas ni//gzhon nu yid kyang rab tu dga' bas tshig smras pa/sangs rgyas gzhal med dpag yas la ni mchod pa yis//shAkya thub bzhin bdag kyang sangs rgyas
79a7(mdo sde): gyur cig smra//bde bar gshegs pas de yi spyod pa mchog mkhyen nas//mi dbang tsha smras med seshes mnga' ba 'dzum pa mdzad//stobs bcu sras kyi thu bo byams pas de zhus
79b1(mdo sde): te//'dren pas gang gi slad du 'di ltar 'dzum pa mdzad//sa 'di dag kyang rnam pa drug tu yongs su g.yos//lha dang klu rnams mkha' la 'dug cing rab dga' ste//shin tu sems rangs
79b2(mdo sde): mgu bas sangs rgyas lta zhing mchis//bde gshegs zil gyis ma non de dag lung bstan gsol//skyes bu mchog gi ye shes gang la zhugs pa ni//bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos
79b3(mdo sde): dag gi sa ma lags//rgyal ba khyod kyis gang gi slad du 'dzum mdzad pa//ye shes rnam dag dpe med ye shes ma lus gsungs//shAkya'i seng ge stobs bcu mnga' zhing rnam 'dren
79b4(mdo sde): pa//rkang gnyis gtso bo ye shes kyi'ang pha rol phyin//'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang thab gti mug sal//rab tu 'od snang mdzad pa khyod la zhu ba lags//byang chub dam pa mchog
79b5(mdo sde): 'di rab tu 'tshol ba'i phyir//'dren pa khyod kyis bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed dang //de las lhag par yang ni spyod pa rab tu spyad//gang gi don du 'dzum pa 'di mdzad bstan du gsol///
79b6(mdo sde): ye shes dam pa mchogro 'dri rab tu 'tshal po'i phyir//ston pas phyog dang zhabs kyang yongs su btang ba mdzad//sras dang btsun mo gnyen bai shes rtsa lag phangs pa btang //thub
79b7(mdo sde): pa 'dzum pa bstan pa 'di yi rgyu gang lags//rta dang ba glang dang ni shing rta rkang thang dang //bran dang nor bu dngul dang mu tig khyod kyis btang //spyod pa mchog spyod tshe ni khyod kyis ma gtang
80a1(mdo sde): pa//rin po che dang nor rdzas dag ni dang yang med//srid pa gsum na ye shes dag ni mchog tu gyur//sems can thams cad kyi ni spyod pa rab tu mkhyen//sems//
80a2(mdo sde): dang khams dang mos pa dag la'ang mkhas shing rig/gang gi don du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan pa mdzad//mo yi gtso bo la ni gang gis mchod//gong gi don ni rgya tshe yangs par 'gyur///
80a3(mdo sde): spyod pa 'di yang su dag rab tu 'dzin//thub pa gang gi don du 'dzum 'di bstan//sa yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos//pad+ma bye ba 'dab ma bye bar ldan//gser gyi pad+ma shin tu
80a4(mdo sde): 'od gsal ba//mdzes shing yid du 'thad pa sa las byung //byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul rab che ba//rgyal ba'i thugs kyi sros po de la mchis//chos smra ba yang ming po
80a5(mdo sde): 'dir mchis te//'dren pa la ni de yi slad du zhu//rnga dang dung dang la bar rnga sgra chen dang //sil snyan bye bo khrag khrig brdungs pa yi//de dag sgra ni nam mkha' 'di las gda'//
80a6(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa'i dbyangs ni bsam mi khyab//thung khrung dang pi ka la ping+ga dang //khu byug bya tshogs mang po 'dus pa yi//skra dbyangs rab tu snyen pa phyung ba yang //de dag
80a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi char mi phod//gang gis sbyin dang dul dang legs sdom rnams//sngon gyi bskal pa mang por bsnyen par bgyis//gang gis mi yi gtso bo rab
80b1(mdo sde): mchod na//su yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan//ra malus pa mchog kyang bskyod nas ni//sangs rgyas byang chub ji ltar thob 'gyur zhes//gang gis rkang gnyis gcal sngon chad
80b2(mdo sde): zhus//su yi spyad du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan//stobs bcu dran pa ji snyed 'das pa dang //de ltar byung dang ma byon pad+mo gshegs dang //mi yi gtso bo thams cad rab tu mkhyen//de
80b3(mdo sde): phyir skye dgu'i don du zhu ba lags//srog chags kun gyi spyod yul mtha' yas dang //mi rnams gang gi bsam pa ji 'dra dang //skye dgu'i sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen//de byir
80b4(mdo sde): mi yi gtso la zhu ba lags//rgyu dang rigs pa 'dul la mkhas pa dag/sangs rgyas ye shes ji ltar thob snyam pa//spyod pa mchog lo su dag spyod pa rnams//de phyir de dag ni rkang
80b5(mdo sde): gnyis gco la zhu//gang gis phra zhing shin tu blta dka'i chos//stong pa zhi ba mtshungs med bsam mi khyab//stobs bcu ldan pa'i spyod yul bsgoms pa rnams//de dgra slang
80b6(mdo sde): du'adren pa byadag zhu'o//srog chags 'gro ba bsam yas kun gyi phyir//gang gis byams pa snying rje rab bsgoms shing //gang la sems can 'du shes med pa dag/de phyir ting
80b7(mdo sde): gnyis gtso la bdag zhu'o//gang dag ye shes mtshungs med bsam mi khyab//de dag la ni gzung ba yod med de//sems dang spyod yul dag gi pha rol phyin//de phyir mgon
81a1(mdo sde): po la ni bdag zhu'o//tshul khrims ye shes yon tan pha rol phyin//dus gsum la ni ye shes mtshungs med 'jug/khyod la 'khrul pa dag ni mi mnga' n+da//
81a2(mdo sde): su yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di dag bstan//shA ri'i bu dang ma 'gags maud+gal bu//bde gshegs nyan thos gzhan grang su mchis pa//'di la de dag ye shes mi 'jug ste//'di
81a3(mdo sde): ni sangs rgyas spyod yul bla na med//chos rnams kun la dbang ba'i pha rol phyin//bslabs pa'i spyod pa kun gyis mngon par 'phags//'dren pa thugs rje dag kyang rab
81a4(mdo sde): bskyed la//de ni dam mkhyen pa gsung sgra dbyung bar gsol//sngon grang bskal pa bye ba mang por yong //skyabs dang dpung gnyen mchog tu gyur snyam ste//de 'dra'i sems
81a5(mdo sde): kyis rkang gnyis gtso dris po//'dren pas de yi 'bras bu deng gsung zhig/gang thog chen pos lung bstan mnyan pa'i phyir//gnod sbyin srin po grul bum gsang ba po///
81a6(mdo sde): rkang gnyis gtso bo la ni rab rtog cing //thams cad thal mo sbyar te gus par 'khod//sangs rgyas zhing ni bye ba mang po nas//byang chub sems dpa' 'phrul ldan mang po
81a7(mdo sde): mchis//bde gshegs sras kyi gtso bo thugs las skyes//thams cad thal mo sbyar cing gus pas 'khod//shAkya seng ge mi mchog dri ba'i phyir//mi 'khrugs zhing phyogs
81b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten rnam grags pa//shar phyogs nas ni spos kyi glang po yang //byang chub sems dpa' khrug khrig mdun bdar mchis//shAkya song ge mi mchog dri ba'i phyir//bded can
81b2(mdo sde): gyi 'jig rten khams mchog nas//mthu chen thob dang spyan ras gzigs dbang yang //byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig lhan cig mchis//gang dag sngan chad bskol pa bye mang snyed//
81b3(mdo sde): ye shes dam pa mchog 'di 'chol ba'i phyir//rgya mtsho kun gyi bye ma mnyam pa yi//bde gshegs dpag tu med pa bsnyen bkur bgyis//sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod cing rab
81b4(mdo sde): bsngags pa//chos rnams kun gyi yon tan pha rol phyin//'jig rten phyogs rnams kun tu rab grags pa//'jam dbyangs legs par thal mo sbyar te mchis//sangs rgyas
81b5(mdo sde): zhing du khrag khrig spyad bgyis kyang //'di 'dra rnams ni mthong ba rnyad dka' ste//legs bslabs sangs rgyas sras po yon tan can//thams cad thal mo rab sbyar gus par 'khod//
81b6(mdo sde): ston pa kun gyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa//mkhas pa 'dir mchis ci 'dra de lta bu//snod du gyur pa 'di na gzhan ma mchis//'dren pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa gsungs//rgyal/
81b7(mdo sde): ba rnam 'dren gleng gzhi ma mchis par//gang zag dam pa 'dzum pa mi ston na//gang gi slad du 'dzum pa 'di bstan pa//rnga mchog sgra ldan gsung dbyangs dbyung du gsol//ngang
82a1(mdo sde): pa khru drug rma bya sa ra sa//'brug gi sgra skad khyu mchog sgra 'byin bzhin//lha yi rol mo snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa//sems can grol mdzad gsung gis lung ston
82a2(mdo sde): cig/byams pa skyed cing dga' ba 'phel bar bgyid//ye shes ston cing ma rig sel ba ste//don la rtog cing shos rab 'phel bgyid cing //bskal pa khra khri ga bye bar
82a3(mdo sde): rnam sbyong ba//rtogs pas nges bgyis dngos po rnam par bshig/sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i tshig don nges par ston//mu stegs kun gyi smra ba rnam par 'jom//stong
82a4(mdo sde): pa srog med sems can med pa sgom//bsod nams stong phrag brgya yis legs par brgyan//sangs rgyas stong phrag brgya yis 'dir smad de//lha rnams stong phrag brgya
82a5(mdo sde): yis rab tu bskyod//tshangs pa stong phrag brgya yis phyag kyang bgyis//gnod sbyin srin po grul bum dad bgyid de//klu dang lto 'phye 'dab bzang grol bar bgyid//rtag
82a6(mdo sde): tu ma chags shin tu ldan pa ste//las dge'i 'bras bus 'phags pa gsung phyung shig/rgyal ba ji snyed mya ngan 'das pa dang //gang dag ma byon pa dang bzhugs pa rnams//
82a7(mdo sde): thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen cing thogs mi mnga'//'dren pa yon tan kun gyis shin tu 'phags//'byung po 'dzin pa ri dang rgya mtshor bcaso//sa 'di thams cad
82b1(mdo sde): rnam pa drug tu g.yos//lha yi tshogs rnams mkha' las me tog 'gyur//lha yi spros ngang yid du 'ong ba ldang //'dod chags zhe sdang rab rib ma lus bsal//tshul khrims yongs
82b2(mdo sde): dag yid kyang yongs su dag/mtshan med rab tu zhi ba'i sbyong la dgyes//seng ge'i sgra skad sgrogs shig thugs rje can//spobs dang ldan zhing shin tu snyan pa yangs//rgyal ba'i
82b3(mdo sde): shes rab rdzogs shing ye shes rdzogs//thugs rje ldan pa khyod 'dra 'jig rten med//gang gi don du 'dzum pa 'di bsten gsungs//rma byi khu byug ka la pid+ma'i sgra//shang shr-ing te'u'i
82b4(mdo sde): sgra yang yid 'ong ba//dgra' 'gyur skad kun dus gcig tshogs pas kyang //bde gshegs gsung gi char ni des mi phod//rnga dang rdza rnga 'khar rje de bzhin te//dung dang gling bu de
82b5(mdo sde): bzhin pi wang dang //sil snyan stong gi sa rnams gcig tu 'dus//de dag bde gshegs sgra yi char mi phod//lha yi sil snyan dam pa stong gi sgra//lha yi bu mo glu dbyangs snyan
82b6(mdo sde): pa dang //rol mo'i sgra rnams dga' ba skyed brgyad pa//de dag bde gshegs gsung gi char mi phod//'jig rten phran pa khyod kyi gsung gcig las//mos pa tha dad bzhin du skra
82b7(mdo sde): 'byung ste//rgyal ba bdag la ston snyom so so sems//gang gi slad du khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad bstan//lha yi sgra dang de bzhin klu yi skad//mi'am ci yi sgra snyed ci mchis pa///
83a1(mdo sde): de dag nam yang nyon mongs zhi mi bgyid//sangs rgyas gsung ni rtag tu nyon mongs spel//dga' ba skyed cing 'dod chags dga' ma lags//byams pa
83a2(mdo sde): skyed cing zhe sdang blo ma lags//shes rab skyed cing gti mug blo ma lags//sangs rgyas gsung gis dri ma thams cad sel//'khor las slad rol tu ni sgra mi 'byung/thams
83a3(mdo sde): cod kyi yang nim nur brgya mang gcod//modzo bI ma lags dma' ba ma lags pa//thub pa'i gsung ni snyoms shing bde ba ston//dri dang nags bcas sa 'di gis gyur cing //rgya
83a4(mdo sde): mtsho'i chu dag de bzhin pas gyur la//zla ba nyi mas la lhung gyur kyang //rgyal bas bshad pa rnam pa gzhan mi 'gyur//tshig gi yan lag thams cad dag pa'i gsung //song
83a5(mdo sde): ge'i sgra skad 'jam zhing mnyen pa'i dbyangs//tshangs pa'i dbyangs mnga' bde gshegs thugs rje can//gang gi slad du 'dzum mdzad bstan du gsol//'das dang ma 'ongs
83a6(mdo sde): pa dang da ltar gyi//'jig rten sems can ji snyed kun gyi yang //sems dang spyod pa kun la rab tu mkhas//gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan bshad du gsol//rgyal ba
83a7(mdo sde): ji snyed su dag zugs rje can//dbang dang ye shes kun gyi pha rol phyin//dri mod zla zhal rgyal ba de dag ni//rtag tu rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad do//bskal pa bye bar
83b1(mdo sde): brjod kyang mtshungs med pa//gang+gA'i bye snyed yon tan brjod bgyis kyang //yon tan dag gi tshad brjod mi nus pa//gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan bshad du gsol//'dzum pa bstan
83b2(mdo sde): pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o///de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis sa
83b3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid kyis//mtshungs pa med pa'i dga' bas sangs rgyas bstod//sangs rgyas yon tan bye brag 'phags brjod pa//rtag tu
83b4(mdo sde): mor shin tu bsngags par 'gyur//sngon yang rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'dir//sangs rgyas dag kyang bye ba phrag stong mthong //rgyal ba de dag kun gyi drung du 'dis//ting 'dzin
83b5(mdo sde): zhi mchog 'di yang rab tu dris//byang chub spyod pa mchog 'di spyad pa no//'di ni kun tu nga yi bur gyur to//thams cad du yang spobs dang ldan par gyur//kun tu rtag par tshangs
83b6(mdo sde): dar spyod pa spyad//de ni phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po la//'od la ma pham khyod nyid nga yi dbang //rtag tu tshangs spyod gtsang la gnas nas ni//ting nge 'dzin 'di shin tu rgyas
83b7(mdo sde): byed 'gyur//ting 'dzin dam pa 'di ni rab 'tshol zhing //lam 'dir zhugs pas byang chub des thob 'gyur//sangs rgyas bye ba mang pos yongs bzung ste//'dren pa rnams
84a1(mdo sde): mchod pa mchog byed 'gyur//nga ni ye shes la yang rab gnas te//zla 'od spyod pa khyad thugs lung bstan cing //'di yi srog dang chongs par spyod pa dag/
84a2(mdo sde): phyi ra'i dus lnga bad chad med par bya//leg mthil sgyu ru 'bru lnga bkod pa bzhin//ma 'ongs po ni gdol mchod 'gyur 'i//sangs rgyas bye ba dag ni brag stong ngo //de
84a3(mdo sde): lhag par gang+gA'i bye snyed shes//lha dang klu rnams bye ba brgyad cu dang //gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag 'dun cu dag/phyi mo'i dus la btsun po byed par 'gyur//rkang gnyis ga
84a4(mdo sde): byol yang mchod pa byed//rkang gnyis gtso la mchod pa mchog byas te//ye shes bla med 'di ni rab bsgrubs nas//phyi dus lus la de ni 'jig rten mngogon//rgyal ba
84a5(mdo sde): dri med 'od ces bya bar 'gyur//zla 'od gzhan nur gyur pas bdag nyid kyi//lung bstan 'di zos dka' bos rgyas kyu /ta la bdun srid du ni mngon 'dugs nas/
84a6(mdo sde): mnga' la 'dug ste ched du brjod pa brjod//oM ma rgyal ba chos mchog ston mdzad pa//rnam grol ye shes bdag ngo sto sul gnas//shin tu nges pani ye shes mchog
84a7(mdo sde): gnas pas//pha ro'i rgol ba dag gis zil minon//chags pa spangs shing rnam par grol la reg/dngos po rnam shig srid par chags mi mdzad//khyod la spros
84b1(mdo sde): pa mtha' dag kun mi mnga'//srid pa gsum la chags med ye shes 'jug/spros pa thams cad kyis kyang mi gos shing //lta ba spros pa mtha' dag rab tu spangs//lam yang
84b2(mdo sde): shin tu bsgoms shing gnas mod pa//zil gyis mnon su dang mi 'phrod med//khyod ni khams gsum dag la gnas med de//chu bo dang ni mdud pa thams cad spangs//srid
84b3(mdo sde): pa'i 'khri shing 'ching ba mtha' dag bcad//srid pa spangs shing srid par mtshams sbyor med//chos kyi rang bzhin dngos med rab mkhyen cing //brjod du med pa'i tshig kyang thugs su
84b4(mdo sde): chud//mu stegs phyin ci log la gnas pa dag/mi mkhas de bzhin seng ges wa bzhin bshig/bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos kyi gter//gter mchog dam pa
84b5(mdo sde): bdag gis deng thob ste//ngan 'gro log par ltung ba thams cad spangs//'dren par mi 'gyur snyam ni the tshom med//gser gyi kha dog mdzes shing 'od gsal ba//phyag
84b6(mdo sde): brkyang de yi mgo la rab bzhag nas//lhar bcas 'jig rten dag kyang dbang bkod de//mi yi khyu mchog byang chub dbang bskur mdzad//'dzum pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bco
84b7(mdo sde): lnga pa'o////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems
85a1(mdo sde): dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar bya bar 'dod pa dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' zhing bde ba bla na med pa
85a2(mdo sde): 'phags pa 'di la sems can rnams rab tu dgod par 'dod pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam po nyid rnam par spros pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya//gzung
85a3(mdo sde): bar bya/kun chub par bya/bcang bar bya/bklag par bya/rab tu gdon par bya/lung mnod par bya/kha ton du bya/nyon mongs pa med pa'i sgom pas bsgom par bya//
85a4(mdo sde): mang du bya/gzhan lo yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzhon nu chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa ting nge/
85a5(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di ni ngan song thams cad las 'da' bar byed pa/nad thams cad las rab tu thar bar byed pa yin te/gzhon nu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
85a6(mdo sde): chen pos chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam por spros pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di thos shId+tha bzung ste bsgoms par gyur pa dro'i tshe/gzhon nu byang chub sems
85a7(mdo sde): dnga' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par byas shing ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba'i bde ba bla na med pa 'tshogs pa la
85b1(mdo sde): sems can rnams rab tu 'god de ting nge 'dzin 'di'ang myur du thob bo//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//de nas de'i
85b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la don 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di yang dag par rab tu bshad do//sngon
85b3(mdo sde): chad spyod pa spyad pa dran pa ni//bdi gshegs seng ge rgyal mtshan bstan pa la//dge slong mkhas pa chos smra byung ba yang //de yo mang ni tshangs pas byin zhes bya//dA na blo
85b4(mdo sde): gros zhes bya rgyal po'i bu//na bar gyur te mi bzad sdig bsngal tshor//de tshe tshangs pas byin pa chos smra ba//nga yi slob dpon du ni gyur pa yin//nga ni sman po lnga brgya mi nyung
85b5(mdo sde): ba//brtson pa'i yid kyis nad dpad gso bar byed//nga yi nad ni gso bar ma nus nas//nga yi gnyen bshes kun kyang sdug bsngal gyur//nga yang na bar dge slong des thos nas///
85b6(mdo sde): nad dri byar ni nga yi drung du 'ongs//tshangs byin nga la brtse ba rab bskyed nas//ting 'dzin mchog 'di de tsha bshad par gyur//de ni ting 'dzin dam pa 'di thos nas//'phags pa'i
85b7(mdo sde): dga' ba zang zing med pa skyes//chos kyi ngo borgyan kyang rab shes mos//nga yang de yi dus na nad las spos//mar me mdzad ni spyod pa spyod pa ni//dge slong chos su mkhas par
86a1(mdo sde): gyur pa yin//nga ni blo gros rgyal blo'i bur gyur te//ting 'dzin ye shes kyis ni nad las thar//de bas gzhon nu khyod kyis byi dus na//yongs su nyams
86a2(mdo sde): pa 'di dag rjes dran zhing //byis pas nyes par brjod pa'i tshig bzod kyis//ting 'dzin 'di yang zung la legs par lcogs//phyi ma'i dus la dge slong mang po dag/brkam
86a3(mdo sde): zhing gtum la ma bsngams 'byung bar 'gyur//sdig la dga' zhing lhung bzed chos gos chags//ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur//rgod cing dbang po g.yengs pa
86a4(mdo sde): phrag dag can//grong la chags shing rnyed pa 'dod pa dag/sbyor ba byed pa'i skabs la rtag tu gnas//ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur//lag pa dang ni rkang pa rnam
86a5(mdo sde): par rdod//rtse 'jo rgod la rtag par rab tu zhugs//gcig lo gcig ni maphul 'khyud lag kyang sbrel//grong du spyod lam gzhan du sgyur bar byed//mi rigs sbyor ba'i
86a6(mdo sde): mtshan nyid 'di dag ste//gzhan gyi bu mo la yang rtag tu chags//gzugs kyi rgyags shing 'dun pa bor ba yin//grong dang grong khyer yul 'khor kun tu rgyu//de dag
86a7(mdo sde): bza' dang btung la rab tu zhugs//glu dang bro gar de bzhin rol mo dang //nyo 'tshong lhag par byed cing rtag tu brtson//btung po dag la chags shing ngo tsha bor//mi
86b1(mdo sde): rigs brtson pa spring yig skur bar byed//tshul khrims de bzhin lam dag btang nas so//khyim pa dag dang bsten cing khrims dral nas//de dag tshul zhig log par shin tu gnas/
86b2(mdo sde): las gang sangs rgyas kyis ni rtag smad pa//srang dang tshad lagayo sgyu byed par zhugs//de 'dra'i sdig pa nyon mongs las byas pas//las ngan byed pa de dag ngan song 'o//dung dang
86b3(mdo sde): gser dang nor bu nor mang dang //khyim dang gnyen bshes rnam spongs rab byung ste//sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di la rab byung nas//sdig pa'i las rnams shin tu spyod par byed//nor
86b4(mdo sde): dang 'bru la snying por 'du shos shing //gzhon drang ba lang shing rta rnams la chags//gang la bslab pa'i nan tan med pa rnams//de dag gis kyang ci phyir mgo bo bregs//ngas ni
86b5(mdo sde): sngon tshe spyod pa spyad pa na//bskal pa stong du shin tu dka' spyad de//nga yis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di btsal na//de dag de tshe 'di thos gad mos 'debs//de dag yun ring brdzun sgra
86b6(mdo sde): chings mi spyod//rtag tu rnyed la dga' zhing ngan srong gzhol//tshangs par spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni//tshul khrims 'chal pa de ni chos min smra//de dag phan tshun dbye
86b7(mdo sde): ba'i phyir 'jug ste//rigs pa ma yin pas ni rnyed pa 'tshal//gcig le gcig ni mi snyan rab brjod de//shi 'phos nas nI ngan song sar yang 'gro//de dag brgya dang stong gi
87a1(mdo sde): nad+ha na yang //de che bzod pa'i stobs ldan shin tu dkan//de pyir 'thab lnga brtson pa mang po 'byung //bzod pa sbyangs nas rab tu spros 'byed//byang chub
87a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' dod yin tshig tu smra//de yi sgra yang phyogs dang phyogs su 'gro/mi bden sgra yi dregs pas de rgyags te//tshul khrims nyams pas byang chubo gal yod//gang
87a3(mdo sde): la bsam pa rnam par dag med cing //chos 'di la yong bzod po med pa dang //chos rnams spong byed byang chub 'di thob pa//ngas ni ma thos nam yang yong ma mthong //de dag
87a4(mdo sde): 'jigs shing skrag nas khyim spangs te//rab tu byung nas shin tu dam du 'dzin//skyes bu dam pa'i theg pa spang byas nas//bye brag lhag par 'dod pa brlag par 'gyur//shes
87a5(mdo sde): rab dman zhing yon tan rnam spangs pa//theg pa mchog gi nyes pa rtag tu brjod//gang gi skyabs su de dag rab zhugs pa//de nyid la yang nyes pa brgya dgra brjod//'tsho ba
87a6(mdo sde): med pa mang po rab byung ste//sangs rgyas byang chub rnam pa kun mi 'dod//byis pa de dag bdag tu lta la gnas//stong pa nyid ni thos nas sgrog par 'gyur//phan tshun du
87a7(mdo sde): yang rtsod pa byas nas ni//gnod soms khong khro tho ba rab tu skyed//phan tshun du yang sbyang ba mngon 'debs shing /sdig pa bya sa nas shin tu dga' ba rnyed//gang dag tshul
87b1(mdo sde): khrims gnas shing yon tan ldan//byams la gnas shing rtag tu bzod rtogs pa//mnyen zhing des la shin tu bsdams pa rnams//de dag de tshe yongs su brnyas par 'gyur//gang
87b2(mdo sde): la shin tu gtum sems ldan 'byung dang //mi bzad ma rus ngan pa'i las byed pa//chos ma yin pa spyod cing 'thab la dga'//de dag de yi dus na mchod par 'gyur//bsgo bar
87b3(mdo sde): bya zhing rab tu go bar bya//gzhon nu nga la dad pa'i phyir 'brang na//bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa 'od dran nas//de dag la ni nam yang yid mi rton//de dag 'dod chags
87b4(mdo sde): tsho zhing zhe sdang che//gti mug che zhing nga rgyal dregs pas rgyags//lus kyang ma dul ngag kyang ma dul zhing //sems kyang ma dul ngan song gzhol ba yin//nga ni yon tan dag gi
87b5(mdo sde): bsngags brjod na//dge slong yon tan dag la mi spyod de//tshig tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi 'gyur//nan tan lhur byed byang chub rnyed mi dka'//sngon byung ba'i le'u ste bcu drug
87b6(mdo sde): pa'o////de nas gtam 'di mthar phyin par gyur pa dang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa de ltar 'dug bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la
87b7(mdo sde): yid kyis tshigs su bcad pas zhus pa/ri yi rgyal po bya rgod phung po ste//rtag tu sangs rgyas gnas par bde gshegs bzhud//'jig rten smon ma der yang gshegs nas ni//
88a1(mdo sde): khyod la bas rgyas ma byub rgya ba // bam ldan das chos nga chub sa spang ba smo sa nga tsun pabyams pa songs rgyag pas sa/
88a2(mdo sde): mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe' chen po byams pa la yid kyis tshigs su bcad pas bta ba/ri'i rgyal dor rgyal ba mngon gnas par//bya pham bdud rnams pham
88a3(mdo sde): byas byeng song shig/der ni 'gro ba kun gyi don chen yod //bla na med pa myur du grub par 'gyur//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bcom ldan
88a4(mdo sde): dad kyis yid kyis tshigs su bcad pas btang ba dang /bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis phyag btsal/bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'khor
88a5(mdo sde): de nas byung ste sangs rgyas mu myed pa rgya mtsho'i bye ma skyed kyi gnas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po mchod rten chen po gang na yod pa der song ste byin nas 'di lta ste/bcom ldan 'das
88a6(mdo sde): kyis yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir de'i mod lo ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po mnyam zhing yangs pa tu che ba/sdong dum dang tshwar ma dang rdo dong gseg ma dang gyo mo med cing kho re
88a7(mdo sde): yug kun rin po che sna bdun du byin gyis brlabs te/sa gzhi rin po che an+da rnyil 'bar ba bsam gyis mi khyab le dpe med pa'i lha'i rgyan thams cad dang rin po ches brgyan pa/rin po
88b1(mdo sde): che rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa du ma'i bkod pas rab tu spras pa/dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i nu bzas khyim gyi nyon 'khor brgyan cing spraspud de/bdug spos kyi snod sna tshogs nas ni bdug pa
88b2(mdo sde): 'thul bar byed/phreng ba dang lnga ldis ni brgyan/me tog sna tshogs ni bkram/lha'i rol mo'i sgra dbyings ni bsgrags/rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang lhab lhub bsgreng bas ni gang /khyams
88b3(mdo sde): kyi dkyil 'khor du ni bla re bres/'khor gyi khyams kyi dbus su nI rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i lha'i seng ge'i khri mngon par sprul te rgyu spun las ma byas pa'i gos ni bting /ka tsa lin+da ltar
88b4(mdo sde): 'jam zhing reg na bde ba dga' ldan ris kyi lho'i na bzas ni g.yogs/steng du snying po bag tsher ni bting /snam rten mtha' gnyis dmar po ni bshams/chu zheng dang 'phang du dpag tshad
88b5(mdo sde): tsam yod pa btsugs te/zhabs rten ri wa dang mi'i las 'das pa/dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa/mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa/ras rin po che bcos bus g.yogs pa/seng
88b6(mdo sde): ge'i khri la btags pa'i lha'i rin po che'i dril bu las ni sgra 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba gsal bar 'byung /phyogs kun tu ni nor bu rin po che chen pos snang bar gyur/rin po che gdugs
88b7(mdo sde): chen po rtsa ba ni bai DUr+ya dri ma med pa'i rin po che chen po las byas par mngon par sprul to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po
89a1(mdo sde): khor yug dang bcas pa thams cad rin po che sna tshogs du ma'i bkod pa'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan pa mngon par sprul nas skad cig de nyid la zla 'od gzhon
89a2(mdo sde): nur gyur pa'i khyim du zhugs par gyur to//zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas snyen la 'dug go///
89a3(mdo sde): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ri yang lha rdzas yangs shing rgya che ba//rin chen rdo stengs bzang zhing dga' ba dang //bsam gyis mi khyab lha rdzas yid kyi khyams//dbus su rin chen
89a4(mdo sde): seng ge'i khri yang btsugs//lha rdzas gdugs las yid 'ong sgra 'byung zhing //phyogs su nor bu rin chen 'od cher 'byung //rtsa ba yid du 'thad pa'i bai DUrar+ya//ma pham rgyal ba'i sras
89a5(mdo sde): pos de ltar sprul//ri yang rin chen sna tshogs rnam par bkra/rin chen gdan mchog rgyang grags tshad tsam du//byams pa dpa' bos de dag rab sprul nas//skad cig de nyid la ni
89a6(mdo sde): khyim du zhugs//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor chen po rgya mtsho lta bu la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan te/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar
89a7(mdo sde): byas/yang dag par btsud de gdan las bzhengs nas gshegs so//de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i chu dron gyi sgor byung nas ri'i rgyal po
89b1(mdo sde): byargod kyi phung po gad na yod pa deng gshegs te byon pa dang byams pas sprul pa'i khyams gang nA yod pa de dag shegs te byon nas byams pas mngon par sbrul pa'i seng ge'i khri chen po la
89b2(mdo sde): bzhugs te/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis ni yongs su bskor cing /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis ni mdun gyis bltos/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin
89b3(mdo sde): dang drang srong dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pas ni phyag byas te 'khor rgya mtsho lta bu'i nang na chos ston to//de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur
89b4(mdo sde): pa srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thams cad lhogs par gyur pa rnams dang /'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
89b5(mdo sde): tshan po khrag khrig mang po dang lhan cig tu me tog dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa thogs nas rol mo ni byed/phag ni rdo ba/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang lta'i ba dan ni
89b6(mdo sde): sgreng /phreng ba chen po dbul ba ni thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po zhi ba'i sgo nas byung ste/bya rgod kyi phung po'i raM gang na yod
89b7(mdo sde): padang bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabos la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas me tog dang
90a1(mdo sde): bdug po dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang sil snyan dang pog rdob pas mchod pa chen po byas te
90a2(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//gus pa dang ldan ri mo dang ldan par chos dri ba'i phyir phyogs cig tu 'dug pa dang zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
90a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de
90a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la skabs phye na bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das
90a5(mdo sde): kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu khyod la skabs phyes/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
90a6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig/de skad ces bka' stsal te go skabs phye nas bcom ldan 'das la zla 'od gzhon nur bAr pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
90a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros po'o ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur//
90b1(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa lo 'di skad ces bka' stsol to//gzhon nu chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
90b2(mdo sde): pos chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro//bzhi gang na na/gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
90b3(mdo sde): po des shing 'grogs na bde ba yin/dul zhing dul ba'i sa thob pa yin te/de pha rol gyis gshes sam/smyos pa'i tshig nyes par smra zhing /nyes par brjod pa'i tshig gi lam
90b4(mdo sde): bzod cing mi mjed pa'i rang bzhin can yin/las la lta zhing nga rgyal bcom pa dang chos 'dod pa yin te/gzhon nu chos dang po 'di dang ldan na byang chub sems dpal sems
90b5(mdo sde): dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/tshul khrims
90b6(mdo sde): yongs su dag cing tshul khrims ma zhig pa dang tshul khrims la skyon med pa drang tshul khrims 'dren ma ma yin pa dang tshul khrims sra srer ma gyur pa dang tshul khrims mi nyams
90b7(mdo sde): pa dang tshul khrims mi gnas pa dang tshul khrims ma 'bags po dang tshul khrims mi dmigs pa dang 'phags pas bstod pa'i tshu la khrims dang mkhas pas bstod pa'i tshul
91a1(mdo sde): khrims pa yin te/gzhon nu chos gnyis po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang /
91a2(mdo sde): gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khams gsum la sems skrag pa dang sems dngangs pa dang skyob dang don du mi gnyer cing mngon par mi dga' ba dang mchags
91a3(mdo sde): bzhin pa dang khams gsum la yid skyongs khams gsum las gzhan du sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams thar bar bya'o zhes brtson zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
91a4(mdo sde): byang chub tu yang dag par sgrub pa yin to/gzhon nu chos gsum po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ngo ro//
91a5(mdo sde): gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dad cing chos yongs su 'chol bas mi ngoms pa yin/mang du thos shing 'jigs pa med pa yi mtsha
91a6(mdo sde): 'dod cing chos lhur byed pa yin te/rnyed pa dang bkur sti lhur byed pa ma yin/shes kyi khe lhur byed pa ma yin/ban pa'i dngos po sngon du 'gro ba'i sems kyi mchos
91a7(mdo sde): jiskad du thos pa dang /ji ltar khong du chud pa gzhan la rgyu cher 'ochad cing rab tu ston pa yin te/shes kyi khe 'dod pas na ma yin gyi ci nas sems can 'di rnams chos
91b1(mdo sde): 'di dag thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur snyam pa ste/gzhon nu chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems
91b2(mdo sde): dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro//gzhon nu chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam
91b3(mdo sde): pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur te/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gzhon nu rnam grangs
91b4(mdo sde): 'dis ting nge 'dzin 'di 'di ltar sangs rgyas mang pos bshad pa sangs rgyas mang pos bsngags pa sangs rgyas mang pos yang dag par rab tu bstan pa/sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu
91b5(mdo sde): bstod pa yin te/gzhon nu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mang po'i drung du nga rab tu byung nas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di rgya
91b6(mdo sde): cher mnyan te bzung ngo //dris shing bcangs so//bklags so bton to//nyon mongs pa med pa'i bsgom pas bsgoms shing mang du byas so//gzhan la rgya cher yang dag
91b7(mdo sde): par rab tu bstan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas mang po nges par brjod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas
92a1(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad po'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa/dran pa bskul pa gzhal med dpag yas na//rgyal ba dbyangs kyi yan lag smra
92a2(mdo sde): ste//bde gshegs dbyangs kyi yan lag sgo de yi//che tshad lo yang brgya phrag drug cur gyur//de yi pha rol sangs rgyas gzhan byung ba//mi mchog mtshan ni ye shes dang de
92a3(mdo sde): phyug ste//rkang gnyis gtso bo ye shes dbang phyug gi/che tshad lo grangs stong phrag bcu gnyis so//ye shes dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni//gzi brjid dbang phyug
92a4(mdo sde): ces bya rgyal ba byung //rkang gnyis gtso bo gzi brjid dbang po yi//tshe tshad lo ni stong phrag drug cu bdun//gzi brjid dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni//blo gros dbang
92a5(mdo sde): phyug ces bya rgyal babyung //rkang gnyis gtso bo blo gros dbang phyug gi/tshe yi tshad ni lo grangs bya bar tshang //blo gros dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni//tshangs pa'i dbang
92a6(mdo sde): phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung //rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i dbang phyug gi/cha yi tshad ni lo khro bzhi stong gyur//tshangs pa'i dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni//me yi
92a7(mdo sde): dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung //rkang gnyis gtso bo me yi dbang phyug gi/tshe tshad lo grangs bdun khri drug stong gru //me yi dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni//tshangs
92b1(mdo sde): pa'i zhal zhes bya ba rgyal ba byung //rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i zhal de yi//rke yi chad ni nyin zhag bdun du gyur//tshangs pa'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni//tshogs
92b2(mdo sde): dbang phyug ces bya rgyal bzung //rkang gnyis gtso bo tshogs kI dbang phyug gi/tshwa yi tshad ni lo grangs bye bar tshangatshogs kyi dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni//dbyangs kyi
92b3(mdo sde): dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung //rkang gnyis gtso bo dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gi/tshe tshad lo grangs bye ba phrag dgur tshang //dbyangs kyi dbang phyug pha rol sangs rgyas ni//dbyangam
92b4(mdo sde): kyi zhal zhes bya bo rgyal ba byung //rlung gnyis gtso bo dbyings kyi zhal gyi yang //tshe tshad lo grangs bye ba phrag bcur tshang //dbyings kyi zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni//zla ba'i zhal
92b5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i rgyal ba byung //rkang gnyis gtso bo zla ba'i zhal gyi ni//tshe yi tshad kyang nyin zhag gcig tu gyur//zla ba'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni//nyi ma'i zhal zhes bya ba
92b6(mdo sde): rgyal ba zung //rkang gnyis gtso bo nyi ma'i zhal gyu yang //chu tshad lo ni stong phrag bco brgyad do//nyi ma'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni//tshangs pa'i zhal zhes bya ba'i rgyal
92b7(mdo sde): bo byung //rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i zhal gyi yang /tshe tshad lo ni stong phrag nyi shu'o//tshangs pa'i zhal gyi pha rol sangs rgyas ni/tshangs pa'i snyan pa zhes bya rgyal ba
93a1(mdo sde): byung //rkang gnyis gtso bo tshangs pa'i snyan pa yi//tshe chud lo grangs stong phrag bco brgyad gyur//bskal ba gcig la sangs rgyas 'di dag dang //'jig rten rnam
93a2(mdo sde): par 'dren pa nyis brgya byung //zil gyis mi non de bzhin gshegs pa yi//mtshan rnams 'dir yang brjod kyis mnyan par gyis//mtha' yas dbyangs dang rnam par grags pa'i/
93a3(mdo sde): dbyangs//rnam par bsgrags pa'i gzi brjid rnam grags smra//sgra skad rnam grags sgra dbyangs mchod pa dang //dbyangs kyi yan lag dpa' dang dbyings dag dang //ye shes
93a4(mdo sde): stobs dang ye shes bye brag 'gro/zil gyis ma non ye shes yang dag 'phags//ye shes 'od 'phro ye shes mngon par 'phags//ye shes rnam grangs de bzhin ye shes
93a5(mdo sde): dpa'//tshangs pa'i stobs dang tshangs nor tshangs pa'i mchog/tshangs pa'i lhar bcas de bzhin tshangs pa'i dbyangs//tshangs pa'i dbang phyug tshangs pa'i mi dbang spyan//
93a6(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yan lag tshangs pas byin//gzi brjid stobs dang gzi ldan gzi brjid mchog/gzi brjid dbang phyug gzi brjid mngon par 'phags/gzo brjid
93a7(mdo sde): khyab dang gzi brjid shin tu nges//gzi brjod sgra dbyangs shin tu rnam grags gzi//'jigs btsan stabs dang 'jig smra nga can blo gros dang //shin tu 'jigs patsan
93b1(mdo sde): 'jigs zhu ba 'jigs bcan 'phags//'jigs bcan 'od 'phro 'jigs mchog 'jigs pa'i dbyangs//'jig rten rnam 'dren rgyal ba 'di dag byung //sgra dbyangs zab mo dang ni
93b2(mdo sde): dpal 'dzin dang //rnam dag sgra yi dbang phyug tshangs pa'i dbyangs//mtha' yas dbyangs dang shin tu rnam grol dbyangs//bdud kyi stobs dang bdud rnams skrag byed dang //spyan
93b3(mdo sde): dbyangs dang ni zhal gtsang spyan dag dang //rnam par dag pa'i spyan dang mtha' yas spyan//kun+da nas spyan dang rnam par grags pa'i spyar//sman gyis zil gyis gnon dang ma smad sbyin/
93b4(mdo sde): dul mchog dul dang shin tu dul ba'i sems//dul rab zhi bo'i dbang po zhi ba'i yid//zhi ba'i bla ma zhi pal rab tu zhi//zhi bo'i pha rol phyin dang zhi bar dpa'//bla mar gnas
93b5(mdo sde): ba zhi ba dul bar sems//shin tu dul dang zhi dbang zhi ba'i yid//zhi ba'i bla ma zhi ba'i dpal 'bar ba//zhi ba rab zhi dbang phyug zhi bar dpa'//tshogs dbang tshogs gtse
93b6(mdo sde): tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang //tshogs rnams zil gnon tshogs bzung ye shes gtsang //tshogs kyi dbang tshan tshegs dbang dpa' ba dang //gzhan yang tshogs bzang rab tu rnam
93b7(mdo sde): par 'byed//chos kyi rgyal mtshan de bzhin chos kyi tog/chos kyi bla ma chos kyi rang bzhin 'phags//chos kyi stobs ldan chos bzang dpa' bo dang //rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges
94a1(mdo sde): pa byung //rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges par ni//mtshan gcig pa yang bye phrag brgyad cu ste//bskal pa gnyis la 'dren pa 'di dag byung //byang chub phyi ni 'di
94a2(mdo sde): dwag dus mchod de//rang bzhin chos kyi bla ma nges pa yi//rgyal ba'i mtshan rnams gang dag nyan byed cing //thos nas rnam par grags pa'i mtshan 'dzin na//de dag myur du
94a3(mdo sde): ting 'dzin 'di thob 'gyur///'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo//bam po drug pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas mang ba'i ting
94a4(mdo sde): nge 'dzin gyi sgo sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la rgya cher rgyas par rab tu bstan to//sangs rgyas 'di dag gi yang pha rol ni//bskal pa bas ma yas dpag tu
94a5(mdo sde): med pa'i tshe//lha mis mchod pa sangs rgyas gzhan zhig byung //de yi mtshan ni mo dbang dbyangs zhes bya//de bzhin gshegs pa mi dbang dbyangs kyi ni//tshe tshad lo
94a6(mdo sde): grangs bdun khri drug stong ste//nyan thos dag ni bye ba brgya phyag gsum//de yi 'dus pa dang dor gyur pa yin//mngon shes drug ldan gsum rig dbang po thul//mthu yang tshe
94a7(mdo sde): zhing rdzu 'phrul chen po ste//zag pa zad pa tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa//'od mdzad kyi ni dge 'dun de tshe byung //bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad cu yi//byang chub sems dpa' rnams
94b1(mdo sde): kyi tshogs byung ste//blo gros zab cing grags pa shin tu che//mthu yang che zhing rdzu 'phrul che bar gyur//mngon par shes pa thob cing spobs par ldan//stong pa thams cad rtogs
94b2(mdo sde): par khong du chud//zhing ni bye bar de las lhag par yang //gang+gA'i bye ma snyed du 'phrul gyis 'gro/rkang gnyis gtso la dri ba dris nas ni//phyir yang rgyal ba de yi drung du 'ong //mdo sde
94b3(mdo sde): sgrub pa nges pa'i tshig la mkhas//snang bar gyur pa sa yi steng ni rgyu//sems can don phyir spyad pa rnam spyod de//bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po mthu chen ni//'dod pa'i rkyeni
94b4(mdo sde): gyis sdig pa mi byed de//de dag la ni lha yang smon pa skyed//srid pa'i 'gro bar mi gnas don mi gnyer//mnyam gzhag bsam gtan gnas pa'i spyod yul can//rnam par nges
94b5(mdo sde): pa'i don ldan 'jigs med pa//dri ma med par rtag tu tshangs par spyod//tshig kyang rgyun mi chad cing spobs par ldan//nges tshig bstan pa'i tshig gi don la mkhas//sangs
94b6(mdo sde): rgyas sras po kun tu yang dag ston//dge ba'i las rnams kyis kyang yongs su bzung //bskal pa mtha' yas par ni spyod pas 'phags//'dren pa dag gis rtag tu stong
94b7(mdo sde): cing bstags//rnam par thar dang don tshig yang dag ston//tshul khrims shin tu dag cing nyon mongs med//chu yis pad+ma bzhin du mi chags te//khams gsum las ni rnam
95a1(mdo sde): grol ba ga yod pa//'dzeg rten chos bcad dag gis migs shing //lus kyang nam drug las cad yongs su ga/'dud pa nyung shing chog hU~Ms mahA yang na/
95a2(mdo sde): chags pa med cing sangs rgyas yon tan gnas//sems can kun gyi rten dang dpung gnyen te//tshig tsam ma yin nan tan snying par byed//gang la gnas pa dri nyid gzhan la
95a3(mdo sde): ston//sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yongs su bzung //rgyal ba rnams kyi mdzod 'dzin thugs brtan pa//khams gsum thams cad la yang skrag pa'i yid//rab
95a4(mdo sde): tu sems ni rtag tu dgon par spyad//'jig rten 'dren pa rnams kyis byin brlabs pas//mdo sde bye ba phrag stong 'chad par byed//'chad pa de yang sangs rgyas rnams kyis
95a5(mdo sde): bsngags//'jig rten dag gi tshig kun rnam spangs te//stong pa nyid la mos shing don dam ston//bsdigs pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho bzhin//mang du thos shing
95a6(mdo sde): mkhas pa shes rab ldan//gzhon nu bskal pa bye ba mang por ni//rgyun chad med par bsngags pa rab brjid kyang //de ni cung zad tsam zhig brjod par 'gyur//rgya mtsho
95a7(mdo sde): las ni chu thigs gcig po bzhin//de cha mi yi dbang po'i dbyangs de ni//ting 'dzin zhi ba mthong dka' 'di ston te//stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten khams 'di yang //lha
95b1(mdo sde): de klu rnams kyis ni gang bar gyur//de yis tIng 'dzin nipa 'di bshad tshe//sa yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos//lha dang mi rnams gang+gA'i bye ma spyod//sangs rgyas ye shes la ni mi
95b2(mdo sde): ldog gnas//der yang mi dbang rje lnga po byung ba ni//dpal gyi stobs zhes bya ba mthu che ba//de la bu yang brgya phrag lnga yod de//byad bzhin bzung zhing mdzes la bltan sdug/
95b3(mdo sde): rgyal pa de yi btsun mo'i 'khor kyang ni//bud med bye ba brgya phrag brgyad cu yod//sa bdag rgyal po de yi bu mo yang //bye ba stong phrag bcu bzhir tshang ba byung //de yang ston
95b4(mdo sde): zla tha chung nya bu la//yan lag brgyad ldan gso sbyong bzung nas no//bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu lhan cig tu//'jig rten gtso bo'i drung du nye bar 'ongs//rkang gnyis gtso bo'i zhabs
95b5(mdo sde): le phyag btsal te//rgyal ba de yI spyan sngar rgyal po 'dug/rgyal po de yi lhag pa'i bsam mkhyen nas//ting 'dzin 'di ni rkang gnyis dbang pos bshad//ting 'dzin 'di ni
95b6(mdo sde): rgyal po des thos nas//rgyal srid mchil mo bzhin du kun spangs te//gnyen dang rtsa lag ldog pa yongs btang nas//rgyal ba de yi drung du rab tu byung //bu yang brgya phrag lnga
95b7(mdo sde): dag rab byung ste//de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor dang sras ma dang //gnyen bshes rtsa lag mang po gzhan dag kyang //bye ba khrag khrig bdun cu rtsa drug byung //bu dang chung mar bcas
96a1(mdo sde): pa rab byung nas//khwa zas sgrub pa'i sa yang bor nas ni//rgyun ma chad par lo brgyad bar du bcags//'chag cing 'greng bzhin 'chi ba'i dus kyang byas//
96a2(mdo sde): rgyal do'i glang po ting 'dzin sems dpa' de//rtag par rab tu mnyam gzhag dus byas pas//de'ang rgyal po'i pho brang der skyes te//mngal gri dri mas ma gos brjos te
96a3(mdo sde): byung //de yi pha ni brtan pa'i stobs zhes bya//blo gros tsha zhes bya ba mar gyur te//gzhon nu btsas ma thag tu tshig smra ba//'jig rten mgon po de nyid bzhugs sam gri/'jig
96a4(mdo sde): rten mgon pos bdag gi sems mkhyen nas//de phyir bdag la zhi ba'i ting 'dzin bshad//rkyen rnams med cing rkyen dang bral ba yang //srid pa'i 'gro ba rnams ni gcig
96a5(mdo sde): tu bstan//chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin phyag rgya gang //mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig byung ba dag/byang chub sems dpe'i nor ni bla med pa//ting 'dzin 'di ni rgyal
96a6(mdo sde): bAs bshad mdzad dam//lus kyang gtsang zhing de bzhin drag gtsang po//sems gtsang de bzhin lto ba gtsang ma dang //dmigs pa rnams las yang dag 'da' ba
96a7(mdo sde): yi//ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam//chung mi za ba'i 'bras bu chos bstan pa/lam mchog yan lag brgyad ldan sgom pa ste//de bzhin gshegs dang
96b1(mdo sde): phrad cing shes rab rno//bden la 'jug dang rtag tu chos shes pa//phung po yongs shes khams rnams mnyam pa nyid//skye mched rnam pa kun tu bsal ba ste//skye ba med pa mngon
96b2(mdo sde): sum 'jug pa dag/ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam//so so yang dag rig pa bzhi la 'jug/yi ge thams cad dbye ba'i ye shes dang //dngos por 'jug pa las ni
96b3(mdo sde): 'da' ba yi//ting 'dzin de ni rgyal pos bshad mdzad dam//dbyangs rnams yongs su shis shing dga' ba thob//bde gshogs bsngags pa la'ang dgar gyur cing //'phags
96b4(mdo sde): pa dag gi tshul 'jam drang po yi//ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam//des pa nam yang khro gnyer mi byed cing //mnyen zhing 'jam pa bzhin yang 'dzum pa ste//sems can
96b5(mdo sde): mthong nas sngon du smra ba yi//ting 'dzin don rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/le lo med cing bla ma'i ri mo byed//srid zhu che bas phyag 'tshal sdug par lta//skye bo dag gis chog shes
96b6(mdo sde): dkar ba yi//ting 'dzin de ni rtul bas bshad mdzad dam//'tsho ba dag cing de bzhin dgon gnas dang //sbyangs pa dag la gonas shing dran mi nyams//phung po dang ni khams
96b7(mdo sde): la mkhas pa yi//ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam//skye mched mkhas shing mngon pas ye shes dang //nyon mongs bsal ba dul ba'i sa rnams dang //gsang
97a1(mdo sde): sngags mang po thams cad 'chud pa yi//ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam//srid pa'i 'gro ba kun las 'da' ba dang //skye ba dran zhing chos
97a2(mdo sde): la nem nur med//chos la sems shing thos pa 'tshol ba yi//ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam//khyad par 'gro zhing rtag tu sgom la 'jug/lhung po dag lnga mkhas
97a3(mdo sde): shing 'byung bar gnas//de la gnas pas bag la nyal ba sel//ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam//gang las ye shes rno ba'i mchog 'byung ba//mi g.yo
97a4(mdo sde): ri bo bzhin du mi sgul ba//phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan dang gzungs kyi sgo//ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam//rtag tu dkar po'i chos rnams yongs 'chol zhing //
97a5(mdo sde): sdig pa'i chos rnams khor mor rnam par spong //rtag tu nyon mongs phyogs rnams rgyu ba med//ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam//bslab pa kun la rtogs par khong
97a6(mdo sde): du chud//mkhas pa ting 'dzin gnas pa rtogs par rig/sems can dgu gi bsam pa shes pas skul//sangs rgyas byang chub mchog tu chos kyang ston//khyad
97a7(mdo sde): par shes pa skye ba shes pa dang //mtha' yas shes pa shin tu rdzogs par shes//'gro ba kun du mtshams sbyor shes pa yi//ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzod
97b1(mdo sde): dam//khyim gyi gnas spangs rab tu 'byung ba'i sems//khams gsum la yang mi dga' mi 'dzin cing //sems rnams rab tu 'dzin cing dga' byed pa//chos rnams rkang
97b2(mdo sde): gnyis gro tso bo ston mdzad pa//skyob pa chos rnams la yang ma chags shing //rtag tu chos kyi mchog kyang yongs su 'dzin//las kyi rnam par smin la brtan mos pa//chos rnams
97b3(mdo sde): rkang gnyis gtso bo ston pa mdzad//'dul ba la yang mkhas shing rnam smin shes//de bzhin 'thab cing rtsod pa nye bar zhi//'thab pa med cing rtsod pa med pa'i sa//chos rnams rkang
97b4(mdo sde): gnyis gtso bo ston pa mdzad//bzod pa yang dag 'dzin cing khro med gnas//chos la rnam par nges shing rtag tu mkhas//tshig rnams rab tu 'byed la ye shes mthong //thugs
97b5(mdo sde): rje bskyed nas chos rnams ston pa mdzad//sngon gyi mtha' shes phyi ma'i mtha' shes te//bde gshegs bstan la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid//'khor gsum dag ni yongs
97b6(mdo sde): su chod par gsungs//rgyal ba chos kyi bdag po de skad ston//sems kyang rab tu gnas shing rtse gcig dang //lus kyang rnam par gnas dang 'phags pa'i sa//spyod lam
97b7(mdo sde): dag kyang rtag tu bsrung ba yi//chos ni skyes bu khyu mchog thub pa ston//khrel yod ngo tsha shes shing mdzes pa dang //'jig rten shes pa rigs pa'i tshigs rnams gsung //
98a1(mdo sde): chos rnams 'byung ba srog rdugs rang bzhin dang //byang chub dam pa mchog gro chos kyang rgod//rjes su phran gdags pa dang khrel yod dang //mi dge ba la
