98a2(mdo sde): sems la smod pa dang //sbyangs pa rjes su mi gtong bsod snyoms spyod//chos rnams rkang gnyis gtso bo ston pa mdzad//khrel yod do tsha shes pa rtag tu spyod//bla ma la yang gus
98a3(mdo sde): smra ldang ba dang //thog ma nyid nas nga rgyal tshar bcad par//chos rnams rgyal po chos rje de ltar ston//sems ni ldang ba nas kyang sems dge ste//ye shes khong du chud cing
98a4(mdo sde): rtags par byed//mi shes phyogs rnams rtag tu rnam par spong //byang chub mchog gi chos rnams ston pa mdzad//sems la 'jug pa dang ni sgo shes pa//nges pa'i tshig la
98a5(mdo sde): 'jug cing don rtogs dang //gnod pa thams cad rtag tu rnam spang bar//rgyal ba chos kyi bdag pa de ltar ston//skyes bu dam pa rtag tu yang dag bsten//skyes bu ngan pa
98a6(mdo sde): dag ni rnam par spang //rgyal ba la yang rtag tu dad cing dga'//chos mchog rgyal ba de ltar ston pa mdzad//btags pa dang ni brda dang tha snyad dang //'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
98a7(mdo sde): rnams ni rtag par spang //rnyed dang ma rnyed pa la zhum pa med//chos kyi dam po rgyal bas de ltar bstan//bkur sti rnyed kyang mtshar du mi bzung zhing //dkur sti ma
98b1(mdo sde): byas na yang btang snyoms bzhag/yang dag bsngags pas nam yang rlom sems med//'jig rten phan pa'i bstan pa 'di 'dra'o//grwa she zhing smod pa thams cad bzed par bya//khyim
98b2(mdo sde): de kun dang lhan cig mi bstan cing //rab tu byung ba dang yang 'grogs mi bya//rgyal ba chos kyi bdag po de skad ston//spyod yul ma yin thams cid rnam spangs nas//sangs rgyas
98b3(mdo sde): spyod yul la ni rab tu gnas//spyod pa phun sum tshogs shing dul ba'i sems//chos kyi tshul 'di bde bar gshegs pos bshad//byis pa'i chos rnams rtag tu rnam par spang ///
98b4(mdo sde): rigs sun pa yang thams cad spang por bya//sangs rgyas bstan pa rtag par yongs su bsrung //chos kyi bdag po rgyal ba de skad ston//smra ba nyung zhing rab tu 'brel la snyan/
98b5(mdo sde): gzhan dag la yang tshig 'jam dge bar smra//phas kyi rgol ba chos dang ldan pas 'dul//rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o//dus su 'gro ste dus la ma bab me//so so'i
98b6(mdo sde): skye bo kun la yid mi brtan//sdug bsngal reg kyang yi mug med par bya//rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o//dngul po mthong na nor dang ldan par bya//tshul khrims
98b7(mdo sde): 'chal pa mthong na brtse ba bskyed//phan pa'i dngos la rtag tu gdams par bya//rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o//chos kyis sems can rnams la phan gdags shing //
99a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten zang zing rtag tu btang bar bya//bsags par mi bya spang bar mi bya ste//rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o//tshul khrims bsngags shing tshul
99a2(mdo sde): khrims 'chal pa smad//g.yo sgyu med cing tshul khrims ldan la brten//nor lo mo gnas bdag pa thams cad gtong //rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o//lhag pa'i
99a3(mdo sde): bsam pas bla ma gnyer ba dang //ji skad smras pa de bzhin thams cad bya//chos smra ba yang mi chad bsten par bya//rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o//ri mor bcas
99a4(mdo sde): shing rtag tu yid dgar bya//zhi ba'i lta bas khor mor gnas par bya//sngon spyod rnams la rtag par shin tu ngeso//rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o//dge ba'i spyod
99a5(mdo sde): par rtag tu sngon du 'gro//'du shes bzlog dang dngos po'i mtshan nyid dang //mtshon ma spang ba la yang thabs mkhas pa//rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o//mdo sde sgrub
99a6(mdo sde): nga'i tshig la mkhas pa dang //bden pa bstan pa'i tshig la gdon mi za//rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mngon du byed//rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o//mgo gcig
99a7(mdo sde): tu ni tshig rnams brjod par bya//ji lta bzhin du mthong zhes rtogs par mkhas//rtag tu tshig la the tshom med par bya//rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o//stong pa nyid kyi
99b1(mdo sde): chos kyang rtag tu bsten//'jigs pa med cing tshul khrims stobs la gnas//ting 'dzin gnas kyis mnyam par 'jug par bya//rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o//shes kyi
99b2(mdo sde): khe 'dod phyir ni yong mi bstan//sems kyang gya gyu can du mi bya ste//lta bar byas pa thams cad rnam par spang //rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o//spobs pa mchog dang
99b3(mdo sde): gzugs kyang dam pa ste//ye shes snang ba pha rol mtha' ma med//gsang sngags byin rlabs rigs par spobs pa ni//rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o//lam 'di
99b4(mdo sde): sgom pa dag ni tshul gyi sgo//bstan pa 'di la spyad nas nan tAn dang //tshul dang gdakris pa rjes su bstan pa bzang //rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o//rjes su mthun pa'i
99b5(mdo sde): bzod pa sangs rgyas bsngags//bzod la gnas pas nyes pa rnam par spang //ye shes la yang gnas nas mi shes spang //rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o//ye shes
99b6(mdo sde): rten yin de bzhin rnal 'byor sa//byang chub zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug ste//skyes bu dam pa rtag par bsten pa ni//rkyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o//mi rigs
99b7(mdo sde): brtson pa khor mor rnam par spang //sangs rgyas sa ni de bzhin gaushegs pas bshad//mkhas pa kun gyis rjes su yi rang ba//rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o//
100a1(mdo sde): byis pa mi shes pas ni spangs pa ste//'di ni nyan thos mang po'i sa ma yin//byang chub sems dpa' dag gis rtag tu bzung //rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra
100a2(mdo sde): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su 'brang //lha rnams kyis kyang mchod cing ri mor byas//tshangs pa bye ba phrag stong yi rang ba//ting 'dzin de ni rgyal ba ston mdzad dam/nam
100a3(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang gnod sbyin mi 'am ci//kA yang stong gis rtag tu phyag byas pa//byang chub dam pa rgyal bas gsungs pa yi//ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/
100a4(mdo sde): shin tu mkhas pas rtag tu yongs thog ste//nor mchog dam pa yang ni legs par rnyed//zang zong med pa'i ye shes gso ba mchog/ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad
100a5(mdo sde): mdzad dam//ye shes mdzod yin spobs pa mi zad pa//'di ni mdo sde bye bar 'jug pa ste//khams gsum yongs shes yang dag shes pa yi//ting 'dzin de ni rgyal
100a6(mdo sde): ngas bshad mdzad dam//gang la tang 'dzin zhi ba 'dri ba shad pa//'di ni pha rol 'gro ba'i gzings su bstan//'di ni chu bo brgal ba'i gru yin te//'di ni snyan grags
100a7(mdo sde): bsngags phreng 'phel bar byed//gang gis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad pa//de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bstod pa yin//skyes bu khyu mchog la yang bsngags pa ste///
100b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mi zad yon ten tshal//brang dag la ni ting 'dzin 'di bshad pa//'di ni zhe sdang zhi bar byams pa bstan//'di ni snying rje can gyi btang snyoms sa//'di ni
100b2(mdo sde): glogaste pa chen du'i dbums 'byin pa//seng phred sgra gas rnams kyinan tan te//'di las sangs rgyas ye sa mchog kyang 'byung //tshes rnams kun gyi ring bzhid phyug r+b+ha ste/
100b3(mdo sde): ting 'dzin 'di ni 'dren pa dag gis bshad//ting 'dzin ni nga rgyal bas bshad pa 'di//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed//'di ni byang chub rabazhugs spyod pa ste/
100b4(mdo sde): rgol ba chos kyis tshar gcod pa//ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la brten byas na//'di ni spobs pa'i sar yang rab tu bstan//stobs dang rnam thar de bzhin dbang po dang //sangs rgyas
100b5(mdo sde): chos rnams bco brgyad bye drag 'phags//stobs bcu rnams kyang yongs su 'tshal ba ste//sangs rgyas ye shes kyi yang suM ltas so//skyes mchog 'jig rten phan+da ni zugs
100b6(mdo sde): brtse bas//sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu bstan pa'ang yin//sangs rgyas dag gi sras kyis 'od bzung ste//'di ni rnam thar 'dod pa'i lam du bstan//ting 'dzin ni
101a1(mdo sde): ba mthong dka' 'di thos nas//de la bde gshegs sras po dga' bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa dang //byang chub sems dpa'
101a2(mdo sde): mkhas pa 'chol ba 'di//rnam dag sems gtsang nyon mongs med pa yis//ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la brten par gyis//rgyal ma bzhin du de yi lus dag ste//rnam par
101a3(mdo sde): thar dang ye shes rnam grol mthong //'dod chags 'ching bas rtag tu nyon mi mongs//ting 'dzin bzang po 'di la brten par gyis//zhe sdang sa min gti mug bral ba ste//bde
101a4(mdo sde): ba 'dod pa'i ye shes 'byung ba yin//rig pa skye zhing ma rig 'jig pa ste//ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la brten par gyis//rnam grol snying por byed pa ngoms par bshad//bsam
101a5(mdo sde): gtan pa la ting 'dzin zhi 'di bstan//sangs rgyas ma smad pa yi spyan yin te//ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la brten par gyis//'di ni zhing mang ston pa'i mngon par shes//sangs
101a6(mdo sde): rgyas mtha' yas ston pa'i rdzu 'phrul te//ting 'dzin 'di nyid sgom par byed pa la//gzungs de rnams kyang rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur//byang chub phyir ni dbang po zhi ba'i gnas//
101a7(mdo sde): 'di ni byin rlabs mtha' yas ston pa ste//ting 'dzin 'di ni bsnyen par byed pa yi//ye shes phra zhing yangs pa rnam par dag/gang gis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di mthos//mi
101b1(mdo sde): rigs brtson pas 'di ni rtogs mi 'gyur//yi ge thams cad rnam par bzlog pa ste//dbyangs kyis rnam par go bar nus ma yin//byang chub sems dpa' N+Di/pas 'di
101b2(mdo sde): te//chos kyi bdag pos ji ltar gang bshad pa//ting 'dzin 'di la brten par byed pa yi//zhi ba dag dang sbed pa med pas rtogs//brtson 'grus brtsams pas 'dri bzung ste//
101b3(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byas shing rtag tu legs par bcangs//ting 'dzin 'di la bsnyen par byed pa ni//sdug bsngal zad cing skye ba 'gog pa shes//chos rnams kun gyi skye ba med par sbyin/
101b4(mdo sde): de ltar srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad na//sangs rgyas//gas chen dag gis ye shes mchog/ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bso bshad mdzad dam//gzhon nu de yis tshogs bcad 'di
101b5(mdo sde): thos nas//khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad rnams//dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro bzod pa der thob ste//sangs rgyas ye shes las ni mi ldog gnas//brtan pa'i stobs kyis
101b6(mdo sde): gzhon nu de la smras//da dung 'jig rten mgon po de bzhugs so//khye'u khyod la don 'di dri bar bya//ting 'dzin 'di ni khyod kyis su las thos//gzhan nus smras pa rgyal po gsan
101b7(mdo sde): dugs mi//bdag gis bskal pa gcig la sangs rgyas ni//bye bo khrag khrig mthong ster mor bgyis//ting 'dzin zhi bo 'di yang bdag gis dus//gzhan yang bskal pa
102a1(mdo sde): /dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang //bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong du//de dang der bdag skye ba dran par gyur//nam yang mngal du skyes par ma gyur //de nas bdag gis
102a2(mdo sde): ting 'dzin 'di bsgoms te//rgyal ba de dag 'chad pa drag par thos//zos nas bshad pa la yang mos bskyed de//nam nur med pas byang chub rig por bgyi//dge slong su dag bdag
102a3(mdo sde): lnga kun 'dri zhing //ting 'dzin 'di la yongs su chub bgyid pa//de la bdug ni gus par ri mor bgyid//'jig rten don mdzad dgo la bgyi ba bzhin//sru las bdag gis
102a4(mdo sde): tshigs bcad gcig tsam yang //lung mnas rjes mthun spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe//de dag la yang bdag ni ston pa sgom//sangs rgyas bzhin du gus pas rimi bgyid//
102a5(mdo sde): 'dzin yongs su chub par bgyid pa 'di//su dgal la bdag la 'dri ba yang //'jig rten 'dren pa rgyal bar mi 'gyur bar//rmi laman yang bdag la the tshom med//dge
102a6(mdo sde): slong rgan rangs par ma gzhon nu la//bdag ni dri mo gus dang ldan par bgyid//ri mor ldan pas badrag gi snyan pa dang //de bzhin bsod nams grags pa yon tan 'phel/
102a7(mdo sde): 'thob cing rtsod pa dag la brtsoni mi bgyid//de tshe bdag ni brten pa chung bar 'gyur//sdig pa bgyis pas 'gro ba gzhan du 'gyur//dge ba bgyis pas 'gro ba gzhan du 'gyur//
102b1(mdo sde): mi rigs brtson par sbyong zhing ma bsdams pa//de dag gi ni mi snyan tshig thos nas//de tshe bdag gir bgyi ba las su 'dzin//las rnams bgyis pa rnam par chud mi za//de la khro
102b2(mdo sde): ba'i dbang du mi 'gyur te//sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i bzod pa'i stobs 'dzin te//'dren pa dag gis rtag tu bzod pa bsngags//bzod pa bsgoms na byang chub rnyed mi dka'//
102b3(mdo sde): bdag kyang rtag tu tshul khrims ldan par 'gyur//tshul khrims la yang gzhan dag rab tu 'god//tshul khrims bsngags pa rtag tu bdag brjod de//don bdag gi tshig kyang
102b4(mdo sde): btsun par gyur//dgon pa'i bsngags pa dag kyang rtag tu brjod//tshul khrims la ni rtag par rab gnas te//rtag tu gso sbyong dag kyang 'dzin du stsal//de dag byang chub
102b5(mdo sde): la yang yang dag btsud//de dag tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag bstabs//chos dang don rnams la yang rab tu gnas//gong la mtha' dang chags pa 'di med pa//byang
102b6(mdo sde): chub lam la de dag sad par bgyis//bdag drin bskal pa 'das pa'i dus shig na//rgyal ba sgra yi yan lag dbyangs byung ste//de yi spyan sngar bdag gis dam bcos
102b7(mdo sde): pa//bdag ni rtag tu bzod pa'i stobs ldan bgyi//yi dam bcas pa de la gnas nas ni//lo grangs bye ba brgyad cu phrag bzhir yang //bdag la bdud kyis shin tu smad
103a1(mdo sde): cing smros//'on kyang bdag gi sems ni yong ma 'khrugs//der ni bdud kyis bgams shing sad na yang //bdag gi byams bzod brtan par 'tshal nas ni//
103a2(mdo sde): sems dang bdag gi rkang lo phyag 'tshal te//lnga brgya byang chub mchog lnga rab tu zhugs//bdag ni rtag tu ser sna med par gyur//gtong ba'i bsngags pa dag kyang khor mor 'chad//
103a3(mdo sde): phyug cing nor ldan bdag nyid chen por gyur//mu go'i tshe yang bdag nyid sbyin bdag gyur//dge slong su dgra ting 'dzin 'di 'dzin cing //su dge klog cing su dag lung nod pa/
103a4(mdo sde): de dag la ni bdag kyang bsnyen bkur bgyid//de dag thams cad mi yi mchog tu 'gyur//bdag ni bla na med pa'i las de yis//sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon po mang po
103a5(mdo sde): mthong //rgyal ba'i bstan pa la yang rab byung ste//rtag tu chos smra ba ni mkhas par gyur//sbyangs pa la yang rtag tu bdag brtson te//bas mtha' dgon pa la yang khor
103a6(mdo sde): mor gnas//kha zas phyir ni tshul 'chos mi bgyid de//ngan do ni tsam dag gis kyang chog shes gyur//bdag ni rtag tu phrag dog ma mchis te//bdag ni khyim la'ang
103a7(mdo sde): chags par mi 'gyur ro//khyim la chags pa dag ni phrag dog skye//phrag doka ma mchis nags dgon dga' bar bgyid//bdag ni rtag tu byams la gnas par
103b1(mdo sde): gyur//gsho zhing sdigs kyang khro ba mi skyed de//byams pa la yang gnas pa des pa yi//smad pa'i phrad pa phyogs bzhir rab tu mchod//rtag tu chog shes 'dod pa nyung bar
103b2(mdo sde): gyur//dgon par gnas shing sbyangs po'i yon tan brtson//bsod snyoms len pa dag kyang mi gtong ste//sbyangs pa la yang yi dam brtan par gyur//rtag tu dang bar
103b3(mdo sde): bcas shing dad par gyur//khor mor sangs rgyas bstan la dad pa mang //dad pa mang ba'i phan yon 'di lags te//byed bzhin bzang zhing dbang po ma nyams gyur//gang
103b4(mdo sde): ngag 'chad pa de la bdug gnas te//bdag ni rtag tu nan tan snying por bgyid//nan tan snying por bgyid la lha klu yang //rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ri mo 'gyid//yon
103b5(mdo sde): tan ji snyed brjod pa 'di dag dang //gzhan yang rnam pa du ma mang po yod//sangs rgyas byang chub rtogs par su 'dod pa//mkhas pa 'di dag rtag tu bslab par bgyi//
103b6(mdo sde): 'di bas ches mang dka' ba spyad pa ni//sngon gyi bskal pa du mar med spyad dran//de ltar de dge brjod par mi nus kyis//bde bar gshegs pa'i drung du du mchi'o//byang
103b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' shes rab rno mkhas des//de yi mod la mngon sheso lnga thob nas//de yang srog chags byi ba brgyad cu dang //rdzu 'phrul gyis ni rgyal po'i drung du song //
104a1(mdo sde): brtan pa'i stobs kyang mchog tu dga' rangs nas//de tshe bye ba brgya phrag drug cu dang //de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du nyer lhags te//zhabs la phyag
104a2(mdo sde): btsal nas ni spyan sngar 'dug/rgyal po de yi lhag pa'i bsam mkhyen nas//rkang gnyis dbang pos ting 'dzin 'di bshad de//rgyal po des kyang ting 'dzin 'di thos nas///
104a3(mdo sde): rgyal srid btang ste ma chags rab tu byung //rab tu byung nas ting 'dzin 'di la sgom//klog cing 'chad de rab tu ston par byed//bskal pa drug cu 'das pa'i 'og du de/
104a4(mdo sde): pad+ma bla ma zhes bya rgyal bar gyur//rgyal po lhan cog rgyal ba'i drung 'ong ba//bye ba brgya phrag drug cu mi nyung ba//de dag kyang ni ting 'dzin 'di thos nas//de tshe dga' zhing
104a5(mdo sde): mgu bas rab tu byung //dri dag rab tu byung nas ting 'dzin 'di//bzung zhing bklags te rab tu ston par byed//bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu 'dras nas ni//bskal pa
104a6(mdo sde): gcig la byang chub mchog reg ste//mtshan ni ye shes bla ma mtha' yas pa//lha mis mchod pa'i sangs rgyas rnams su gyur//de la rkang gnyis gtso bo re res kyang //
104a7(mdo sde): sems can gang+gA'i bye snyed grol bar byas//byang chub spyod pa mchog 'di spyod pa na/smyung ni rgyal po dpal gyi stobs su gyur//nga yi bu dag lnga brgya yod pa yang //rjes su
104b1(mdo sde): chos rnams skyong ba 'di dag yin//de tshe gang su nga yi mar gyur pa//de ni lha mo sgyu 'phrul nyid yin te//bye ba stong phrag bcu bzhir chang ba yi//nga yi bu mo de kun mya ngan 'das/
104b2(mdo sde): stobs brtan zhes bya rgyal po gang byung bya//rab tu mdzod mang 'khor los snang ba'i mchog/de ni rgyal po zos gcing de yin te//de dang der yang nga yi yab tu gyur//de ltar
104b3(mdo sde): ngas ni bskal pa bye stong du//le lo med cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa yis//byang chub mchog 'di yang dag sgrub pa na//ting 'dzin yongs su 'chol ba rnam par dag/gzhon
104b4(mdo sde): nu de phyir byang chub sdoms dpa' gang //ting 'dzin 'di la sgom par 'dod pa dag/brtson 'grus brtsams shing srog la mi lta bar//gzhon nu rtag par nga yi rjes su slobs//sangs
104b5(mdo sde): rgyas mang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bdun pa'o////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa
104b6(mdo sde): gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' snyoms dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dzin pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang lung nod pa dang /
104b7(mdo sde): ton byed pa dang gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de la yon tan gyi phan yon bzhir rig par bya ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bsod nams dril gyis mnon par 'gyur//sa
105a1(mdo sde): kyi rgol ba rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur/ye shes dpag tu med par 'gyur/spobs pa mtha' yas par 'gyur te/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
105a2(mdo sde): gang la la ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dzin pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang lung nod pa dang kha ton byed pa dang gzhan la'i de rgya cher rab tu ston pa de
105a3(mdo sde): la yon tan gyi phan yon 'di bzhi yod par rig par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ba//ting
105a4(mdo sde): 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na//rtag pa'i dus su bsod nams kyang //shin tu zil gyis mi non 'gyur//byang chub spyod pa bye brag 'phags//mchog tu dag pa spyod pa na//
105a5(mdo sde): dpa' bo rtag pa'i dus su yang //bsod nams dag gis bsrungs par 'gyur//de la phas kyi rgol ba dag/su yang 'tsho bar yongs mi byed//rtag pa'i dus su sangs rgyas
105a6(mdo sde): kyis//yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba yin//rtog pa'i dus su ye shes kyang //dpag tu med par 'gyur ba yin//zhi ba'i rten 'di 'dzin pa ni//spobs pa dag kyang
105a7(mdo sde): mtha' yas 'gyur//ting 'dzini zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na//rtag tu bsod nams phung po zil mi non//byang chub spyad pa dam pa spyod pa na//phas kyi rgol ba med cing
105b1(mdo sde): mi rmugs 'gyur//de yi ye shes yangs shing rno bar 'gyur//de bzhin spobs pa dag kyang mtha' yas 'gyur//mig kyang dag 'gyur rtag tu mkhas pa de//dran pa'i stobs
105b2(mdo sde): dang gzungs kyi stobs kyang byung //don gyi tshig rnams rab tu ston byed na//mkhas pa dag gi shin tu yid 'ong 'gyur//ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di ni rab bshad na//shes rab ldan
105b3(mdo sde): pa skye bo mang pos rig/ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung no//chos gos dam pa mchog dang mal cha dang //mgron du gnyer dang bza' zhing bca' ba'ang rnyed//shin tu
105b4(mdo sde): gzhon zhing blta na sdug par 'gyur//ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'dri 'tshol ba na//sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon po mang po mthong //'dren pa drag la mtshungs med mchod pa
105b5(mdo sde): byed//de la bar tshad dag kyang 'byung mi 'gyur//ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung no//sems dga' tshigs bcad snyan pa brgya dag gis//'jig rten mgon po'i
105b6(mdo sde): spyan sngar bstod 'gyur te//de ni nyams par nam yang yong mi 'gyur//ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na//de yi mdun du 'jig rten mgon po ni//mtshan dang
105b7(mdo sde): dpe byed mdzes pa'i sku bzhugs te//de yi ye shes nyams par yong mi 'gyur//ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na//ninem yang num pa'i sems su mi 'gyur te//
106a1(mdo sde): rtag tu phyug cing dngul po ma yin 'gyur//sems kyang 'dzin cing chags par yong mi 'gyur//ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na//mi khom par yang
106a2(mdo sde): gnas par mi 'gyur te//sa bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur//de yi rgyal srid rtag tu bde bar 'ong //bskal pa brgyar ni bshad kyang mi zad de//ye shes
106a3(mdo sde): yangs pa de la the tshom med//ting 'dzin zhi ba'i sa 'di thos nas ni//brtan pa ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin gnas//bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas dpag med du//stobs bcus
106a4(mdo sde): de yi phan yon brjod na yang //cha tsam du ni yongs su brjod mi 'gyur//rgya mtsho las ni chu thigs blangs pa bzhin//de tshe gzhon nu de yang rab dga' bas//langs
106a5(mdo sde): nas rab tu thal snar phyag bcul te//mgu rangs stobs bcu yi ni mngon sum 'dug/tshig rab mchog gis ched du rjod pa brjod//'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad
106a6(mdo sde): pa//mi gtsos 'di dag ji tsam du//phan yon legs par rabyA ba shad pa//dpa' bo chen po bsam mi khyab//phyi ma'i dus na su dag ni//mdo sde 'di la nyan
106a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur//phan par dgongs shing thugs brtse ba//dpe mo che pos drag la gsungs//ka la ping+ka'i sgra dbyangs kyis//ston pas de la bshad mdzad de//bcom
106b1(mdo sde): ldan chags med ye shes can//tshig kyang 'di skad rab tu gsung //su dag chos kyi rjes slob cing //mdo sde 'di ni nyan 'gyur ba//nan tan bla na med pa yang //gzhon nu bshad
106b2(mdo sde): kyis mnyan par gyis//sangs rgyas ye shes rab 'chol bas//mi dbang dag la mchod byed cing //byams pa'i sems la skyen byed pa//mdo sde 'di ni nyan par 'gyur//
106b3(mdo sde): sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs//yon tan mchog la bsnyen byas shing //nan tan la yang gnas nas su//mdo sde 'di ni nyan par 'gyur//'jig rten mgon po'i
106b4(mdo sde): rostan pa la//gang gis tshul khrims bshig pa dang //sdig pa byed pa'i lag nas ni//mdo sde 'di yang thos mi 'gyur//dpa' bo tshangs par spyod pa dang //gang gi sems
106b5(mdo sde): kyang mi brkam zhing //sangs rgyas dag gis byin brlabs pa//de dag la gnas thos par 'gyur//gang gis sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag/'jig rten mgon po ri mor byas//
106b6(mdo sde): dri dag lag nas mdo sde 'dri//phyi ma'i dus na zos par 'gyur//gang dag tshe rabs snga ma la//mu stegs can du gyur pa ni//de dag mdo sde 'di bos de//yid ni dgo'
106b7(mdo sde): zhing bder mi 'gyur//nga yi bstan pa 'di la ni//'tsho ba 'dod phyir rab byung nas//rnyed dang bkur stis zil gyis non//gcig la gcig kyang smod par byed//dge slong
107a1(mdo sde): /dbang po ma bsdams pa//gzhan gyi bud med rab snyegs shing //tshul khrims 'chal pa rnyed pa 'dod//mdo sde 'di la dad mi byed//sangs rgyas brnyes
107a2(mdo sde): pa'i bsod nams dang //bstim gtan thob par mi 'dod cing //bdag tu 'du shes gnas pa dag/mdo sde 'di la dad mi byed//phyi ma'i dus na 'byung ba ni//'jig
107a3(mdo sde): tan bsam gtan 'bras bur 'dzin//dgra bcom bsod snyoms zos nas kyang //sangs rgyas byang chub smod par byed//dzam+bu yi ni gling 'di ni//mchod rten ci yod
107a4(mdo sde): kun bshig pas//gang gis mdo sde 'di spangs na//sdig pa 'dri ni khyad par che//gang gis grad+ha'i bye snyed kyi//dgra bcom dag ni bsad pa bas//gang gis mdo
107a5(mdo sde): sde 'di spangs na//sdig pa 'di ni khyad par che//mi bzad pa yi phyi du so la//dam pa'i chos ni 'jig pa'i tshe//mdo sde 'di ni rab bshad par//khyed la su dag/
107a6(mdo sde): spro ba yod//de tshe gzhon nu langs nas ni//dra zhing rgyal la 'di skad gsol//sangs rgyas thugs kyi sras po yis//'di skad seng ge'i sgra yang bsgrags//rdzogs
107a7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das//mi bzad pa yi phyi dus la//lus dang srog kyang rab btang ste//bdag gis mdo sde rgyas par bgyi//byis pa rlams kyi mi bden pa//
107b1(mdo sde): cing ltos pa rjod pa //gsheb dang ba yang //'dren pa dang du blu byung ba gyi//byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la//ngan sems dang ni daspyad pa
107b2(mdo sde): 'am//gang sngon bdag gis sdug pa//las rnams dgyis pa byang bar dgyi//spyi bo la ni phyag bzhog s+ho//sangs rgyas gsar k+Sha ma ngag 'drung //de bzhin gshegs
107b3(mdo sde): pA 'jam pa'i debangs//zla 'od la ni stong pa gdung //gzhon nu phyi ma'i dus dag la//khyod kyis tshangs par spyod pa dang //srog gi ba rgad mi 'byung bar//khyod la
107b4(mdo sde): byin gyis brlang par bya//chos sma ni gzhan dag kyang //brgyad brgya po dag langs nas ni//phyi ma'i dus la bdag cag kyang //mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin pa lpag so//lha
107b5(mdo sde): dong klu dang gdod sbyin yang // bla brgyad cu nyid lhags te//gzhan yang khrag khrig drug cu rnams//'jig rten mgon la 'di skad sa//dge slong dag ni 'di rnams laM//
107b6(mdo sde): de ring suM drug langs pa rnams//phyi dus de tshe bdag cag gis//'dren pa rab tu bskyang bar bgyi//mdo sde 'di ni bshad pa'i tshe//ston pa yi ni byin rlabs kyis//ga
107b7(mdo sde): bye ma mnyam pa yi//sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos//zhing rnams ji snyed rab gi yos pa//kun tu sangs rgyas sprul pa dag /'jig rten mgon pos rab bkye ste//
108a1(mdo sde): de dag gis kyang chos rab bstan//zhing de so so re rer yang //sems can bye ba bsam mi khyab//de tshe de 'dra'i chos thos nas//sangs rgyas kyi ni ye shes bkod//
108a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yang zhing 'di nas//sems can bye ba dgu bcu rnams//byang chub kyi ni sems bskyed de//sangs rgyas la yang me tog 'thor//bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu na//
108a3(mdo sde): bskal pa gcig la thams cad kyang //rnam par 'dren pa nyid 'gyur zhes//de dag mi gtso so lung bstan to//dge slong dang ni dge slong ma//dge bsnyen po dang dge bsnyen
108a4(mdo sde): ma//srog chags bya ba bdun cu drug/gang dag mdo sde 'di thos pa//de dag mi gtses lung bstan te//byang chub spyod pa rab spyod cing //gang+gA'i bye ma mnyam pa yi//'jig
108a5(mdo sde): rten 'dren pa mthong bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas ye shes rab 'tshal bas//thams cad la yang mchod pa byed//mdo sde bla na med pa 'di//de dang deng yang thos par 'gyur//
108a6(mdo sde): byams pa yi ni sangs rgyas la//bla na med pa'i mchod byas te//dam pa'i chos mchog bzung nas ni//bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur//gang na sangs rgyas rdul bral
108a7(mdo sde): bo//tshe dpag med pa de bzhin gshegs//de la byang chub mchog gi phyir//mchod pa dag kyang byed par 'gyur//mdo sde dam pa 'di thos na//ma 'ongs pa yi bskal
108b1(mdo sde): pa ni//grangs med bdun cu rtsa gsum du//ngan 'gro rnams su yong mi 'gro/phyi ma'i dus la su dag ni//mdo sde dam pa nyan 'gyur zhing //'chang ngam klog par byed pa yang //de
108b2(mdo sde): dag kun gyis ngal mched//ji skad mdun na 'dug pa rnams//thams cad la yang bsgo bya ste//ngas ni dka' bas thos pa yi//byang chub 'di yang yongs su gtod//ting
108b3(mdo sde): 'dzin rjes su gtad pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/gzhan nu de lta bas na
108b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag
108b5(mdo sde): tu med pa thos nas mi skrag par 'dod pa dang mi dngang bar 'dod pa dang dngang bar mi 'gyur bar 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa la mkhas par bya'o//
108b6(mdo sde): spangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos par bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su dri ba la mkhas par bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos bas
108b7(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa yongs su btsal po la mkhas par bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos nas mi sgrog/mi dngang dang ngo bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o//de skad
109a1(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal pa dang /zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
109a2(mdo sde): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ji lta bur na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa la mkhas pa lags/sangs rgyas
109a3(mdo sde): kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'dri ba la mkhas pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos na mi skrag
109a4(mdo sde): mi dadang dngang bar mi 'gyur ba lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//gzhon nu byang
109a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang kun chub por
109a6(mdo sde): byed pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang nyon mongs pa med par bsgom pas sgom par byed pa dang mang du byed pa dang gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu
109a7(mdo sde): ston na gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam
109b1(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa la mos pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'dri ba la mkhas pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos na mi skrag mi dngang dngang par
109b2(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ro//yang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par smos pa'i ting nge 'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon bsgrub pa'i tshig 'odi bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon
109b3(mdo sde): nur gyur pA la nges par bstan pa na zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin lngas yon tan gyi phan yan
109b4(mdo sde): bsgrub pa'i tshig dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcom ldan 'das las thos nas de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par
109b5(mdo sde): spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di rab tu thob bo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa grangs med dpag tu med pa'ang mngon par shes pa chen po thob
109b6(mdo sde): bAr gyur to//sems can dpag tu med pa'ang snying rje chen por 'jug pa la mngon du phyogs pa'i sems skyes so//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
109b7(mdo sde): 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/rab tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos/'gul rab tu 'grol kun tu rab tu 'gul/ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg/'khrugs rab tu
110a1(mdo sde): 'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/chem tshim rab tu tshim tsham kun tu rab tu tshematshim/'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ung kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/shar phyogs dma'i//
110a2(mdo sde): na nub phyogs mtho//nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho//byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho//lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho//mtha' dma' na dbu so margo/ dngus
110a3(mdo sde): dma'o na mtha' mtho zhing /snang ba dpag tu med pa'ang 'jig rten du byung /lha'i spos kyi char chen po'ang mngon par bab bo//lho dang lha'i bu ji snyed chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus
110a4(mdo sde): telhags pa de dag nam mkha'i la mngon par 'phags nas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon gyi tshig dpag tu
110a5(mdo sde): med pa 'di dag thos nas lha dang lha'i bu de dag thams cad dga' mgu yi rangs te/rab tu dga' ba dang tshim pa dang yid bde ba skyes nas a la la zhes grwa zha sgrogs pa'i sgra byed do//
110a6(mdo sde): lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog gi char chen po 'bebs so//lha'i sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'ang rab tu rdung ngo //brjod pa gcig pa'i dbyangs kyis tshig
110a7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces 'dzer te//a la la bdag cag gis ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed de/'di ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das las yon tan gyi phan yon sgrub po'i tshig dpag/
110b1(mdo sde): tu med pa 'di dag thos nas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad kyang gcig car mthun par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas ji ltar
110b2(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par smos pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa de bzhin du/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad kyis kyang chos kyi rang bzhin mnyam
110b3(mdo sde): pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par bgyi'o//de nas de'i tshe bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril bcom ldan 'das 'khor rgya mtsho'i nang na chos ston pa la dri za'i bu gtsug pud
110b4(mdo sde): lnga can zhes bya ba ri ma gro dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir sil snyan lnga brgya dang bcas te nam mkha' las babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/de nas dri za'i bu gtsug
110b5(mdo sde): phud lnga can 'di snyam du sems te/bdag cag gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang na ji lta ba bzhin du rim gro dang bsnyen
110b6(mdo sde): bkur bye'o//glu dbyangs dgra ji ltar len pa de bzhin du dang lha'i lha de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la'ang mchod pa'i phyir glu dbyangs
110b7(mdo sde): rab tu sbyar ro//de nas dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can sel snyan thogs pa lnga brgya po de dag dang sgra gcig tu sbyar te/pi wang gi khog pa bai DUr+ya las byas pa dag kyang thogs nas bcom
111a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi spyan sbyar blangs s+ho//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba lta bu mngon par 'dus byas pas zla
111a2(mdo sde): 'od gzhon nur byur pa sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nges par rtogs pa la mkhas pa thob pa dang /chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros
111a3(mdo sde): pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo ba dang /dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can la'ang rgyud kyi sgra dang glu'i sbru la mkhas pa bstan par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba
111a4(mdo sde): ngas bya'o snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bye ba mngon par madz+nyAd ni/sangs rgyas kyi mthus so la snyan lnga brgya po shin tu
111a5(mdo sde): legs par sbyangs pa/legs par blangs pa de dag las bsim gyis mi khyab pa'i don dang ldan pa chos nyid dang ldan pa'i sgo byung ngo //sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis
111a6(mdo sde): mi khyab pa nges par rtogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang byung ngo //sku gcig khyon la sangs rgyas mang po ni//gang+gA klung gi bye ma ci yod snyed//rgyal ba de dag
111a7(mdo sde): ning yang de skyed de//de dag mtshan nyid ma 'dra sbrul mi mnyam//sgra yi khyon la 'gro ba lnga rnams te//sems can dmyal dang dred 'gror 'gro ba dang //gau shin rje
111b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten lha drang mi rnams zhugs//'dres pa med cing glanod par 'gyur ba'ang med//de yi gnas su mtsho dang rgya mtshor bcas//chu klung de bzhin mtshe'u dang lteng ka rnams//
111b2(mdo sde): 'dres pa med cing gnod par mi 'gyur te//de ltar rgyal ba'i chos ni bsom mi khyab//de yi gnas su ri bo du ma ste//khor yug dang ni lhun po rab lhun+da dang //bting zung dang
111b3(mdo sde): ni btang zang chen po dang //'bigs byed bya rgod phung po grangs kyi ri//gnas der sems can dmyal ba mi bzad pa//tsha dang rab tu che ba nyams mi dga'//de na sems can
111b4(mdo sde): dmyal skyes tshor ba mo//sdug bsngal de dag rjes su myong bar byed//de yi gnA sA na lha yi gzhal med khang //de drug dpag tshad bcu gnyis dbyangs dga' ba//wA
111b5(mdo sde): rnams stong phrag mang ba de dag kyang //lha yi dga' bo shin tu bye bu myong //ni mrig nas su spangs rgyas rnams skye blong //'jig rteni rig pa'i blostan pa 'byung ba snang //
111b6(mdo sde): glang gis rnam dag spyod pa ma sbyangs pa//ye shes bral ba dag gis de mo mthong //de yi glenas nyid na yod chos nub tshong //'dren pa mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra yang thos//
111b7(mdo sde): yi gnas nyid ni yang la la yos//'dren pa bzhugs te chos kyang ston ces thos//de yi gnas nyid na yang la lo dag/tshe tshad la ni bsam yis bzhugs snyam 'dzin//
112a1(mdo sde): de yi gnas na'ang 'chi ba'i dus byed ning //ring du mi 'tsho zhes ni sgra yang thos//gnas de la la 'di snyam 'du shes te//yid kyi 'du shes dang ni 'dzin
112a2(mdo sde): ba yis//bde gshegs mthong mchod sangs rgyas mnyes byas snyam//skyes pa med cing muchod pa byas pa'ang med//mi dag bdag gi khyim na rmi lam bzhin//'dod
112a3(mdo sde): pa'i yon tan dag la dga' myong nas//phyir song nas kyang de yisde gdod mi mthong //de ni rmi lam yin par de yis shes//de bzhin mthong thos rig dang bye brag byed//
112a4(mdo sde): 'di dag thams cad mi bdeni rmi lam bzhin//gang gis ting 'dzin 'di yang thob gyur pa//des ni chos kyi rang bzhin 'di dag shes//su la'ang sngag dang mi sdug med pa
112a5(mdo sde): ni//rmyi de 'jig rten na yang bde skyid rtag/su drug nags khrod mngon par dga' ba yi//dge sbyong de ni shin tu bde ba myong //su dag ci la'ang bdag gling bya ba med/yongs
112a6(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa rnam pa kun tu spangs//bse ru bzhin du 'jig rten 'di na gnas//nam mkha' la ni rlung dag rgyu ba bzhin//lam rnams bsgoms shing ye shes rab tu
112a7(mdo sde): zhugs//chos rnams thams cad stong pa bdag med par//chos rnams 'di dag gang gis rab bsgoms pa//de yi spobs pa dag ni mtha' yas 'gyur//su dag 'jig
112b1(mdo sde): rten na ni yid chags med//de dag sems ni rtag tu rlung dang 'dra//sdug dang mi sdug la yang chags pa med//'jig rten na ni mi de shin tu skying //mi sdug pa dang 'grogs pa
112b2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal te//sdug pa dang yang bral ba sdug bsngal yin//mthar byos 'di gnyis rab tu spangs nas ni//mi gang chos la dka' ba de dag spyod//gang zhing chos 'di thos
112b3(mdo sde): nas chags byed cing //chos ma yin pa thos nas khong khro byed//nga rgyal rgyags pas bcom pa log pa de//nga rgyal dbang gis sdug bsngal rjes su myong //su dgra mnyam
112b4(mdo sde): pa nyid la rab gnas te//rtag tu khengs pa med cing 'dud pa med//sdug dang mi sdug pa las rab grol ba//de dog rtag tu grol yid legs par gnas//tshul khrims
112b5(mdo sde): yongs su dag par rab gnas te//bsam gtan bsam mi khyab la rtag gnas shing //su dag nags khrod zhi bar dga' ba ni//de dag nam yang yid gnyis yong mi 'gyur
112b6(mdo sde): mi bden pa lA su dag rab zhugs shing //byis pa 'dod pa'i yon tan rtag tu dga'//bya rgod dag ni ro la mos pa bzhin//de dag rtag par bdud kyi dbang du 'gro/yang pi wang
112b7(mdo sde): gi sgra de las tshigs su bcad pa mngon par sgrub pa 'di byung nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa zab mo nges par rtogs pa la mkhas pa rjes
113a1(mdo sde): su thob bo//dri za'i bu gtsug phung lnga can yang skra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i bzod pa thob par gyur to//lha dang mi yi skye dgu sems can dpag tu med pa bla na med
113a2(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzosbas pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so//sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi'ang do ni byas par gyur to//sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa
113a3(mdo sde): nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyud pa la bka' stsal pa/gnon du delta
113a4(mdo sde): bsan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dod pa dang /myur du bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
113a5(mdo sde): mngon por rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bslab pa dang yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad gdon mi za zhing tshul khrims shin tu yongs su dag par bya'o//'du
113a6(mdo sde): 'ji med pa mang zhing sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa dang dge ba'i bshos gnyen la brten pa dang yongs su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can dang chos 'chol ba la brtson pa
113a7(mdo sde): dang chos la don du gnyer ba dang chos 'dod pa dang chos la dga' ba dang chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
113b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen pos gzhon nu sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed de/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o//gzhan yang gzhon//
113b2(mdo sde): nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dod pa dang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
113b3(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas brtson 'grus brtsams shing lus dang srog la mi blta bar byas te/gang snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
113b4(mdo sde): de dag rgya ni mo chad par yongs su btsal bar bya/g.yo med pas bsnyen par bya/bsten par bya/rim gror byas te/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
113b5(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su btsal nas kyang de dag las snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/gzung bar bya/kun
113b6(mdo sde): chub par bya/bcang bar bya/klag par bya/rab tu gdon par bya/lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/nyon mongs pa med par sgom pas bsgom par bya//mang du bya gzhan dag la'ang /
113b7(mdo sde): rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o//gang las snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de la dga' ba dang gus pas ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//gzhon nu
114a1(mdo sde): nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su 'tshol ba dang sri zhu bya ba dang g.yog bya ba la yid mi skyo bar gyur pa de'i tshe gzhon
114a2(mdo sde): nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bde bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//bde ba ro snying rje chen po la 'jug
114a3(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thob bo//gzhon nu de lta bas na mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du byas te rtag par dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su btsal bar bya/g.yo med//
114a4(mdo sde): pas bsnyen par bya/bsnyen par bya/rim gror bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
114a5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi khor los na/snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta ci smos/gzhon nu de lta bas na khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes
114a6(mdo sde): gnyen yongs su btsal ba dang sri zhu bya zla dang g.yog bya ba la yid yongs su mi skyo bar bya'o zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis rtag tu de ltar bslab par bya'o//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan
114a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid shin tu brjod pa'i phyir zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la sngon byung ba bstan pa tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis
114b1(mdo sde): rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to//'das pa'i bskal pa bye ba mang po ste//dpag tu med cing gzhal med bsam mi khyab//de tshe dbang rtog rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes//'dren pa
114b2(mdo sde): rkang gnyis gtso bo byung bar gyur//des ni ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad de//de la mi dang srog dang gang zag med//sgyu mtsho bur smig rgyu glog 'dra zhing //chos rnams thams cad chu yi
114b3(mdo sde): zla ba bzhin//shri nas 'jig rten pha rol 'gro ba yi//sems can shed las skyes pa mi dmigs kyang //las rnams byas pa med par mi 'gyur te//dkar gnag ji bzhin
114b4(mdo sde): 'bras pa smin par byed//rigs pa'i tshul gyi sgo 'di bzang po ste//phra zhing mthong dka' rgyal ba'i spyod yul yin//gang la yi ge'i tshig kyang mi dmigs pa//sangs rgyas byang
114b5(mdo sde): chub nyid ni bcom ldan mkhyen//yangs pa'i gzungs dang ye shes bsags pa ste//mdo sde bye ba khrig khrig rnams kyang 'byung //sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig spyod yul te//ting 'dzin
114b6(mdo sde): 'di ni bcom ldan rab tu 'chang //'di ni na ba nad las thar byed pa//byang chub sems dpas bsgrubs pa'i nor yin te//sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod cing rab tu bsngags//
114b7(mdo sde): bakhrag khrig lce yis rab tu mchod//skye bo byis pa kun la yang dag ston//mu stegs can gyis rtog par yongs su spangs//tshul khrims nor ni mchog tu sangs rgyas gsungs//
115a1(mdo sde): nam mkha' la ni glog bzhin chags mi 'gyur//gang gis rgyal ba bye ba rab mchod cing //sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad pa mkhas pa dang //sngan chad sdig
115a2(mdo sde): pa'i grogs po spangs pa dag/de dag gi ni bla med pha rol nor//de na dge slong chos smra 'dug pa dag/tshangs par spyod pa bde gshegs thugs kyi sras//rjes su mthun pa'i
115a3(mdo sde): chos 'di thos nas ni//'jig rten 'dren par sems kyang bskyed par gyur//'dren pa dbang tog rgyal mtshan rgyal po yis//chos smra de la yang ni tshig gsungs pa//dge
115a4(mdo sde): slong dngos po mchog tu bya dka' yis//byang chub dam pa mchog la sems bskyed cig/nor bu rin chen 'dra bar tshul khrims srungs//rjes su mthun pa'i grogs la
115a5(mdo sde): rtag par brten//sdig pa'i grogs la na mo yang ma brten dang //sangs rgyas ye shes ring por mi thogs thob//dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i drung //gang gis byang //
115a6(mdo sde): chub sems mchog bskyed pa ni//de dag thams cad chos slar rab 'gyur te//tshangs par spyod pa bde gshegs thugs kyi sas//dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal
115a7(mdo sde): po'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o////'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo//bam po bdun pa//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon
115b1(mdo sde): nu gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bslab pa dang yon tan gyi chos thams cad la gdon mi za bar
115b2(mdo sde): bya'o//'du 'dzi mang ba ma yin par bya'o//sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa dang yongs su dri ba'i rang bzhin can dang chos yongs su 'chol ba
115b3(mdo sde): la brtson pa dang chos la don du gnyer ba dang chos 'dod pa dang chos la dga' ba dang chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang chos dang chos kyi rjes su mthun pa la zhugs par bya'o//des sangs rgyas
115b4(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//gang las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de la'ang des dga' ba dang gus pas ston par 'du shes bskyed
115b5(mdo sde): par bya'o//gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bslab pa dang yon tan kyi chos thams cad gdon mi za ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang
115b6(mdo sde): dag par blangs te gnas ni de myur du spobs pa rgyun mi chad pa las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi
115b7(mdo sde): chos zab mo la nges par rtogs par 'gyur ro//lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi nem nur dang yid gnyis dang the tshom gyi mun pa sel po'i phyir snang ba lta bur 'gyur ro//de nas bcom
116a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bslab pa dang yon tan gyi chos thams cad nges par bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di brjod pa'i phyir zla 'od gzhon nur
116a2(mdo sde): gyur pa la sngon byung ba'i gtam gyi rgyud tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag par rab tu bstan pa/sngon byung dza mu'i gling zhes bya ba 'dir//g.yel ba med pa'i khye'u mchog
116a3(mdo sde): gnyis byung ste//bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la rab byung nas//bse ru bzhin du nags khrod stug por gnas//rdzu 'phrul ljon zhing bsam gtan bzhi rnams thob//snyan
116a4(mdo sde): dngags bstan bcos mkhas shing rdzogs pa ste//bar snang gi ni rjes dang sa yang rig/de dag nim mkha' la yang thogs med 'gro//de dag nags khrod stug po bsil ba dar//
116a5(mdo sde): me tog sna tshogs yid du 'ong bas gang //bya yang sna tshogs mang posu bsnyen pa der//phan tshun du ni gtam dag rab tu smra//rgyal por dwags 'chor zhing srong song na//
116a6(mdo sde): glags nis ni nags tshal der 'ongs te//rgyal pos chos sgra de gnyis mthong nas ni//de la mi tshig tu dga' ba nye bar bri zhig/de dang rjes su mthun pa'i gtam byas nas//
116a7(mdo sde): de dag rgyal po'i mdun du 'dug pa dang //rgyal po de yi dmag meng mtha' yas pa//bye ba khrag khrig drug cu rgyu bar lhags//de nas chos spyad de dgus so nas//rgyal po de
116b1(mdo sde): la smras pa rgyal rigs nyon//sangs rgyas 'byung ba mchog tu rnyed par dka'//sa yi bdag po rtag tu bag yod kyis//tshe ni rtag tu 'gro zhing mi gnas te//ri yi chu bo bzhin
116b2(mdo sde): du myur du 'gro//nad dang mya ngan rga bsra gzir ba lnga//khyod la dge bu'i lam 'dra skyabs gzhan med//rgyal po'i glang po chos rnams bskyang bar gyis//stobs bcu ldan pa'i
116b3(mdo sde): bstan pa 'di yang srung //zad pa'i dus la shin tu 'jigs pa'i tshe//rgyal po'i glang po chos kyi phyogs gnas kyis//de ltar de tshe mkhas pa de dag gis//rnam pa du mar
116b4(mdo sde): mi dbang gdams pa byas//rgyal po khrag khrig drug cur bcas pa yis//de tshe byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//de tshe rgyal po'i glang po chos thos nas//des shing dge ba'i
116b5(mdo sde): chos rnams smra ba la//rangs shing yid bde dga' ba rab skyes nas//rkang pa la yang phyag btsal de nas song //rgyal po de yi dge slong mang po dag/rnyed pa 'dod cing de
116b6(mdo sde): yi khyim du 'jug/de dag de mi 'dra ba'i spyod mthong nas//de la rgyal po de ltar ri mo med//bstan pa de yang ston pa 'dus pa yi//de tshe lo yi tha mar gyur pa ste//
116b7(mdo sde): dzam+bu'i gling na snod gyur rab tu nyung //ma bsdams pa dag shin tu mang po byung //de na dge slong mang po ban+d+ham zhing chags//rnyed pa 'dod cing dmigs pa'i lta ba can//bde
117a1(mdo sde): gshegs bstan pa rab tu zhig da' cha//rgyal po de yang bskur cing byed du bcu//chos sgra gnyis po 'di ni bskrad par gyis//'di dag su stabs cad
117a2(mdo sde): par smra ba ste//yun ring spyod par yang dag 'dzud byed kyang //de dag gang du'ang mya ngan 'ad mi ston//las kyang 'jig cing rnam par smin pa 'jig/tshul 'chos 'di dag phung
117a3(mdo sde): po med ces smra//rgyal po 'di dgra yul nas spangs nas ni//'dir yang cho so ni yun ring gnas par 'gyur//de dag gin tshig thos de yi tshe//rgyal po'i glang po the tshom byung
117a4(mdo sde): bar gyur//chos smra gnyis po 'di ni bsad par bya//btang snyoms bzhag na gnod par 'gyur srid snyam//rgyal po de phyir 'brang ba lha mo zhig/tshe rab snga mer lhan cig
117a5(mdo sde): spyod pa spyad//yun ring dus nas phan 'dod mkhas pa ste//de yis rgyal po de la 'di skad smras//rgyal rigs sdig pa'i grags po'i tshig dag gis//'di lta bu yi sems
117a6(mdo sde): nomA bskyod cig/dge slong chos smra mkhas pa gnyis po 'ad//sdig pa'i grogs po'i tshig gi snga ma spang shig/de dag gis ni nags khrod ci bshad pa//shin tu 'jigs
117a7(mdo sde): pa mi bzod dus kyi tshe//rgyal po'i glang po chos kyi phyogs gnas kyis//mi ye bdag po cung zad mi dran nam//rgyal po yang dag tshig gis bskul ba yis//de ni rgyal ba'i
117b1(mdo sde): bstun pa mi gtong gyur//te tshe rgyal po'i nu bo ma rungs pa//nyen 'khor rgyal po byed pa des spyad de//rgyal po khyod kyi gcen ni sdig pa can//bdag gi srog kyang nam du 'dod
117b2(mdo sde): mi byed //dge slong gnyis po rig sngags drag ldan pa//de dag nam mkho' la yang sngags kyis 'gro/de thos nas ni khyod kyi drung du 'ongs//thams cad 'dus te gsol ba
117b3(mdo sde): 'dobs pa ni//rig sngags drug ldani 'di gnyis myur du song //phyis gdod 'gyod par gyur na ma legs so//de tshe rgyal po'i glang po go bgos nas//sdig pa'i grogs kyi
117b4(mdo sde): tshig gis der chas te//rgyal po demag sde kun gyis yongs bskor nas//nags nas dge slong gang na yod par lhagaso//rgyal po mi zad drag shul sems rig nas//klu dang
117b5(mdo sde): gnod sbyin nags der gnas pa yis//rdo dang so phag char phab phyir bskrad de//dus ni rgyal po sde dang bcas pa btags//ltos shig sdig pa'i grogs kyi tshig gis ni//
117b6(mdo sde): de tshe ma rungs rgyal po 'chi dus byas//chos smra dag la khro ba byas pas na//der ni tshe rabs drug cur mnar med song //rgyal rigs rgyal po gang gis spad pa yi//dge slong
117b7(mdo sde): dmigs lta mang po de dag kyang //tshe rabs bye ba brgya phrag bsam yas su//sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur//lha mo gang gis rgyal po bskul bstan
118a1(mdo sde): cing //gang gis chos smra de dag bsrungs pa ni//sangs rgyas gang+gA'i bye ma mnyam pa mthong //spyad pa spyad cing de dag mchod pa byas//bye ba khrag khrig drug
118a2(mdo sde): cu mtha' yas pas//rgyal po dang ni lhan cig chos thos shing //byang chub tu ni sems mchog bskyed pa dag/'jig rten khams mang du yang sangs rgyas gyur//de dag
118a3(mdo sde): tshe tshad bskal pa bye ba mang //de dag ye shes gzhal med bsam mi khyab//de dag kun gyis ting 'dzin bzang po 'di//bshad nas rkang gnyis gtso bo myo ngan 'das//tshul
118a4(mdo sde): khrims tshangs po yon tan ye shesu bsags//bla na med pa'i tshig 'di thos nas ni//g.yeng ba med par bag yod spyod cig dang //sangs rgyas ye shes ring por mi
118a5(mdo sde): thogs thob//phyogs bcu dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams//sems zhi snying rje byams pa'i sman mnga' ba//'jig rten kun gyi skabs dang dpung gnyen mthong //'jig
118a6(mdo sde): rten kun tu chos kyi char 'be bras 'gyur//grazhon nu khye'u mchog gnyis po byung ba yong //gzhon yin snyam na de ltar mi blta ste//mar me mdzad ni de na gcig tu gyur//
118a7(mdo sde): de tshe chos smra gnyis pa nga yin no//gang gis rjes su mthun pa'i chos thos pa//rgyal po der yang byams pa de tshe gyur//lha mo phan 'dod mkhas pa gang byung ba//gzhan/
118b1(mdo sde): khyod ni de tshe de gyur to//rgyal po de yinanu bye gang zung ba//dge slong chos sgra 'di gnyis sod cig ces//dge sbyong rnyed pa 'dod pas skud pa ni//lha smin de yi rkyen dang gyur to//
118b2(mdo sde): sden drung ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu gcig pa'o////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur byur pa la bka' stsal po/gdon nu de lta ngas
118b3(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang /myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod
118b4(mdo sde): pas lus dang srog la ma chags par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzhon nu lus dang srog la chags pa'i phyir sems can rnams mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur
118b5(mdo sde): ro//gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dang srog la ma chags pa rnams la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rnyed par mi dka' na ting nge
118b6(mdo sde): 'dzin 'di lta ci smos/gzhon nu de lta bas na lus dang srog la'ang ma chags par bya'o zhes de ltar khyod kyis bslab par bya'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste//rtag tu khor mor
118b7(mdo sde): rnag gi lus 'di la//byis pa rnams ni rab tu chags byed de//srog la 'ju zhing bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir//mi mkhas pa dag rtag tu sdig pa byed//su dge snying po med
119a1(mdo sde): pa'i lus srog la//lhag par chags pa yod pa ma yin pa//de dag gis ni bdud kyi sde bcom ste//byang chub shing drung byang chub rab tu rtogs//su
119a2(mdo sde): dag bdag med stong pa'i lus rnams dang //srog kyang rmi lam g.yo ba zil pa 'dra//'di gnyis la ni chags par byed 'gyur ba//de dag shi 'phos sems can dmyal
119a3(mdo sde): bar 'gro/lus nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal
119a4(mdo sde): pa/gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
119a5(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi skur mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba
119a6(mdo sde): yin te/gzugs kyi skus rab tu phye ba ma yin no//gzhon nu de la byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la smon par 'dod pa dang /de
119a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku shes par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di gzung bar bya/kun chub par bya bcang bar bya/klag par bya rab tu gdon par bya/lung mnod cing kha
119b1(mdo sde): ton du bya bsgom par bya bsgom pa'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par bya//gzhan la'ang rgya tshor rab tu bstan par bya'o//gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni bsod nams brgyu pa
119b2(mdo sde): las skyes pa'i blo dang don gcig tu bstan pa yin te/chos ltos skyes pa/mtshan ma med pa/mtshan mo thams cad dang bral ba/zab pa tshad med pa tshad med pa'i chos
119b3(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid mtshan ma thams cad rnam par bshig po/mi g.yo ba mi gnas pa shin tu nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/mi snang ba mig gi lam las yang dag par
119b4(mdo sde): 'das pa ni chos kyi skur rab tu shes par bya ste/bsam gyis mi khyab pa/bsam pa'i sa dang bral ba/bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi bskyod pa/spros pa thams cad las
119b5(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das pa/gnas med pa/sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la smon par 'dod pa rnams kyi sku las shin tu 'dres pa'i snying po ste 'dod chags las yang dag par 'das
119b6(mdo sde): pa/dbyer mi phyed pa ste zhes ngalas yang dag par 'das pa/brtan pa ste/gti mug las yang dag par 'das pa stong pa nyid du bstun pas nges par bstan pa me skyes pa skye
119b7(mdo sde): ba las yong dag par 'das pa/tha snyad du rtags pa/mya ngan las 'das pa bye brag med pa/sgras mya ngan las 'das pa dbyangs kyis zhi ba/brdas mtshungs par gyur to//
120a1(mdo sde): don dam pas brdar gyur pa/yang dag pa ji lta ba'i tshig gis don dam paHyongs su gdung ba med pas bsil bu//gnas med pa/gzhal du med pa/
120a2(mdo sde): kha dog bstan pas mu med pa/mngon par shes pa chen po yongs su sbyang ba las byung ba ste/gnon nu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhes bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das
120a3(mdo sde): kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//'di 'dra'i 'jog rten mngon po'i sgo//su dag shes po 'dod pa ni//ting 'dzin 'di ni sgom gyis dang //sangs rgyas
120a4(mdo sde): sku ni shes par 'gyur//sangs rgyas sku ni dag pa ste//bsod nams brgya skyes 'od kyang gsol//de ni bar snang mtshungs pa skye//de la tha dad bya ba med//sangs rgyas byang chub
120a5(mdo sde): ci 'dra ba//mtshan rnams kyang ni do 'dra ste//de yi mtshan rnams ci 'dra ba//de yi sku yang de 'dra'o//sku ni byang chub mtshan nyid de//sangs rgyas zhing yang de 'dra zhing //stongs
120a6(mdo sde): drang rnam thar bsam gtan yang //de dag thams cad mtshan nyid gcig/de ltar sangs rgyas 'byung 'gyur te//'jig rten mgon po'i de 'dra bso//sus kyang sha yi mig gis
120a7(mdo sde): ni//nam yang mthong bar mi nus so//mang po dag kyang 'di skad smra//des ni 'jig rten 'dren pa mthong //sku yang gser gyi kha dog la//'jig rten thams cad snang bar mdzad
120b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dag gi byin rlabs dang //mthu dang rnam thar sprul pa yis//de ltar mtshan gyis sbas pa yi//skra dag shin tu snang ba yin//bong tshod khrun dang sboms su yang //sangs
120b2(mdo sde): rgyas sku ni bshad mod kyis//sku yi tshad ni ma rnyed de//de phyir bsnam gyis mi khyab po//ma sa nas sku ni 'di sdom zhes//gal te tshad kyang rnyed gyur ni//lha dag drang ni mi rnams dang //
120b3(mdo sde): ston pa bye brag med par 'gyur//mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyi ni//rnam por smin pa'ang de yi mtshan//ming dang gzugs kyang de 'dra mtshan//rnam par dag cing 'od gsal
120b4(mdo sde): 'gyur//ji ltar 'jig rten mgon po yis//bskal pa bye bar bsnyen pa ltar//sus kyang ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di//num yang goms par ma byas so//dkar po'i chos ni mang po
120b5(mdo sde): yis//ting 'dzin 'di ni bskyed pa ste//ting 'dzin 'di ni rgyo che bas//nga yi lus kyang mi snang ngo //gang gi sems ni ci 'dra ba//ming dang gzugs kyang de 'dra ste//rlung bzhin
120b6(mdo sde): med pa'i sems kyi ni//ming dang gzugs kyang mtshan de 'dra//ming dang gzugs la gang gi ni//'du shes rags pa 'jug pa yang //skal ba mi mnyam 'du shes kyis//
120b7(mdo sde): rags pa'i sems kyang skye bar 'gyur//ming dang gzugs le su dag gi/'du shes phra mo 'jug pa ni//ming dang gzugs la ma chags pas//sems ni rab tu 'od gsal 'gyur//
121a1(mdo sde): ngas dran sngon gyi tshe rabs ni//grangs med pa dag bdun du yang //sdig par 'du shes gsum po dag/nam yang skyes par ma gyur to//nga yi sems ni zag
121a2(mdo sde): med de//bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su//sems can rnams kyi dod byed kyang //de yi lus ni mi snang ngo //ji ltar gang gi dngos po las//yid kyang rnam par grol gyur pa//
121a3(mdo sde): de dag de yi dngos po dngong //phyir yang phrad par mi 'gyur ro//dngos po kun las rnam pa kun//nga yi rnam shes rnam grol te//sems kyi rang bzhin shes pas ni//phyir
121a4(mdo sde): yang ye shes 'byung bar 'gyur//zhing rnams bye ba phrag stong du//tra yi sprul pa dag kyang 'gro/sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed//de la lus kyang rnyed mi 'gyur//mtshon
121a5(mdo sde): nyid med cing mtshan ma med//ji ltar nam mkha'i de bzhin du//nga yi sku yang brjod med cing //shes par dka' bar rab tu bstan//dpa' bo chen po chos kyi sku//sku ni chos
121a6(mdo sde): las skyes pa ste//gzugs kyi skur ni nam du yang //rgyal ba gdugs par yong mi nus//ji ltar bshad pa 'di dag kyang //thos nas dga' bar 'gyur ba ni//de la sdig
121a7(mdo sde): can bdud kyis kyang //glan ka rnyid par mi 'gyur ro//zab mo yi ni chos thos nas//de la skrag pa mi 'byung ste//de ni srog gi phyir du yang //sangs rgyas byang chub spong
121b1(mdo sde): mi byed//mdo sde bye ba phrag stong gi/yang dag bstan pa shes par 'gyur//gang dang gang du song bar yang //'jig rten dag la snang bar 'gyur//gzhon nu de la de bzhin gshegs
121b2(mdo sde): pa'i sku ni mtshan ma dong las kyas kyang shes par sla ba myi yin te/sngon po'am kha dog sngon po 'am/sngon po lta bur ston pa'am/'od sngon po 'byung ba 'am/ser po'am/kha dog ser
121b3(mdo sde): po'am/ser po lta bur ston pa 'am/'od ser po 'byung ba'am/dmar po 'am/kha dog dmar po'am/dmar po lta bur ston pa 'am/'od dmar po 'byung ba'am/dkar
121b4(mdo sde): po'am/kha dog dkar po'am/dkar po lte bur ston pa'am/'od dkar po 'byung ba 'am/le brgan nam/kha dog la brgya nu nam/le brgan lte bur ston pa 'am/'od lde brgan
121b5(mdo sde): 'byung ba 'am/shal lam/shel gyi kha dog gam/shel lta bur ston pa'am/shel gyi 'od 'byung ba 'am/me'am/me'i kha dog gam/me lta bur ston pa 'am/me'i 'od
121b6(mdo sde): 'byung ba 'am/mar gyi snying po 'am/mar gyi kha dog gam/mAr lta bur ston pa 'am/mar gyi 'od 'byung ba 'am/guser ram/gser gyi kha dog gamaM/glaser lta bur ston
121b7(mdo sde): pa'am/gser gyi 'od 'byung ba 'am/bai DUr+ya 'am/bai DUr+ya'i kha dog gam/bai DUr+ya lta bur ston pa'am/bai DUr+ya'i 'od 'byung ba'am/glog gam/glog gi kha dog ga ma/
122a1(mdo sde): klog lta bur ston pa'am/glog gi 'od 'byung ba'am/tshangs pa'am/tshangs pa'i kha dog gam/tshangs pa lta bur ston pa'am/tshangs pa'i 'od
122a2(mdo sde): 'byung ba 'am/lha 'am/lha'i kha dog gam/lha lta bur ston pa 'am/lha'i 'od 'byung ba'o zhes shes par sla ba ma yin no//gzhon nu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
122a3(mdo sde): ni dag pa ste/mtshan ma dag gis bsam par bya ba ma yin pa/bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa/mtshan ma thams cad kyis kyang bsam par bya ba ma yin pa/bsam
122a4(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab par bstan pa ste/rnam pa thams cing bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang gzugs kyi sku
122a5(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs pas sku'i tshad gzung bar sla ba ma yin no//de nu so bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//'jig rten khams kyi rdul
122a6(mdo sde): phran dang //rdul du ming yang ston pa dang //mtshe'u dang rdzing dang lteng ka dang //rgya mtsho na yang ji snyed chu//'di snyed rdul phran yod do zhes//de dag la ni mtha' mi rnyed//
122a7(mdo sde): rgya mtsho la ni sgyu rtse yis//chu thigs gzhal bar nus kyang ni//'jig rten mgon po'i dpe nyid du//yang dag bstan par mi rung ngo //chu yi thigs pa dpag med cing //
122b1(mdo sde): de bzhin rab tu phra ba'i rdul//de bas sems can gcig gi yang //shin tu mang du ngas mthong ste//mos pa dang ni sems bskyed pa//du ma dag ni shes mi smra//ngas ni sku
122b2(mdo sde): yi yon tan dag/yang dag pa ni grang bstan pa//sems can kun gyi mos pa yang //de dag dpe ru bzod mi 'gyur//mtshan ma dang ni las rnams dang //kha dog snang ba 'di
122b3(mdo sde): 'dra zhes//sangs rgyas kyi ni shes mi nus//nga yi bye brag de 'dra'o//sangs rgyas mtshan ma bral ba ste//chos kyi sku yis rab tu phye//zab cing dpag tu med pa ste//de phyir
122b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab//sangs rgyas bsam du med pa yi//sangs rgyas sku yang bas mi du med//sku de bsam du med pa yau//chos kyi sku yis rab tu phye//sangs rgyas
122b5(mdo sde): sku ni sems kyis kyang //bsam par bzod pa ma yin te//de ltar de yi sku la yang //tshad kyang nye bar mi dmigs so//chos rnams de dag dpag tu med//bskal pa bye
122b6(mdo sde): bar bsnyen pas na//de phyir nga yi lus kyang ni//'od gsal bsam du med pa grub//sems can kun gyis gzung du med16/chud kyis gzung bya ma yin te//de lta sangs
122b7(mdo sde): rgyas sku dag ni//tshad med rdzas ma gyis mi khyab pa//tshad med pa yi chos dag gis//de la tshad ni brtag tu med//ma brtag pa yi chos dag gis//de ltar sangs rgyas
123a1(mdo sde): ma brtags so//rtog pa dgra ni tshad du bstan//rtog pa med pa tshad med yin//mi rtog rtog dang bral bas na//de phyir sangs rgyas bsum du med//ji ltar
123a2(mdo sde): nam mkha' tshad med la//sus kyang gzhal du mi nus pa//de bzhin sangs rgyas sku dag kyang //nam mkha' nyid dang 'dre zhing mtshungs//sangs rgyas sku ni de lta bur//gang
123a3(mdo sde): gis rig pa rgyal ba'i sras//de dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa//sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu
123a4(mdo sde): gsum pa'o////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems
123a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po gang ci nas kyang bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mngon sum du bya bar 'dod de/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/don so so yang dag par rig pa dang
123a6(mdo sde): chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang nges pa'i tshigs so so yang dag par rig pa dang spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa 'di bzhi mngon sum du bya'o snyam na/gzhon nu byang chub
123a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ting nge 'dzin 'di gzung bar bya//kun chub par bya/bcang bar bya/bklag par bya/rab tu gdon par bya/lung mi nod cing
123b1(mdo sde): khaton du bya/nyon mongs pa med par sgom pas bsgom par bya/gzhan la'ang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya/bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par bya'o//gzhon nu de la
123b2(mdo sde): chos so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/gzhon nu gzugs su brjod pa ji snyed yod pa gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'ang de stod do//de bzhin du tshor
123b3(mdo sde): ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams ji snyed pa dang gzhon nu rnam par shes pa'i brjod pa ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'ang de snyed de/gzhon nu da ltar
123b4(mdo sde): gzugs su brjod pa mtha' yas mu med bsam gyis mi khyab pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du
123b5(mdo sde): shes dang 'du byed rnams dang gzhon nu 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i brjod pa mtha' yas mu med de/bsam gyis mi khyab pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa
123b6(mdo sde): brjod pa'ang po som gyis mi khyab po//gzhon nu de ltar 'dus byas la'ang nyes pa grangs med/mya ngan las 'das pa lo'ang phan yon grangs med de/de bzhin gshegs
123b7(mdo sde): pa'i bsngags pa'ang grangs med do//gzhon nu 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i ming ji snyed yod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa'ang de snyed do//gzhon nu 'di ltar mya ngan
124a1(mdo sde): 'das pa'i ming grangs med de/dri bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa'ang grangs med do//gzhon nu 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod
124a2(mdo sde): pa bsam gyis mi khyab par brjod pa ste/de dag mthar phyin pa'i gnas su bstan par sla ba ni ma yin no//bzhi gang zhe ni/'di lta ste/'du byed brjod pa bsami gyis mi khyab
124a3(mdo sde): pa dang dbyangs brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/gzhon nu de
124a4(mdo sde): dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags po brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/bsam gyis mi khyab por brjod pa bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di bzhi ni de bzhin ga shegs pa'i brjod
124a5(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa/bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa ste/de dag ni mthar phyin pa'i gaunas su bsten par sla ba ma yin no//bzhi gang zhe na/bzhi po de dag nyid de/
124a6(mdo sde): de bzhin du rgyas par bstan par bya'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'dra
124a7(mdo sde): byed yongs su bshad pa'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byung ba'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyad po dang 'di bzhi'i
124b1(mdo sde): gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rigs pa bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed kyi rigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i rigs pa
124b2(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i rigs pa bsamau gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di
124b3(mdo sde): ngag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed kyi sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas
124b4(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhan nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nges par bsten pa
124b5(mdo sde): bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed nges par bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa nges par bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs
124b6(mdo sde): pa'i nges par bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba nges par bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
124b7(mdo sde): sgra bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed kyi sgra bsam gyis mau khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgra bsam gyis mi
125a1(mdo sde): khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig bzhi ste/bzhi gang
125a2(mdo sde): zhe na/'du byed kyi tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam
125a3(mdo sde): par byang ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig gi lam bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed kyi tshig gi
125a4(mdo sde): lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i tshig gi lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig gi lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par
125a5(mdo sde): byang ba'i tshig gi lam bsam gyis mo khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgongs te bshad pa bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed
125a6(mdo sde): kyi dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dgongs te bshad
125a7(mdo sde): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i dge/ngos te bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lha la
125b1(mdo sde): nges par rtog pa bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed lha la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa lha la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongasnga pa
125b2(mdo sde): lha la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byeng bA lha la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'dra bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di drag ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi me la rtog pa bzhi ste/
125b3(mdo sde): bzhi grang zhe na/'du byed mi la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mi la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa mi la rtog pa bsam
125b4(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba mi la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ming la rtog pa bzhi ste/bzhi grang zhe na/
125b5(mdo sde): 'du byed kyi ming la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i ming la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ming la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab
125b6(mdo sde): pa dang rnam par byang ba'i ming la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jug pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed la
125b7(mdo sde): 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa la 'jug la bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun+da nas nyon/mongs pa la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba
126a1(mdo sde): la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'dri bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrol ba bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed kyi
126a2(mdo sde): babartsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i sgrol ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgrol ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang po'i sgrol ba/
126a3(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhan nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdo rje'i tshig bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed kyi rdo rje'i tshi go bsam gyis mi
126a4(mdo sde): khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i rdo rje'i tshig bsam
126a5(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed gsong sngags kyi tshig bsam
126a6(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
126a7(mdo sde): rnam par byang ba'i gsong sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa bzhi ste/bani gong zhe na/'du
126b1(mdo sde): byed sgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa sgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa drang kun nas nyon mongs pa sgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /rnam par byang ba sgrub pa
126b2(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//zhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdo sde'i tshig bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed mdo sde'i tshig bsgom gyis mi khyab
126b3(mdo sde): pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mdo sde'i che ga bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis
126b4(mdo sde): mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btags pa'i tshig bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed btags pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab
126b5(mdo sde): pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa btags pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa btags pa'i tshig bsdam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba btags
126b6(mdo sde): pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snang ba'i tshig bzhi ste/bzhi grang zhe na/'du byed snang ba'i tshigra bsam gyis/
126b7(mdo sde): mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam por bying ba snang ba'i tshig bsam
127a1(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsal ba'i tshig bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed gsal ba'i
127a2(mdo sde): tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa gsal ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa gsal ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
127a3(mdo sde): rnam par byang ba gsal ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'i tshig bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du
127a4(mdo sde): byed kyi spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di byed yongs su bshad pa spyod pa'i cho ga bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab
127a5(mdo sde): po dang rnam par byang ba spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyad pa'i tshi ga bzhi ste/bzhi grang zhe na/'du
127a6(mdo sde): byed kyi spyad pa'i tshig bsom gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa spyad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa spyad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab
127a7(mdo sde): po dang rnam par byang ba spyad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'o bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bzhi ste/bzhi
127b1(mdo sde): gang zhe na/'du byed pasam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs
127b2(mdo sde): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyad pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub
127b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi mtha' yas pa'i tshig bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed mtha' yos pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mtha' yas pa'i
127b4(mdo sde): tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam pa rnga byung ba mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//
127b5(mdo sde): gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su
127b6(mdo sde): bshad pa rgya ba med po'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu ba med pa d+h+r-i ga bsarme gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi
127b7(mdo sde): khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mu med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed mu mod pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa
128a1(mdo sde): dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa mu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par
128a2(mdo sde): byang ba mu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhal du med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed
128a3(mdo sde): gzhal du med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa gzhal du med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa gzhal du med pa'i chog
128a4(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byung ba gzhal du med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi grangs med
128a5(mdo sde): pa'i tshig bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed grangs med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa grangs med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
128a6(mdo sde): kun nas nyon mongs pa grangs med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba grongs med pa'i chog bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang
128a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dpag tu med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed dpag tu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa dpag
128b1(mdo sde): tumed pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dpag tu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /rnam par byung ba dpag tu med pa'i tshigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa
128b2(mdo sde): dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshad med pa'i tshig pazhi ste/bzhi ga she na/'du byed tshad med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyad du dang 'dra khyod yongs
128b3(mdo sde): su bshad pa tshad med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa tshad med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyad pa deng rnam par byang ba tshad med pa'i tshig bsom gyis mi khyebo pa dang
128b4(mdo sde): 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i tshig bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed shes pa'i tshi ga bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad
128b5(mdo sde): pa shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba shes pa'i tshig bAs mA~M gyis mi khyab po dang 'di bzhi'o///
128b6(mdo sde): gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa bsags pa bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed kyi shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /'du byed yongs
128b7(mdo sde): su bshad pa'i shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba shes pa bsags pa bsom gyis mi
129a1(mdo sde): khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i rigs bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed kyi shes pa'i rigs bsam/
129a2(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di byed yongs su bshad pa shes pa'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba shes
129a3(mdo sde): pa'i rigs bsam gyiso mo khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o//gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa bsags pa bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'du byed kyi spobs
