194a4(mdo sde): pa dang /myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogaso pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas g.yo ba med cing 'jigs pa med pas rang gi sha dang khrag kyang
194a5(mdo sde): yongs su btang ste/dge slong chos smra ba na pa las bslong bar bya'o//gzhon nu rnam grangs des 'di ltar rig par bya ste/gzhon nu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal
194a6(mdo sde): pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/yangs pa/tshod med pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa/dpag tu med pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
194a7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/lha dang
194b1(mdo sde): mI rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das smon lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa/khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bu 'jig rten du byung ste/gzhon nu smon lam+bu bsam
194b2(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de gang gi nyin par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
194b3(mdo sde): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i nyi ma ma 'das par sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa grangs med dpag tu med pa mngon par sprul nas sems can tshad med pa gdul ba byas te/zag
194b4(mdo sde): pa zad pa dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod nas sems can tshad med pa yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod nas nyi ma de ma 'das por yongs su
194b5(mdo sde): mya ngan lngas 'das so//bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan 'das pa de'i dam pa'i chos lo byi ba khrag khrig brgya stong du gnas par gyur to//gzhon nu bcom ldan 'das smon lam
194b6(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa nub pa'i dus kyi tshe lnga brgya tha mar gyur pa
194b7(mdo sde): na dge slong dmigs par lta ba mang po byung ste/de dge 'di lta bu'i mdo sngal mi sred mi mos shing phyir bzlog par byed/spong bar byed de/mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong dag
195a1(mdo sde): la'ang gnod par byed cing srog kyang ka cod par byed de/rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pa de dag gis mdo sde 'dri lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong stong srog bcad
195a2(mdo sde): par gyur to//gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgal po ye shes kyi stobs zhes bya bi dzim+ba'i gling le dbyung ba/dam pa'i rjes yongs su 'dzin pa/sngon gyi smon lam phun sum tshogs
195a3(mdo sde): pa zhig byung ste/gzhan nu de'i tshe de'i dus na dzam+bu'i gling 'dir dge slong yang dag blo gros zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dzin pa/chos smra ba rgyal po de'i pho brang du 'gro zhing /dge ba'i
195a4(mdo sde): ngashes gnyen byed pa/phan par 'dod pa/snying brtse ba don du 'dod pa zhig byung ste/rgyal po de'ang de la rgyun mi chad par blta bas mi ngoms te rtag tu 'dod par gyur te//
195a5(mdo sde): de'ang bstan pa dang chos kyi gtam bya ba dang nye bar 'gro ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dang yongs su dri ba dang /bzung ba dang tshig gis go bar byed nus shing dge slong chos skyo ba de/
195a6(mdo sde): sems can dag gi g.yo ba dang smod lam dang mos pa dang khams dang bag che gos la mkhas te/sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang sngo bos dang brtson 'grus kyi rim pa shes
195a7(mdo sde): shing /khams dang bag chags la'ang mangs/bden pa dang mtshams sbyar ba la'ang mkhas/mtshams bral ba dang tshig gi lan gtan la dang ba pa la'ang mkhas/
195b1(mdo sde): skyobs pa zab cing sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i cho ga la'ong mkhas/gsong por smra zhing bzhin la khro gnyer med pa/sems chen por gyur pa la gnas pa/snying rje chen
195b2(mdo sde): po la brtson pa/pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis ma non pa yin no//gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po ye shes kyi stobs kyi bu mo skyes nas lo bcu drug lon pa/byeng
195b3(mdo sde): bzhin bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/kha dog bzang zhing rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa ye shes ldan zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/de'i slob dpon ni dge slong yang dag po gros
195b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yin te/dge ba'i chos rnams la yang dag par ston pa/yang dag par gzing bstod pa/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa
195b5(mdo sde): yin no//gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong chos smra ba de'i brla gnyis la 'brum bu me dpal nag po chen po gso dka' zhing sman dkon pa zhig byung ste/na ba de sman pa dge
195b6(mdo sde): gis spangs par gyur to//de nas rgyal po ye shes kyi stobs btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa sas dang sras mo dang zhabs 'bring bar bcas pa dge slong de na par rig nas rag
195b7(mdo sde): tu ngu zhing mchi ma byung ngo //bud med brkyang khrir bcis pa dang kong dang grong khyer gyi mi rnams su bcas pa dang yul 'khor ba dang grong 'ad pa dang yul gyi mi dang rtsis pa dang blon po
196a1(mdo sde): dang ston pa chen med naso la rnams su bcas pa de dag thams cad kyang dge slong byed par thos nas rab tu du zhing mtshom 'anata/dge slong 'di'
196a2(mdo sde): smras byed par gyur ti rI zhes skad 'dzer te//gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po ye shes stobs la lho mo sngon sdug gi gnyen mtshams su gyur pa dag yod de/de rgyal po d+ha
196a3(mdo sde): po ni 'brang bas rmi lam du bstan pa/rgyal po sbyin po da la te dge slong 'di la ma'i sha dang khrag g-is myungal bas 'bras bu ma de ba cug pa 'di 'i phyogs te/mi
196a4(mdo sde): sor pA mAR+than+te/byA las ro sna tshigs su g.yos byas te bI rang gi slong 'di ni 'di lces 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro//de nas rgyal po ye shes kyi skyongs mtshon mo dri 'das pa
196a5(mdo sde): dang gnyid kyis log pa las sa dang btsun mar 'khor kyi nang du 'das nas dza lam gyi rnam pa de dag thun mo ri kho dum sa la bzlas te/nga'i tshul ma 'di lta bu ni gung byung
196a6(mdo sde): nas bzlas nas ge par byas na/gzhan nu nges kyang bu med kyi khyim de dang rgyal po'i pho byung de nas dge sbyong de la ci de sbyin par su'ang sprob med do//d+himaM po'i bu mo mi
196a7(mdo sde): shas ldan yang rmi la mdo lta bu zhigi rmis nas sad pa dang btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song ste/rmi lam gyi rnam pa de dag mi dang nabs 'bring ba rnams la gautam byas thong dge
196b1(mdo sde): slong de la rtsi de sbyin par su'ang spro ba med do//de nas rgyal po'i sras mo ye shes ldan de dga' zhing mgu yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ba dang mos pa dang yid bde ba skyes nas 'di lta bur
196b2(mdo sde): brtson par byas te/'di ltar bdag gis rtsi 'di bdag gi luste las bcad de ji skad bstan pa bzhin du khrag gsar pa dang sha gsar pa sbyin par bya'o//rgyal po'i pho brang ni bdag
196b3(mdo sde): ni thams cad kyi nang na gzhan zhing chung ste/lus dang drag dang yid kyi las kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa mi yin la/kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ye shes btsal bar 'dod
196b4(mdo sde): pas chos smra ba kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa la bdag gi lus kyi sha dang khrag phul te/dge slong 'di ci nas nad 'di las sos par bya'o snyam mo//de nas rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes
196b5(mdo sde): ldan de rang gi gnas su song nus mtshon rnon po thogs te chos la zhugs pa'i yid kyis bdag gi brla lAs sha bcad nas/ro sna tshogos dang ldan pa gya nom par g.yos byas nas//khrag
196b6(mdo sde): kyang thogs te 'phags pa de'i drung du song nas rgyal po ye shes stobs kyi mdun du 'dug ste/khrag gis 'brum bu mi dbul nag po de byugs nas/g.yos legs por byas pa'i
196b7(mdo sde): zas de dge slong de zar bcug ste/'grangs par byed cing legs par bstabs so//de nas dge slong du mi shes ma rig ma dogs pas zas de zos so//zas de rngos ma thag tu
197a1(mdo sde): dge slong de na cha thams cad med par gyur te nad de thams cad kyang sos so//de yongs su gdung byu dang bral ning 'do ba dang ldan pas de lta de lta bur chos
197a2(mdo sde): bstan te/btsun mo'i 'khor de de dgod pa dang yul mi dang yul 'khor ba 'dus pa de dag las smig chags khro nyis spyod blan med pa yang dge par rdzogs de'i byang chub tu
197a3(mdo sde): sems skyes sa//n+d+haswA N+Da la ze ye shes skyibs kyis bdage gi bu mo la tshigs sru bcad pa 'di dge smos so// mi spyod kyim khrig 'dig las rnyed//me yi sho 'dri dag kyang
197a4(mdo sde): gu nas blangs//bu mo khyod kyis kha zas 'di byas pas//chos smra 'di yang 'di ltar bde bar gyu/sna tshogs blo dang ldan pa'i g.yos byas pa//dasad pa yin no
197a5(mdo sde): demi shi ba rnyed//du mo khyud kyis khrag 'di ga las rnyed//des ni sdig pa'i nang las 'di thar byas//dri mo san pa yi na ga thos nas//na mo ye shus ldan gyis di
197a6(mdo sde): skud smras//num sems meng par tshig kyang rab smras te//bdag ni ci mchi yang khyod gsun du gos lnga//lha yis bskrun pa'i rmilam dang //bdag gis mthing bar ma
197a7(mdo sde): yag//sa yi bdag po bdag la gson//yang dag don ni mkhyen par mdzad//lha 'dig la 'di skad sto ni//mi me sha dang khrag rnams ni//dge slong 'di la su sa myed
197b1(mdo sde): nga du su / na ldas sasku//bdun ma ldanaman//blan nas mas/
197b2(mdo sde): /drin ma rnams pa 'das dag da yi masang sa pa gsas /
197b3(mdo sde): na ma sa su ga 'di //ma ga sbyin ma na/dag 'a dug sa
197b4(mdo sde): bdag sa / sa na med phrul //de sa na shi na dzin/da myed shA ma nga
197b5(mdo sde): ying sa da// mi nama'i kyis sa/mam cing sa du ni/ba dge spyang dzin//sus
198a1(mdo sde): to//de nas bdag gi sems skyes pa//dge slong 'di ni zas byin te//bdag gi shA yang bcad nas ni//khrag rnams kyis kyang byasmra bar bya//bad+mag
198a2(mdo sde): gi b.rarla las sha bcad de//sha rnams dang ni khrig blangs nas//sha yi stu gu bdag gis bskal//bro ba sna tshogs g.yos legs bgyis//dge slong nu bo de la nI/
198a3(mdo sde): mi sha yi ni kha zas dang //khrag rnams kyis kyang byug pa dag/bdag gis yab kyi spyan sngar stsal//mi yi bdag po bdag gi tshig la gson//sa bdag me shwa dag ni
198a4(mdo sde): mA rnyed nas//bdag gi bAR+Ya les sha dag bcud nas su//de bsgrubs chos smra 'di la stsal pa lags//bdag gis bla med byang chub don phyir du//rang gi lus
198a5(mdo sde): kyis don chen 'di dag bgyis//dge slong 'di yang thar bgyis mi bde med//bdag gis bsod nams dag ni tshad med bgyis//bu mo de lo rgyal pos 'di skad smras//
198a6(mdo sde): bu mo khyod kyis rtsir ni bya ba'i phyir//ji ltar lus las rang gi sha bcad na//khyod kyi lus lan tshar ma gyur tam//rgyal po'i bu mo blo ldan 'jigs med pas//
198a7(mdo sde): tshe smras pa rgyal po so bdag gson//las kyi rnam smin bsam yas de 'dra ba so//de dag gsan nas tshul bzhin mkhyen par mdzod//yab cig sdig pa'i las
198b1(mdo sde): rnams bgyis pa yis//sems can sems dpal mi bzad ltung gyur te//sha med gyur nas phyir yang sha dag skye//las kyi 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab gzigs//
198b2(mdo sde): sdig pa'i las kyis sha khrag med gyur cing //skad cig tu yang shi khrag 'byung 'gyur na//dge ba'o las dang mos po de dag las//sha dang khrag rnams skye bo smos ci 'tshal//
198b3(mdo sde): she bcad bdag lan tsha ma mchis te//khrag phyung bdag la g.yo ba yod ma mchis//bdag gi sha rnams thams cad bcad na yang //chos kyi lus la rma dang skyon ma mchis
198b4(mdo sde): bdag gis chos la dga' ba mchog bskyed nas//rang gi brla las shu bcad rab tu stsal//rma dang sdug bsngal bdag la ma mchis te//bdag gi lus kyang sngon gyi bzhin du
198b5(mdo sde): gyur//'di 'dra ba yi chos sgra 'di lta bu//brgya lam nA yang dzam+bu'i gling du 'byung //yub cig u dum+b+hi ra'i me tog bzhin//bskal pa bye ba mang la res 'ga' gda'//ji ltar
198b6(mdo sde): dzam+bu'i chu bo gser 'bar ba//sems can lci bas ngoms par mi 'gyur te//de bzhin du ni chos smra de 'dra ba//lha dang mi dag mthong bas chog mi shes//skye bo skom pa dang
198b7(mdo sde): ba'i chu 'thungs nas//skom pas gdungs pa skom pa med par 'gyur//de bzhin chos smra mkhas pa 'di dag kyang //chos kyi bdud rtsis srog chags sred pa sol//dge slong
199a1(mdo sde): mi bzung na ba 'di la yang //sha dang khrag ni bdag gis rab tu btang //chos smra ba ni mI dpal rab zhi ste//bdag gis sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i rim gro
199a2(mdo sde): bgyis//mang du thos shing spyod dang ldan pa ste//ting 'dzin dam pa 'di ni 'dzin pa la//'di ltar bdag gis rang gi sha btang bas//chos 'di rnams kyang bdag gis thob
199a3(mdo sde): par shog/ji ltar spos rab dri zhim yid 'ong ba//dus 'brang dang ni tsan+dan dmar po yi//dri dag phyogs bcu rnams su ldang ba ltar//chos spya dri yi dri yang de bzhin no//
199a4(mdo sde): ji ltar rI rab phyogs su rab snang zhing //kun nas mdzes pa mthong na dga' bar 'gyur//phyogs su rab tu snang zhing gsal bar bgyid//de bzhi ni chos smra 'di yang rwa rab
199a5(mdo sde): 'dra/ji ltar mchod rten la la zhig pa ni//skyes bu mkhas pa sra btsas shing srer bskyang s+ho//mchod rte ni de la dad par bgyid pa ni//dri ldang bsang ba de yang de yi t+ya//
199a6(mdo sde): de bzhin chos kyi mchod rten na ba yang //chos la gus par rang ki sha dang nI//khrag gis zug pa dag gis thar bar bgyis//dzam+bu'i gling du bdag gis mar me bltam//
199a7(mdo sde): dge slong 'di ni 'chi ba'i dus bgyis na//dzam+bu'i gling du ting 'dzin sgra yang ni//sems can rnams la rtag tu nub par 'gyur//'di gsos pas ni ting 'dzin rnams
199b1(mdo sde): nga 'job//dge slong 'di ni 'jig rten kun gyi skabs//'jig rten ldongs pa dag la mig nyin pa//'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang gti mug la//sman pa'i rgyal po chen po gso bar/
199b2(mdo sde): bgyid//chen por gyur par rtag tu sems gnas te//de yi spyod pa dag ni tshed mi rnyed//nges pa'i don dang tshig la shin tu bslabs//pha rol rgol ba kun gyis zil mi nan//chos
199b3(mdo sde): smra ba la rim gro mchog bgyis pas//bskal ba bye ba phrag ni stong du yang //bdag la phyir yang log ltung 'jigs ma mchis//bud med dngos por bdag ni phyis mi 'gyur//de
199b4(mdo sde): nis yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/gzhon nu de lta bas na shin tu dka' bar spyad pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpe'i chos
199b5(mdo sde): 'di thos nas chos sle ban pa la sman shin tu dkonu pas rim gro bya ba la brtson zhing bdag gi sha dang khrag gis kyang rim gror byas te/tha na sor mo gcig tsam sbyin pas kyang 'gro ba'i
199b6(mdo sde): chos kyi mchod rten la rim gro bya'o//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la sngon byung ba'i gtamo nges par bstan pa 'di rgya cher tshigs su bcad pa'i
199b7(mdo sde): dbyangs kyis yang dag par rab tu bstan to//gang gis pang+ge'i bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing //rin chen bkang nas 'dren la phul ba bas//gang gis rkang pa'i ser mo gcig byin
200a1(mdo sde): na//de bas bskyod nams mchog 'di bye brag 'phags//bu mo de ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas//sangs rgyas bye ba stong dag mthong bar gyur//kun gyi bstan
200a2(mdo sde): pa la yang rab byung nas//ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di rab tu bzung //rkang gnyis gra tsa ba de dag thams cad ni//yongs su mya ngan 'das pa phyi dus na//de ni rtag par rab
200a3(mdo sde): tu byung gyur te//bde gshegs sras mo kun nas nyon mongs med//mar me mdzad pa de bzhin gshegs pa yi//bstan pa la yang tshangs par spyad pa spyad//der yang bung
200a4(mdo sde): med dngos po bsgyur nas su//dri tshe de ni dge slong chos smrar gyur//rtag tu dam pa'i chos ni yongs 'dzin pa//mi dbang ye shes stobs ni byams pa yin//mar me mdzad
200a5(mdo sde): ni ches smra der gyur te//de tshang ni rgyal po'i bu mor gyur//lha mo ston gyi snag gi gnyen gyur pa//mi dbang ye shes stobs kyi phyir 'brang zhing //rgyal po'i rmi lam du yang
200a6(mdo sde): smon pa nI//mi 'khrugs spyad pa spyod tshe der gyur to//ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu 'dod pa'i phyir//g.yo sgyu thams cad yongs su spangs nas su//bdag gi sha dag dang
200a7(mdo sde): ni khrag gis kyang //chos sme ba la ngas kyang rim gro byas//dge slong na ba na chos gzir ba do//gang dag mthong nas de che dus po yang //phyir mi ldog par de dag ra
200b1(mdo sde): gyur te//log par ltung ba'i sar ni yod ma song //de dag rtag tu mig kyang na ba med//klad pa'i nad med rna ba'i nad med do//sna yi nad med lce ya nad kyang med//so yang na
200b2(mdo sde): bar nam yang ma gyur te//dge slong na ba de tshe sus bsnyen pa//de dag rtag tu kun nas mdzes par gyur//sum cu rtsa gnyis bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan//dpal dang gzi brjid
200b3(mdo sde): dag gis lus kyang 'bar//de dag nga yi bstan la rab byung nas//rab tu 'jig dus byang chub dam pa 'di//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyang bzung nas ni//sangs rgyas
200b4(mdo sde): bye ba stong dag mthong bar 'gyur//byang chub mchog 'di legs par bzung nas su//rtag tu ri mo byas shing bcad byas na//de dag skye dgu'i don chen byas nas ni//mi yod
200b5(mdo sde): po mi 'khrugs mthong bar 'gyur//de dag spyod pa bla med 'di thos nas//dga' ba zang zed med po 'phags pa 'thob//de dag bdag gi sngon spyad thos nas ni//sangs rgyas
200b6(mdo sde): ngag la mchod pa rgya cher byed//dge slong mkhas pa tshul khrims ldan mthong nas//g.yo med par ni rtag tu bsnyen par bya//zhe sdang tha ba dag kyang rnam spangs te//dge slong
200b7(mdo sde): chos smra rtag tu bsnyen par gyis//gnod sems khro ba dag kyang rnam spangs la//nga yi sras po chos skyong mchod par gyis//bskal pa bye ba mang por long ba dang //log
201a1(mdo sde): par ltung zhing sdug bsngal gyur ta re//gcig la du/cid kyang gnod sems byas na ni//de la tshul khrims thos pa skyob mi nus//bsam gtan mi skyob dgo/
201a2(mdo sde): gnas skyob mi nus//sbyin pa mi skyob sangs rgyas mchod pa min//ye shes ldan gyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o////de nas yang tshe dang ldan pa kun
201a3(mdo sde): dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrog pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga lwa ba de logs su thal mo sbya ra ba btud nas
201a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
201a5(mdo sde): pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
201a6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//de'i phyir kun dga'o bo bdag ka ston la 'dug la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang se rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod
201a7(mdo sde): pa dris shig dang dris pa de dang de lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la
201b1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to//zhus pa lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das bdag lta skabs pa'o//bde brla gshegs pa bdag la skabs bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dag

201b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpe'i spyad pa mtha' yas pa spyod pa dge lag pa bcad pa dang /rkang pa bcad pa dang rna ba bcad pa dang sna bcod pa dang /
201b4(mdo sde): mog dbyung ba dang mgo bcad pa dang lus bcad pa dang yan lag bcad par gyur/sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang myong bar gyur cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
201b5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang lags rkyen grang lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces
201b6(mdo sde): bka' stsal to//kun dga' bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yang dag par sgrub pa na/ngas sdug bsngalnga ji snyed myong bar grwar pa khyod kyis shes shing de dag dran
201b7(mdo sde): na ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems/kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na 'di la skyes bu la la zhig rkang po nas spyi ba'i bar du 'bar bar gyur te/rab tu
202a1(mdo sde): 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa de la skyes bu la la zhig der nye bar 'ongs te/'di skad du kye skyes bu tshur shog/lus la me 'bar ba ma zhi bar 'dod pa'i
202a2(mdo sde): yon tan lnga dang phrad cing ldan par rtses shig/dga' bar gyis shig/yongs su spyod cig ces zer na/kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/skyes bu de lus la me 'bar
202a3(mdo sde): ba ma zhi bar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang phrad cing ldan par gyur te rtse ba dang dga' ba dang yongs su spyod par byed dam/kun dga' bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags
202a4(mdo sde): so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/skyes bu de lus la me 'bar ba ma zhi bar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang phrad cing ldan par
202a5(mdo sde): gyur te rtse ba dang dga' ba dang yongs su spyod pa byed du zin kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sems can rnams ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal
202a6(mdo sde): par gyur cing dbul ba dag mthong nas yod bde ba 'am sems dga' ba ma byung ngo //kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sngon byang chubi sems
202a7(mdo sde): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na tshul khrims mnyams pa dang tshul khrims ma zhig pa dang tshul khrims 'dren ma ma yin pa dang /tshul khrims sra srer ma gyur pa dang /tshul khrims ma
202b1(mdo sde): 'bags pa drung tshul khrims ma g.yos pa dang tshul khrims ma glongs pa dang /tshul khrims ma 'khrugs pa dang tshul khrims mi yang ba dang tshul khrims gzhan la ston pa ma yin
202b2(mdo sde): pa dang tshul khrims mi slu ba dang tshul khrims drang ba dang tshul khrims dam bcas pa bzhin du byed pa dang /tshul khrims sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa yin te/de lta bu'i
202b3(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang ldan par 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po spyad pa mtha' yas pa spyod pa de dag ni lhag pa bcad pas yongs su nyams par
202b4(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/rkang pa bcad pas yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/rna ba bcad pa dang snga bcad pas yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/mig phyung ba dang mgo bcad pes yongs
202b5(mdo sde): su nyams par mi 'gyur/lus dang yan lag bcad pas yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyang mi myong la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
202b6(mdo sde): chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o///'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo//bam po bcu gnyis pa//kun dga' bo rlom
202b7(mdo sde): grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'dus pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/tshad med pa/bsam gyis mi khyab
203a1(mdo sde): pa//gzhal du med pa/mtshungs pa med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa
203a2(mdo sde): dang zhabs sde ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med po lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
203a3(mdo sde): 'das zin mo che'i pad+ma'i zla ba rnam par dag pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //yang de'i tshe de'i dus na rin po che'i pad+ma'i zla ba rnam par dag pa
203a4(mdo sde): mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'i tshang ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu btsun dgur gyur
203a5(mdo sde): nyi ma thams cad la nyin ro zhing yang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dgu sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog pa lu spyong ngo //rab dri bkod cing yongs
203a6(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das nas sems can grangs mod dpag tu meng po rnams zag pa zad pa dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod do//rab tu bkod cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das
203a7(mdo sde): sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod de yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to//kun
203b1(mdo sde): 'do lan sa ldan 'das rin pa che ba'i zla zla rnam par dag pa ma na par 'phags pa'i/la spyod bzhin gshogang pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyud de yangs
203b2(mdo sde): mya na las 'das na sa lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i rjes nu par 'gyur ba'i dus te che dam pa'i chos rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba na/kun dkar /la ba dpa' bas byin zhes bya
203b3(mdo sde): t+yA ste/rgyal bye dpa'i bas byin de la btsud pa'i khor ni brang med pa tung zhi nga ni spyong yod do//bu bo ni stong yod do//bu mon lnga brgya yod do//de'i tshe de'i dus no rgyal po dpa'
203b4(mdo sde): bas byin ma rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldani zhes bya ba langs shing rgya chel spro ba na yod pa/stegs bu dang sgo gang dang rta babs dang skor khung dang bu shu dang khyad pa dge bang
203b5(mdo sde): brtsegs pa dang /skyed mas tshul gyis brgyan cing rnam par bkra ba/bstan stug pa/lha'i ga nas shin snang ba/sems can grangs med dpag tu myong pa'i gnas su gyur pa
203b6(mdo sde): dang //kun dga' 'di'i ched de 'i'adus ni mdo sde 'di lta ba dge ni skye bo bas skyed cing skye me pos sang sa te/skye mang po mi 'bred cing sgribo meng blos pa lam gyur /
203b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa chen po mi bzang ba'i dus su myur du/gtso pa mi ni chang ces pa'i rjes kyi checher mo 'bab pa sa kyi kyi/dus me yin par char 'i bab pa'i dus kyis//
204a1(mdo sde): skyugs can gyi gsang sngags yongs su 'tshal ba'i dus kyi tshe/sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus kyiH/byang chub sems dpa' bdun skyong grong dang
204a2(mdo sde): khyir dgrang rdal dang yet+pal khor dang rtul ba'i po dwa 'dzor dang ljongs nas bskod nas de dag chos sgrub me tog d+ha mdzes dang lhan cog kun tu bzung po zhes bya'i nags kyad
204a3(mdo sde): gnas te dge slong de dag la gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di stan/kun dga' bon gis khrod de ring dus thams cad du snang ba'i me tog sna tshogs dang /snyam dang
204a4(mdo sde): khri shing dang 'bras bu dag dang ldan pa/dpag bsam gyi shing dang 'dra ba/shrI ste tshogs kyis gang phreng ba'i gzhi'ang gzugs dengade kha dog du ma dngas bon dang myu gu thams cad
204a5(mdo sde): kyis brgyad pa/brag dang rdo ba skye tshogs mdzes shing dri ma med pa/yangs shing mtho ba dang gser gyi ri dag gis mdzes par byas shing sdug po/grub pa'i rig sdigs 'chang
204a6(mdo sde): dang dri zi'am skyes bu'am phreng srong dang ming maca dag gnas pa/byad gzugs dang kha dag che zhing rnam pa sna tshogs mang po gnas pa/sangs rgyas du mi bzhugs bzhugs pa/
204b1(mdo sde): /ka'atshab dang 'dra ba kun tu bzang zhing rnal 'byor dang mthun pa'i nags tshal dam pa kun tu bzang po de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson zhing gnas par gyur to//
204b2(mdo sde): kun dga' ba chos spyi ba~M me tog zla mdze sa dri gcig pu dben par song nAs/nang du yang dag 'jo ga la zhugs te/lha'i mig rnam par drug pa mi'i las 'das pas bltas ma/
204b3(mdo sde): rlung sems dpa' khrag khrig mang po dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nus 'drir skyes te/de dag gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa rnyed na ni bla na mod
204b4(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur//gal te gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa ma rnyed na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
204b5(mdo sde): las phyir ldog pa dag mthong ngo //de nas chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes dran zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de lngas langs nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po ga la yod pa der
204b6(mdo sde): song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu dag kho bo ni 'gro'o//grong dang grong khyer drang grong 'dab dang ljongs dang yul 'khor
204b7(mdo sde): dmyal ba'i 'bring 'dus la sems can rnams lachis bstan par bya/nas bya rgyas sa 'i tshogs kyi pa ngog gis du rjes la 'dzi
205a1(mdo sde): ces smras so//khyod nags khyod 'di nas grong dang grong khyer dang grod 'dab dang ljongs dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'gro ba ni kho bo cag 'dod pa ma
205a2(mdo sde): yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe ni//dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma lhag pa'i nga rgyal can mang po dmo pa'i chos spong ba dag byung ba'i dus la bab kyis/de dag
205a3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa'i srog gcod par gyur na ma legs so//tshe dang ldan pa ni shin tu mdzes shing byad bzhin bzong la blta na sdug ste/dang po'i lang tsho dang ldan zhing /na chod darA la bab
205a4(mdo sde): ste/mdog ni gser bcom bzang po 'dra/dpral ba ni dung dang zla ba dang me tog kun+da'i kha dog lta bu'i mdzod spus puN+ya nau/sgra dang gtsug tor ni mthon mthong la lcang lor 'khyil ba
205a5(mdo sde): yin pas rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i blon po'am/de dang 'dra ba gzhan dag kyang phrag dog dang 'jungs pas non po'i sems kyis khyod kyi srog bcad na ma legs so//de nas chos
205a6(mdo sde): smra ba me tog zla mdzes kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la 'di skad du gal te kho bos bdag nyid bsrung ba byas na kho bos 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i
205a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa bsrung bar mi 'gyur ro//zhes zer nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'odi dag smras so//bdag tu 'du shes 'di la gnas nas
205b1(mdo sde): subastan pa 'di la bsrung bar yang mi nus//mi bzad phyi dus bde bar gshegs pa so//byang chub bstan pa kod pa chen po yin//gang gis bdag tu 'du shes kun spang pa shi //
205b2(mdo sde): snyoms can 'di dang gang zag smra gnas dang //gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro rnams dang //rog pa spong ba de ni bstan pa bzung //brtul pa bye ba gat+taM phyi snyed du//deng ba'i sems
205b3(mdo sde): kyi zas dang rlom rnams dang //gdugs dang ba dun mer me'i phreng ba yis//sangs rgyu bye khrag/khrig rim gro byas//gang gis dam chos rab tu 'jig pa dang //bdeg shugs
205b4(mdo sde): brtan pa 'gag par 'gyur pa'i tshe/nyon mtshan du ni bslab pa gcig stod pa//bsod nam pa 'don dpas bye brag 'jogs//skyes bla g+ha mchog gi ni dam pa'i chos//'dzin pa
205b5(mdo sde): 'gyur tshe gang dag btang snyoms sgom//de yis rgyal ba bkur sti byas mi yin//'dren pa dag la ri mur de so ma byas//khyed 'di rang gi don gyis la//bdag nyid rab tu bsrung bar
205b6(mdo sde): gyis//khyed ni rtag tu byams gnas shing //'dul ba 'dri la bgro yod kyis//ma 'dres dag gtsang dri med pa//tshul khrims dang por bsrung bar gyis//gang gis tshul khrims dri
205b7(mdo sde): ma med//sangs rgyas bsngags pa bsrungs pa ni//de yis ji snyed sngon byung ba//bde gshegs thams cad ri mi byas//de yis thams cad bskyabs pa yin//skye bo'i tshogs
206a1(mdo sde): rnams du chub bgad//drod kyisangs rgyas drug gros pastod pa ma//ral smoms thos yod pasas pasmra snag//de dag gis ni sems can mad yang /
206a2(mdo sde): sems can dan lta ba dang ni sdig las drung sa//chos mchog rin chen sbyin pa sbyin par gyis//bzod byu dag kyang rtag tu bskrad kyis la//dgun par gnas shing ting 'dzin ma sa
206a3(mdo sde): pa dang //'jam zhing mnyen pa dag kyang bsgom par smra ste//rnam pa kun tu rtsod pa mi byed par//spyad pa zhi rjeg 'di la rnam par spod//bdug ni sems can rnams kyang bskyab pa'i
206a4(mdo sde): phyir//grong dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'gro bar bya//blo gros che 'chang sems chen dam po'i mchog/drang srong de ni 'gro bar byas pa dang //kha cig nang pa la yang 'ju bar byed//hrI
206a5(mdo sde): rdzo bar yang du shong mchi ma zag/mkhas pa blu gas chen po ma bzhud par//sgra 'jam yid du 'ong zhi mdzes pa yi//zhing 'di rnams la gzigs shing rtag pa mdzad//bdag
206a6(mdo sde): nyid bsrung ba mdzad la ma bzhud cig/sngon gyi stobs bcu 'dun pa de dag kyang //dbang po ni zhing shin tu nges pa rnams//nags tshal brag dang ro yi tsir gshegs nas/
206a7(mdo sde): byang chub dam pa dag ni thugs su chud//byang chub rgyur yang spyod pa dam pa spyad//de dag bsod nams ye shes mchog dang ldan//de dag rjes slobs nags khrod gnas
206b1(mdo sde): par mdzod//brtul zhugs bzang po 'di nas ma bzhud cig/lus ni shin+da tu mdzes pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan//khyod kyi sgra yang mthon mthing kha dog ste//gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra 'od
206b2(mdo sde): byed pa//sa 'di kun kyang rab tu snang bar gyur//khyod kyi mdzodzad spu bzhin gyi smin mtshams na//shin tu mdzes pa drung dang 'dra ba'i 'od//rgyal po dag kyang de bzhin srid kyi phyir//drug
206b3(mdo sde): dog bskyed nas khyod kyi lus bshig 'gyur//de nas chos smra ba me tig zla mdzes kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dril tshigs su bcod pas smras pa/ji snyed sngon gyi bde
206b4(mdo sde): gshegs byung po ni//thams cad mkhyen cing zag pa zad pa rnams//de dag thamaso cad 'jig rten don mdzad de//srid pa gsum du byang chub dam pa rtogs//spyad pa'i dam
206b5(mdo sde): pa byang chub rgyu spyad de//de dag bsod noms ye shes mchog dang ldan//de yi rjes bslabs byang chub sems dpa' yang //sems can khrug khrig rnams kyi skyabs byed 'dod//drang
206b6(mdo sde): srong mkhas pa kun gyis bskor byas te//rkang pa la yang phyag 'tshal shugs phyung nas//mi bzang snying rje bar ni sgra 'byin cing //nyam thag mi bde tsha nges 'debs par byed//kha cig
206b7(mdo sde): rab tu 'gyel cing brgyal nas su//sa la lhung ba rtsal bcad 'gyel bzhin//'on kyang drang srong sems can don 'dod pa//bsod nams bsags pas de las phyir ma log
207a1(mdo sde): drang srong chos gos lhung bzed thogs nas chas//ji ltar seng ge ral pa can dag bzhin//de ni chos kyi rang bzhin gnas byas na//de la yon tan nyes par
207a2(mdo sde): bya ba med//'jig rten 'di na nags khrod bdug gnas pas//sems can ngan song song na ma legs zhes//de ni sems can bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir//grong khyer po drang
207a3(mdo sde): mchog tu song bar gyur//de nas chos sme ba me tog zla mdzes grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang ljongs dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongasu nas sems can rnamos la chos

207a5(mdo sde): rgyapo'i pho brang der ma phyin pas dri mthar gyis rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan pa der phyin pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan pa der nye bar song ste/shing brag sha
207a6(mdo sde): dang sA la'i drung du 'dug go/de de'i nub mo 'das pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs par gyur te/zhugs nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag sum cu rtsa drug
207a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog par bkod kyang de dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so//de zas gcod pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin tshon ldan nas byung ste/bcom ldan
207b1(mdo sde): 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song ste/'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so//de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro gnyis pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen
207b2(mdo sde): ldan du zhugs nas srog chags bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa gsum sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog par bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so//de zas gnyis pa gcad pa bcad nas rgyal
207b3(mdo sde): po'i pho dang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song ste/'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so//de de'i nub mo
207b4(mdo sde): 'das nas de snga dro gsum pa le rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas srog chags bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu sangs rgyas kyi chos la so phyir mi ldog par bkod
207b5(mdo sde): de dung rdzas kyi bye ba ma byas so//de zas gsum pa gcad pa bcad na sa rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin tshon ldan nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod
207b6(mdo sde): pa der song nas 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so//de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro bzhi pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas srog chags bye ba khrag
207b7(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so//de zas bzhi pa gcad pa bcad
208a1(mdo sde): nas rgyal ba'i pho brang la bar rin chen ldan nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi son ma mchod rten gang na yod pa d+mar song nas 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das
208a2(mdo sde): bar byas so//de de'i nub mo 'das nas des dril pa la btsun pa'i 'khor gyi nang du song nas zung med rgyad kyi blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las byor mi ldog par
208a3(mdo sde): god do//gleng khyer de nas kyang sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog bor bkad ded dung zas kyi bye ma
208a4(mdo sde): byas so//de mo lnga zas gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song na
208a5(mdo sde): 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so//de de'i nub mo 'das nas de ste ng+ge drug pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas rgyal po'i bu stong bla na med pa
208a6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod de de dung zas kyi byeb ma byas so//de nyi me drug zas gcad pa de ci nas rgyal ba'i pho blang 'khor rin chen ldan
208a7(mdo sde): nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas 'greng bzhin du nyon mtshan 'das par byas so//de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga de 'dun
208b1(mdo sde): pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs pa dang rgyal po dpa' bras byin skyeng myos tshal du 'gro ba mthong ste/gser gyi shIng rta la ngos ni dngul mda' ni sbrul gyi snying po'i tsan+dan//
208b2(mdo sde): 'khor lo ni bai DUr+ya/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba dang rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/shing rta'i mda' la dar gyis dkris shing ris bcos bu phyags
208b3(mdo sde): kyis g.yogs po daM bu mo gzhon nu brgyad brgyas rin po che'i tha gus btags shing 'dren te/de dag byad bzhin bzang zhing mdzes pa/blta na sdug pa/kha dog bzang po rgyas pa'i
208b4(mdo sde): mchog dang ldan pa/byis pa rnams dga' bar byed cing tshim par byed pa ste/mkhas pa rnams la ni ma yin no//rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang
208b5(mdo sde): zhabs 'bring mtho dman du 'gro'o//bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang zhabs 'bring mtho dman du 'gro'o//khyim badrag shing sA la chen po lta bu brgyad khri
208b6(mdo sde): bzhi stong yeng zhabs 'bring mtho dman du 'gro'o//rgyal po'i bu mo lnga brgya'ang reni po che'i khyogs kyi nang bzhugs N+Da saM mdu ni thog thag tu 'gro ste/de dag gis dge slong de mthong ma
208b7(mdo sde): thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//btsun mo'i 'khor brgya sto phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyang dge slong de mthong ma thag tu bla na med pa yang
209a1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//skye bar tshogs chen po de dag kyang nor bu dang bdu bu rnams bkrol te lham rnams bzhag nas bla
209a2(mdo sde): gos phrag pa gcig tu gzur ti dus mo g.yos pa'i lha ngos la btsugs nas/dge slong dag la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyaga'i tshe la zhing 'khod do//de nas bur gzhon
209a3(mdo sde): de dag kyang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul bas khyogs de dag las babs nas nor bu dang gdu bu dag bkrol te lha ma rnams bzhag nas bu gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus
209a4(mdo sde): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas dge slong de ga lo ba de logs su thal mo sbar te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//dge slong 'di ni byon pa'i tshe//nyi ma lta bur thams
209a5(mdo sde): cad du//'di dag rab tu snang bar bgyis//skye bo'i tshogs kyang 'dun par gyur//'dod chags zhe sdang rgyun bcid cing //gti mug dag kyang bsal bar gyur//de tshe zhe sdang
209a6(mdo sde): khro bro drang //phrag dog thams cad bcad par gyur//rgyal po dpa' bas byin pa yi//zhabs 'bring sras la sogs pa yang //su yang rgyal po mi lta ste//su yang nabs
209a7(mdo sde): 'bring mi bgyid do//ji ltar zla ba nyi ba ni//skar ma dag gis bskor ba bzhin//rgyal po'i bu yis me dun bdar bas//dge slong 'di yang mdzes par gyur//ji ltar gser
209b1(mdo sde): gzugs ri mo dag/mkhas pas ri mor bris pa dang //sA la'i rgyal po rgyas pa ltar//de bzhin dge slong mdzes par gyur//mthu chen brgya byin lha yi dbang po ni//grong khyer
209b2(mdo sde): 'jig pa bdag po mgre stong ldan//ri rab spyil sum cu rtsa gsum dbang //de bzhin dge slong byon pa 'di yang mdzes//tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs pa gnas pa 'dra//reb 'phrul
209b3(mdo sde): lha yi bu ni lha dbang bzhin//'dod khams 'thab bral mchog gi lha bzhin du//dge slong byon pa 'di yang de bzhin mdzes//nyi ma bzhin du bar snang lhan ner bgyis//'od zer
209b4(mdo sde): stong ldan mun nag rab tu sel//phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyid pa ltar//de bzhin dge slong byon pa mdzes par gyur//bskal pa mtha' yas rgya cher sbyin pa byin//tshul khrims
209b5(mdo sde): ma 'dres rtag tu bsrung ba bgyis//bzod pa mtshungs med 'jig rten kun tu bsgoms//de ni mtshon gyis brgyan cing 'di ltar mdzes//'phags pa'i skyo bos rab bstod brtson
209b6(mdo sde): 'grus bskyed//bsam gtan bzhi yang zhum med sems kyis bsnyen//nyon mongs dra ba bsal cing shes rab bskyed//de phyir dge slong 'jig rten kun tu gda'//sangs
209b7(mdo sde): rgyas bstan pa mtshungs med sems can snying po ste//dpa' bo 'das pas chos mchog dag kyang rab tu bshad//mo 'ongs dus dang de bzhin da ltar byung ba yi//chos kyi rgyal po
210a1(mdo sde): dbang brnyes rnams kyi sras de lags//dge slong khyod ni mi rtag nam yang ma gyur cig/gzugs ni 'di ltar 'jig rten kun na rab tu lhan//gzi brjid
210a2(mdo sde): che zhing dbyangs sgra shin tu snyan par gda'//rgyal po'i gzi brjid shin tu lham me snang mi bgyid//chos 'di ji ltar khyod bdag nyid kyis rlab rtogs shing //sangs rgyas dag
210a3(mdo sde): gis bko' stsal 'jig rten kun tu rgyu//de bzhin bdag cag bud med dngos po kun spangs te//bdag cag thams cad dge slong 'di bzhin 'gyur bar bgyi//de dag thams
210a4(mdo sde): cad sor bcu thal mo sbyar byas nas//tshigs bcad 'di dag smras te gos rnams 'thor bar byed//gser gyi phreng ba dang ni rin chen do shal dang //rna ba'i rgyan dang mgul gyi rgyun
210a5(mdo sde): dag rnam mang 'thor//ji ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge/stobs ldan sa 'di kun la rnam par lta//sras su 'du shes dag ni nye bar 'jog/gling rnams bzhi po 'di
210a6(mdo sde): dag kun tu 'gro/rgyal rigs dang ni tshong dponi dam zla dang //khyim bdag mkhar gyi rgyal po bad+mak+ShAM ki mri//de dge gcig la lhag par sdug pa med//thams cad la yang byams
210a7(mdo sde): pa mnyam par bskyed//de bzhin dge slong nges pa 'di yang ni//gzungs dang dbang rnams la ni shin tu bslabs//byang chub yan lag stobs dang dbang po dang //yan
210b1(mdo sde): lag brgyad ldan lam yang rnam par 'byed//mtshan mo zla ba skar tshogs dbus na yang //ji ltar rab tu mdzes par snang ba bzhin//ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba'i tshe//
210b2(mdo sde): gzi brjid ldan zhing rnam par snang bgyi de bzhin//dbang po zhi zhing stobs bcu ldan pa yi//sangs rgyas nges pa kun la phyag 'tshal lo//de dag gis ni bsngags pa bskal pa brgyas//
210b3(mdo sde): zad par byed nus skyes bu su yang med//bskal pa ba ba stong phrag mang por ni//yon tan brjod kyang zad pa yong med de//'jig rten rab mchog gi ni sra gcig kyang //bsngags
210b4(mdo sde): pa dag ni zad par mi 'gyur ro//des ni mtshungs maud 'khor lo rab tu bskor//ye shes dag gi gnas kyang shin tu bstan//zhib cing rdul bral chos rnams bshad pa mdzad//
210b5(mdo sde): de ni gung na'ang snang bar 'gyur ba med//dge sbyong dang ni bram ze lha dang klu//lha min bdud dang tshangs par bcas la sogs//sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan gyis//
210b6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho dag ni zad par yong mi nus//gang gis thugs sras 'di 'dra mnga' ba yi//sman rgyal mtshungs med rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo//tshigs bcad 'di dag smras nas de yi
210b7(mdo sde): tshe//rgyal po'i bu mo gzhon nu thams cadat+pa dga'//gseN+Da dang gser phyi dag kyang 'thor bor+ya byed//gos rnams kyang nI rab tu 'ding bar byed//gtsug gi nir bu do shal
211a1(mdo sde): mdzes pa dang /den pang bye phrag ni ban+d+ha bas//dge sbyong de la mngon par g.yogs nas no//dUSh+Tha nas byung chub d+hi yang rab tu zhugs/danas
211a2(mdo sde): rgyal po dpa'i ngaso byin 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma btsu ni mo'i 'khor 'di dag na log par zhugs te skye bo'i tshigs kyang log go snyam mo//skye bo de dag kyang nor bu dang gdu bu
211a3(mdo sde): bkrol lham bzhag nas gos phyag pa gcig tu bgos tAM/pus mo grayas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas dge slong dre gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas phyag btsal to//drag
211a4(mdo sde): slong de byed gzugs bzang ba tsam du rgyal po dnga' bas byin byang bzhin mi bzang /de tsam du blta na sdug pa ma yin/de tsam du mdzes pa ma yin te/de rgyal po'i srid
211a5(mdo sde): kyi phyir shin tu spangs par gyur to//dge slong de'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa mthong nas shin tu khros so//dge slong de rgyal po'i lam na 'dug pa'i mig tu rdul song
211a6(mdo sde): ba dang de 'di snyam du sems te/dge slong 'dis chags pa'i sems kyis nga'i btsun mo'i 'khor la bltas te/'dis mig gis kyang brda byas so//de 'di snyam du sems te/
211a7(mdo sde): de dge slong 'di la srog gcod par byed pa su yod snyam mo//de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyi zhabs 'bring du bu stong 'brang ba de dag bos nos gzhon nu dag dge slong 'di srog dang
211b1(mdo sde): phrol cig ces byas na/gzhon nu de dag rgyal po dpa' bas byin la slar zlog go//dge slong de'i phyir de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi bu dag rkang bka' mi nyan te/bdag gcig pu
211b2(mdo sde): gnyis su med por bzhag na dge slong 'di srog dang bral bar byed pa su yod snyam mo//de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin la gsod pa'i gshed ma dga' byed ces bya ba gtum po btsam pa med
211b3(mdo sde): pa ma rungs pa zhig yod pa dri rgyal po'i lam na rgyal po dpa'i bas byin dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug go//rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis de mthong nas dga' mgu yi rangs te/rab
211b4(mdo sde): tu dga' ba dang mos pa dang yid bde ba skyes nas de sems 'di snyam du sems te/dka' byed 'dis dge slong 'di srog dang dpral bar byed snyam mo//de nas gsod pa'i gshed ma dga'
211b5(mdo sde): byed rgyal po dpa' bas byin gang na 'dug pa der 'ongs pa dang dga' byed la 'di skad ces smos so//khyod bye dga' tshar sbyin na dga' byed khyod dge slong 'di srog dang bral bar byed nus
211b6(mdo sde): som/dga' byed kyis smras pa/lha shin tu rngo thog glo bka' bzhini 'tshal/de dge slong 'di srog dang dpral bar 'tshal lo//rgyal pos smras pa/dga' byed de'i phyir de'i dus
211b7(mdo sde): la bab par shes ni mtshan rnon po thogs la dge slong 'di'i lag pa dang rkang pa chod cig/rna ba dang sna'ang chod cig/'dis tshogs pa'i sems kyis nga'i btsun mo'i 'khor
212a1(mdo sde): la bltas kyis de'i phyir 'di'i mig kyang skam pas phyung zhig ces byas so//de nas gsod pa'i gshed ma dga' byed kyis de'i tshe ral gri rnon po thogs nas
212a2(mdo sde): dge slong dri'i lag pa dang rkang pa bcad do//rna ba dang sna'ang bcad do//mig ga nyis kyang phyung ngo //de nas dge slong de'i mgo dang rno ba dang rkang lag bcad pa las 'od zer bye
212a3(mdo sde): ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'ang byung /'o ma'i rgyun du ma'ang byung ste/phyogs bcur bskor nas slar yang dge slong de'i lus kyi nang du nub bo//bcad cing gtubs pa'i 'phro
212a4(mdo sde): nas dpal be'u dang bkra shis dang 'khor lo la sogs pa nang nas byung ste skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kun tu snang ngo //de nas rgyal po de skye bo'i tshogs chen po
212a5(mdo sde): dang dong nas skye de'i tshogs chen po des dge slong de lam na bcad gtubaso shing 'dug pa mthong nas/de dag sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ngo mtshar du gyur nas ngu zhing
212a6(mdo sde): cho nges btab ste smre sngags bton nas phyir yang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan par song ngo //de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin zhag bdun 'das pa dang skyed mos tshal
212a7(mdo sde): mchog na 'dug pa mi dga'o/mi rtsi yongs su mi spyod de/skyed mos tshal nas de logs nas zhag bdun 'das pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldon du zhugs pa
212b1(mdo sde): dang des dge slong de rgyal po'i lam du bor ba shi nas zhag bdun lon yang lus kyi mdog ma gyur pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/dge slong 'di'i lus kyi mdog ma gyur pa
212b2(mdo sde): las bltas ni dge slong 'di ni gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin te/bdag gis sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur
212b3(mdo sde): ba'i sdig pa'i las byas kyis bdag ni myur du sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes de de ltar sems pa na/steng gri bar snang las lha'i bu brgyad khris skra skad dbyangs
212b4(mdo sde): gcig tu smras pa/rgyal po chen po 'di ni de bzhin te/khyod ji skad zer ba ltar dge slong 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no zhes zer
212b5(mdo sde): ro//bAr snad las lha dag gi sgra thos nas de shin tu 'jigs shing skrag nas bag tsha zhing spu zing zhes byed de 'gyod par gyur to//de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin sdug bsngal zhing
212b6(mdo sde): yid mi bde ste 'gyod par gyur pas de'i tshe cho nges cher btab nus tshig 'di skad zer ro//rgyal po'i sring dang rgyal po'i pho brang dang //nor bu rin chen mu tig gser dbyig spang //
212b7(mdo sde): bdag nyid mtshon thogs bdag nyid 'chi bar bya//bdag ni byis pa'i blo can las ngan ldan//dge slong me tog zla mdzes 'dir byung ba//sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos te/
213a1(mdo sde): snang bar byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang 'ongs//zla ba nya tshe skar ma'i rgyal po bzhin//'dod pa'i longs spyod ngan pas bdag bkrugs te//rab tu dga' bar bud med
213a2(mdo sde): tshogs rnams dang //shing rta'i nang du zhugs te de nas dong //rgyal rigs rnams kyis yongs su 'khor bar bskor//dge slong dri mchog mig bzang 'di nyid ni//'dir dbyon
213a3(mdo sde): dge slong de'ang mthong nas su//bud med tshogs rnams rab tu dgar gyur cing //mos pa skyes nas gser gyi phreng ba gtor//thams cad sor bcu'i thal ma sbyar byas
213a4(mdo sde): nas//tshigs bcad dbyangs kyis dge slong de la bstod//rgyal po yi ni klu yi dbyangs sku rnams//de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur//de yang shing rta'i nang du zhugs
213a5(mdo sde): nas ni//rgyal rigs rnams kyis yongs su bskor bar gyur//bde bar gshegs pa'i sras mchog mthu che ba//dge slong dri mchog mig bzang 'dir byon na//bdag gi
213a6(mdo sde): sems ni rab tu ngan gyur te//dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'jug pa'i tshe//bud med tshogs chen dga' bar lha mthong nas//rmongs pas de la phrag dag khro ba bskyed/
213a7(mdo sde): phyogs bzhi kun tu snang bar bgyis pa ni//zla ba sgra gnan zin thar mdzes pa bzhin//dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'jug mthong nas//bud med tshegs rnams dga' zhing
213b1(mdo sde): sgra yang 'byin//bdag gis der ni gtum pa'i tshig smras te//bu stod dag la de nyid khyod song la//dge slong 'di ni dum bu dum bur gyis//'di ni nga yi dgra mchog ma rungs pa//
213b2(mdo sde): gzhon nu thams cad mnyan zhing tshul ldan te//bdag la phan sems dge slong de la 'dud//rgyal po 'di 'dra'i bka' bzhin bgyir mi rung //de tshe bdag ni mya ngan non par gyur//
213b3(mdo sde): dge slong shin tu tshul khrims mchog ldan pa//byams ldan pa bzhin zhugs pa mthong nas ni//shin tu gtum pa'i sems kyis gsod du btang //phyi dus bdag ni lhung
213b4(mdo sde): nas mnar med sreg/dga' byed de ni rgyal po'i lamo 'dir gnas//ma rungs las bgyid mi la sdug bsngal skyed//bdag gi bka' bzhin de 'drar des bgyis te//me tog
213b5(mdo sde): phreng ba rgyas 'dra ba'i dge slong gtubs//nags mchog kun tu bzang po dga' ba na//bya yis gling zhing me tog dri zhim rgyas//de ni dge slong tshogs gzhan rab mang ba//bu
213b6(mdo sde): gcig po ni ma dang bral ba bzhin//dge slong bzhengs la nags su gnas par mdzod//mi yi don kyang shin tu rgya cher bgyis//rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir byon pa'i tshe//
213b7(mdo sde): dge slong shin tu snying rjer ngu zhing 'tshol//lag pa g.yas pas me tog rgyal mtshan thogs//g.yon pa yis kyang bsta sdug mdzeg pa gzhan//lam yang spangs shing gos
214a1(mdo sde): kyis khebs par g.yogs//dge slong bzhungs la chos mchog bshad pa mdzod//rgyal po'i khyab 'dir khyod zhugs ring lon kyang //dge slong rab tu snang
214a2(mdo sde): rjerdzing ngu zhing 'tshol//rgyal ba mchog gi bstan pa 'jig pa'i tshe//khyod kyi srog gi bar chad 'gyur du dogs//ji ltar skyes bu mthu chen la la dag/phyogs dang phyogs
214a3(mdo sde): mtshams rtag tu sgra grags pa//srid gsum 'di kun thams cad zil mnan nasaM//g.yangs chen po mchongs te sar lhung lhur//de bzhin dge slong mtshan mchog rab
214a4(mdo sde): brgyan pa//byad bzhin bzang po so 'dir 'gyel bar gyur//me tog zla mdzes zhe sdang gtum med pa//bdag gis sdig pa'i sems kyis dum+b+ha bur brlags//me tog
214a5(mdo sde): zla mdzes bkrongs nas sar lhung ba//chos smre 'di ni mthong nas myur bar yang //dge slong thams cad sdug bsngal gzer gyur te//mi dga' skyes 'gyur de bzhin sems
214a6(mdo sde): mi bde//me tog bla mdzes ri yi rgyal po ltar//sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos te//phreng ba brgyas pa bud med thogs pa 'dra//'dir ni dum bu dum bur rnam par
214a7(mdo sde): bcang //bdag gis dngos sdig shin tu mi bzad bgyis//mgon med mnar med gshin rje'i yul du mchi//'dir yang dge slong dum bur brlags pa yis//bdag ni
214b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams dang ring bas ring //bdag gis shin tu las ngan bgyis pas na/khwa dang gnyen pa shes phyogs rnams sbubs mi 'gyur//blon blo dang ni zhabs 'ding brlabs
214b2(mdo sde): pa yang //de dag dmyal bar bdag song skyabs myi 'gyur//spangs rgyas 'das dang de ban ni mkhyen dang //phyogs bcu dgin gang su bzhugs pa yi//ded dpon bas bcu
214b3(mdo sde): nyon mongs med pa rnams//rdo rje stug sra skum du'i skyabs su mchi//der ni dge slong dum bur byas mthong nas//lha rnams rab tu snying rje tshangs 'debs//de dag der song dge
214b4(mdo sde): 'dun go bar byas//me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khob 'dir bsad//chos smra ba ni mkhas shing rtogs pa de//mthu chen phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rab tu grags//byang chub
214b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' gzungs la gnas pa de//me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad//bskul pa mtha' yas sbyin pa sna tshogs byin//tshul khrims mi g.yo skyon med gang srung
214b6(mdo sde): zhing //'jig rten kun tu mtshungs med bzod skyom pa//me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad//bsgral pa mtha' yas rtog tu brtson ldan zhing //zhu mo med sems kyis
214b7(mdo sde): rasam gtan bzhi la sgom//nyon mongs 'joms pa'i shes rab gang bsten pa//me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad//lus la phongs pa thams cad rab spangs
215a1(mdo sde): // ga chags smra na // //rnas pa smranas/ na du rlo /

215a3(mdo sde): ngo'i khab 'ongs nas/dge sbyong dum bu dus bur gyis mthong ste//nya sa thig skad kyis mI brdud mengs 'dubs//de dgra rnams ca ba la rnaMs sa la 'tshal//
215a4(mdo sde): dge 'dun rtul pa de la sku/la khrim kyi sbyin modo shin tu bsnams pa me//dge sbyong 'dis ni nyes pa ci na ga ng+gAs//'di ni sbyin gyi sgrib bas ma yas dran/
215a5(mdo sde): shes gzungs dbang pa la phyin//'do na 'dus byas 'di dge sbyong bar shes/'dri ni 'phye ba dag la mtshan med ston//'di ni sprin lam 'du shes thams cad pang /
215a6(mdo sde): 'di ni yid 'ong snyan pa'i smad pod+mos 'byin//'di ni des shing dbang po rab tu ni//'di ni sngon gyi glanas kyi pha rol phyin//'jig rten thams cad las kyang mngon par 'phags
215a7(mdo sde): 'di ni sangs rgyas rang byung ye shes kyis//khyu mchog gyur cing 'jig rten ri mor byas//dag cing rab rib med po'i mig gis lha//byams pa d+mang ni snying rje sbyin tu//'ad
215b1(mdo sde): pa ngan cing gtsog la sdug bsngal bskyod//mtho rIs rnam par ma rung byed pa ste//'dod pa bsnyen na na pa meng+ga par 'gyur//mi dag shes rab dang yang bral bar 'gyur//mau rnams
215b2(mdo sde): 'dod pa dag ni bsnyen byas na//ltung bar 'gyurany+tsi pha dang ma yang gastod//'dod pa bsten byas tshul khrims ldan pa gsod//de bas mi yis 'dod pa rnam par spang //rgyal
215b3(mdo sde): pos 'dod pa dag ni bstan byas na//s+ya bdag tu ts+tsha pa 'byor pa 'di nasau//mi bzang sdig bsngal chub byed sems dmyal nas//sems can dmyal ba 'jigs pa chen po
215b4(mdo sde): 'gro//'di 'drir dge slong mkhas pa gsod byed so//sdig pa'i las rnams rtag tu byed par 'gyur//dri phyir byang chub zhi ba su 'dod pa//sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs spang bar
215b5(mdo sde): bya//lus ni sgyu ma gsog dang 'dra ba dang //de bzhin rnamig sna lce nig nas ni//gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dro mchog dang //reg bya chos rnams zhum med sems kyis gtong //
215b6(mdo sde): sprin la bslabs shing tshul khrims mnyam pa med//bzod pa dang ni brtson 'grus de bzhin te//bsam gtan sten cing shes rab pha rol song //sems can dag gi don kyang
215b7(mdo sde): rab tu byed//'jig rten lha dang mir bcas thams cad kyang //byams pas rgyal ba la ni rab tu lta//de phyir mig ni mun gnag gtibs gyur kyang //byang chub zhi pa nyid ni
216a1(mdo sde): /'tshang rgya 'gyur//rta dang bal grang yang thogs khri rnams dang //khyogs dang sngas rnams kyang ni de bzhin te//glang po dag dang bzhon dang dgal ba dang //grong dang
216a2(mdo sde): yul 'khor dga' ba gtong bar byed//grong khyer dang ni rgyal srid yongs gtong zhing //gser dang dngul dang shel dang byu ru dang //de bzhin gnas dang bu dang bu mo dang //rang gi
216a3(mdo sde): mgo yang gtong zhing byang chub zhugs//me to/drang ni spos dang bdug pa dang //gdugs dang rgyal mtshan lha yi ba dan dang //rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs thogs nas ni//dga' nas
216a4(mdo sde): mchod pa mtshungs pa med pa byed//srid pa dang ni stong par shes nas kyang //srid pa'i 'gro ba dag la dga' mi byed//de phyir stobs bcu mtshan gyis rnam brgyan cing //phyogs
216a5(mdo sde): bcu thams cad du yang snang por byed//byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa//'dod pa'i khamos rnams dang ni gzugs kyi khams//gzugs med khams
216a6(mdo sde): la de dag mi chags te//khamos gsumo dag la snga nas chags pa med//byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa//bdag tu 'du shes sems can 'du shes
216a7(mdo sde): med//srog tu 'du shes gang zag 'du shes med//tshangs par spyod pa ma 'dris rtag tu spyad//byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa//dngos por 'du
216b1(mdo sde): shes dngos mod 'du shes med//dad bar shos mi bder 'du shes med//grangs su 'du shes grangs med 'du shes med//byang chub sems da par gzungs la gang gnas//
216b2(mdo sde): pa//yod par 'du shes med par 'du shes med//bud med 'du shes skyes par 'du shes med//grong gi 'du shes grong khyer 'du shes med//byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la
216b3(mdo sde): gang gnas pa//yul 'khor 'du shes grong 'dab 'du shes med//'dod chags 'du shes 'dod bral 'du shes med //zhe sdang 'du shes sdang bral 'du shes med//gti mug
216b4(mdo sde): 'du shes rmongs bral 'du shes med//byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa//nga rgyal nga rgyal bral ba'i 'du shes med//ma reg ma rig ma yin 'du shes med//
216b5(mdo sde): lta dang lta ba ma yin 'du shes med//byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa//de dag dbang po stobs la mi chags te//byang chub yan lag bsam gtan chags
216b6(mdo sde): pa med//khams gsum nyes pa thams cad rab tu spongs//'dod chags chags med zhe sdang gtum pa med//gti mug rmongs med rtog tu g.yo med 'gyur//sangs rgyas/
216b7(mdo sde): stobs bcu mthong nas bkur sti byed//blo gros ldan pa mtho ris smon mi byed//su dag gzhan las chos mchog thos nas ni//de la nam yang nem nur mi byed pa//'bru
217a1(mdo sde): mar gang ba'i snod bzhin dang zhing dag/bcad dang mo bcud gzhan gyi blo yang shes//mdza' ba byas na rjes su chags pa skye//de yang nyon mongs pa ni chen
217a2(mdo sde): po yin//zhe sdang byas na khong khro skye bar 'gyur//dgra dang 'jigs pa sdig pa rnams kyang 'byung //'di gnyis rab tu rnam par spang byas te//blo gros ldan pa dag ni byang
217a3(mdo sde): chub zhugs//de dog mI yi khyu mchog stobs bcur ni//'jig rten du yang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur//nang dang phyi rol dag kyang rnamo spangs te//chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rab
217a4(mdo sde): ge nas shing //tshul khrims phung po dag kyang rnam par sbyangs//ral pa med cing ma 'dres skyon yang med//nam yang de dag gi ni tshul khrims dag/'bags shing 'dres
217a5(mdo sde): pa dag tu mi 'gyur te//mtha' 'di dag ni gnyis po yongs spangs nas//blo gros 'chang po byang chub zhi rtogs 'gyur//de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis dge slong gi dge
217a6(mdo sde): 'dun las chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes kyi yon tan bye brag chen po yangs shing rgya tsha ba thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi dga' nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po la
217a7(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pas slor smras pa/nags khrod stug po kun tu bzang po ni//sdong po chen pos gang zhing 'bras bus mdzes//dus kun skye ba me tog sdug pas brgyan//sna
217b1(mdo sde): tshigs tha dad bya rnams sgra yang 'byin//gser g+hi ri yang mdzes shing mtho bas brgyan//mi 'am ci yi glu dbyangs snyan pa dang //rol mo shin tu thabs ldan yid 'ong grag/grub
217b2(mdo sde): pa'i bu mo rtag tu gar yang byed//nags de lha yi dga' ba'i tshal bzhin te//gzugs bzang gzugs 'bar ba yi shing gis dkrigs//me tog rnam pa sna tshogs tha de bkram//
217b3(mdo sde): sut+pal pad+mos brgyan cing chu yang 'byab//'di 'dra ba yi nags mchog nyams dga' ba//drang song rtag tu gnas par mthun pa dge/bor nas sems can don dang phan bzhed
217b4(mdo sde): pas//sdig pa'i phung po bdag drung grong du byon//de ltar ches sgra yon tan 'chang ba 'dadi//me tog zla mdzes grong khyer 'dir byon te//byon nas sdig pa bgyid pa bdag gis
217b5(mdo sde): bkrongs//'di bkrongs pas ni bdag kyang dmyal bar ltung //byang chub sems dpa'i thugs rje'i stobs ldan gang //dpa' bo sems can phan phyir 'jig rten spyod//de dag
217b6(mdo sde): sdig bgyid bdag gi skyebs mdzod cig/byang chub sems dpa' do skabs bdag mchi'o//gang yang rang rgyal dag ni gnyis pa dang //gang gzhan nyan thos rdzu 'phrul ldan pa
217b7(mdo sde): ste//zag pa zad cing tha ma'i lus 'dzin po//bdag ni sdug bsngal mnar med mchi ba skyobs//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal
218a1(mdo sde): pa/de lta bas na kun dga' bo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus dang sog la ma chags par bya'o//de tswi'i phyi na/kun dag
218a2(mdo sde): lus drang srog la chags pa'i sems can rnams mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/rtokra tu rul ba'i lus 'di dang //srog kyang
218a3(mdo sde): g.yo zhing dbang med de//rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra ba la//sems can gang dag chags po ni//shin tu ma rungs las byas nas//gti mug dbang song de dag ni//sems can
218a4(mdo sde): dmyal ba mi bzud par//mi mkhas bdud kyi bzhan pas song //dbu ba rjes 'dra'i lus dang ni//chu yi chungar 'dro so ka la//mi gang chags par mi byed pa//de dag 'gro
218a5(mdo sde): bu mchog tu 'gro/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa
218a6(mdo sde): ting ngange 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang /myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rtogs paratshang tsha bar 'dod pas lus dang srog la mi lta bar byas te/
218a7(mdo sde): mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus brtsams pas sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed de dngan pa na 'di par gnas pa dang dgon pa dang nogs khrod
218b1(mdo sde): spangs te grong drang srong khyer dang grong rdal dang ljongs dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang ri khrod rnams su zhugs te/ci nas sems can de dag nyan thos kyi byang chub dang rang
218b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chubi las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur sems can rnams la chos bstan
218b3(mdo sde): par bya'o//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di nyid rgya cher tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgyas par rab
218b4(mdo sde): tu bstan to//ngas sngon spyad pa dag ni spyod pa na//de tshe rgyalnga po dpa' bas byin par gyur//rgyal po'i pho brang rin chen ldan zhes bya//skyed mos tshal gyi sar ni byung bar gyur//
218b5(mdo sde): shing rta zhugs pas de tshe dge slong mthong //kun nas mdzes shing blta na sdug po ste//sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos pa//phyogs rnams thams cad du yang snang bar
218b6(mdo sde): byed//me tog zla mdzes phyogs su brags pa ste//snying rje gnas pa phan zhing snying brtse ba//dpal dang gzi brjid dag gis mdzes pa ni//sems can rnams la brtse phyir grong
218b7(mdo sde): dri 'ongs//nga ni gzugs kyang de tsam mi phodade pas//de la nga yang 'jungs pa ma rungs skyes//'dod la chags shing srid la bcings pas na//'di ni bdag gi srod las
219a1(mdo sde): skyod snyam skye//nga yi bu rnams stong du tshang ba yang //shing rtar zhugs shing zhabs 'bring mtho dman 'gro//cod pan dang ni sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan//sum
219a2(mdo sde): cu dbang phyir lha yi bu 'brang bzhin//de na nga yi bu mo lnga brgya dag/nor bu thogs shing lham gyon blta na sdug/mgo rkyen dang ni lhab lhu brgyan gyis spung //de dag gsor gyi dra
219a3(mdo sde): bas shing rta 'dren//nga yi bud med dag ni brgyad khri yang //gzugs mdzes shin tu blta na sdug pa dag/shing rtar zhugs pas dge slong de mthong ste//ri rab bzhin du gzugs
219a4(mdo sde): bzang dpal 'bar ba//mthong nas de dag par yang 'du shes bskyed//byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems skyes te//de tshe tshangs pa'i spyod par yang dag btsud//yid du
219a5(mdo sde): 'ong ba'i rgyuni rnams de la gtor//de tshe nga ni phrag dog skyes par gyur//gnod sems zhe sdang tho ba mi bzod de//dbang phyug rgyags pas bu lu 'di skad smras//mdun na 'dug
219a6(mdo sde): pa'i dge slong bsdad par gyis//gzhon nu de dge nga yi tshig thos nas//shin tu sdug bsngal yid kyang mi dgar gyur//yab cig de skad kyi ni tshig ma gsung //dge slong 'di
219a7(mdo sde): 'dra bdag cag mi 'gums so//bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye snyed du//bdag cag lus dang yan lag bcad gtubs kyang ///dge slong 'di ni 'gums par mi babyed de//'di
219b1(mdo sde): ltar bdag cag byang chub sems skyes so//rgyal po de tshe bu yi tshig thos nas//khros te gsod pa'i gshed ma 'bangs la smras//nga yi btsun mo'i mdun na 'dug pa yi//dge
219b2(mdo sde): slong 'di ni myur du sod de phul//de nas gsod pa'i gshed ma phyi bzhin 'ongs//shin tu gtum sems dga' byed snying rje med//'bru mar dAr btags ral gri thogs nas su//de
219b3(mdo sde): yis dge slong dum bu brgyad du byas//de yi lus dang yan lag bcad pa las//khrag kyang mi zag 'od zer stong byung ste//bcad pa'i 'phro ni dpal be'u 'khor lo dag/mtshan
219b4(mdo sde): rnams de yi lus kyi nang na yod//shin tu ma rungs las ni byas nas su//skyed mos tshal du de yi mod la byung //dge slong me tog zla ba dran nas ni//de yi rtsed mo dga' bar ma
219b5(mdo sde): gyur to//rings pa'i gzugs su myur zhing mgyogs par no//de nas bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang song //gang du dge slong dum bu brgyad byis pa//sa phyogs der ni shing rtar
219b6(mdo sde): zhugs nas phyin//lha rnams khrag khrig mang po bar snang la//cho nges 'debs pa'i sgra dag des thos te//rgyal po khyod kyis mi dag sdig mang bgyis//shrI 'phos nas ni
219b7(mdo sde): mnar med mi bder 'gro/rgyal po des ni lha yi sgra thos nas//shin tu sdug bsngal mo dga' sems skrag gyur//bdag gis me tog zla mdzes bkrongs pa ni//bdag gis
220a1(mdo sde): sdig pa mi zad mang po bgyis//de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mtha' yas ldan//sangs rgyas mi yi khyu mchog sras po gang //dbang po bsrungs shing
220a2(mdo sde): des pa zhi ba'i yid//de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis bkrongs//de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams gang 'dzin cing //zad pa'i dus la dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod//'jig
220a3(mdo sde): rten kun tu chos kyi sgron ma mdzad//de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis bkrongs//'jig rten kun na sman pa'i rgyal po gang //sems can na brtag tu gso byed cing //bdud
220a4(mdo sde): rtsi dag gi sra bkru sman gtong ba yi//dge slong bdag gis 'dod pa'i don phyir bkrongs//zhib cing zab la zhi ba blta dka' ba'i//chos rnams skye dgu dag la grong 'chad cing ///
220a5(mdo sde): byang chub snying po mtshig kyang gang ston pa//de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis bkrongs//'dren pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin cing //'jig rten ljongs pa'i sgron mar gyur
220a6(mdo sde): po ste//gzungs dang mdo sde'i rgyal po gang 'dzin pa//de na tso slad bdag gis 'dod phyir bkrongs//nyon mongs med cing rnam dag ye shes can//zhi bar bzhi rtag tu mnyam
220a7(mdo sde): bzhag pa//'dod pas ldongs pas bdag gis deng bkrongs te//des ni shin tu mi rungs dmyal bar ltung //sangs rgyas gang dag 'das dang de bzhin ma byon dang //mi yi
220b1(mdo sde): dam pa rgyal ba gang yang bzhugs pa ni//bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa rnams//de dag kun la thal mo sbyar te skyabs su mtsho///'phags
220b2(mdo sde): pating nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo//bam po bcu gsum pa//de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis chos smra ba me tig zla mdzes bsod de shi ba'i lus kyi mdog ma gyur par sa la 'gyel cing
220b3(mdo sde): 'dug pa mthong nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste 'gyod cing myos par gyur nas de'i tshe cho nges rab tu cher btab bo//chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes de la'ang 'di lta bur yang dag pa'i yon
220b4(mdo sde): tan gyis bstod pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag smras so//kun tu bzang por 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyis//khyod la rnam pa mang po bsgo ba bgyis//khyod kyi srog
220b5(mdo sde): gi bar chad byung ta re//rin chen ldan par rgyal po'i khab ma bzhud//khyod kyis dge slong dge 'dun tshig ma bzung //mgon po grong khyer du ni ci slad byon//khyod ni gang gi don du byon
220b6(mdo sde): pa yi//don de sgron ma mdzad pa mdzad du gsol//lha rdzas myu gu sna tshog so brgyan pa'i sa//gzugs bzang gzugs 'bar shing ljon mang pos dkrogs//grub pa'i rig 'dzin
220b7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin mchog gis bsrungs//lha rnams zhugs shing byi rgyal sgra yang sgrog/kun tu bzang po sangs rgyas rtag bzhugs pa//nags tshal dam pa dga' ba bor nas ni//bgyi
221a1(mdo sde): bgang phyir khyod ni 'dir byon pa//des pa bgyi ba de dang bdag la gsungs//khyod kyi tshig thos nis ni bka' bzhin bgyi//sangs rgyas sram po bzhengs la
221a2(mdo sde): bka' stsol cig/kye ma doni tsa bgyi lha yi lho//bdag ni mgon med khyod kyi skyabs su mchi//gcig pu seng ge rI dgas rgyal po ltar//dge slong dge 'dun mchog gi khya bor
221a3(mdo sde): dag//sems can mtha' yas pa la thugs 'acu'i phyir//rang gi srog kyong btang ste 'dir byon na//'dod chags zil non shin tu 'jungs pa yis//bdag gis dpa' bo dum
221a4(mdo sde): bu dum bur bcad//'di ni dge slong dge 'dun mtha' dag kyang //khyod la lta bar pho brang mo lhags par//bdag ni 'jigs sgrags khyod la ci gsol ba//bde bar gsol ba
221a5(mdo sde): gcig ni mdzad par 'os//me tog zla mdzes mi 'jigs bdag stsol la//nya dus zla ba nya 'drar bzhengs su gsol//sems can gtso bo bdag la gnang bar mdzod//chos
221a6(mdo sde): skra khyod ni zhe sdang rnam par grol//do ring bdag la sna gcig gnang bar mdzod//nyi ma bzhin tu snang mdzad bzhings su gsol//chos skye mchog ni bdag gis bkrongs bgyis
221a7(mdo sde): /sdig pa me logs bdag gis deng bgyis pa//'di nas 'chi 'phos mi bzad dmyal bar skye//bdag la de yi skyabs su 'gyur ba med//nyon mongs byed pa sdig sems
221b1(mdo sde): ciru rung //rgyags pas khengs pa'i rgyal srid ci ru rung //thams cad spangs te gcig pu 'gro bar 'gyur//'di nas bdag gis snying po ci ma blangs//'dod chags zhe sdang bcom
221b2(mdo sde): pa rnam dag chos//snyan par gsung ba bdag thul thugs rje can//'gro ba'i gnyen gcig sun 'byin mi mdzad pa//me tog zla mdzes bdag gis ci phyir bkrongs//kye ma bzod dang
221b3(mdo sde): dka' thub nor phyag brtul zhugs bzang //kye ma gzugs dang des pa dag gi yon tan ldan//kye mu g.yo med dpal stug spros pa mi mnga' ba//bdag cag bor nas khyod ni gang du
221b4(mdo sde): bzhud par mdzad//'phags pa khyod kyi lus dang yan lag bcad pa ni//'o ma rab tu zag cing 'od zer stong dag byung //'jig rten 'di dag thams cad shin tu ngo mtshar gyur//ngo
221b5(mdo sde): mtshar che ba'i rang bzhin 'dren pa bzhengs su gsol//kye ma me tog zla ba dul ba thugs rje can//kye ma byams dang snying rje'i phung po ri bo tshur//kye ma chos rnams zab mo shin tu ston
221b6(mdo sde): ba'i mchog/lha khyod bzhengs shig bdag la thugs brtsar mdzad du gsol//kye ma zla ba nya zhal tshur spyon cig/kye mas bcu legs gnas tshur ston cig/kye ma dpa' bo stobs
221b7(mdo sde): bcu mngon 'phags pa//che la khyod dbang bdag po gang du bzhud//kye ma dpa' bo tshur spyon bdag la gsungs//khyod kyis yun ring bzod pa bsgoms pa dang //brtson 'grus
222a1(mdo sde): thugs rje de drag gang du mchis//byams pa chen po bzhengs la gsung phyung zhig/kye ma shin tu mchod 'os lha yi lha//chos smra cang mi gsung bar ci slad bzhugs//
222a2(mdo sde): mkhas pa bzhengasu la hA dag gi khyim du bzhud//bud mod tshogs la khyod kyis chos ston cig/lha khyod lus ni bcad par mi nus te//lha dang lha min gnod sbyin srin pas kyang //khyod
222a3(mdo sde): kyi lha yi lus 'di mi shigs kyis//mkhas pa khyod dang sgyu dag ma mdzod cig/lha khyod skye mdzad bzhugs pa ga la gda'//byang chub sems dpa' sgyu mo mi mdzes so//skyo
222a4(mdo sde): ma thams cad spongs la bzhengs su gsol//rin chen ldan pa'i grong du chos shod cog/kye ma 'phags pa me tog zla mdze sa tshur//kye ma khams gsum 'dod chags
222a5(mdo sde): bral ba tshur//kye ma pha ma lta bu 'dren pa tshur//bdag gi sems dmal sgro ni bcad du gsol//ngan song skyes pa rnams kyi rten dang dpung //srog chags mnar med chen
222a6(mdo sde): por lhung ba yi//skyabs mdzad me tog zla mdzes tshur spyon cig/bdog gi bde 'gro'i sgo yang dbye bar gsol//mgon po khyod ni dpung bdun bshos ma gsol//re zhig
222a7(mdo sde): deng bzhengs bdag gi bshos gsol cig/bdag gis pa sa gsal ren chen ldan pa 'dir//sems can du ma chos lo dgod pa mdzod//kyi mchos mchog rtogs
222b1(mdo sde): pa bdag gi yab//kye ma sems can rnams la khon med sems//kye ma tshur spyon bdag mdun chos ston cig/kye ma tshur smon khyod smon myang grub shog/dge slong dge 'dun de ni
222b2(mdo sde): mgon med gyur//kye ma mdongs shing mi dran mya ngan bgyid//sems can sdong po khyod ni myur bzhengs la//dge slong dge 'dun dbugs kyang dbyung bar mdzod//kye ma 'jig rten
222b3(mdo sde): gsum na smon gyur pa//kye mtshur spron kun tu bzang por bzhud//kun tu bzang po'i nags khrod bzhud nas ni//dge slong dag la phan phyir khyod ston cig/TIkye chos 'dzin yon
222b4(mdo sde): rten rmang byung che//a shwad me tog bzhin du rnyed par dka'//shes rab thugs rje'i spyan ni dri med pa//kye kye dge slong dge 'dun gzigs su gsol//tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i
222b5(mdo sde): gzugs de yang //kye kye dge slong dag la bstan du gsol//kye kye zla ba shar ba bzhin du 'dir//me tog zla ba de ring bzhengs su gsol//kye kye rgyal sras bdag la thugs brtse ba//
222b6(mdo sde): dbugs 'byin mdzad pa ston pa bla na med//kyi kye mtshon dang dbyug pas btab pa bzod//bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan zhing rab tu des//kye kyai me tog zla mdzes thugs rje can//rab
222b7(mdo sde): sbyin 'dren po khyod ni bzhengs su gsol//kye kye khyod ni bzhengs la bdag la yang //mthong bar dka' ba'i gzungs rnams bshad du gsol//kye kyi 'jig rten kun tu snang mdzad
223a1(mdo sde): /pa//shes rab kyi ni sgron ma dam pa'i mchog/kye kye sems can dag gi phan don la//brtson mdzad 'dren pa thugs rje'i stobs dang ldan//kye kye me ta ka zla/
223a2(mdo sde): mdzes bzhengs su gsol//dpa' bo sems can dag gi don mdzad pa//kye kye sems can dag ni bye ba da / khrig rnams kyang zhi ba'i gong du khyod//kyaikye tshul khrims na
223a3(mdo sde): ldan blo gros che//mkhas pa bslabs pa'i nor gyis shin tu phyug/kye kye tshul khrims brtul zhugaso rab gnas shing //chos kyi shing gi myu gu mngon par dga'//kye kye chos
223a4(mdo sde): gos ngur smrig kha bsgyur 'chang //rtag tu mngon par byung la dga' bar mdzod//kye kye me tog zla ba brtul zhugs mchog/rab sprin dka' thub bzang po khyod bzhengs shig/kye kye
223a5(mdo sde): dul ba sems can mo dul 'dul//rtag par dul ba'i gnas dang rjes su ldan//kye kye dul rab dul ba'i rjes su bzhu de//zhi ba dbang po rab zhi khong nos des//kye kye sems
223a6(mdo sde): tsan+da nyal zhing gnyid log pa//chos kyi sgra yis rtag tu sad par mdzod//kye kyai sems can bye ba khrag khrig dag/sad par bgyis nas theg pa mchog la khod//kye kye sbyin pa
223a7(mdo sde): yi ni spang leb la//brtson 'grus thag gus sgrol ba'i gru sbyor te//kye kye sems can rgya mtsho chen por ni//rab tu lhung zhing srid pas ded pa rnams//kye kye stobs bcu ldan pa
223b1(mdo sde): ma tog mchog/mnyan pa grangs 'dzin mkhas pa bzhengs su gsol//kye shin tu sra ba'i klur yang ni//zhugs nas bdag dang de dag bsgral par mdzod//skud par dam
223b2(mdo sde): pa brtul zhugs la//shin tu spyad cing rlig mdzad sman pa'i mchog/kye kye ye shes rnam grol pha rol phyin//dam pa'i chos kyi rtsi dag sbyin mdzad pa//kye kye na ni rnam pa sna tshogs
223b3(mdo sde): kyis//btab pa'i sems can na ba rnam gzigs nas//kye kye myur du bzhengs la de dag la//chos kyi sman rnams shin tu stsal bar mdzo do//kye kye ye shes sman pa'i rgyal po mchog
223b4(mdo sde): mtshungs med ye shes 'phags shing pha rol phyin//kye kye nad rnams shin tu gso mdzad cing //thugs rjes sems can dag gi don kyang mdzad//kye kye na ber gyur pa'i sems can
223b5(mdo sde): khams//'dod chags nad kyis ma lus bcom pa rnams//des ni sems can thams cad bde ba dang //nad rnams med cing mya ngan 'das par 'gyur//kyi kye mkhas pa ye
223b6(mdo sde): shes rgya chen bslabs//chos kyi rnga dag shin tu brdung bar mdzod//kye kye 'jig rten gyi ni the tshom gyi//'khri shing thams cad ye shes rgya mtshos chod//kye kye legs thos chos
223b7(mdo sde): rnams 'dzin mdzad pa//rdul bral mdo sde bye ba brgya dag kyang //'khor gyi nang du gdan la rab bzhugs la//mi mchog mkhas pa brjod pa mdzad du gsol//me tog zla ba mtshan
224a1(mdo sde): mchog brgyan pa kye//dpe byad bzang po brgyan tu tshang ba kyi//dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus lus brgyan kye//srid pa'i mtsho rgal spros med tshur son kau//srid
224a2(mdo sde): pa'i btson rang drung khrol bzhings shig tu//yo shes mchog reg mings pa 'drub kyi//me tokra zla ba thugs rje chen po kye//byams dang thugs rje skyeng la bzhengs shig/me tog
224a3(mdo sde): zla ba khyod la gsol ba 'debs//dge slong dge 'dun khyod kyis ma dor bar//tshur gshegs dge 'dun yongs su bsdu ba mdzod//bzheng sa la na gas khrod der yang gshegs sam
224a4(mdo sde): /me tog zla ba bsdam gtan dgyes pa mchog/mdzo' dang mi mdza' mtshungs par byams shing pha ni//gzungs la rab tu gnas pa tshur spyon kyi//ye shes sdong po mtshungs
224a5(mdo sde): med khyod bzhengs shig/ri rab bzhin du mi g.yo brtan pa kye//sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sems can mnyam yid kye//me tog zla ba brtul zhugs rdzogs pa kye//bzhengs la
224a6(mdo sde): shing gi drung du 'tshang rgya mdzod//lha yi rna ba chos kyi mchog 'chang kye//lha yi mig mkhas ye shes rtogs pa kye//bzhengs te bdag la gzigs shig thugs rje can//
224a7(mdo sde): grags pa mtha' yas bdag gi tshig gson kye//'jig rten kun la phan dang don mdzad kyi//me tog zlo ba shin tu sbyin dgyes kye//bzhengs la myur du bdag gi ri rdzogs mdzad//
224b1(mdo sde): khyod 'dir dum du dum bur ma bzhugs shig/grong 'dir skyes pa bud med tshogs rnams kyang //khyod mthong thams cad shita bzhin sa la 'gyel//snying skabs 'gyur ba'i mya ngan
224b2(mdo sde): rnams kyang bgyid//thugs rje mchog gi spyan gyis de la gzigs//gang gi slad du byams pa bsgoms pa dang //ye shes shes rab thabs kyi stobs rnams dang //khyod kyi thugs
224b3(mdo sde): rje btang snyoms dga' ba yangs//de dag rdzogs mdzod bzhengs shig me tog mdzes//lha klu lha min rdzu 'phrul chen po dang //gnod sbyin srin po mi dang mi 'am ci//snyim pa me tog
224b4(mdo sde): bdug pas bkang nas ni//thams cad mthong bar dga' nas lhags shing 'khod//drang srong chen po'i tshig ni deng rtogs te//skye dgu'i 'dod pa gnod byed gsod pa yin//yid kyi
224b5(mdo sde): nad tu 'gyur ba ngan 'gro'i rgyu//de phyir 'dod pa'i spyod pa spang bar bya//dge slong bdag gos bsad pa sdig gi las//shin tu ma legs mi bde byas pas na//bdag ni mi bzad
224b6(mdo sde): dmyal ba mo nar med 'gro/bdag la de yi mgon skyobs byed pa med//bdag ni rgyal po'i srid btang chings spyod gzhol//spos dang me tog byug pa rnams kyis ni//mchod pa
224b7(mdo sde): dam pa rnams kyang rab tu bya//shin tu mdzes par mchod rten bdag gis bya//bu dang bu mo bud med khyim bdag dang //blon po dang ni tshong dpon de dag dang //grong pa dang ni
225a1(mdo sde): rgyal rigs mang po rnams//de dag rnams cad la nI ngas bsgog/sdug ru dang \u0f7fn+dan shug pa dang /
225a2(mdo sde): dun ma kyabyung pa khyams rgyas la// sadzin ga pa'i jig sa
225a3(mdo sde): nga ba yod du 'ang la sa ng+yas/ ni da slo de yang 'brug nas su//sa gom m+b+ha//rgyas s+ho//de zhin pa//
225a4(mdo sde): na rgya ba dang byu'i dag giso zugs// rnas pa'i rnamin byam par gyur//dge slong dag gis de hU~M dang bsregs//rnamags du m+b+ha ma d+hi rnaMs /
225a5(mdo sde): 'di la dus ni mchod pa sbyinas zer//mAN+Dag dang ni phreng babyug dang //gadregs pang badzin mtsha thogs nas sku/la bas da ni ma snyed stong /
225a6(mdo sde): dzizhin gyi chags//bai tsud bye ba phrag ni su 'gyugyur/gnyis pa byas pa dag kyang bzhan tun ma gyis dam pam //dem
225b1(mdo sde): cing bcud la dri ma med//lo stong bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu lngar//gso sbyong dag kyang de tshe rab gsos te//de ni de tshe bdag gi lus zhig nas//mnar med mi bzad par ni de lhung gyur//
225b2(mdo sde): 'dod phyir snying rje med pa'i las byis pas//sdug bsngal mang po dag kyang myong bar gyur//sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag drugu bcu lnga//de tshe de dag bdag gis ma mnyes byas//la stong bya
225b3(mdo sde): ba phrag ni dgu bcu lngar//de yi tshe nang ni long bar gyur//bskal pa bye bo khrag khrig drug cu gnyis//sngan chad dang yi mig kyang bcar bar gyur//bskal pa bye ba khrog khrig phrag sto
225b4(mdo sde): dang //shin tu mang bar nga yi mig phyung phyogs//mgo dang rna ba dang ni rkang lag kyang//bskal pa mtha' yas khrag khrig bcad par gyur//bsgral pa dag ni bye ba khrig khrig tu//ming
225b5(mdo sde): gyur pa dang skye ba gzhan du yang //'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis rab gtses shing //sdug bsngal tshor ba yun ring myong bar gyur//sdig pa'i las rnams byas pas 'khor ba na/
