398b6(mdo sde): cad spangs lnga dga' ba dang /mi dag re ba dang /srid pa thams cad bsal te/zab mo mi dmigos pA la mos shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bskal pa
398b7(mdo sde): grangs ma mchis pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bsgrubs pa 'di kun tu bsrung bar bgyi/gzung bar bgyi/yongs su gzung bar bgyi/gzhan dag la'ang rgya che re yang dag par rab
399a1(mdo sde): rta bstan par bgyi zhing /bdag sa gu dus dang srog la mi blta bar sangs rgyas ni byang chub 'di kun d+hangs ba //de nas bcom ldan 'as
399a2(mdo sde): da' ba'i rgyal po dang /'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa dab med pa drug cu dang /byams pa dang /song de/rab snang la sogs pa bskal ba bzeng rje'i byang chu
399a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la rjes su bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsol to//gal med sgra me dang med tha ba med//dran ldan po thos ldad ning gonas med
399a4(mdo sde): gnas//zang mo bzod la mig yod legs gnas te//stobs bcu nor 'di rab tu srung bar gyis//sna med gtsam med 'dod medang med dang //gzung med dga' dang rnam
399a5(mdo sde): par 'dzin bral dang //nam mkha'i lam ltar mnyam nyid rab ldan pa//de ltar slar ba'i ting 'dzin 'di 'thob bo//rtag tu byang chub 'dun pa brta nI rgyas//rna
399a6(mdo sde): rgyal ba da rdul yang byasgoms//dag du kun la 'dris la me ldan/dan 'dzin dukun mA klu 'di 'thob bya//rgyug cu gA rje dang mi dga' sems spyonas shing rna
399a7(mdo sde): blo mchog la ston pa lta bu yi//du shes skyed cing dgu' bye rtag dga' ba//des ni myur du ting 'dzin 'di rtags so//snong bzid mi shes pa mchog gi gter// kyi
399b1(mdo sde): ba rgyal ni byed brgyas/'i'o nar rab ba sel stu thA//ye shos 'jug pa rdalam+b+hi ning pa dud//hrIrnam no// /sa dang gangs byu
399b2(mdo sde): gling ni'i bdog pa rgyu 'i ni tshangs pa da//sman pa lta bu'i mdo sde 'di rlung zhig//'di ni sems da//9na da//'di ni 'du 'di ni bdud 'al ba//'din
399b3(mdo sde): ral sems spyod rdzu 'phrul mig/'di ni sems can thams cad rtogs byed skye//'di ni bsgral pa khrag /khrig dran par byed//'di ni dra ba thams da du ma lu smai zed//sangs rgya
399b4(mdo sde): phyag rgya 'dini 'di gshegs bskyod//'di dang ldan pa'i lag tu byung rlob gnas//ji ltar stong nyid rang bzhin 'dir gnas pa//de ltar de yis stong nyid 'di rtogs te///
399b5(mdo sde): dang rnam par rtog pa'i spros pa 'di//gnyi ga yongs su spangs ni chos 'dzin yin//nga ni mya ngan 'das phyi lnga la zhig/chos 'di rmi lam+ba lta bur blta zhes 'dzed//gang chos
399b6(mdo sde): mabyung sus kyang byas ma yin//rang gi shes pas de dag de la rtag/stong nyid ma skyes sus kyang byas mo yin//ma mthong 'ongs pa ma yin 'pho min na//dmigs gnas
399b7(mdo sde): bdag cag sto nyod legs bslabs shes//'dzer ba de dag chos kyi rkun pa yin//gang dag las ni chos 'di thos nas su//mchi ma 'byung ba spu ra ba grayos nas//de ni
400a1(mdo sde): byang chub phyir mi ldag ces ra//phyinas bsngags pa ma yin brgya dgas//ma pas khyim du nor mang zad nas ni//bde ba'i ched du ded/rab 'byung
400a2(mdo sde): ste//bstan pa 'di la bad pa rkun rnyed nas//nga yi sras rnams la ni sdang bar byed//byang chub don/nyer kha cig 'dir rab 'byung //byang chub smra ste byang chub gnas ma yin//
400a3(mdo sde): rgyu mtsho chung mtha' pha mtha' ring ba ltar//'dir yang ma bsams byang chub de bzhin no//rnyed dang mdza' bo'i khyim la sten pa'i phyir//bdag cig yang dag rab tu byung ba
400a4(mdo sde): sti/spyod lam dang ni dgron pas rnam dag cing //mkhan po dang ni mdza'o bos dag ces 'dzer//gang dag nga yi bstan 'dir rab byung nas//pad+ma chu ltar 'jig rten chos
400a5(mdo sde): gnas te//tshul 'di ji bzhin mdo sde 'dir brtson pa//de dag nga yi byang chub yang dag srung //mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po khyod bstan gyis//blo ngan de dag lta bur
400a6(mdo sde): bslab mi bya//nan tan gyis ni sangs rgyas yon tan thob//de phyir rtog pa med par rab tu sbyor//khrag khrig zhing gi mi rnams ji snyed pas//gang+gA'i bye snyed blangs nas
400a7(mdo sde): btab pa dang //de la bye snyed sa bon ji tsam par//'bras bu ri ro byung bar gyur pa yi//de lta'i thabs kyis bye ma rgya che ba//stong 'gyur du ni yongs su bsgyur byas nas///
400b1(mdo sde): ji sted zhing rnams mtha' yas rab 'das shing //gcig ces bya bar mtshan ma bzhag gyur la//de lta'i tshul gyis sta na yod pa yi//bye ma dag ni thams cad zad gyur pa//de tsam
400b2(mdo sde): na phyogs bcu ji snyed pa//zhing rnams rgyu ljang rnams kyis yongs gang la//sangs rgyas re re 'ang de snyed dbur gyur te//dbu kun la yang de snyed lcags gyur lo//de dag bskal
400b3(mdo sde): pA gang+gA ra bya snyed du//mdo sde 'dir gnas de yi bsngags brjod kyang //ri rab yungs 'bru nam mkha' rtswa tsam dang //rgya mtsho las ni thigs gcig blangs pa bzhin//de ltar de
400b4(mdo sde): yi yon tan brjod gyur pa//de phyir rtog med tshul du rab tu sbyor//de nas mchog tu dka' ba'i rgyal po dang //'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe
400b5(mdo sde): med drug cu dang /byams pa dang /seng ge rab snang la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
400b6(mdo sde): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos chos zhes bgyi ba'i chos de chos gang gi tshig bla dgos lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis mchog tu dga' ba'i
400b7(mdo sde): rgyal po dang /'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med drug cu dang /byams pa dang /seng ge rab snang la sogs pa/bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
401a1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag chos chos zhes bya ba'i chos de ni 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas
401a2(mdo sde): so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'gyur ba ma mchis dong /rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa de'ang gong gi tshig bla dgas lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
401a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni dmigs pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das dmigs pa ma mchis pa de yang
401a4(mdo sde): gang gi tshig bla dag sro lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni mi zad pa'i tshig bla dwags so//gsol pa/
401a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das mi zad pa de'ang gang gri tshig bla dgas labras/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag mi zad pa zhes bya ba de ni mi skye ba'i tshig bla dwags
401a6(mdo sde): so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mi skye ba de'ang gang gi tshig bla dwags legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag mi skye bo zhes bya ba de ni mi
401a7(mdo sde): 'gog pa'i tshig bla dgas so//gsol po/bcom ldan 'das mi 'gog pa de'ang gang gi tshig bla dgas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag mi
401b1(mdo sde): 'gog pa zhes bya ba de ni sdud pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das spyad pa ma mchis pa de'ang gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
401b2(mdo sde): stsal pa/rigs kyi'u dge srud pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni yongs su gzung ba med pa'i tshig bla dgas so//gsel ba/bcom ldan 'das yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa derang gang gi
401b3(mdo sde): tshig bla dgas lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag yongs su gzung ba med pa zhes bya ba de ni gnas med pa'i tshig bla dgas so//gsol pa/bcom
401b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das gnas ma mchis pa de'ang gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag gnas med pa zhes bya ba de ni 'gyur ba med pa'i tshig
401b5(mdo sde): bla dgas so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'gyur ba ma mchis pa derang gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag 'gyur ba
401b6(mdo sde): med pa zhes bya ba de ni 'dus ma byas kyi tshig bla dgas so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma bgyis pa de'ang gang gi chog bla dgas legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis
401b7(mdo sde): bka' stsal po/rigs kyi bu dog 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba de ni grangs dang bral ba'i tshig bla dgas so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das grangs dang bral ba de'ang gang gi tshig
402a1(mdo sde): bla dgas lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag grangs dang bral ba zhes bya ba de ni sems med pa'i tshig bla dag sa so//gsol
402a2(mdo sde): pra/bajom ldan 'das sems ma mchis pa de'ang keng gi tshig bla dkas legs/ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal /rigs kyi bu dag sems med de zhes bya ba de ni rnam par
402a3(mdo sde): reg pa med pa'o tshig bla dgas so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa de'ang gang gi tshig bla dges lpags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/rigs kyi
402a4(mdo sde): ngag rnam par rig pa med pa zhes bya ba daM ni 'du ba med pa'i tshig bla dgas so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'du ba ma mchis pa de'ang gang gi tshig bla dgas la gros/bcom ldan
402a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag 'du ba med pa zhes bya ba de ni bral ba med pa'i tshig bla dgas so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bral ba ma mchis pa de'ang gang gi
402a6(mdo sde): tshig bla dgas lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi'u dag bral ba med pa zhes bya ba de ni nyam pa nyid kyi tshig blo dgas so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'du
402a7(mdo sde): /mnyam pa nyid de'ang gang gi tshig d+ma degs lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dang /mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba den mi mnyam pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas so//gsol 'o//
402b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das mI mnyam pa ma mchis zhes bgyi ba de 'ang dang ga chag blad sa 'ad pa/bcom ldan 'du sa bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi pra da sa pa me zhes bya ba de ni
402b2(mdo sde): gnas pa med pa'i tshig bla dwags so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gnas pa ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba de rang gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/so ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa
402b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag gnas pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni dngos po med pa'i tshig zla danas so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba de'ang gang gi rmig ba dwags legs
402b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag dngos po med pa zhes bya ba de ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshig bla dgas so//gsol pa/com ldan 'das ngo bo nyid ma mchis zhes kyi
402b5(mdo sde): bde'ang gang gi tshig bla dgas legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka stsa lo pa/rigs kyi bu dag ngo bo nyid med pa zhes bya ba de ni kun gzhi med pa'i tshig blad pas so//gsol pa
402b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kun gzhi ma mchis zhes bgyi ba de'ang gang gi tshig bla dogs lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'o stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dang kun gan med pa zhes da badren
402b7(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshig bla dgas so//de nas mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang /'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med drug cu dang /byams pa dang /seng ge
403a1(mdo sde): rab snang la sogasnga pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'dasnga la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
403a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das gal te chos de dag mtshan nyid de lta bu lags na/bcom ldan 'das 'di la chos nub par gyur pa ni gang lags/bdag gis ni gang bsrung bar bgyi/de skad ces
403a3(mdo sde): gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang /'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med drug cu dang /byams pa dang /seng ge rab
403a4(mdo sde): srung la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni
403a5(mdo sde): ches chos su 'du shes shing chos su rtog ste/chos spros par byed do//de dag chos su brtags/chos su spros pas gnyis su ston to//gang dag gnyis su ston pa de
403a6(mdo sde): dag chos dang 'gal bar zhugs pa yin mod kyi/rigs kyi bu go/'dron dam par na 'di la chos sam/chos dang 'gal ba gang yang mi dmigs so//de nas bcom ldan
403a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis don de bka' stsal nas/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//kha cig byams pa nyid 'dus byas pa ste//gzhan ni 'dus ma byas 'dzer kha cig/
403b1(mdo sde): gzhan//chos la dmigs pas gnyi ga'ang rnam rtog ste//spros pa de ni dag pa ma yin smra//chos ni gang gis ma byas bshig pa med//ma mthong ma shes su dang nye ba'ang min//
403b2(mdo sde): yongs rtog spyod yul mi rigs ldan de dag/de dag thams cing stong zhes tshig tu smra//gang zhig sbyong sems de ni rigs min te//'di ltar de yis skye med brtags phyir ro//rnam
403b3(mdo sde): rtog thams cad bdud kyi zhags pa ste//'gyur med chos kyi phyag rgya zhes bya'o//med pa'i chos la yongs su rtog pas na//byis pa gang yini g.yo bo de yis bcingaso//rnam par
403b4(mdo sde): rtog pa thams cad brag cha 'dra//byis pa de dag gnyis su 'dzin pas rtog/shes ldan rnams kyis shes pa gzhar mi rnyed//shes ldan las kyang shes pa byung ba med//kun
403b5(mdo sde): rdzob dag la brten nas 'di bsten te//'di la shes dang shes ldan mi dmigs so//gal te chos kyi ngo bo 'ga' yod na//de ni 'jig phyir chad pa mya ngan 'da'//gal te
403b6(mdo sde): chos rnams gnas par gyur na ni//de tshe mya ngan 'das kun rtag par 'gyur//byis pa dag gis spangs dang de bzhin thob//byis pas mya ngan 'da' byas mtshan nyid med//bdag
403b7(mdo sde): tu dmigs pa dag ni 'dus byas thob//mkhas pa yod dang med par 'du shes med//rig dang ma rig gnyi ga gnyis su med//tha snyad tsam ste de lo snying po med//spros pa
404a1(mdo sde): mtshan ma spyod yul de dag ni//dngos po gzhig phyir mya ngan 'das pa smra//sems kyis sems kyi ngo ba nyid mi shes//nga bo nyid kyis sems kyang ma
404a2(mdo sde): shes te//chos rnams thams cad rmi lam ngo bo nyid//de ni gnyis su 'don zhes kha cig smra//skye ba'i chos de bden pa ma yin te//'gog pa yang ni cung zad bden ma yin///
404a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad skye ba'i chos min te//de lta'i thabs kyis bden par 'gyur ba yin//sangs rgyas ye shes cung zad ma rnyed de//bstan pa'i chos kyang cung zad bstan
404a4(mdo sde): bu med//gsos kyang sems can gang yang bkrolnga ba med//de ltar sangs rgyas mi skye sangs rgyas so//gal te 'di ni rang bzhin mya ngan 'das//rgyal ba nyan thos bcas pa
404a5(mdo sde): de nyid 'gro/ther zug chos ni mya ngan 'da' ma yin//spros pa med pa nam yang mkhos mi 'gyur//gang gis sems can sems can don mi mthong //de ltar 'jig
404a6(mdo sde): kun rdzob sems can bstan//sems can yang dag ngo bo nyid mthong na//de ni mya ngan 'da' ba gzhi med gnas//gang dag 'dri la phung po bden smra dang //kha cig
404a7(mdo sde): srid 'gog lam ni 'den zhes 'dzer//skye ba med pa bden pa gcig yin no//de la kha cig 'don pa bzhi zhes 'dzer//byang chub snying por 'dug nas dri na gcig kyang //grub
404b1(mdo sde): par ma mthong bzhi lta ga la zhig/de ltar blo gros don+da mang rab byung nas//nga yi bstan pa rnam par 'jig par byed//dge sbyong yon tan 'tshol bar 'dod pa dag/ting 'dzin 'di
404b2(mdo sde): la rab tu sbyar ba'i phyir//ma bsdams rnams dang 'dris pa med byas te//bse ru lta bur dgon par gnas bor bya//rkang gnyis dam pa bye ba brgyad cu yis//'di la rab tu sbyar
404b3(mdo sde): la dgongs pa mdzod//gang dag bden pa mthong ba'i lha mang po//de dag nyin dang mtshan du de la srung //gang dag ting 'dzin blta dka' 'di sgom la//sangs rgyas kyis ni de yi rma
404b4(mdo sde): lam du//sdang ba gsal ba mtha' yas mi zad pa//bsgrub pa 'jug pa'i skor 'jug sbyin par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka'
404b5(mdo sde): stsal pa//'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bya'o//byang
404b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su sgrub par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
404b7(mdo sde): thob par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'od la brtson par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang /mi 'jigaso ba dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po thob par 'dod pas
405a1(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtsan par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang /rung byung nyid dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa dang //
405a2(mdo sde): tshe phun sum tshogs pa dang /dkod pa phun sun tshogs pa thob par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang
405a3(mdo sde): gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang /nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson
405a4(mdo sde): par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' stong pa dang /ye shes dang /gzungs dang /sems can gyi skad kyi brda dang /rigs pa dang /tshul dang /sgro thob par 'dod pas ting
405a5(mdo sde): de'i don 'dri lo brtson par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' lam la 'jig pa dang /'od phun sum tshogs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang /rnam
405a6(mdo sde): par gdon mi za ba'i stobaso bskyed pa la mkhas pa thob par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /lha
405a7(mdo sde): ba byin ci ma log pa dang /mnyam pa nyid rtogs par khong du chud par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
405b1(mdo sde): ti nge 'dzin 'di la brtson pa ni yon tan gyi phan yon 'di thams cad 'thob bo//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' don ta sri phan yon dang ldan pa ni sangs nas zhes bya'o//'du
405b2(mdo sde): pa zhes bya'o//rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya'o//yongs su 'dren du zhes bya'o//sten pa zhes byar//thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o//le zhes da'o//'jig rten rgya
405b3(mdo sde): mgon po zhes bya'o//rang byung zhes bya'o//de zhin gshegs pa nas bya'o//'tshul ba slab bzhin byed pa zhes/mnyam pa med pa dang /mi mnyam pa dang /mnyam
405b4(mdo sde): pa dang /mtshungs pa med pa zhes bya'o//mchog du skye ba/yang drag pAr smra ba/badra ba smra baM/dus su smra ba zhes bya'o//'dul ba smra ba zhes bya'o//bla na med pa zhes bya'o//
405b5(mdo sde): me'i dam pa zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jam dpal ngas ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas bcom ldan 'das ma ro me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ma thag tu byang chub thob
405b6(mdo sde): bo//'jam dpal gyis gsol po/gal te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad gzogs ma thag tu byang chub brnyes nas/bcom ldan 'das tso'i slad du
405b7(mdo sde): slar bskal pa grangs ma mchis par 'khor ba na 'khor/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed cing sems can yongs su smin par
406a1(mdo sde): bya ba dang /sngon gyi smon lam phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir bskal pa gangs med par 'khor ba na 'khor mod kyi/'on kyang 'jam dpal der ngas
406a2(mdo sde): byang chub dang /de nyid du yongs su mya ngani las 'das pa bzung ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
406a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal to//'dre dang ldan pa 'dren par 'gyur te blo gros mtha' yas blo gros mchog/phyog sa bcu'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya mang po dag gis dgongs par 'gyur//mdo
406a4(mdo sde): sde brgya yi tshul dag shin tu rab 'byed bas ma yas dpag med de//mdo sde 'dri la rab tu sbyor ba mi zad gzungs 'thob rnyed par 'gyur//'di ni ye shes ting 'dzin rnam par
406a5(mdo sde): gdon mi za ba skad kun sgo/rab tu rtogs dang rnam par grol dang chags me de 'dzin pa thams cad ni//mi skye ba dang 'gog dang gzhi med mya ngan 'das dang rims nad med//
406a6(mdo sde): stobs dang mtshan dang dang byang bzang dang rgyal ba'i yon tan kun sgrub pa//dbyangs kyi yan lag kun dang sna tshogs mtha' yas skad rnams yongs su sbyong //rjes su rtogs
406a7(mdo sde): dang tshim pa dang ni sbyong dang 'dzin pa thams cad bral//shin tu rnam par shes dang gdon mi za mchog nyon mongs thams cad zad//mdo sde 'di la rab tu sbyor ba byang chub
406b1(mdo sde): nga du song ba yin//rtse gcig yid kyis mngon pa sum du ni 'di la tshul bzhin rab sbyor la//gnyid da le lo ma byed shes kyi khe bde mngon par dga' ma byed//rtag tu tshul
406b2(mdo sde): drims gnyen dang phrag dag med dang byams pa'i yid du byas//dbang po'i ngang tshulo shus dang bcas pas ting 'dzin mchog 'di rnyed par 'gyur//mnya mo sems shin tu bsdams
406b3(mdo sde): pa drang po rtag tu rnam par dga' ba dang //gnas med 'das med shes kyi khe dang bde la pad+ma chu bzhin byos//ji ltar bya bzhin nga med mos pa brtan zhing sred dang g.yo med pa//di ni
406b4(mdo sde): phyi ma'i dus ni gzungs mchog rgyal po 'di ni 'thob par 'gyur//stong gsum dag ni rab tu g.yos nas lha brgya sil snyan dkrol bar byed//nam mkha' las ni byug pa gos
406b5(mdo sde): dang phye ma dag dang rgyal mtshan brgya//mdzes phreng mgu la rgyan rna cha zla ga ma dung dang rkang gdub dro shal bum//nor bu mu tog dpung rgyan gtsug rgyan sgor gdub sna tshogs 'thob
406b6(mdo sde): par byed//lha dang rtswa yi bu me klu dang dri za 'dab bzang tshogs mang po//nam mkha' lding dang lha min dbang po dge bsnyen dge slong brgya mong dang //de bzhin dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen
406b7(mdo sde): ma ni mang po dga' 'gyur langs//rang gi gos dag dang ni rgyan rnams phul nas byang chub sems skyed do//chos 'di shin tu bstan tshe sems can mang po byang chub zhugs pa dang ///
407a1(mdo sde): kha cig phyir mi ldog par gyur pa bstan cing tshad gzung nus ma yin+da//dgra bcom nyid du btul bar gyur pa gang+gA bye ma snyed//'dren pa blta
407a2(mdo sde): phyir zhing ni brta nas lhags po de dag dga' nas dong //bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/sems can grangs med pa bla na med pa yang drag
407a3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs so//byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
407a4(mdo sde): mi ldog par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu dang /'bum phrag gsum ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bo//
407a5(mdo sde): dge slong dang /dge slong mo dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma dpag tu med pa dang /sems can tshad med pa drag gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo//phyogs
407a6(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bo//
407a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/nyan thos chen pa de da dang /mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang /'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa'
407b1(mdo sde): myed drug cu dang /byams pa dang /seng ge rab snang las snang byed la thug pa'i bar la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang /
407b2(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /rgyal po'i btsun mo dpal bzang dang /kAser mchog snang dang
407b3(mdo sde): mas cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /lha dang mi daM /l+h+wa ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsu pa 'i mngon pa
407b4(mdo sde): bstod do//'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so////rgya grwar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra do
407b5(mdo sde): dang /zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya shU rang ga ma sa mA~M d+hi nAM ma ma hA yA na sU tra/bid
407b6(mdo sde): skad du/'phags pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po dang ngo po//sangs rgyas drang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
407b7(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril dge slong sum khri nyis stong gi dge slong go dge
408a1(mdo sde): 'dun chen po mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa sha stag dang /thabs cig tu bzhugs so//byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong dang
408a2(mdo sde): yang thabs cig ste/thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa'i ye shes thob pa/gzungs kyis mi brjed pa'i chos dang ldan po/spobs pa mi zad pa'i chos dang ldan pa/
408a3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin la shin tu gnas pas mi g.yo ba/shes rab kyi mig sgrub pa shes pa la mkhas pa/bzod pa thob pa/gzungs kyi tshul thob pa/chos zab mo'i tshul la
408a4(mdo sde): zhugs pa/bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba tshar phyin pa/smon lam phun sum tshogs pa/bdud dang phyir rgol ba btsam pa/sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa chen po dang
408a5(mdo sde): ldan pa yongs su bzung ba/byams po chen po'i go cha bgos pa/snying rje chen po yongs su bzung ba/brtson 'grus chen pos rtul ba/tshig thams cad kyi nges
408a6(mdo sde): pa'i tshig ston pa shes pa la pokhas pa/spyod pa yongs su dag pa/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la gnas pa/ye shes dus gsum la ma chags pa thob pa/
408a7(mdo sde): khams gsum las mngon par byung ba/sangs rgyas dang chos la mos pa mang ba/chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba/sgra thogs pa med pa/sgra yid du 'ong ngas go bar
408b1(mdo sde): byed pa/spyod lam thams cad yongs su brtags pa ma yin pa/dkris pa dang bral ba/mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa/sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong
408b2(mdo sde): ba'i go cha bgos pa/dran pa dang /blo gros dang /rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ngo tsha shes pa dang /brtan pa dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sengs
408b3(mdo sde): dngang man po thogs pa med par chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /byang
408b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrub pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mgro gtsang zhing dri ma med par yongs su spyod
408b5(mdo sde): pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par spel ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ba dang dad
408b6(mdo sde): bya'i spyod lam ston pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan dam pa bkod pa'i rgyal po'i blo gros dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
408b7(mdo sde): ngo sems can thams cad mi slu ba'i blo dang ldan pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yos de'i blo gros dang /byang chub sems
409a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du shes ldog pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtan zhing
409a2(mdo sde): dul ba rtag tu legs par brtsoms pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu mnyam par bzhag cing dbang po mi g.yeng ba dang /byang chub sems
409a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i sgra 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha thams cad kyi bstod po dang /byang chub
409a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa'i rgyal po dang /byang chubo sems
409a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyal po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur po dang /byang chub
409a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po'i rtsi 'dzin brtsegs pa'i rgyal po dang /byang chub sems
409a7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che bkod pa rgya mtsho'i blo gros dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus chen po dang /byang chub
409b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bkod pa chen po'i blo gros dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che chen po'i dodang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
409b2(mdo sde): dpa' rjen po 'od kyi dog dang /byang chub sems dpang sems dpa' chen po 'od dpal dang /byang chub sems dpang sems dpa' chen po 'od bkod dang /byang chub sems
409b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang ldan dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu
409b4(mdo sde): brtan dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpang chen po blo gros brtan pa dang /de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sumo khri nyis stong dang thabs cig go//gang yang
409b5(mdo sde): seng gzum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pa'i bta byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dang /dri ma yin pa gzhan yang lha dang /klu dang /
409b6(mdo sde): nod sbyid dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nem mkha' lding dang /ma'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang /mi ma yin pa gze brjid che ba/gzi
409b7(mdo sde): brjid tsha ba che zhing che ba 'ongs shing lhags pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/rgya chen po la mos pa de dag thams cad kyang 'khor der tshogs shing 'khod par gyur to//de nas
410a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo glos brtan pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa de 'di snyam du sems te/gang bdag gis
410a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ji lta bu'i zhu ba zhus pas sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur pa dang /chos
410a3(mdo sde): kyi rigs kyang yongs su bsrungs par 'gyur pa dang /dge 'dun gyi rigs kyang shin tu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang mog mog
410a4(mdo sde): por byas par 'gyur ba dang /gang zag lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyang shin tu tshwar chod par 'gyur ba dang /sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyang dge
410a5(mdo sde): ba'i rtsi ba bskyed par 'gyur pa dang /sems cad dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /sems can gang dag byang chub
410a6(mdo sde): tu sems mo bskyed pa de dag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang /sems can gang dag byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur
410a7(mdo sde): ba dang /gang phyir mi ldog pa de dag kyang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang /sems can
410b1(mdo sde): dmigs pa can thams cad dang /bdag tu mngon par zhen pa rnams kyang lta ba de dag las bskyod par 'gyur ba dang /sems can dman pa la mos pa rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi
410b2(mdo sde): chos rgya chen po la mos par 'gyur ba dang /sems can rgya chen po la mos pa rnams kyang mgu zhing mchog tu dka' bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i zhu ba kun zhu bar bya'o snyam mo//de nas byung
410b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan po stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ljon
410b4(mdo sde): 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsil to//gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdeg
410b5(mdo sde): la skabs phye na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /
410b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//blo gros brtan pa dris pa lung bstan pa'i phyir khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas
410b7(mdo sde): rtag tu skabs phyis/blo gros brtan pa khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin shegs pa lo zhus shig dang /zhu ba zhus pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par
411a1(mdo sde): bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pas 'di skad ces gsal to//
411a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
411a3(mdo sde): rgya bar 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba dang /phyogs bcur snang ba'i phyir snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ba dang /bdud
411a4(mdo sde): thams cad tshar gcad pa'i phyir shes rab rgya chen po grags pas rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur ba dang /rang byung gi chos thob pa'i phyir ye shes la dbang du 'gyur ba dang /ma
411a5(mdo sde): bstan pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dring la 'jog par mi 'gyur ba dang /phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye bar ston pa'i phyir spobs pa rgyan mi chad par 'gur ba dang /
411a6(mdo sde): tshe bskal pa dpag tu med par 'dzin pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos la mos pa rnams la nyan thos kyi theg
411a7(mdo sde): pa ston par 'gyur ba dang /sems can rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos la mos pa rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ston par 'gyur ba dang /sems can theg pa
411b1(mdo sde): po'i chos la mos pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ston par 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang 'tshal cing 'chad la nyan thos kyi nges par gyur pa la'ang mi 'jug
411b2(mdo sde): pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang 'tshal cing 'chung la rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par gyur pa la'ang mi 'jug pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang 'tshal cing 'tsheng
411b3(mdo sde): la shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'ang thob par mi bgyid pa dang /nyan thos kyi kha dog dang /gzugs dang /rtags dang /cha byad rnams kyang sngon la byang chub kyi
411b4(mdo sde): sems dang yang mi 'brel ba dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi kha dog dang /gzugs dang /rtags dang /cha byad rnams kyang ston la sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje chen po dang yang mi
411b5(mdo sde): 'bral ba dang /sa bcu'i stobs bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nges par byung pos dri bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs dang /kha dog dang /cha byad
411b6(mdo sde): kyang ston pa dang /srid pa tha ma dang ldan pas dga' ldan gyi gon sa rab na gnas par yang gda' bu dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa'i phyir mngal du 'jug pa dang /bcos
411b7(mdo sde): pa dang /mngon par 'byung ba dang /dka' ba spyod pa dang /bdud 'dul ba dang /byang chub kyi snying po'ang ston pa dang /shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir byang chub kyang rnam
412a1(mdo sde): par 'tshang rga ba dang /gsol ba gdab pa dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang ston pa nas ye shes kyi stongs bskyed pa'i phyir sungs rgyas kyi yongs su mya
412a2(mdo sde): ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du'ang yongs su ston pa dang /ting nger 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir lus 'jig par yang ston pa dang /smon la mo gyi stong so brjod pa'i phyir//
412a3(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ba'ang ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin de gang yang mchi sa sam/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ti nge'i'adzin gang
412a4(mdo sde): la gnas na sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa rnam par stsal pa'ang ston cing gzugs su mthong ba thams cad kyang ston la/shin tu yongs su mya ngad las
412a5(mdo sde): 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
412a6(mdo sde): 'o/gros brtan po lo 'di skad ces dka' stsal to//blo gros brtan pa legs so legs so//yi blo gros brtan pa khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang //skye bo myang
412a7(mdo sde): rol 'dod dang /'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /skye pal po che dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /phan pa nga/bde ba dang /natu dang /ma 'ongs pa'i bya
412b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zhugs te/blo gros brtan pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de zhu bar sems pa legs so//legs so//'di ltar
412b2(mdo sde): gros brtan pa khyod ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas po/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/theg pa chen po na la yong
412b3(mdo sde): tusbyang ba byas pa/theg po thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba'i lam rnams su nges par bya dro ba/bdud dang /nyon mongs pa dang /phyir rgol ba bcom pa/chos pa phan
412b4(mdo sde): gdogs po'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos la rang dbang yod pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'o ye shes yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/byang chub sems dpa'
412b5(mdo sde): yongs su sdud po/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa'o//'di ltar blo gros brtan pa khyod ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i rlung gi bye ma snyel zhu ba
412b6(mdo sde): zhus pa'i lung bstan pa char phyin pa'o//blo gros brtan pa ngas ni skyes bu dam pa khyod lta bu theg pa che ni pro la yang dag par zhugs be go che chen po bgos po ma bstogs par
412b7(mdo sde): 'khor 'di na/lha 'am/klu 'am/gan sbyin nam/dri za'am/lha ma yin nam/nam mkha' lding ngam/mi 'am ci 'am/lto 'phye chen po 'am/mi ma mi ma
413a1(mdo sde): yin pa 'am/nyan thos kyi thug pa la yang dag par zhugs pa ma/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'ang rung ste/gang de bzhin
413a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa lnga don 'di 'dri nus pa de ma mthong ngo //blo gros brtan pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
413a3(mdo sde): chen po ting nge 'dzin gang dang ldan na yon tan gyi bye brag de dag dang de bas kyang shin tu ches khyad par du 'phags pa gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin de ngas
413a4(mdo sde): khyod la bstan to//bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das
413a5(mdo sde): kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//blo gros brtan paM dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba yod de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ti
413a6(mdo sde): de la gnas na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa rnam par sprul pa'ang ston la shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi 'gyur/gzugs su
413a7(mdo sde): ston pa thams cad kyang ston la gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las chos rnams 'khrugs par yang mi byed/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du'ang 'gro la sangs rgyas kyi
413b1(mdo sde): zhing sna tshogs su 'du shes pa'ang med/sangs rgyas thams cad dang phyed par yang 'gyur la chos kyi dbyings tha dad par yang mi byed/spyod pa thams cad du'ang snang la de dag
413b2(mdo sde): la spyod pa yongs su dag pa'ang shes/lha dang mi thams cad kyi bdag po'ang yongs su 'dzin la de dge rgyags shing bag med par 'gyur ba'ang mi skyed/bdud kyi yul thams
413b3(mdo sde): cad kyang ston la bdud kyi las la gnas pa'ang ma yin/khams gsum thams cad du'ang spyod la chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin shes pa las kyang mo g.yo//'chi bar yang mi
413b4(mdo sde): 'gyur/skye bar yang mi 'gyur/'gro ba thams cad du'ang skye la 'gro ba sna tshogs su 'du shes pa'ang ma yin/chos kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad kyang ston la yi ge mnyam pa
413b5(mdo sde): nyid dang /chos kyi tshul rtogs pa las kyang mi g.yo/gcig tu mnyam par yang bzhag la sems can yongs su smin par byed par spyod par yang snang la mi zad pa dang mi skye ba
413b6(mdo sde): la bzad pa dang ldan pa chos rnams kyi skye ba dang /'gog pa'ang rnam par 'jog/thams cad du ma zhum pa'i phyir seng ge'i rtsal gyis kyang 'gro zhing 'jig rten pa dang 'jig
413b7(mdo sde): rten las 'das pa'i bya ba thams cad na'ang snang la pad+ma bzhin du mi chags pa'i phyir rtag tu chos kyi kun dga' mchog la dga' zhing mos par yang 'gyur ro//de nas nyan
414a1(mdo sde): thos chen po de dag dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dag dang /'jig rten skyong ba dag dang /lha'i bu dag dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
414a2(mdo sde): de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag cag gos dpa' bor 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ming tsam yang sngon ma thos na/rgya cher rnam par phye zhing bshad pa lta ci smos te/gang bdag
414a3(mdo sde): cag gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ming thos pas na bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do//bdag cag 'khor 'dir legs par 'ongs so//bdag cag
414a4(mdo sde): gis de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang dag dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin
414a5(mdo sde): rnam par phye ste bshad pa 'di thos nas mos shing yid chos la dad pa de dag the tshom med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur
414a6(mdo sde): na/gang drog thos nas len pa dang /'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher ston pa dang /de bzhin nyid du nan tan
414a7(mdo sde): byed pa lta ci smos snyam mo//de nas brgya byin dag dang /tshangs pa dag dang /'jig rten skyong ba dag dang /lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/gang bdag cag
414b1(mdo sde): gris de bzhin gshegs pA la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir khri gang la bzhugs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ston pa'i chos kyi khri/skyes bu dam par
414b2(mdo sde): daklad pa chen po'i khri/chos kyi 'o khor lo chen po bskor ba'o khri'i seng ge'i khri nges par ba sham par bya'o snyam mo//khri de ltang bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs nas dpa' bar
414b3(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'chad par 'gyur ro snyam mo//de nas lha'i bu re re zhing yang badrug ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng gri'i khri shom gyi gzhan ni ma yin no snyam mo//de nas
414b4(mdo sde): lha'i ba dag dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rang rang gis slong gi'i khri sna tshogs pa/
414b5(mdo sde): ni sdug pa/'phang mtho ba/rgya che ba/yangs pa/ras bcos ma brgya stong du ma bting ba/steng gri dAr s+yAng las rin po che'i gdugs dang /rgyu lnga mchen dang /dra
414b6(mdo sde): g.yogs pa/kho ra khor yug tu rin po che'i stegs bus bskor ba/g.yas g.yon du rin po che'i shing ljon pa du mas brgyan pa/der gyi l-I ldi bres pa/mu tigra gi dreng
414b7(mdo sde): basbyangs pa/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan skyeng ba/bla bre bres pa/gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha'i dre bas g.yogs pa/me tog sna tshegs brngam pa/gser dang //
415a1(mdo sde): dngul dang /mu tig dang /nor bus brgyan pa/rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i rgyan gyi bkod pas legs par brgyan pa/gser phye bkram
415a2(mdo sde): pa/lha'i tsan+dan dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /phye ma dang /byug pa dang /spos thams cad kyis bsgos pa/me tog sna tshogs gtor ba/snying po dam pa dang ldan pa'i
415a3(mdo sde): pog phor nas bdug pa bshams par gyur te/de ltar de'i skad cig thang cig yud tsam la de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i lus bya ba'i phyir seng ge'i khri bye ba
415a4(mdo sde): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtse bzhi pa shams par gyur kyang 'khor dpas chen po la sgrib par yang mi byed/lha'i bu gcig gi su lho'i bu gcig shos kyi
415a5(mdo sde): bshams pa'ang ma mthong ste/lha'i bu re re zhing yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri ba shams pas bdag gi seng ge'i khri la de bzhin pa/shegras pa
415a6(mdo sde): bzhugs te/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'chad par shes so//de nas brgya byin dang /tshungs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dag dang /de ma yin pa'i
415a7(mdo sde): lha'i bu gzhan dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri bshams nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gi seng ge'i
415b1(mdo sde): khri 'di la bzhugs te/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bshad du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par
415b2(mdo sde): mdzad pas/seng ge'i khri bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rgya ba zhi po dri la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi mngon par sprul nas/seng ge'i khri de
415b3(mdo sde): dag thams cad la de bzhin go shegs pa dag bzhugs par snang ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad nas/de na lha'i bu re re zhing bdag bdag gi seng
415b4(mdo sde): ge'i khri la de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par mthong gi phan tshun du gcig gis gcig gi khri ni ma mthong ste/de ni brgya byin re re zhing brgya byin gnyis pa la kye grogs pa de bzhin
415b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa kho bo'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs kyis ltos shig ces ston to//gnyis pa'ang gsum pa la kye gogs po de bzhin gshegs pa kho bo'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs kyis
415b6(mdo sde): ltos shig ces smra'o//de bzhin du brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad dang /lha de dag kyang phan tshun gcig la gcig kyi grogs po dag de
415b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa kho bo'i seng ge'i khro la bzhugs kyis ltos shig ces ston to//de na re re zhing yang re re reg la de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin
416a1(mdo sde): 'chad pa kho bo'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs kyi khyod kyil ni ma yin no zhes de skad ces smra'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /
416a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong du de dag dang /lha'i bu de dag gdul ba'i dbang dang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'ing brtsam pa tsam bstan pa dang /theg bre chen po yongs su bsdu
416a3(mdo sde): bya'ang bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe ci nas kyang brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten stong ba rnams cad dang /lha'i bu de dag gis seng ge'i khri bye ba khrag khrig brgya
416a4(mdo sde): stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bzhugs par mthong ba de lta bu'i ltas bstan to//de na 'khor de dag
416a5(mdo sde): thams cad ngo mchir du gyur nas bdag bdag gi ston de dag las longs te/thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa laM phyag btsal te/tshig 'di
416a6(mdo sde): skad ces legs so legs so//'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas lha'i bu 'di dag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar te/sangs rgyas bcom
416a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes smras so//de ltar lci'i bu ji snyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i khri ba shams pa de dag thams cad kyis
416b1(mdo sde): dedi da gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong nas/thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas tshig 'di
416b2(mdo sde): skad ces/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyi ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba dang /dam pa'i chos yongs
416b3(mdo sde): su gzung ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi chad par bgyi ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar da ltar
416b4(mdo sde): na/de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa de bzhin du badrag cag kyang ma 'odus pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi yul la
416b5(mdo sde): gnas te/rnam par 'phrul bar bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lho'i bu de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/legs so legs so//lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no//
416b6(mdo sde): lha'i bu dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/gang sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba dang /dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyan mi
416b7(mdo sde): chad par bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i dam pa yin no//de nas tshangs pa'i 'khor de'i
417a1(mdo sde): nang nas tshangs pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa gang
417a2(mdo sde): dgag seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa lags sam/gang gzhan gyi seng gi'i khril bzhugs pa lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs
417a3(mdo sde): pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//tshangs pa chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa'i phyir sgyu ma lta bur byung ba/rnam par skyeb pas nye bar gnas
417a4(mdo sde): gA'i mtshan nyid byed pa med pa/yongs su rtog pa las byung ba ste/de dag ni ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa de lta de ltar rnam par sgrub do//tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pa
417a5(mdo sde): 'di dag thams cad na yang dag pa ma yin no//tshangs pa ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad yang dag pa ma yin zhe na/'di dag ni bden pa ma yin
417a6(mdo sde): te/'di dag ni mi bden pas na de'i phyir 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin no//byung ba ma yin/'byung bar 'gyur du'ang ma yin pas/de'i phyir 'di dag ni yang
417a7(mdo sde): dag pa ma yin no//de dag ni 'byung po chen pos ma bsdus pas na de'i phyir 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin no//'di dag ni phung pos ma bsdus/khams kyis ma
417b1(mdo sde): bsdus/skye mched kyis ma bsdus pas na/de'i phyir 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin no//'di dag ni yang drag pa ma yin/skyes pa ma yin/byung ba ma smin pas na/de'i
417b2(mdo sde): phyir 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin no//'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin te/thog ma ji lta bar tha mar yang de bzhin/bar du'ang de bzhin pas na de'i phyir 'di dag ni yang dag /
417b3(mdo sde): pa ma yin no//tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad ni mnyam pa ste khyad par med do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ni de bzhin gshegs
417b4(mdo sde): pa 'di dag thams cad mnyam ste khyad par ma mchis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i de dag ni gzugs kyi de bzhin
417b5(mdo sde): nyid kyis mnyam/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pas na de'i phyir 'di dag ni mnyam mo//tshangs pa de bzhin
417b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad ni thog ma'i mtha' de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam/tha ma'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam/da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam mo//tshangs
417b7(mdo sde): pab de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag ni sgyu ma'i chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam/mig yor gyi chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pas na/de'i phyir 'di dag ni mnyam mo//
418a1(mdo sde): tshangs pa de bzhin ga shogs pa 'di dag ma 'ongs pa'ide bzhin nyid kyis mnyam/da ltar byung ba de 'dzin nyid kyis mnyam/ma chags par
418a2(mdo sde): bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pas na de'i phyir 'di dag ni mnyam pa zhes bya'o//sa thams cad gang dang mnyam pa 'di dag kyang de dang mnyam/sems can thams cad ga
418a3(mdo sde): dang mnyam pa 'di dag kyang de dang mnyam/sangs rgyas thams cad gang drang mnyam pa 'di dag kyang de dang mnyam/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad gang dang mnyam pa
418a4(mdo sde): 'di dag kyang de dang mnyam pas na tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag ni mnyam pa nyid las mi lo'i ste/de'i phyir 'di dag ni mnyam mo//tshangs pa de bas na de bzhin
418a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'di dag ni mnyam pa nyid las ma 'das te/de'i phyir 'di dag ni mnyam mo//tshangs pa dri lta bas ni de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad
418a6(mdo sde): mnyam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa zhes bya'o//de nas bcom ldan
418a7(mdo sde): 'das la tshangs pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas 'di skad ces gsol te//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni de ltar chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid man
418b1(mdo sde): papa rdzogs par sangs rgyas la//gzugs kyi sku yongs su grub pa'ang sems can+da rnams la ston pa ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'dad kyis bka' stsal pa/tshangs
418b2(mdo sde): ni sngon dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin sbyangs pa'i khyod//yon te/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar chos thams cad kyi mnyim pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rnam
418b3(mdo sde): nas/gzugs kyi sku yongs su grub pa'ang sems can+da rnams la rton to//de bzhin gshe gras pa la blta ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/tshangs pa mnyartsa ba nyid la gnas
418b4(mdo sde): pas chos la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob bo//lha'i bu khris kyang chos la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur te//nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'khrul
418b5(mdo sde): bsdus nas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad ma snang bar byas pa dang /'khor de dag thams cad kyis bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu mthong ngo //de na mitsam snga
418b6(mdo sde): lnga ni 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa la bka'i stsal pa/blo gros brtan pa drapa'i bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni byang chub sems dpa' sa dang po la gA nas
418b7(mdo sde): pas mi 'thob/sa gnyis pa la gnas pas ma yin/sa gsum pa la gnas pas ma yin/sa bzhi pa la gnas pas ma yin/sa lnga pa la rnas pa ma yin/
419a1(mdo sde): sna drug pa la gnas pas ma yin/sa bdun pa la gnas pasam yin/sag+har+b+ba dpal gnas bsam yin/byang chub sems dpa'as dgu pal
419a2(mdo sde): gnas pas mi 'thob kyi/blo gros brtan pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni byang chub sems dpa' so bcu pa la gnas pas 'thob bo//blo gros brtan pa de la dpa' bar
419a3(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin de ga she na/'di lta ste/nam mkha'i khams bzhin du sems bskyed pa shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi sems
419a4(mdo sde): la rtog pa mngon sum du gyur pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang /mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang /gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la rnam par
419a5(mdo sde): lta ba mngon sum du gyur pa dang /las rnam par 'byed pa thams cad la las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang /mos pa sna tshogs la 'jug pa mi brjed
419a6(mdo sde): pad /m+b+has sna tshogs da /khams du ma dag mngon sum du gyur pa dang /tshangs pa'i dbyings dang /ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rdzob dang /rdo rje lta bu'i ting
419a7(mdo sde): nge 'dzin mthong zhing shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad gcig tu gyur pa dang /thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pas rnam par
419b1(mdo sde): ba dang /sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa la sgrib pa med pa dang /lha'i mig thogs pa med pas mthong ba dang /zag pa zad par bya ba dang /spangs par bya/
419b2(mdo sde): ba'i phyir dus gcig tu 'thob pa shes pa dang /gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa shes pa dang /gzugs thams cad ston cing rnam par 'phrul
419b3(mdo sde): pas rnam par rtse ba dang /sgra skad thams cad brag cha'i sgra dang mnyam pa dang /dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa dang /gzungs la 'jug pa shes pa dang /sems
419b4(mdo sde): can thams cad legs par bshad pas nom par byed pa dang /so so ci rigs por chos 'chad pa dang /dus dang dus ma yin pa la rnam par lta ba dang /dbang po 'gyur
419b5(mdo sde): ba shes pa dang /chos 'chad pa don med pa ma yin pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa shes pa dang /sems can thams cad rab tu gzung ba dang /char
419b6(mdo sde): gcad pa la mkhas pa shes pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /spyod lam ma brtags pa dang /rtog pa dang /rnam par rtog pa dang /
419b7(mdo sde): yongs su rtog pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa dang /chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa mnyam pa'i ngos la 'jug pa shes pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
420a1(mdo sde): kyi zhabs kyi drung du skad cig gis lus ston pa dang /de bzhin gshogs pa thams cad kyis chos bshad pa 'dzin cing mi brjed pa dang /mig yod
420a2(mdo sde): lta bu'i lus 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa dang /theg pa thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba ston pa la mkhas pa dang /theg pa chen po las
420a3(mdo sde): nyams pa dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs 'dzin pa dang /phyi ma'i mthu'i mur thug pa'i bskal par go cha sra zhing yongs su mi skyo ba dang /skye ba'i gnas thams
420a4(mdo sde): ts+tshad du tsI rigs par byed pa ston pa dang /sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad
420a5(mdo sde): kyi ye shes kyis gting dpag dka' ba dang /dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad mngon por sgrub pa bstan pa shes pa dang /chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags
420a6(mdo sde): pa'i grwanas shes pa dang /bskal pa gcig tu bskal pa grangs med pa 'jug pa dang /bskal pa grangs med pa la bskal pa gcig 'jug pa dang /zhing thams
420a7(mdo sde): cad du zhing gcig yang dag par 'du zhing 'jug pa dang /zhing gcig la zhing thams cad ston pa shes pa dang /skra'i khyon gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis
420b1(mdo sde): mikhyab pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa 'jug pa shes pa dang /hU~M sems can gcig gi lus la sems can thams cad kyi lus yang dag par 'du zhing 'jug pa shes pa dang /
420b2(mdo sde): mongs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang /rang gi lus la sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa dang /rang gi
420b3(mdo sde): lus lus thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par rtogs pa la mkhas pa dang /thabs thams cad lo mkhas pa dang /thabs thams
420b4(mdo sde): cad la mkhas pa'i bya ba shes pa dang /sgra skad cig phyung bas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du grags pa dang /tshig gcig la brtsams nas bskal pa grangs med par thachad
420b5(mdo sde): pa dang /chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos su rtogs pa dang /chos kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad bstan pa la mkhas pa shes pa dang /'gre ba dang 'gre ba
420b6(mdo sde): ma yin pa la mkhas pa shes pas rnam par dpyod pa dang /zung gi rim pa dang /skul zhi'i rgyud bstan pa shes pa dang /bdud kyi lam thams cad las yang dag
420b7(mdo sde): par 'da' ba shes pa dang /thabs chen po l-i mkhas pas shes rab dang /ye shes kyi 'od zer gtong ba dang /lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi las ye shes
421a1(mdo sde): sngon du 'gro ba dang /mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon du gyur cing thob pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis sems can gyi khams zad
421a2(mdo sde): da tshim par byang ba dang /chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyis klas par rnam par 'phrul ba ston pa dang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can thams cad yongs su 'dzin
421a3(mdo sde): ba dang 'jig rten gyi khabs thams cad du sems can gyi tha snyad thams cad rtogs pa dang /sgyu ma lta bu'i chos bsgrub pa la the tshom med pa dang skye
421a4(mdo sde): thams cad la dbang thob pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang yo byad la dbang thob pa dang /sems can thams cad bsam pa bzhin du tshim par byed pa dang /tshul khrim
421a5(mdo sde): 'chal pa dang tshul khrims dang ldan pa la sbyin gnas su sems mnyam pa dngabyang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba thams cad thob pa dang 'jig rten
421a6(mdo sde): gyi khams thams cad du 'od zer gtong ba dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtsho drug can pa gting dpag dka' ba shes pa dang sems sa dang /chu dang
421a7(mdo sde): dang rlung dang mnyam pa dang tshig bstan pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la 'jug pa dang /
421b1(mdo sde): bstan pa rang gi bzod pa dang /ye shes thob pa dang /rin po che lta bu'i sems bskyed pas kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis dri mas mi gos pa dang /sna gcig na
421b2(mdo sde): thung bar chu'i phung po thams cad chung par byed pa chun gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la'i 'ganod par mi 'gyur ba dang dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa'i bsod
421b3(mdo sde): rnams sogs pa'i snying po yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i bya ba shes pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang 'phrul pa la ye shes thogs pa med pa
421b4(mdo sde): dang sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la dbugs phyin pa thob pa dang rang gi lus kyi smon lam gyis sems can 'dzin pa'i
421b5(mdo sde): spyod pa'i gnas rgyun ma gcad pa kun tu ston pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul la 'jug pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la
421b6(mdo sde): rnam par lta ba mngon sum du gyur pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la 'jug pa dang /brtse ba dang /dga' ba dang /longs spyod thams cad kun tu
421b7(mdo sde): ston pa dang sems zhi zhing rab tu zhi la nye bar zhi ba dang thos pa tshad med pa 'dzin pa rdzogs pa dang /thos pa thams cad kyi nan tan rgyun mi gcod pa dang
422a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis myi gos pa dang /bskal pa grangs myed
422a2(mdo sde): pa snga dro gcig tu byin gyis rlob cing chos 'chad pa dang /spyod lam thams cad du lkug pa dang /grum po dang /rna ba mi gsang ba dang /glen pa dang /'on
422a3(mdo sde): pa dang /long bri ston cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /lce'i dbang pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad khebs par byed pa dang /sangs
422a4(mdo sde): rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas 'bying ba ston pa dang /lag na rdo rje 'bum rtag tu phyi bzhin du 'brang ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub
422a5(mdo sde): rang byung gi ye shes la rnam par lta ba mngon sum du gyur pa dang /rtag par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams la sreg pa'i bskul pa ston pa dang /tsho'i tshed
422a6(mdo sde): bskal pa tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du byin gyis rlob pa dang /sems kyi skad cig thang cig yud tsam la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston cing 'gro
422a7(mdo sde): ba shes pa dang /nyan thos dang rang songs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod lam ston pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rgyun mi ga cod pa dang /
422b1(mdo sde): zhi zhing rab tu zhi la nye bar zhi ba dang /mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa dang /sol snyan dang /pheg rdob pa dang /rol mo'i sgra dbyangs 'byin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs
422b2(mdo sde): pa thams cad la blta ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /mchod par bya ba rgyun mi gcod pa dang /thos pa dang /mthong ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /'dod pa dang /
422b3(mdo sde): 'gro ba dang /bstan pa dang /rjes su dran par byas te/sems can mtha' yas pa/tshad med pa/yongs su smin par byed pa dang /sems kyi skad cig sems
422b4(mdo sde): kyi skad cig la 'dul ba'i sems ca na ji ltar yongs su smin pa la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /rnam par grol ba ston pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' dag
422b5(mdo sde): mngal du 'jug pa dang /bcas pa dang /mngon par 'byung ba dang /dka' ba spyod pa dang /byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang /bdud 'dul ba dang /byang chub mngon
422b6(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po dang /lus 'jigs pa'ang ston la byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid
422b7(mdo sde): de'ang mi gtong zhing shin tu phung po med par yang mya ngan las mi 'da' ba 'di ni blo gros brtan pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/'di ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i
423a1(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi yul lo//gzhan yang dpag tu med pa dag yod do//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ji ltar nam mkha' dag gyur cing //rdul gyis
423a2(mdo sde): gos par mi 'gyur bzhin//dpa' 'gro ting 'dzin gnas pa yang //yid ni de ltar sgom par byed//gang phyir lus can thams cad kyi//rnam par bcas pa'i
423a3(mdo sde): sems shes pa//des na 'di ni bdag nyid che//de yi mtshan mar rab tu shes//dpa' 'gro rtogs par khong chud pas//sems can dag gi dbang po rnams//
423a4(mdo sde): rno ba dag dang rdul ba dang //gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes//las kun rnam par phye ba dang //rnam par smin pa sna tshogs dang //sems can rnams kyi
423a5(mdo sde): mos pa yang //bde gshegs sras dris shes par 'gyur//sems can khrims ni mkhas pa la//de ni chags par 'gyur ba med//gang phyir de yis mi
423a6(mdo sde): rmongs pas//tshangs dbyangs ting 'dzin shes par 'gyur//rdo rje snying po'i ting nge 'dzin//sra ba des ni shes gyur nas//ting nge 'dzin la mnyam gzhag ste//
423a7(mdo sde): lag na 'dug bzhin mthong bar 'gyur//chos rnams kun gyi lam gyur pa//thams cad du ni gang 'gro ba'i//dam pa thub pas bshad pa ste//de dag 'dis ni/
423b1(mdo sde): rtogs par 'gyur//de nas de yi sngon gyi gnas//shes pa la ni 'jug par 'gyur//lha mig dri ma med pa yis//'gro ba dag ni mthong bar 'gyur//zag pa dag ni zad/
423b2(mdo sde): dus kyang //mkhas de mya ngan 'da' mi byed//gzugs yod pa dang gaN+Di/snga med pa'o//tshan nyid gcig pa mnyam pa shes//ji ltar skye ba'i mkhan pa dag/sna tshogs
423b3(mdo sde): rnam par bye ba ltar//dpa' bo des ni gzugs kun kyang //ting nge 'dzin gyis rim gyis ston//sgra kun gyi ni mnyam pa nyid //brag cha lta bu rnam dang /drang //sems can
423b4(mdo sde): kun d+hi skad rnams kyang //skad cig tsam gyis des shes so//gzungs dang ye shes ldan pas ni//skad kyi dad la myur du 'jug/skra dbyings kyin thog mar mtha'/
423b5(mdo sde): lce bzhin du rtogs par 'gyur//rdul med dran dang blo gros kyis//thub pa gshegs par myur du 'ju//legs pa shid pas na sems can la//sdig pa med pa
423b6(mdo sde): yid dga' byed//sems can rnams lnga ci rigs par//dgra bcom brin chos 'chad do//mo yi dus dang dus mya yin//blos ni rnam par rtog byer byed//
423b7(mdo sde): ji ltar dbang po rnams 'byung ba//de lta nyid du phyi phyir zhing //cho ga bzhin du shes gyur nas//brten pa das pa don yang stan//yang dag mtha' ni phra ba nyid/
424a1(mdo sde): nang nam du rgyags pa ra //sas ldan m+b+ha dang rgyu ga du//dusan nam ma //gang ma na
424a2(mdo sde): byatshom//kun tu rtog pa ma bsgribs pa//pha rol sbyin pa'i pha rol na//smod lam la ni mo rtog go/chos dbyings 'dres pa med pa yang //ye shes chos ni
424a3(mdo sde): rtogs par 'gyur//sangs rgyas gang dag phyogs bzhugs pa//skad cig tu yang kun tu snang //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//chos bstan gang dag
424a4(mdo sde): ci yod pa//de kun shes rab ljon pas lan//rmongs pa dag tu 'gyur ba med//mig yir lta bu'i lus rnams kyis//zhing kun tu yang snang bar 'gyur//nad
424a5(mdo sde): med theg pa thams cad pa//blo ldan sangs rgyas bzhin du 'chad//brgal zhugs brtan par gyur pa de//theg chen de las mi nyams te//dkon mchog gsum
424a6(mdo sde): rigs gnas bya'i phyir//de ltar rnam pa gsum du 'chad//phyi ma'i mthar ni go bgos kyang //de ni skye bar mi 'gyur te//snying rje las ni byung ba ste//sems
424a7(mdo sde): can ris ni kun na sdong //shin tu blo dang ldan pa yis//skye bo'i mtshan nyid kun bstan te//mkhas pas sems can thams cad ni//mying du yongs su smin
424b1(mdo sde): par byed//sems can kun gyi bsam pa dang //sems kyi spyod yul shes pas na//de bas de ni nyan thos dang //lus can kun gyis rtogs par dka'//rkang
424b2(mdo sde): du gnyis ni med pa der//dbyangs kyi yan lag kun bsgrub slob//chos rnams kun las 'phags zhi ba//gzhal yas chos ni ston par byed//rnam grol shes
424b3(mdo sde): pa bskal gcig tu//bskal pa du ma ston par byed//skal pa rnam pa du ma dag/bskal pa gcig tu ston par byed//zhing ni rnamo pa du ma dang /zhing gcig
424b4(mdo sde): tu ni ston par byed//zhing gcig rnam pa du ma yi//zhing rnams su na ston par byed//skra yi rtse mo gcig tu yang //zhing rnams thams cad ston par byed//de bzhin
424b5(mdo sde): du ni l+r-i gcig la//sdig med lus kun ston par byed//zhing kun dper na na mo mkha' bzhin//dag pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur//de ni bdag gi lus kyis
424b6(mdo sde): kyang //zhang rnams thams cad khyab par byed//bdag gi lus dang chos kyi dbyings//de gnyis mnyam par rab tu shes//chos kyi dbyings ni mtshan ma med//snang
424b7(mdo sde): ba med pa nyid du rtogs//sna tshogs kyi ni thabs la mkhas//sgra bsem mo khyab nam mkha' bzhin//don rig tshig gcig brtsams byos nas//bskal pa'i bar
425a1(mdo sde): du 'chud par byed//sems can rnon po chos kun la//sargyas kyis ni chos su rtogs//che/gi rab tu dbye bstan la// khas pa 'ag \u0f7f
425a2(mdo sde): 'gyur//rgyud kyi rnam pa sna tshogs po//zung dang snrel zhi sgrung par byed//du min mnan gyur nas//yum las 'od zer gtong bar byed//de yi lus dang ngag yid
425a3(mdo sde): lA ni ye shes sngon du 'gro//de ni tshe rabs tshe rabs su//rdzu 'phrul mngon par thob par 'gyur//so sor rig pa'i stobs du skyed pas//dbang ldan chos kyi dbyings su ni//
425a4(mdo sde): rnam par 'phrul pa du mi byed//g.yo ba med pa'i gnas 'chad do//bsdu pa rnam pa bzhi po yis//sems can bu gcig bzhin du sdud//de dag gi ni smra ba dngong //sgra dang skad
425a5(mdo sde): kyang shes par 'gyur//des na sgyu ma 'dra ba'i chos//byin gyis brlabs nas rnam par 'phrul//sems can thams cad skye bar gnas//nam mkha' lta bur snang ba
425a6(mdo sde): 'gyur//rnam thos bu ni ji bzhin du//yo byad kun ldan phyog thob nas//sems can rnams kyi 'dod pa yi//bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed//tshul khrims
425a7(mdo sde): 'tshal dang khrims ldan la//de yi sems ni de tshe mnyam//sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba yang //gang zag dam pas shes par 'gyur//'od zer dra ba byas nas
425b1(mdo sde): kyang //'jig rten khams rnams khyab byed de//shes rab ldan pas gting dpag dku'//rgya mtsho chen po chu ldan bzhin//sa chu me dang mtshungs pa dang //rlung dang nam mkha' 'angadra
425b2(mdo sde): ba'i yid//de ni rtag par sems can la//snying brtse ba yi phyi 'jug go/srid pa sel ba ngo yis ni//mi skye dam pa'i bzod thob nas//nor bu rin chen dag pa ltar//de bzhin
425b3(mdo sde): nyon mongs mi gos so//spu yi khung bu gcig tu ni//chu yo phung po kun 'jug cing //bska lnga pa chen po rnam par rtse//dge ba phun sum tshogs par byed//yongs su bsngo bar
425b4(mdo sde): bya ba la//de yi shes pa mi rmongs te//sems can rnams kyi spyod shes nas//'bral pa chen po nye bar 'gyur//chos kun rtogs par bya ba'i phyir//de yi sems ni rtag
425b5(mdo sde): por 'jug/lus ni sbyangs shing rdul med de//mya ngan bral ba ser sna med//sems can rnams ni gang las ste//de ni smad pa med pas sheso//sangs rgyas rnams kyi
425b6(mdo sde): spyod yul yang //smra bo'i mchog gis rab tu shes//de bzhin gshegs pas gang mkhyen pa//de kun la ni rtog par byed//sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsong ba kun//
425b7(mdo sde): des ni rjes su rtogs par 'gyur//gang yang rtse dang dga' ba dang //de dag thams cad des stan te//thos pa dag ni tshod med pas//thos pa rgya tsho thob par 'gyur//
426a1(mdo sde): thos pa 'tshol bas bosbas pa med//'jig rten chos dang mthun 'jug pa//'jig rted kyis ni mi gos te//mtsha'u'i pad+ma ji bzhin no//de ni
426a2(mdo sde): dra gcig tu yang //bskal pa mang po ston par byed//bdag ni glen pa lkug pa yi//dbyings dag tu ni ston par byed//lag 'ardo rje stong dag dang //'grogs shi
426a3(mdo sde): sems can smin par byed//rang byung ba ni rtag tu shes//de nyid la ni rtog par byed//bskol pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i//tshe ni skad cig gcig lado na//de ni nyen thos
426a4(mdo sde): rang rgyal gyi//bye ba dag kyang ston par byed//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la//rtag pa kho nar rjes su 'jug/sems kyis rtag tu zhi ba dang //nye bar zhi zhing phung po
426a5(mdo sde): med//sems can dga' bar byed pa yi//sil snyan dkol ba kun kyang shes//sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal dang //bsnyen bkur bya ba gtong mi byed//mthong ba dang
426a6(mdo sde): ni thos pa yis//sems tson mang po smin par byed//skad cig tu ni sna tshogs pa'o//sems can dag ni ston par byed//dpa' bo la lar btsas pa dang /mngon
426a7(mdo sde): par 'byung dang 'chi ba ston//la lar yongs su mya ngan 'da'//la la ri 'khor lo bskor ba'o//la lar bdud rnams rob tu 'joms//la lar dka' ba spyod byed
426b1(mdo sde): kyang //sems can thar bar bya ba'i phyir//shin tu mya dran mi 'da' 'o//dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzid kyi//yul ni 'di 'dra 'di yin te//gang gis ting 'dzin de thob pa//dri med de ltar
426b2(mdo sde): rnam par rtse//blo gros brten pa de ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/de'ang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul yin no//gzhan dag kyang dpag tu med pa yod de//
426b3(mdo sde): bloglos brtan pa de ltar na dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni tshad med pa bstan pa'o//sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul dang yul bkod pa ston pa'o//sems can thams cad nye bar
426b4(mdo sde): 'tsho ba'o//'gro ba thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'o//blo gros brtan pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni bshad pa gcig tu mi blta/spyod yul gcig tu ma yin/rnam pa
426b5(mdo sde): gcig tu ma yin/dmigs pa gcig tu ma yin/don gcig las byung bar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/blo gros brtan pa ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /snyoms par
426b6(mdo sde): 'jug pa thams cad dang /rnam par thar pa thams cad dang /rdzu 'phrul dang /mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa de dag thams cad ni/
426b7(mdo sde): dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi nang du 'dus shing chud par blta'o//blo gros brtan pa 'di lta ste/dper na chu mig dang /mtshe'u dang /rdzing dang /lteng ka dang /chu bran
427a1(mdo sde): dang /'bab chu dang /'bab chu chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag ni rgya mtsho chen por 'dus par blta'o//blo gros brtan pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
427a2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar paM gang ji snyed po dag dang /rdzu 'phrul thams cad dang /mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par

427a4(mdo sde): lag bzhi pa thams cad ni dpa' bo g.yul du 'jug pa'i lag tu song zhing dbang du gyur pa yin te/dpa' bo g.yul du 'jug pa gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der dpung gi
427a5(mdo sde): tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'ang 'gro'o//blo gos brtan pa de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'am/snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo 'am/chos la gnas pa'i sgo'am/rnam
427a6(mdo sde): par thar pa'i sgo 'am/gzungs kyi sgo 'am/mngon par shes pa dang /rig pa dang /rnam par grol ba'i sgo gang ji snyed pa chos la gnas pa'i sgo de dag thams
427a7(mdo sde): cad ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lag tu song ba yin/dbang du gyur pa yin/mngon du gyur pa yin te/blo gros brtan pa byang chub sems dpa'i
427b1(mdo sde): dpa' 'gro bapo ting nge 'dzin gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid du chos la gnas pa'i sgo thams cad 'gro'o//blo gros brtan pa 'di lta ste/dper na 'khor
427b2(mdo sde): 'os sbyar ba'i rgol po gar 'gro da der rin po che sna bdun yang 'gro'o//blo gos brtan pa de bzhin du dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gar 'gro ba der byang chub kyi phyogs

427b4(mdo sde): brtan pa dpa' bar 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni longs smod btsal te/sbyin pa bged par byed par mi blta yi/blo gros brtan
427b5(mdo sde): pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rin po che gang ji snyed pa rgya mtsho chen po na yod pa'am/lha'i gnas na yod pa 'am/klu'i gnas na yod pa
427b6(mdo sde): 'am/sa chen po'i steng na yod pa 'am/gnod sbyin gyi lag na yod pa'am/mi'i 'jig rten na yod pa'i rin po che'ang rung /zas dang skom dang gos dang /
427b7(mdo sde): bzhon pa'ang rung ste/de dag thams cad la de dbang phyug tu gyur pa yin/dbang du gyur pa yin no//gang la sbyin par 'dod pa de la sbyin par byed de/de'ang
428a1(mdo sde): smra pa sems da'i sbyin pa sa / pa yongs su snying byu ba'i byu ga ltar//thugs brtan pa zlon na yang dang 'byor 'gyu

428a3(mdo sde): 'dul ba de phyir chub khams kyi len par byed/bsgrub pa'ang yongs su 'dzin par rnyed/ga dang spyod da 'di ston la byung ba las byung bar ltung sa
428a4(mdo sde): da/ dgas par ltung la dakhrims padu du ltung ba rnyed pa'i chos dang dun pa na/de smranas kyin la sa smra smin byer bya ba'i sbyi dang
428a5(mdo sde): dgyenganas su smra /'khri di lus sur bya'i rgyal por sbyin nas/dud myed rdzogs kyis mdun du du dang byu /btsun ma'i 'khod kyi drug sa /
428a6(mdo sde): 'dad la 'i sa spyod par yang pa'i nga/bu mo dang/chung mas pa tshong ba'i khyiman 'ang gnas/de'ang 'dod chags dang bral ba/ nge'i rgyu myim ra/

429a1(mdo sde): gshe bar yang mi byed/gnod sems dang ldan pa'i dbang por yang snang la ngo bo nyid bsgoms pras gnod sems su'ang mi byed/bsnyen
429a2(mdo sde): bar dka' bar yang snang la chos gang yong nye ba 'am/ring bar yang mi gnas/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir spyod lam thams cad rnam par 'khrugs
429a3(mdo sde): pAr yang byed la/chos kyi dbyings 'khrugs par yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de ni bzod pa smra ba'ang rjod la rtog pa dang /brtan pa dang /ther drug dang
429a4(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang mi bzod do//de de ltar bzod pa dang ldan pas gnod sems dang /tha ba dang zhe sdang dang /khro ba mang ba'i sems can rnams la gnod
429a5(mdo sde): sems dang /tha ba dang /zhe sdang dang /khro ba spang ba'i phyir bzod pa'i bsngags pa'ang rjod la gnod sems dang /bzod pa'ang mi dmigs shing /de dus thams
429a6(mdo sde): cad du ma snang ma nyams so//blo gros brtan pa de ni dpa' bur 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa yos su sbyong bar byed pa'i bye brag tu
